story:
Need something special for your daily commuting? Folding or non-folding?

Now, you don’t need to hesitate, here comes the Morfuns Éole. With the ultra-light carbon fiber frame and elegant look, Éole will definitely be the best companion for you!

We are one of the earliest manufacturers who put seat post battery design into folding bike frame. Some of our models have been selling all over the world now.

The Japanese market is quite strict on the stability and safety of the electrical system. Morfuns Bicycle team has passed the certification test in Japan twice in a row last year and we achieved remarkable sales in the Japanese market as well.

All delivery can be guaranteed! Based on years’ sales, we have developed not only wide  distribution network, but also mature overseas warehouse system located in the United States, Germany and Netherlands so as to help us cover the delivery to most of our major markets.

You Can See Us On

Easy to lift up to go upstairs.

Light enough for a lady to carry down from the trunk.

 

 

Working with carbon fiber can be something special also. The whole frame is only 1.1kg and the folding hitch, originally designed by our team, weighs about 0.8kg. With a 7.0Ah seat post battery, Éole can offer a range of 50km on pedal assist model.

 

Éole C

The C here stands for comfortable and convenient, both are basic features for a good folding electric bike. Éole C takes only carbon fiber frame to reduce the weight of the whole bike. For others parts, they are all from our mature supplying system so as to make the bike a more affordable version.

 

Éole S

The S does not only mean Sports, but also Super light. Comparing to C, most of the parts of S are lightweight options, like the frame, seat post, handlebar, stem, chainwheel and even the motor. All these options contribute to super light weight of 12.8kg, including the battery.

 

No matter you are tall or short（150cm-195cm）, by adjusting the height of the seat post and stem, you will always find the right position to ride your Éole.

 

 

We know that you may have seen some models with this battery design already on Indiegogo, but what makes us different? 


 

Additional bottle battery for extra 50km range.

For most people, lightweight and good riding performance are the most important things for a folding bike. But some people may worry about the range. Thus, we designed this bottle battery to be a solution for the last miles. Samsung 7.0Ah, simple connection, only 1.5kg, easy to store. This may be the best balance between lightweight and longer range.

 

Inside The Box

FYI, when you purchase one bike, it will include one charger inside the packaging box. If you would need another one for a backup, such as putting one at home and the other in the office, you can also buy one in the ADD-ONs. 

We know you may wonder if you can choose any other optional accessories and here comes the guideline. Check the video above and learn how to select the Add-Ons for your Éole!

 

Building a new model is never an easy thing to do, that's why we are so proud of this passionate team. Our name Morfuns does not only mean we shall bring more funs to our great customers, but also to ourselves. 

 

Production Stage

 

Final Shipping

 

Contact Us

story:
HYX6, The Folding Scooter in the Backpack.

 

Small in size, light in weight and delicate in appearance.​

 

Folding design, carry with you. ​

 

Fashionable and beautiful, not general lightweight.​

 

Convenient go out, Accompany you along with you.​

 

Minimalist style, artistic quality. ​

 

Battery detachable design, powerful function.​

 

USB mobile charging, no longer worried about the phone's lack of electricity.​

 

High fidelity Bluetooth sound, music accompanied, no longer lonely.​

 

4000mAh battery capacity, longer endurance.

 

The unique press type control design is more simple and convenient.​

 

Equipped with LED highlighting headlights, safe and smooth travel at night.​

 

Liquid crystal display, speed, mileage, electricity and so on at any time.​

 

Creative small hook, can load 10KG, release your hands.​

 

The double shock absorber design, let you as though walking upon flat ground.​

 

Parameter & Color​

 

Quality Certification​

 

Show​

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/937893136075911173

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/937895159458443264

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/937895297736310784

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/937895432151187457

 

TIMELIN

 

TEAM

 

 

We are a professional folding electric car manufacturer integrating design, research and development, production and sales. We have an elite R & D team.

 

Adhering to the mission of satisfying customers, we are committed to creating a folding electric vehicle suitable for urban travel.

 

Product innovation as the core technology, lean production as a management tool, quality assurance as an important goal, only for better travel experience.

 

The team created products, won 22 international patents. Through the European CE certification, battery MSDS safety certification, product FCC standard certification, national inspection and testing and other authoritative security certification, the quality of trustworthy.

story:
Short Summary

 

  • We are 2 engineers and 2 cousins and we were tired of spending +30% of our travel budget on Airport transfers. We created Tindrive to solve this issue.
  • This crowdfunding Campaign will help us launch Tindrive in a first target city where Airport transfers are expensive (Paris for instance)
  • Contributors will help us achieve a cheap driving experience (€0.8/km) in this target city.

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • We need €20000 to launch Tindrive with 3 used electric cars and 2 motivated drivers for 6 months to showcase the app (already available on the app store and Google play) in the targeted city (for instance Paris).
  • These first cars on Tindrive will demonstrate our business model and our competitive price of €0.8/km, making for example a drive to Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport at €19 from Paris Downtown compared to €54 with Uber
  • If we don't reach your entire goal the funds will go into buying the sensors we need for our different internship proposals (cf. PM2.5 dynamic monitoring, dB level dynamic monitoring, 4G/5G/wifi dynamic monitoring)

The Impact

 

  • By contributing to this Project you will help end the oligopoly Taxis/Uber have on airport transfers and make the airport transfers as small fraction of the total travel budget as it should always have been. In addition you will help car owners - all car owners, including  2-doors car, older cars, convertibles, etc - who are not accepted on Uber/Taxis to make some extra Money with their cars. Indeed, Tindrive is legal and available for all, since it is a car rental service.
  • This is not our first app/Project and you can check out our Barterx app if you are curious. Basically we get things done.
  • The Tindrive app is ready and we want to demonstrate it with first users and vehicles. Do not hesitate to try it yourself.

Risks & Challenges

 

  • Tindrive uses a sharing economy business model which utilises already existing assets like cars. Tindrive do not have to purchase these cars. This is a major benefit – at least in terms of the cost structure. It can help to scale up the business extremely fast. But it can also limit this. If potential car owners ar not willing to join Tindrive, it will fail. And this critical mass problem (or chicken and egg problem)  is why we want to start with our own cars for a few months.
  • By demonstrating the financial benefits of renting the Wheel of the 3 cars we will operate thanks to this Campaign Tindrive intends to attract some car owners who cannot presently work for Uber/Taxis, because their cars are not accepted (ex:2-doors or leisure activity vehicles or light commercial vehicles) and solve this chicken and egg issues typical of sharing economy platforms.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • If you cannot contribute financially to this Campaign but you are tired of expensive airport transfers fares or if your car does not qualify on Uber/Taxi you can support us by downloading our app and register as a user or as a car owner.
  • Use the Indiegogo share Tools to spread the Word: there is an alternative to Uber/Taxi and it is cheaper because you drive. It is called Tindrive.

And that's all there is to it.

By demonstrating the financial benefits of renting the Wheel of the 3 cars we will operate thanks to this Campaign Tindrive intends to attract some car owners who cannot presently work for Uber/Taxis, because their cars are not accepted (ex:2-doors or leisure activity vehicles or light commercial vehicles) and solve this chicken and egg issues typical of sharing economy platforms.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
About Bold Records

Since 2014 we have helped create content that glorifies Christ, encourages believers, and intrigues the unreached. This is our mission. In a forever changing landscape, we are firmly committed to the one thing that remains the same, the Gospel of Jesus Christ. We honor God, prioritize people and commit to excellence. By the grace of God, the mission continues.

 

Our Plan

Bold Records is embarking on a fundraising campaign to reach out to nonbelievers and the youth. Our objective is to travel to as many locations as possible spreading God’s Word through music and fellowship. We want to see people move from darkness to light. We strive to help nonbelievers and the youth learn how to serve their communities in many ways, such as, feeding the homeless, volunteering and cleaning up neighborhoods. Our goal is to raise $10,000 to purchase a passenger van for our traveling ministry. We plan to achieve this goal by selling merchandise until October 2018 then we will be selling raffle tickets for a chance to win some big prizes. The merchandise includes “Reaching the Lost Souls” T-shirts, stylus pens, acrylic tumblers. The raffle tickets will be $10, and the prizes will depend on the winners’ location. You can also help by sharing the campaign with your friends and on your social networks. We welcome any and all donations. 

Thank You!

story:
My name is Roger Artola and I am a film maker and car enthusiast. I have been working in the film industry for the past eight years. Something I would always notice on my way to different productions were people pulled over on the side of the road. I would stop to help when I could, but what I found was most people didn’t have road side assistance. They would call a friend and hope they weren’t busy or ask a stranger to help. Most of the time it would be something simple like running out of gas or needing a jump. These days most people don't have the time to wait hours on end for a tow truck and even if they did have AAA, they had to make sure they weren’t maxed out on their service for the year. These situations are where the Rode Syde app could have really come in handy.

 

The key to a successful app is function and reliability. With your contributions we can maximize the apps potential and insure a strong launch for this app. I believe this app has the potential to be very successful.

Every cent that is raised for this campaign will go towards developing this app properly. I want this to be an app for the people. The idea behind Rode Syde is to give something back to the community, offering both financial freedom and quick access to top notch road side assistance. My goal for this app is to always put the people first. We are excited for the fun perks we are providing. We will be rewarding those who back us with Jumps, gas refills, car washes,  and so much more. If for some reason we do not make our goal, we will still be pressing forward with this project doing everything we can with what we’ve received.

Rode Syde is my way of giving back to society and giving the power back to the people. As a successful business owner of a production company, I am confident that my passion for technology and helping others can be merged into this one app where everyone benefits. I have big plans for reward systems for both the Rode Syde providers and the service requesters.

With any business there will always be challenges. The biggest challenge will be making something that is user friendly and fun to use. With your help we can insure that we have the team capable of molding that reality. Even if you are unable to contribute to this project, a simple repost or share can do wonders for us. We thank you for being a part of Rode Syde in any capacity.

story:
This campaign represents the newest iteration in development in the Transportation as a Service (TaaS) model. An innovative approach to elevated personal rapid transit (EPRT) that will enable cost-effective, convenient, and environmentally responsible transportation.

Be a part of the team developing, testing and implementing this EPRT technology.

The Personal Transportation (PT) Solution is a state-of-the-art transit system that leverages proven technology and a commercial business model to offer communities and commuters a true TaaS experience.

This crowdfunding campaign will raise capital to build and test key components of the ‘first mile’ of a fully operational system: the drivetrain and ribbon rail. As development continues contributors will have a front row seat to see how The PT Solution can deliver on-demand, point-to-point, automated, networked, and elevated transportation.

Completing the ‘first-mile’ will qualify The PT Solution to be included as a viable option in current and future Personal Rapid Transit (PRT) studies.

The principal, Cal Chamberlain, has had a career that spans the defense, space, manufacturing and consulting industries from value engineer, VP R&D to CEO.

After many years of commuting and watching traffic congestion continue to increase, despite bigger and bigger highways, Cal knew there “must be a better way.” The economic and environmental impact of automobile-based transportation were just not sustainable.

Following years of research and design, this funding phase will enable us to demonstrate both the technology and the business model.  

The PT Solution is committed to building a long-term partnership with our investors and supporters to build this new PRT system. Our goal is to raise $50,000. Donors will each receive a 100-mile credit to their PT Solution Travel Account for each $100 dollar commitment.

The $50,000 raised will be used as follows:

  • Design the test components: drive train, cockpit and rail - $15,000
  • Design, test and fabricate the test articles: drive train, ribbon rail and associated testing expenses - $25,000
  • Commission an Addendum to Automated Transit Network (ATN) Feasibility Study for Clemson, Greenville and Mauldin by PRT Consulting - $10,000

The PT Solution will recognize all Phase I supporters as Charter Members with four (4) levels of support:

  • Bronze Level: $100 to $499 - 1 mile credit per $1
  • Silver Level: $500 to $999 - 2 miles per $1
  • Gold: $1,000 to $2,499 - 3 miles per $1
  • Platinum: $2,500 + - 4 miles per $1

For all supporters who reach Platinum status, The PT Solution will recognize their commitment by naming a PT cockpit for them. The most generous supporter will be invited to speak at the inaugural ceremony.

With regular progress updates on our website ThePTSolution.com, you can share in the excitement as we build the ‘first mile’. The successful completion of the ‘first mile’ will enable supporters to experience first-hand the benefits of an elevated personal rapid transit (EPRT) system.

​

.

story:
Did you generally get into this trouble?

You want to drive a car happily but your seat is not your favorite position. And you don't know where it is.

 

 

Seatmemo is the answer.

No more frustration of driving position!

Seatmemo is a pair of small devices attached to the front seat of your car.

*The size is the approximate size of the prototype version. A little change in size may occur in the final version.

 

How do they work?

There are 2 parts of Seatmemo that assist you by indicating the exact seat position.

The backrest part is attached at the side of the backrest area.

LED light will show up when your backrest angle is exactly at your incline angle.

The bottom part is attached at the side of of the seat.

LED light will show up when your seat is exactly at your position.

 

And after your position is set.

You can switch off the LED light.

 

Solved!!

 

Currently, we've successfully tested the 3D printed prototype version. Now we're almost ready for the commercial version. We need budget for mass production tools.

Please back us and together we can bring salvation to those drivers who feel frustrated of driving position.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Gavin Wilding and I am the inventor and CEO of Griffen Securities which has invented the Griff-Lock Car Immobilizer System - a unique protection for your car from the sophisticated car thieves of today.

We have at last come up with a 4-point system that cannot be circumvented unlike others on the market place. As soon as you switch off the vehicle ignition, the Griff-Lock locks down your car and can only be started by you once you activate our unique rolling code with your FOB.

We have done all the testing necessary to bring this to the market and are now ready to go into production.

What We Need & What You Get

We have already spent a considerable amount of money to get to this point and now are looking to raise 495,000 USD for our Campaign to invest in production and our marketing plan.

Come join us on this journey and with a donation of just $345 you will receive a full Griff Lock system - a saving of over 30% of the retail price!

This is a onetime special offer to Indiegogo customers during this launch period.

Donate just $100 and you will receive a Griff Lock Hat and T-Shirt.

The Impact

Why are so many cars still being stolen today?

Over 750,000 cars were stolen last year in the US alone. One of the main reasons for this is down to the car manufacturers who have simply not invested in a fool proof system. If a car is stolen then they can sell another one!! It's pure economics..

The problem with this is that our insurance premiums are now at an all-time high as we the public pay for this, now is our chance to protect our property and hopefully reduce our costs of motoring.

We are excited at the prospect of lower premiums and stopping the car thieves earning from this.

We will make every effort to contact the insurance companies to ensure that all cars fitted with the Griff-Lock receive a discount in premiums and we have already had a lot of interest from them re our product. 

Now is the time to protect your Car.

We have a saying at Griff-Lock ''If you can't start it, you can't steal it''

If you are not able to invest, then please help us by sharing this on Social Media and by directing your contacts to Indiegogo.

Come and join us, and let’s put an end to car theft!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hi, my name is Gavin Wilding and I am the inventor and CEO of Griffen Securities which has invented the Griff-Lock Car Immobilizer System - a unique protection for your car from the sophisticated car thieves of today.
We have at last come up with a 4-point system that cannot be circumvented unlike others on the market place. As soon as you switch off the vehicle ignition, the Griff-Lock locks down your car and can only be started by you once you activate our unique rolling code with your FOB.
We have done all the testing necessary to bring this to the market and are now ready to go into production.

What We Need & What You Get
We have already spent a considerable amount of money to get to this point and now are looking to raise 495,000 USD for our Campaign to invest in production and our marketing plan.
Come join us on this journey and with a donation of just $345 you will receive a full Griff Lock system - a saving of over 30% of the retail price!
This is a onetime special offer to Indiegogo customers during this launch period.
Donate just $100 and you will receive a Griff Lock Hat and T-Shirt.

The Impact
Why are so many cars still being stolen today?
Over 750,000 cars were stolen last year in the US alone. One of the main reasons for this is down to the car manufacturers who have simply not invested in a fool proof system. If a car is stolen then they can sell another one!! It's pure economics..
The problem with this is that our insurance premiums are now at an all-time high as we the public pay for this, now is our chance to protect our property and hopefully reduce our costs of motoring.
We are excited at the prospect of lower premiums and stopping the car thieves earning from this.
We will make every effort to contact the insurance companies to ensure that all cars fitted with the Griff-Lock receive a discount in premiums and we have already had a lot of interest from them re our product. 

Now is the time to protect your Car.
We have a saying at Griff-Lock ''If you can't start it, you can't steal it''
If you are not able to invest, then please help us by sharing this on Social Media and by directing your contacts to Indiegogo.
Come and join us, and let’s put an end to car theft!

Just have fun with your Hammond e-Bike

story:
Atlanta, Georgia, USA -- At the iSexy Party Network® LLC, I not only want to help our Very Intelligent Partiers find Amazing Shopping Experiences, Discounts, Free Stuff and Outrageous Party Atmospheres with unique iSexy Games & Entertainment, but I'm truly concerned for their safety and well-being while doing so.

To accomplish this, I decided to develop my own Rideshare Service for the iSexy Party Network, originating first from my hometown of Atlanta, Georgia!

 

VIPR is not a stand-alone rideshare company, it's a service of the iSexy Party Network® adding value to our brand by transporting our VIPs to and from our Official iSexy Party Network Hot Spots.

Our VIPR Designated Drivers are also Party Concierges who are helpful and knowledgeable of what's happening within the iSexy Party Network®.

I not only want to offer affordable, safe & reliable rides but want to reward our riders for using my service. So, I'm giving VIP-Riders 50 Party Points for every $1 Spent on Every Ride, redeemable for any of the thousands of quality products found in our Party Points Gift Mall.

VIP-Riders may choose their three favorite drivers and lock them into their VIPR Rider's Account so whenever they need a ride, and if any of their favorite drivers are driving, they may select the one they want. This will help build strong Rider-Driver Relationships and a strong feeling of familiarity, comfort, and safety!

Every Year, one week before a VIP-Rider's birthday, I will add a Birthday Ride Credit to their VIPR Rider Account, good for up to 25 Miles, that they may use From or To their Birthday Celebration or wherever they wish to go and they may invite as many friends as there are available seats in the Snake!

VIPR will be marketed directly to our Official iSexy Party Network Hot Spots, by our VIPR Designated Drivers/Party Concierges, and when they agree to become an Official VIPR Pick-Up Spot I'll share a 5% commission with them on every ride originating from their business address!

  • The Official VIPR Pick-Up Spot may keep the 5% Commission.
  • I can add it back into their VIPR Business Account as a VIPR Ride Credit.
  • I can donate their Commissions directly to the Charity of their choice!

Authorized VIPR Designated Drivers may also become an Official iSexy Party Network Party Concierge, and vice versa, generating two streams of income simultaneously!

My First Promise is to our Designated Drivers, VIPR will not be offering shared rides!

Being a driver myself, I find that I'm like most drivers, I've grown to dislike "pool" or "shared" rides. I personally find them frustrating and there seems to be too many personalities and miles to drive for very little money, plus some riders are not considerate of the other passengers or the driver.

I truly believe that with the multiple income streams generated through the niche market that we're creating our VIPR Designated Drivers, Party Concierges, the iSexy Party Network® and VIPR as a whole will be financially just fine without offering shared rides!

My Second Promise is that VIPR Designated Drivers will never lose the opportunity of driving with us as long as manually driven vehicles exist and continue to be manufactured because VIPR and the iSexy Party Network® will always be dedicated to and thankful for our Designated Drivers!

As far as the future of Self-Driving Cars with VIPR, I'm not sure if we'll ever use them because the safety of our riders, dedicated drivers & pedestrians is paramount to me!

But if I do decide to add Self-Driving Cars, I already know that each car will be occupied by an iSexy Party Network Party Concierge, seated in the driver's seat, riding along for added security, to answer any questions about VIPR, the iSexy Party Network® and what exciting iSexy things the VIP-Riders can do around town!

To make VIPR stand out from all the other services, all Authorized VIPR Designated Drivers will have the option of installing and using our RedBeats.net - DJ Mixing Board & Music Pool in their vehicle, FREE-OF-CHARGE!

This will give their VIP-Riders complete control over selecting and playing their favorite music genres and they may even mix it themselves from the comfort of the back seat, if they wish, making the ride not only enjoyable but interactive, crazy fun and groovy!

I wanted the public to get involved with the early development of VIPR, so I set-up this crowd-funding campaign which will not only help raise the money needed to purchase the rideshare app, but through the "VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle!", contributors will help decide the next Official VIPR Party Town by nominating their hometown* and if it wins by popular vote, all their entries will be placed in the raffle for a chance to Win a Free Maiden Voyage VIPR Hometown Ride! *Each hometown must have at least 25 nominations to be eligible to win!

VIPR will become the flagship of the iSexy Party Network! It will be...

  • Your designated driver in minutes, getting you there safely, even to the grocery!
  • Transportation to and from our Official iSexy Party Network HotSpots.
  • A knowledge bank of where to shop and party, ask your Party Concierge!
  • A Redbeats.net Disco on wheels! Let's Groove Tonight!
  • An easy way to collect Party Points, don't burn any brain cells over this one!
  • A rolling recruiting station, as a VIPR Designated Driver/Party Concierge, you may sign new VIPs, Party Concierges, Official iSexy Party Network HotSpots, VIPR Pick-Up Spots, and VIPR Designated Drivers into your network.
  • Income for VIPR Designated Drivers & Party Concierges.
  • Income for our VIPR Pick-up Spots.
  • Income for Charitable Organizations.

CONTACT ME!

I'm going to launch VIPR in my hometown of Atlanta, Georgia USA, and the surrounding areas, first, and then grow from there.

But, I welcome participation and encouragement from anywhere in the world and with the VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle!, found here, the Indiegogo System will keep track of the number of contributions/nominations and where they originate from, I will use this information to direct me to which hometown VIPR should grow to next!

I currently have Digital Billboards around Atlanta introducing VIPR and our Indiegogo Crowd-Funding Campaign. 

Today Atlanta, tomorrow The WORLD!

 *Locations of our Digital Billboards

 

    Several of our Official iSexy Party Network HotSpots in Atlanta, Georgia USA. have already signed up to be a Future VIPR Pick-Up Spot, and why wouldn't they, it will supply their patrons with reliable rides to and from their business, they'll receive 5% commission on every ride originating from their business address where they may keep the Commission, I can add it  back into their Business Account as a VIPR Ride Credit, or I can donate their Commissions directly to the Charity of their choice!

    If your bar or business would like to become a Future VIPR Pick-Up Spot, please CONTACT ME!

     

    Please help me make VIPR a reality! The ride-share app is ready to go and I only need $5,500. to purchase it! After I purchase the app, it will only take a couple of weeks for the developers to add the VIPR logo, colorize it to my liking, add a few bells & whistles that I want and upload VIPR to the app stores... then we go LIVE!

    Instead of just asking for a handout, I wanted to offer some really unique Perks that will make my campaign fun and the talk of the crowd-funding community guaranteeing that I reach my goal and that VIPR will start off and running as soon as it goes live, here's how you can help...

     

    You may contribute any amount you like ($1+) to my VIPR Campaign by clicking the pink BACK IT  button at the top of the page. Every dollar you contribute will get me closer to my goal and I appreciate whatever you can afford! Thank you!

    BACK IT Button Bonus:

    If you pledge $100 or more to my campaign using the pink BACK IT  button at the top of the page, I will add a bonus to your pledge and turn it into VIPR Ride Credits that you may use as soon as VIPR goes live! Here's what you will receive...

    $100. to $249. + 15% Bonus  /  $250. to $499. + 30% Bonus  /   $500. & up + 50% Bonus

    This bonus is available to all future VIP Riders and any Business that wants to set-up a VIPR Business Account to make sure their patrons get home safely! Decide how much you want to contribute by how much of a Bonus/Credit you want to receive.

    Important:

    Since Indiegogo's BACK IT  System does not ask for your Contact Information, I need to make sure that you are credited for your donation and nobody else, so to guarantee that you receive your VIPR Ride Credits...

    1. Click on the starburst below, enter your Contact Information and the amount that you are pledging in the comment box. If you wish to remain anonymous on the Indiegogo page that's OK, simply create an Alias/Username instead and supply me with that in the comment box as well. See NOTE!
    2. Click on the pink BACK IT  button at the top of this page, to make your donation!

    NOTE:

    When making a Donation of $100. or more, If you do not supply your Contact Information, Donation Amount or Alias/Username through my Contact Form before submitting your BACK IT donation, will indicate to me that your intentions are to make a Donation Only! and therefore forego the bonus VIPR Ride Credits!

    Submit your BACK IT donation with confidence, knowing that you won't be charged for your contribution unless we reach our goal of $5,500!

     

    VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle!

     

    I'm going to start VIPR in my hometown of Atlanta, GA, and the surrounding areas, but I'm looking to the future and I need your help!

    NOMINATE YOUR HOMETOWN!

    Nominate your hometown for the next VIPR  Party Town, enter this raffle as often as you wish, plus encourage all your neighbors to get involved through our Referral Program because the hometown with the most nominations will be the first to become a VIPR Party Town. All other hometowns will become a VIPR Party Town in the order of their popularity. When your hometown becomes a VIPR Party Town, your entries will be placed in the raffle for a Free Ride in your hometown! Winners will be contacted if they win.

    RAFFLE RULES:

    • This raffle is contingent upon this campaign reaching its goal of $5,500.
    • This is a fixed funding campaign, which means I will receive funds only if my campaign meets its goal. If it doesn’t meet its goal, Indiegogo will refund all backers within 5 business days.
    • Five (5) Lucky Winners per hometown!
    • $1.00 per entry! Enter as often as you like! The more you enter, the better chance you hometown will have of becoming a VIPR Party Town and you winning a Free VIPR Hometown Ride in the raffle!
    • The Winners must be 18+ years of age.
    • The Winner must be present for their Free VIPR Ride and may take as many friends as there are seats available in the Snake, but may not issue the ride to anyone else without being present.
    • The ride may not exceed Twenty-Five (25) Miles in length.
    • One Free VIPR Ride Per Winner Per Hometown!
    • All hometowns will be considered. Hometown Laws & Restrictions may apply.

    IMPORTANT:

    Since Indiegogo's System does not offer "text fields" and I need a way to get your hometown's name and an accurate count of how many times it has been suggested, so you must...

    1. Click on the starburst below, enter your Contact Information, click the checkbox next to "Nominate Your Hometown!" and then enter the name of your hometown in the comment box. See NOTE!
    2. Click on the "VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle" perk above to make your contribution.

    NOTE:

    If you do not supply your Contact Information & hometown name through my Contact Form before submitting your contribution, will indicate to me that your intentions are to make a Donation Only! and therefore forego the Free VIPR Hometown Ride!

    Submit your contribution with confidence, knowing that you won't be charged for your contribution unless we reach our goal of $5,500!

     

    VIPR Atlanta Promotional Pub Crawl Raffle!

     

    Enter for a chance to Win a Personal 4 Hour VIPR Atlanta Promotional Pub Crawl for you & three (3) of your craziest drinkin' buddies! You & your friends will each receive One (1) Complimentary Drink at each Official VIPR Pick-Up Spot we visit on the crawl!

    RAFFLE RULES:

    • This raffle is contingent upon this campaign reaching its goal of $5,500.
    • This is a fixed funding campaign, which means I will receive funds only if my campaign meets its goal. If it doesn’t meet its goal, Indiegogo will refund all backers within 5 business days.
    • Five (5) Lucky Winners!
    • $10.00 per entry! Enter as often as you like! The more you enter, the better chance you have of winning!
    • TBA: Location & Date of The VIPR Celebration Party & Raffle Drawing?
    • TBA: Participating VIPR Pick-up Spots?
    • You & your friends must be 21+ Years of Age and agree to wear VIPR Promotional T-Shirts during the fun-filled, promotional night full of lots of Free Liquor! Lots!
    • You & your friends will each receive One (1) Complimentary Drink at each Official VIPR Pick-Up Spot we visit on the crawl!
    • The Date of your Personal Promo Pub Crawl and the sizes of the 4 VIPR Promotional T-Shirts must be arranged with me at least One Week in advance.
    • Your Designated Driver will be Blaine Klingaman, Founder of the iSexy Party Network & VIPR and at the end of your Atlanta Promo Pub Crawl he will make sure that each of you get home safely.

    CONTACT ME if you have a favorite bar that you would like to see become a VIPR Pick-Up Spot, so you can get a complimentary drink from them during your Personal VIPR Promo Pub Crawl!

     

    Fifty (50) Free VIPR Rides ATL Raffle!

     

    Enter for a chance to Win Fifty (50) Free VIPR Rides in Atlanta, Ga, USA

    RAFFLE RULES:

    • This raffle is contingent upon this campaign reaching its goal of $5,500.
    • This is a fixed funding campaign, which means I will receive funds only if my campaign meets its goal. If it doesn’t meet its goal, Indiegogo will refund all backers within 5 business days.
    • Five (5) Lucky Winners!
    • $10.00 per entry! Enter as often as you like! The more you enter, the better chance you have of winning!
    • TBA: Location & Date of The VIPR Celebration Party & Raffle Drawing?
    • Winner must be 18+ years of age.
    • Winner must be present for each ride and may not issue stand-alone rides for Friends & Family.
    • Rides may only be used in the Atlanta area and may not exceed Twenty-Five (25) Miles in length.

     

    VIPR Tees!

      • Classic Fit
      • Seamless Rib at Neck
      • Taped Shoulder-to-Shoulder
      • Double-Needle Stitching Throughout
      • Quarter-Turned to Eliminate Center Crease
      • Tear-Away Label
      • Small, Medium, Large, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL, 5XL

      Design 1 - RIDE MY SNAKE!  (Future Designated Drivers Only!)

      Design 2 - I'M HOME, TAKE ME DRUNK!

      Design 3 - I'VE BEEN AROUND THE BLOCK!

      Design 4 - FOR A GREAT RIDE, I'D TAP THAT!

      Design 5 - I RODE THE SNAKE!

       

      CONTACT ME!

      VIPR Bumper Stickers

      Help Us Save Lives! Put one of our VIPR Vinyl Bumper Stickers on your vehicle to help spread the word about VIPR - A Designated Driver In Minutes!

      Design 1 - FOR A GREAT RIDE I'D TAP THAT!

      Design 2 - I'M HOME, TAKE ME DRUNK!

      Design 3 - I'VE BEEN AROUND THE BLOCK!

      Design 4 - I RODE THE SNAKE!

      Design 5 - MY OTHER CAR IS A VIPR

       

      If you want to receive rewards for your promotional efforts, become a part of our VIPR Indiegogo Referral Program or our Party Concierge Affiliate Program, check out our Personalized Bumper Sticker below!

       

      VIPR Personalized Stickers

      If you want to receive rewards for your promotional efforts, become a part of our VIPR Indiegogo Referral Program or our Party Concierge Affiliate Program, check out our Personalized Bumper Sticker above!

      I'll create a personalized VIPR Vinyl Bumper Sticker just for you, personalized with an easy to remember special web address (xxxx.vip-rides.net) that will redirect to your unique VIPR Campaign Link!

      CONTACT ME! with a short name that you want to use to replace ( xxxx.) and something that your friends will know & easily remember and tell me your unique VIPR Campaign Link that you created.

      NOTE: After my Indiegogo Campaign is completed, I will change the redirect address to http://isexypartynetwork.net/vipr

       

      Party Concierge Self-Promoting Tip Box

       

      Taxi? Limousine? Ridesharing? Party Bus? As an Independent Business Owner, you drive people from Point A to Point B to generate your income! Now you can supplement your supplemental income by becoming a Party Concierge and in no time you'll be Making (more) Money & Fun! Our Social Security works! 

      To make it easier for you and get the conversation started, I've created The Party Concierge Self-Promoting Tip Box that gradually changes color, giving the cab of your vehicle a colorful disco-like party glow! 

      It comes complete with a Tip Box, Phone Charging Station, Candy Box, 250 Tri-Fold Brochures, 250 Two-sided Income Cards (Seeking Party Concierges! and on the other side a promotion for the company you drive for, IE: Drivers Wanted!) & 250 Business Cards promoting your iSexy Party Network Home-based Business, all printed with your Personal Party Concierge Link: promocode.isexypartynetwork.net

       

      Military Dog Tags

         

        Back in 1992, I purchased an antique Military Dog Tag Machine to help bring attention to the "Gays in the Military" issue and in July on Gay Pride Weekend in Atlanta, GA. I made and sold over $700.00 in Military Dog Tags! 

        I'm not implying that me selling Dog Tags made a difference, but "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" was passed on July 19, 1993, allowing closeted members of the military to serve without question while prohibiting those in the military who was openly gay to serve. It wasn't perfect, but it was a start. With the current administration, we have to continue fighting to gain/keep our equal rights.

        • Tag Quantity: 2
        • Tag Size: Width 2" / Height 1" - Rolled Edge
        • Chain Material: Stainless Steel
        • Chain Quantity: 2
        • Chain Size: 1 Short 4" / 1 Long 24"

        AVAILABLE CHARACTERS:

        • ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
        • abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
        • 1234567890 / . , ' & ; : ? # ¢ $
        • 15 Keystrokes (Max): Lines 1 & 4
        • 16 Keystrokes (Max): Lines 2 & 3

        NOTE: Enter the word "BLANK" if you desire a Blank Line

        CONTACT ME!

        Monster Ballchain Necklace

           

          Back in ©1992, with the Military Theme still on my mind, I also created the Monster Ballchain Necklace offering a more modern, fashionable, masculine, subtle hint-of-the-military necklace that literally looks amazing with anything a guy could wear; Shirtless, Semi-casual, even draped over a tie while wearing a Dress Suit!

          • Chain Material: #50 Nickel Plated Steel Ball Chain with Coupling
          • Chain Length: 23"
          • Ball Size: 5/8"

          CONTACT ME!

          VIPR Referral Program

           

          When you refer your friends to help spread the word about my VIPR Campaign, I want to reward you with your choice of either Party Points or VIPR Ride Credits. You'll collect...

          •  Fifty (50) Party Points for every $1.00 Contribution made by your referrals! Party Points are redeemable for any of the thousands of quality products found in our Party Points Gift Mall.

          OR

          • One (1) $5.00 VIPR Ride Credit for every $100.00 Contribution made by your referrals! (To ensure that you can use your VIPR Ride Credits, contribute to my "VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle" and nominate your hometown for the next VIPR Party Town!)

          Simply log into your Indiegogo account, if you don't have an account yet,  create one here. Then, come back to my VIPR Campaign (make sure that you're logged into your account) and at the top of this page look to the right of the "BACK IT" button for the "Link" button.

          Click the "Link" button. A popup will appear with your unique link. Copy your unique VIPR Campaign URL link and share on all your social media accounts, email your friends and contacts, write a blog post, etc.

          A PERSONALIZED TEAR-TAG SIGN, JUST FOR YOU!

          I'll even create a personalized VIPR Tear-Tag Sign for you, personalized with an easy to remember special web address (xxxx.vip-rides.net) that will redirect to your unique VIPR Campaign Link! CONTACT ME! with a short name that your friends will know & easily remember (xxxx.) and your unique VIPR Campaign Link that you just created.

          --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

          COPY & PASTE THE FOLLOWING TEXT INTO A FACEBOOK, Write Something Box...

          Help make VIPR a Success! Collect Party Points OR $5.00 Ride Credits by promoting it through the VIPR Indiegogo Referral Program: https://igg.me/at/vip-rides/x/19027078  *

          * Replace 19027078 With Your Indiegogo Referral Link Number!

          --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

          To be eligible to win my referral program, you must first be a backer, at which time your contact information will be entered into the Indiegogo System allowing me to contact you when it's time to issue rewards!

          Note:

          • The issuing of prizes is contingent upon my VIPR Campaign reaching its goal of $5,500.00.
          • Due to Indiegogo's privacy policy, I will ONLY see the name and email address of people who back my VIPR campaign. 
          • Referrals are not immediately reflected on your Indiegogo profile but will be displayed within 24 hours.
          • Indiegogo is not able to track referrals made outside of this method. If you tell your friends by word of mouth or send a link without your unique referral ID, that share will NOT be counted in your referrals on Indiegogo. 
          • The referral must immediately make a contribution after clicking on your link. If they visit other pages or websites or leave and come back to the campaign later to contribute, their contribution will not be counted as a referral from you. 

          How to Track Your VIPR Referral Results

          1. Log into your Indiegogo account
          2. Click on your username beside the search box at the top right of the page
          3. Select the “My Profile” option
          4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions
          5. Count the number of funders
          6. Please note that referrals will only appear on your Referrals tab once you've had 5 clicks on your shared links or once someone backs the campaign through the link you shared.

           

          Hang Signs

          VIPR Tear-Tab Sign: Print this sign, cut between the tear-tabs and hang it where concerned citizens will see, such as laundromats, bars, retail stores, community bulletin boards, office lounges, etc! Ask me about creating a personalized Referral Program sign, just for you! 

          We're a Future VIPR Pick-Up Spot: Bar or Business? Become an Official VIPR Pick-Up Spot and print & hang this sign by your front door.

          Share Links

          Share the links below with your social media followers, friends, family and your favorite Bars & Businesses and ask them to pay-it-forward as well.

          VIPR Website: http://vip-rides.net

          VIPR Tear-Tab Sign: http://vip-rides.net/teartabsign.pdf

          Crowd Funding Page: https://igg.me/at/vip-rides

           

          CONTACT ME!

           

          DRIVERS WANTED:

           

          Until my VIPR Crowd-Funding Campaign reaches its goal & goes live, I'm predicting the middle to the end of October, I want to get a head-start collecting names & contact information of interested independent contractors that would like to become a VIPR Designated Driver. 

          If you're already driving for another rideshare company that's OK, I'd love to hear from you as well. Click the Contact Us! button below and enter your information. Thanks!

          CONTACT ME!

My First Promise is to our Designated Drivers, VIPR will not be offering shared rides!
Being a driver myself, I find that I'm like most drivers, I've grown to dislike "pool" or "shared" rides. I personally find them frustrating and there seems to be too many personalities and miles to drive for very little money, plus some riders are not considerate of the other passengers or the driver.
I truly believe that with the multiple income streams generated through the niche market that we're creating our VIPR Designated Drivers, Party Concierges, the iSexy Party Network® and VIPR as a whole will be financially just fine without offering shared rides!

My Second Promise is that VIPR Designated Drivers will never lose the opportunity of driving with us as long as manually driven vehicles exist and continue to be manufactured because VIPR and the iSexy Party Network® will always be dedicated to and thankful for our Designated Drivers!
As far as the future of Self-Driving Cars with VIPR, I'm not sure if we'll ever use them because the safety of our riders, dedicated drivers & pedestrians is paramount to me!
But if I do decide to add Self-Driving Cars, I already know that each car will be occupied by an iSexy Party Network Party Concierge, seated in the driver's seat, riding along for added security, to answer any questions about VIPR, the iSexy Party Network® and what exciting iSexy things the VIP-Riders can do around town!

To make VIPR stand out from all the other services, all Authorized VIPR Designated Drivers will have the option of installing and using our RedBeats.net - DJ Mixing Board & Music Pool in their vehicle, FREE-OF-CHARGE!
This will give their VIP-Riders complete control over selecting and playing their favorite music genres and they may even mix it themselves from the comfort of the back seat, if they wish, making the ride not only enjoyable but interactive, crazy fun and groovy!

I wanted the public to get involved with the early development of VIPR, so I set-up this crowd-funding campaign which will not only help raise the money needed to purchase the rideshare app, but through the "VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle!", contributors will help decide the next Official VIPR Party Town by nominating their hometown* and if it wins by popular vote, all their entries will be placed in the raffle for a chance to Win a Free Maiden Voyage VIPR Hometown Ride! *Each hometown must have at least 25 nominations to be eligible to win!
VIPR will become the flagship of the iSexy Party Network! It will be...

Your designated driver in minutes, getting you there safely, even to the grocery!
Transportation to and from our Official iSexy Party Network HotSpots.
A knowledge bank of where to shop and party, ask your Party Concierge!
A Redbeats.net Disco on wheels! Let's Groove Tonight!
An easy way to collect Party Points, don't burn any brain cells over this one!
A rolling recruiting station, as a VIPR Designated Driver/Party Concierge, you may sign new VIPs, Party Concierges, Official iSexy Party Network HotSpots, VIPR Pick-Up Spots, and VIPR Designated Drivers into your network.
Income for VIPR Designated Drivers & Party Concierges.
Income for our VIPR Pick-up Spots.
Income for Charitable Organizations.


CONTACT ME!

I'm going to launch VIPR in my hometown of Atlanta, Georgia USA, and the surrounding areas, first, and then grow from there.
But, I welcome participation and encouragement from anywhere in the world and with the VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle!, found here, the Indiegogo System will keep track of the number of contributions/nominations and where they originate from, I will use this information to direct me to which hometown VIPR should grow to next!
I currently have Digital Billboards around Atlanta introducing VIPR and our Indiegogo Crowd-Funding Campaign. 
Today Atlanta, tomorrow The WORLD!

 *Locations of our Digital Billboards
 


Several of our Official iSexy Party Network HotSpots in Atlanta, Georgia USA. have already signed up to be a Future VIPR Pick-Up Spot, and why wouldn't they, it will supply their patrons with reliable rides to and from their business, they'll receive 5% commission on every ride originating from their business address where they may keep the Commission, I can add it  back into their Business Account as a VIPR Ride Credit, or I can donate their Commissions directly to the Charity of their choice!

If your bar or business would like to become a Future VIPR Pick-Up Spot, please CONTACT ME!
 



Please help me make VIPR a reality! The ride-share app is ready to go and I only need $5,500. to purchase it! After I purchase the app, it will only take a couple of weeks for the developers to add the VIPR logo, colorize it to my liking, add a few bells & whistles that I want and upload VIPR to the app stores... then we go LIVE!
Instead of just asking for a handout, I wanted to offer some really unique Perks that will make my campaign fun and the talk of the crowd-funding community guaranteeing that I reach my goal and that VIPR will start off and running as soon as it goes live, here's how you can help...
 

You may contribute any amount you like ($1+) to my VIPR Campaign by clicking the pink BACK IT  button at the top of the page. Every dollar you contribute will get me closer to my goal and I appreciate whatever you can afford! Thank you!
BACK IT Button Bonus:
If you pledge $100 or more to my campaign using the pink BACK IT  button at the top of the page, I will add a bonus to your pledge and turn it into VIPR Ride Credits that you may use as soon as VIPR goes live! Here's what you will receive...
$100. to $249. + 15% Bonus  /  $250. to $499. + 30% Bonus  /   $500. & up + 50% Bonus

This bonus is available to all future VIP Riders and any Business that wants to set-up a VIPR Business Account to make sure their patrons get home safely! Decide how much you want to contribute by how much of a Bonus/Credit you want to receive.
Important:
Since Indiegogo's BACK IT  System does not ask for your Contact Information, I need to make sure that you are credited for your donation and nobody else, so to guarantee that you receive your VIPR Ride Credits...

Click on the starburst below, enter your Contact Information and the amount that you are pledging in the comment box. If you wish to remain anonymous on the Indiegogo page that's OK, simply create an Alias/Username instead and supply me with that in the comment box as well. See NOTE!

Click on the pink BACK IT  button at the top of this page, to make your donation!


NOTE:
When making a Donation of $100. or more, If you do not supply your Contact Information, Donation Amount or Alias/Username through my Contact Form before submitting your BACK IT donation, will indicate to me that your intentions are to make a Donation Only! and therefore forego the bonus VIPR Ride Credits!
Submit your BACK IT donation with confidence, knowing that you won't be charged for your contribution unless we reach our goal of $5,500!
 

VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle!

 
I'm going to start VIPR in my hometown of Atlanta, GA, and the surrounding areas, but I'm looking to the future and I need your help!
NOMINATE YOUR HOMETOWN!
Nominate your hometown for the next VIPR  Party Town, enter this raffle as often as you wish, plus encourage all your neighbors to get involved through our Referral Program because the hometown with the most nominations will be the first to become a VIPR Party Town. All other hometowns will become a VIPR Party Town in the order of their popularity. When your hometown becomes a VIPR Party Town, your entries will be placed in the raffle for a Free Ride in your hometown! Winners will be contacted if they win.
RAFFLE RULES: 

This raffle is contingent upon this campaign reaching its goal of $5,500.
This is a fixed funding campaign, which means I will receive funds only if my campaign meets its goal. If it doesn’t meet its goal, Indiegogo will refund all backers within 5 business days.
Five (5) Lucky Winners per hometown!
$1.00 per entry! Enter as often as you like! The more you enter, the better chance you hometown will have of becoming a VIPR Party Town and you winning a Free VIPR Hometown Ride in the raffle!
The Winners must be 18+ years of age.
The Winner must be present for their Free VIPR Ride and may take as many friends as there are seats available in the Snake, but may not issue the ride to anyone else without being present.
The ride may not exceed Twenty-Five (25) Miles in length.
One Free VIPR Ride Per Winner Per Hometown!
All hometowns will be considered. Hometown Laws & Restrictions may apply.

IMPORTANT:
Since Indiegogo's System does not offer "text fields" and I need a way to get your hometown's name and an accurate count of how many times it has been suggested, so you must...

Click on the starburst below, enter your Contact Information, click the checkbox next to "Nominate Your Hometown!" and then enter the name of your hometown in the comment box. See NOTE!

Click on the "VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle" perk above to make your contribution.


NOTE:
If you do not supply your Contact Information & hometown name through my Contact Form before submitting your contribution, will indicate to me that your intentions are to make a Donation Only! and therefore forego the Free VIPR Hometown Ride!
Submit your contribution with confidence, knowing that you won't be charged for your contribution unless we reach our goal of $5,500!

Military Dog Tags



 
Back in 1992, I purchased an antique Military Dog Tag Machine to help bring attention to the "Gays in the Military" issue and in July on Gay Pride Weekend in Atlanta, GA. I made and sold over $700.00 in Military Dog Tags! I'm not implying that me selling Dog Tags made a difference, but "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" was passed on July 19, 1993, allowing closeted members of the military to serve without question while prohibiting those in the military who was openly gay to serve. It wasn't perfect, but it was a start. With the current administration, we have to continue fighting to gain/keep our equal rights.

VIPR Referral Program

 
When you refer your friends to help spread the word about my VIPR Campaign, I want to reward you with your choice of either Party Points or VIPR Ride Credits. You'll collect...
•  Fifty (50) Party Points for every $1.00 Contribution made by your referrals! Party Points are redeemable for any of the thousands of quality products found in our Party Points Gift Mall.
OR
• One (1) $5.00 VIPR Ride Credit for every $100.00 Contribution made by your referrals! (To ensure that you can use your VIPR Ride Credits, contribute to my "VIPR Party Town Contest & Raffle" and nominate your hometown for the next VIPR Party Town!)

Simply log into your Indiegogo account, if you don't have an account yet,  create one here. Then, come back to my VIPR Campaign (make sure that you're logged into your account) and at the top of this page look to the right of the "BACK IT" button for the "Link" button.

Click the "Link" button. A popup will appear with your unique link. Copy your unique VIPR Campaign URL link and share on all your social media accounts, email your friends and contacts, write a blog post, etc.
A PERSONALIZED TEAR-TAG SIGN, JUST FOR YOU!
I'll even create a personalized VIPR Tear-Tag Sign for you, personalized with an easy to remember special web address (xxxx.vip-rides.net) that will redirect to your unique VIPR Campaign Link! CONTACT ME! with a short name that your friends will know & easily remember (xxxx.) and your unique VIPR Campaign Link that you just created.

COPY & PASTE THE FOLLOWING TEXT INTO A FACEBOOK, Write Something Box...
Help make VIPR a Success! Collect Party Points OR $5.00 Ride Credits by promoting it through the VIPR Indiegogo Referral Program: https://igg.me/at/vip-rides/x/19027078  *
* Replace 19027078 With Your Indiegogo Referral Link Number!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To be eligible to win my referral program, you must first be a backer, at which time your contact information will be entered into the Indiegogo System allowing me to contact you when it's time to issue rewards!
Note:

The issuing of prizes is contingent upon my VIPR Campaign reaching its goal of $5,500.00.
Due to Indiegogo's privacy policy, I will ONLY see the name and email address of people who back my VIPR campaign. 
Referrals are not immediately reflected on your Indiegogo profile but will be displayed within 24 hours.
Indiegogo is not able to track referrals made outside of this method. If you tell your friends by word of mouth or send a link without your unique referral ID, that share will NOT be counted in your referrals on Indiegogo. 
The referral must immediately make a contribution after clicking on your link. If they visit other pages or websites or leave and come back to the campaign later to contribute, their contribution will not be counted as a referral from you. 

How to Track Your VIPR Referral Results

Log into your Indiegogo account
Click on your username beside the search box at the top right of the page
Select the “My Profile” option
Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions
Count the number of funders
Please note that referrals will only appear on your Referrals tab once you've had 5 clicks on your shared links or once someone backs the campaign through the link you shared.

 
Hang Signs

VIPR Tear-Tab Sign: Print this sign, cut between the tear-tabs and hang it where concerned citizens will see, such as laundromats, bars, retail stores, community bulletin boards, office lounges, etc! Ask me about creating a personalized Referral Program sign, just for you! 
We're a Future VIPR Pick-Up Spot: Bar or Business? Become an Official VIPR Pick-Up Spot and print & hang this sign by your front door.

Until my VIPR Crowd-Funding Campaign reaches its goal & goes live, I'm predicting the middle to the end of October, I want to get a head-start collecting names & contact information of interested independent contractors that would like to become a VIPR Designated Driver. If you're already driving for another rideshare company that's OK, I'd love to hear from you as well. Click the Contact Us! button below and enter your information. Thanks!

story:
ORGO is a multi-use micro-mobility solution with electronic controls to easily carry a child, a pet, or cargo (up to 130 lbs.) across all terrains with the touch of a button.

 

 

ORGO does not compromise when it comes to solving common micro-mobility problems in the city, at the park, in your yard, or on an adventure. Relieving the strain of constant pushing and pulling up and down inclines is only where ORGO's innovation starts!

Easily move two kids, a fury companion, and luggage in any combination on any surface. Versatile features make converting the ORGO from soccer practice kid hauler to shuttling the weekly haul from farmers market to home a snap. Uphill, downhill, off-road, or smooth asphalt...ORGO has you covered.

 

 

ORGO is feature packed and ready for any family on-the-go.

 

 

240W of Power

 

That's 120W of power delivered to each rear wheel. Enough get-up-and-go to easily transport 130 lbs. of cargo or precious companions safely up the steepest hills with only one hand (or finger) steering the wagon. With great power comes responsibility... or at least consideration of comfort. 

ORGO is engineered with smart soft start technology built-in, so your latte stays in its cup on uphill climbs.

 

 

Electric Brakes

 

ORGO's automatic electric braking system stops runaway wagons and strollers in their tracks, uphill or downhill.

 

Easy Fold & Stand Storage

 

Transport or store ORGO with ease using our quick and easy fold down design. We understand space can be super limited in vehicle trunks, garages, apartments or around the home.

Ingenious engineering with the help of ORGO's aluminum frame and high-quality fabric construction allow the wagon to completely fold to a convenient size to store in a closet upright, under a bed, or laid in a car trunk to take elsewhere.

 

 

All-Terrain Front & Rear Suspension

 

Independent front and rear suspension with rubber tires create a steady and balanced journey for your child, cargo, and the cup of Joe you should've ordered with room.

 

Durable Aluminum Frame

 

The seamless aluminum tube frame will withstand the test of time and wear from nearly any excursion you can dream up. The quick auto fold and lock functionality allows for efficient storage when not in use, or easy transportability in any mid-size car. A durable multi-use wagon never looked so good.

Joystick Steering

 

A lifetime of gaming practice put to real-world use! Easily navigate obstacles, tight spaces, turns, and more using only a single digit thanks to ORGO's full 360° directional joystick. You'll need that extra hand for your swagger with all the attention your ORGO will bring.

 

 

Multi-Use Cart or Stroller

 

ORGO functions as both a wagon and a stroller, useful and convenient for anyone. A stroller for kids or fury companions, and a cart for cargo loads up to 130 lbs. safely.

Easily move two kids, a fury companion, and luggage in any combination on any terrain. Versatile features make converting the ORGO from soccer practice kid hauler to shuttling the weekly haul from farmers market to home a snap. Uphill, downhill, off-road, or smooth asphalt...ORGO has you covered.

 

12 Mile (20 km) Battery Range & Charging

 

With an average 12 mile range, ORGO has a long drive-time capability than many alternatives and designed to go the "extra mile". Should you find yourself in need of a longer range for your electric wagon or stroller, have no fear, the rechargeable lithium ion battery is also removable and swappable for quick recharge.

 

 

Travel and Camping Friendly

 

Up to 130 lbs of luggage can be easily moved. Especially, you can enjoy a very comfortable experience on both the uphill and downhill. Feel the power of the electric.

 

Relaxed Posture

 

Don't lower your back any more when you're climbing uphill. Make sure you don't have any more trouble moving around with your children at happy times. Stand up for your posture.

Travel in Pairs

Designed to serve your family long past stroller days, the push or pull wagon is ideal as a stroller for kids and children with special needs. From baby to kids can be used for longer usage period with one purchase. 

 

Child Safety Lock

 

The Child Safety lock button prevents children from operating their products to prevent emergencies. We must protect our child's safety.

 

Double -Safe Battery

 

Lithium-ion battery made using certified LG battery cells do not overcharge and worry of explosion. It also produces additional battery hard case to make them more secure. Use it safely. It takes 4 hours to fully charge the battery. And it can use a range of 12 mile(20km).

 

Two Color Options

 

 

ORGO comes in two timeless and sleek colors made from high-quality, water resistant fabrics. Everything matches with the soft charcoal tones of ORGO's dark grey option, while ORGO's navy blue option is dripping with high-end class. A chic stroll or the rugged outdoors- you can't go wrong choosing one... or both!

 

Tech Specs and Features

 

 

Perks

 

 

Take ORGO anywhere

 

Strolling with ORGO

Strolling never looked this good. The style of ORGO's design, effortless maneuverability, and durability will leave passer-byers with more questions than answers. With loaded features, ORGO makes taking strolls or walks to the market a breeze. 

 

Shopping with ORGO

No more awkward cold metal, communal germ laced grocery store carts standing between you and your child or food. The only time the wheels lock on ORGO are because you wanted them to, not because you parked a parking space too far from the store. 

 

Camping with ORGO

ORGO is great for the outdoors and campers alike.  Save your back transporting all your gear on camping trips to and from location. ORGO takes the effort out of getting to the campsite so you can spend more time actually camping.

 

Traveling with ORGO

Suitcases, carry-ons, overnight bags, laptops, travel pillows, snacks- and that's just your stuff. Whether it's the Airbnb you booked with no parking nearby, the hotel with six luggage carts all mysteriously missing at checkout time, or the 100 yard trek across grandma's gravel driveway, travel was never so easy or stylish than with ORGO on standby.

 

Meet the ORGO team

 

Focused on 'The Last Mile' 

DCART Labs strives to help people worldwide- allowing them the freedom to reduce the burden of moving people, things, and luggage by introducing several new  and useful products revolving around the core functionality of micro-mobilty for the last mile.

Our team consists of professional engineers and designers focused on mobility for globally known companies such as Mercedes-Benz, Volkswagen Group, Jaguar Land Rover, Hyundai,  Samsung, and Siemens.

DCART Labs is dedicated to making your experience as fun and informative as possible... and they look pretty good while doing it, too. 

 

Timeline

 

 

Follow us

Especially, you can enjoy a very comfortable experience on both the uphill and downhill. Feel the power of the electric. Relaxed Posture Don't lower your back any more when you're climbing uphill. Make sure you don't have any more trouble moving around with your children at happy times. Stand up for your posture.Travel in PairsDesigned to serve your family long past stroller days, the push or pull wagon is ideal as a stroller for kids and children with special needs. From baby to kids can be used for longer usage period with one purchase.  Child Safety Lock The Child Safety lock button prevents children from operating their products to prevent emergencies. We must protect our child's safety. Double -Safe Battery Lithium-ion battery made using certified LG battery cells do not overcharge and worry of explosion. It also produces additional battery hard case to make them more secure. Use it safely. It takes 4 hours to fully charge the battery. And it can use a range of 12 mile(20km). 
Two Color Options
  ORGO comes in two timeless and sleek colors made from high-quality, water resistant fabrics. Everything matches with the soft charcoal tones of ORGO's dark grey option, while ORGO's navy blue option is dripping with high-end class. A chic stroll or the rugged outdoors- you can't go wrong choosing one... or both! 
Tech Specs and Features  Perks  Take ORGO anywhere Strolling with ORGOStrolling never looked this good. The style of ORGO's design, effortless maneuverability, and durability will leave passer-byers with more questions than answers. With loaded features, ORGO makes taking strolls or walks to the market a breeze.  Shopping with ORGONo more awkward cold metal, communal germ laced grocery store carts standing between you and your child or food. The only time the wheels lock on ORGO are because you wanted them to, not because you parked a parking space too far from the store.  Camping with ORGOORGO is great for the outdoors and campers alike.  Save your back transporting all your gear on camping trips to and from location. ORGO takes the effort out of getting to the campsite so you can spend more time actually camping. Traveling with ORGOSuitcases, carry-ons, overnight bags, laptops, travel pillows, snacks- and that's just your stuff. Whether it's the Airbnb you booked with no parking nearby, the hotel with six luggage carts all mysteriously missing at checkout time, or the 100 yard trek across grandma's gravel driveway, travel was never so easy or stylish than with ORGO on standby. Meet the ORGO team Focused on 'The Last Mile' DCART Labs strives to help people worldwide- allowing them the freedom to reduce the burden of moving people, things, and luggage by introducing several new  and useful products revolving around the core functionality of micro-mobilty for the last mile.Our team consists of professional engineers and designers focused on mobility for globally known companies such as Mercedes-Benz, Volkswagen Group, Jaguar Land Rover, Hyundai,  Samsung, and Siemens.DCART Labs is dedicated to making your experience as fun and informative as possible... and they look pretty good while doing it, too.  Timeline  Follow us

story:
At the beach and during the summer we want to see cheerful and happy colors. That's why we created an electric folding bike that is cool to cruise along the boardwalks and promenades: The BeachCruiser.

We are Amsterdam Bikes, a team of Dutch cycling enthusiasts with an online e-bikeshop in Spain. We don't just love the beach, we live on the beach, we are the beach. And we wanted to have a cool looking folding bike to cruise along the boardwalks and promenades. And a bike with which we can give the urban areas more color. That's why we created the BeachCruiser. An electric folding bike with an aluminum frame which is very competitive priced, but still well equipped with for example 7 Nexus gears and a top quality battery.

 

You can choose from various colors such as Marbella Blue, Navy Blue (dark), Valencia Red, Cordoba Yellow, Sundown Pink, Coral Grey. And to your personal taste you can even choose from three colors for the tires, handles and saddle; brown, black or white.

 

 

 

  • - Comfortable cruiser handlebar
  • - 20 inch wheel size
  • - Frame size 44 cm (17 ⅓ inch)
  • - Shimano Nexus 7 gears
  • - Height adjustable saddle
  • - Height-adjustable and removable handlebar
  • - Entire bike easily foldable  
  • - 36V 10 Ah lithium battery
  • - Bafang motor front wheel
  • - Maximum speed 25  km/h (16 mph)
  • - V-brakes
  • - Side stand
  • - Optional mudguards

 

 

EU or US spec

The bicycle is made according European (safety) laws, with a maximum of 25 km/h pedal assistance. But for our US based clients we will change the bike settings to US Spec. The bike and brakes are adapted to the speed. You will stop on time. A very cool and safe bike.

For the development of this great folding bike we have only used A-brand products, these are easy to maintain and possibly replace.

 

The price of this folding bike is normally € 899,- but during our crowdfunding campaign we offer it once for only € 549,-  And above that the first 100 backers get a free set of mudguards worth of  € 29.95.

We need your help

We wanted to create a battery pack that is easily serviceable. To start these packs we need your help to produce the special battery casing.

Officially, our bike is still in the prototype stage. However, we have made arrangements with our suppliers so that these bikes can be delivered to our standards within 4-8 weeks.

story:
THE INNOVATIVE ELECTRIC BIKE ASSISTANT

When we had the vision of an Innovative Electric Bike Assistant, immediately we catch it and the idea took place. After two years of research, we designed and engineered in Italy BikesTail, with all our efforts and personal capitals. Now is time to leave the mooring and face the mass production, and this is why we need your help to start the process and delivery BikesTail directly rear your bikes.

BikesTail is your personal bike assistant, an electric portable device that allows you to convert your bicycle into an E-bike, in few seconds without any technical tools or particular skills.


Very easy to use: you just need to load it on the rear rack, pull over the extension, fix the elastic belts, and it's done. All the accessories have been studied to be installed with no tools, just with your hands. You can choice to control the power with the throttle or the pedal assistant.

A solid aluminum box, is the central units that contains the battery pack and all components. The aluminum bars safety hold the motor positioned on the rear bicycle wheel.

A Technical bag is supplied to contain your BikesTail and all the accessories, allowing you to bring your BikesTail everywhere or leave it protected and safe, waiting for the next use.

Enjoy your ride!


THE ADVANTAGES

You don’t need a new e-bike: BikesTail is suitable for all kind of bikes … so don’t lose your regular bike!

You just need one for your family rides … share it!

No tools or technical skills are required for the installation … because there is no installation, just load!

You can decide to pedal or use your personal electric assistant every single moment of your ride!

With BikesTail, you can control the power with the Pedal Sensor or with the Throttle… as you want!

Your bike loaded with BikesTail, will never be so heavy like an e-bike … it is just 5 kg!

It Is cheaper than an e-bike or a convertible kit. 

Easy to use, nobody still it because with his technical bag, it will follow you everywhere.

story:
We have long been looking for an intersection of technology and aesthetics. We pay attention to every detail and hope that our products can bring you joy. That is how KISS was born. We focus on your needs and created such a skateboard.


This is a very beautiful product and every single detail of it will provide you with perfect experience. The skateboard weighs 10.5 pounds, equipped with brushless DC motor driven by our self-developed driverchip. 


Of course, as creators with taste, our product is far more than a simple electric skateboard, but a smart skateboard that can fully understand you. All of its parameters and interaction parameters with you will be synchronized to your intelligence equipment, includingyour trajectory, movement time and the state of your equipment.


Taste

We pay much attention to every detail of the design and hope to bring you the most stunning visual enjoyment. KISS is just like your sweetheartwith a sexy curve that you simply cannot look away from. It will continue to impress you with its detail, so that you feel the perfect intersection of technology and aesthetics from the product itself and cannot help but linger your finger on it. While you are skateboarding, not only will you feel solid under your feet, but also meet eyes with admiration from either acquaintances or strangers. 


Portability

Another appealingfeature of KISS is that it is highly portable. Just imagine that you could now go here and there in spite of the urban traffic，the inconvenience of vehicles and bikes and the worries that they would be easily lost. You can always carry it with you into shopping malls, restaurants, cafes, offices, and easily put it aside. KISS is just there, like a loyal escort accompanying you. During your leisure time you are also free to play with it on the terrace or anywhere outdoors. KISS will not only solve a lot of trouble on transportation, but also allow you to enjoy exercise and sunshine. You even do not have to go to the gym every day specifically.


Interactive intelligence

The greatest feature of our product is that ittruly "understands you", just like a nice and caring girlfriend. KISS will record your daily trajectory, calculate the calories you have consumed，understand your health state and lead you to all places as a private navigation device, and you do not need to pay for such a wonderful APP!


·You will know how many kilometers you have slided today & this week

·You will know how many calories you have cosumed today & this week

·You can easily send the data to your friends or share it to facebook

·You can see the track and the location.

·You will own your private data space. 

Price

We hope our product is a piece of art and your good friend as well. Other than so many advantages, it also has a more acceptable price and our APP is completely free! Nonetheless, We do not lower any design and production standards but only hope that KISS appears in more corners of the world, accompanying you from everywhere.


Team

In our team there are engineers and designers; there are beauties and poets; there are geniuses ... but we are all creators. I hope that our product can be a truly amazing one that brings you the ultimate pleasure and beauty. That is why our product is called kiss. With her, you may know what kind of girlfriend you would like.


OTHERS

Why Indiegogo？

 We are almost ready for production. Our Indiegogo funding goal is based on placing orders with our suppliers to make a minimum of 100 KISS Boards and having our molds manufactured for a large-scale production of the fundamental material decks.

Indiegogo is currently the only place in the world where you canbuy a KISS Board. Preorder today helps us reach those last crucial milestones. In return, you will be one of the first to own a KISS Board and try out for this awesome electric vehicle. We really cannot thank you more!


RISK

SAFETY

KISS is an electric skateboard,and provide a different riding feeling. You should first get used to this new feeling before you speed up. Please always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear in case anything happens. Do not ride the board beyond your skills and care about your environment.

LEGALITY

Laws and regulations regarding electric vehicles, and electric skateboards, vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product before you ride it.

Risks and challenges

The KISS Electric Skateboard is an advanced product and large-scale production is never easy. Thankfully we work with amazing suppliers and component manufacturers to make it happen.Some of our electronic components may have longer lead time than we foresee. We will be placing orders with our suppliers immediately after the Indiegogo campaign ends. We already have a back up supplier or manufacturer selected for almost every long lead-time component of the board.
