story:
AERO-SERVICE was founded in 2005. It specializes in the design, construction and repair of ultra-light airplanes. Since 2014, we decided to extend our offer and commence with the production of a small four-wheeled electric vehicle, which is the EV4 City Quad. All the knowledge and experience gained from avionics was carried over to the design and construction of the EV4. In the summer of 2016 we released a new vehicle, the EV4 Bike. Until today we have sold 11 bikes. Our product was featured on different portals and on “Freeze List” YouTube channel – “7 INSANE VEHICLES You Didn't know Existed” which has over 1’000’000 views.

VISION

We strongly believe that electricity and compact size is the future of personal transportation. Imagine no traffic jams, no noise and clean air to breathe even living next to a busy, crowded street. This is not just our vision of the future and with the help of our backers we want to contribute in changing the world.

THE DESIGN

EV4 Bike is an innovative tricycle bike with electric support motor and the ability to tilt in corners. Our goal was to design a bike with a unique appearance, high quality and the ability to safely move around the city without breaking any street regulations. EV4 Bike is classified as an electric bike in the EU and the USA and can be used on roads, bike paths and in some countries on the sidewalk.
The two wheels at the front are both equipped with hydraulic disc brakes. Traction from the doubled footprint increases stability and stopping power. The risk of falling due to a front wheel lock is mitigated by the fact that under such circumstances the whole vehicle moves sideways until it regains traction, where as a normal bike will slip away from under the rider.

REWARD

For our backers we have a special 25% discount on EV4 Bike and fantastic merchandise to along with our product.

OPTIONS

There is a series of options and accessories to choose from. However, because of some shipping restrictions the internal battery pack is not available for shipping outside of Europe. Every version of the bike comes with a charger but we're making it also available for purchase as an additional unit. Most of the bike accessories are form Bernardi - Italy - and come in a variety colours to choose from. The external battery pack has the same parameters as the internal one, we may however decide to choose another supplier so the picture may not resemble final product. Also, please keep in mind that the charger on the picture resembles the one that is used for the internal battery pack. The charger for the external battery pack with look slightly different.

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

Drive: BLDC motors 250 W, max 800 W
Controller: BLDC 800 W
Battery: Li-Ion 36 V, 13 Ah
Brakes: hydraulic discs on 3 wheels
Width: 60 cm
Length: 150 cm
Height: 110 cm
Weight: 35 kg with battery
Range: 30-130 km
Speed: max. 25 km/h with electric motor
Suspension: 2 bicycle shock absorbers
Front tires: 47-305 (16 x 1.75)
Rear tire: 50-406 (20 x 1.95)
Shimano 6-gear transmission
Mechanical tilting system
Aviation grade aluminium frame
Height-adjustable seat

TIMELINE

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The only risk involved in this campaign is that with a very large number of backers we will not be able to produce all of the bikes in time. We did however do our best to estimate the time and resources needed to produce a large amount of bikes and considered all eventualities that might increase production time. I’m sure we came up with a pretty accurate timeline.

FAQ

Can I get the bike at this price elsewhere?
No, the discount is only available through the Indiegogo campaign.

Who is responsible for taxes?
In countries within the European Union VAT is included. For countries outside of European Union you are responsible for taxes, duties and VAT. Please check with your local customs office (HS code 8711.90.00).

Is assembly required?
EV4 is delivered assembled and ready to run in the European Union. In countries outside of Europe due to transport cost minimal assembly maybe required.

Why can't I order panniers with the external battery pack?
The panniers mounting system would have to be placed under the battery pack rendering them unremovable.

How long does it take to fully charge the battery?
It takes about 4 hours.

How is EV4 packaged?
In a crate made of plywood - 161 x 66 x 120 cm - 85 kg.

Why is the shipping so expensive?
The vehicles are shipped fully assembled in crates, not packages.

What about maintenance?
Most of the bike components are standard and available on the market. You can do your own maintenance - it's simple. Any bike service will manage.

 

More information on the product can be found on our website at www.ev4.pl/en
If you have any questions please mail us at info@ev4.pl

story:
How to install the kit?

 

FAQ

1.How about the delivery time?

The handling time is within 30 days before shipping. And the transport takes 10-15 days.

 

2. How much is the shipping?

It is free to UK/ EU, USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, South Africa.

Please leave us a message or contact us to other countries.

 

3.How about the warranty?

The warranty for Motor is 24 months. For the Battery & Controller, LCD display, and throttle are 12 months. During the warranty time, we offer the free new parts but not include shipping.

 

4. How to choose the right wheel size for my bike?

After you placed your order, you will be contacted to confirm your wheel type- Rim and tire size, brake type etc.

 

5. How to charge the battery?

You could charge the battery while it is on the bike or take it home, the charger is 110-240V AC input, 42V 2A output.

 

6. What is the thumb throttle?

The thumb throttle is mounted on the handlebar. Also, you could enjoy the electric assistance by pedaling without a throttle.

 

7. Could it be installed easily?

Yes! Even you may have little knowledge about electric bikes. You could connect one cable only, of which there are arrows and horizontal line to guide your connection right.

Also, there are tools needed to be packed together to help you install the wheel fast.

 

8.How about the PAS?

The EEkit do not need the PAS. The motor has 6 hall sensors while most of the others with 1 hall sensor, which could sense the speed sensitively and offer corresponding assist power according to the setting on LCD.

story:
Trefecta closes the Indiegogo campaign early but nonetheless successfully.

Trefecta will close the crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo. Since the launch of the Trefecta RDR, it appears that Indiegogo is not geared to a product in the higher price range and interested dealers and patrons encountered problems with payments.

As such Trefecta now invites our loyal Indiegogo customers to order directly from Trefecta B.V. once Indiegogo has refunded you (within 5 business days after the campaign closes). We will be able to offer a range of payment options including an instalment plan, this way we can avoid any payment issues as suffered with Indiegogo.

Strong interest in our Trefecta RDR overall and the instalment option in particular has led to the potential achievement of our minimum goal of 25 Trefecta RDR eBikes sold. Naturally, we will need all our patrons to make the switch in order to achieve it. Our apologies for the inconvenience this causes.

Because of the success, we can continue to build our order book directly with our customers via the special Trefecta RDR website. There you will find all the information you need and you can fill-out an order form with your details and which Trefecta RDR package you prefer. After submission we will contact you directly to discuss further details and payment options.

We want to thank everyone who has contributed to achieving our goal and for anyone who has not yet ordered a Trefecta RDR, please visit the RDR.TrefectaMobility.com website and order your RDR now!

 

The Trefecta RDR Go anywhere, do anything

The Trefecta RDR is the ideal eBike to take on a challenging off-road trail and yet with the road kit installed the RDR is the fast and relaxed solution for your every day inter-urban commutes. The Trefecta RDR offers you best value based on Performance, Range and Design without compromising on the values the Trefecta brand is known for since 2012: offering you the ultimate riding experience with the freedom to go where you want, when you want.

 

Trefecta’s aim is to create the game, instead of changing it. By focusing on true innovation we create the norm and set the standard for the products of tomorrow. We are very proud to introduce the new Trefecta RDR speed pedelec, a more affordable version of our famous Trefecta DRT Pro race pedelec. The bike has been designed to tackle almost any terrain and to transport you in style thanks to sophisticated suspension and styling, a powerful motor with unusually long range (due to a large battery).

The Trefecta RDR represents the culmination of 7 years work to develop and produce an eBike powerful and durable enough for international military peacekeeping and professional use. The goal is to lock-in and secure the final investment needed to bring the core technologies developed to the consumer market in serial production.

The range of special perks on offer is highlighted by the Trefecta RDR ABS RK (10 units available at this special offer first come first served price) offering extraordinary value for money.

No Competition

Unmatched Performance

The new Trefecta RDR uses either a 250w, 500w or 920w mid-drive motor from German brand TQ. Whichever power output you choose there’s a stunning 120Nm of torque available. That’s more than twice what most mid-drive motors will provide.

Unmatched Design

We have chosen to finish the Trefecta RDR's in natural aluminium, the upper frame untreated while the powertrain is finished in matt black. Aluminium is a durable and fully recyclable material that forms its own protection through natural oxidation, thus giving a wonderful patina through life. A nod to classic racing motorcycles of yesteryear that had aluminium fuel tanks, thereby building a fun yet sustainable bridge between our past and our future mobility requirements.

Unmatched Pleasure

The greatest value that the RDR offers is pleasure! The pleasure of driving, discovering, getting further than you ever were, building better health or arriving relaxed at work in an environmentally friendly way without traffic jams. The Trefecta RDR already offers you the mobility solution of the 21st century at the lowest cost per kilometer. That is unmatched pleasure combined with an attractive value proposition.

Your Equipment

The Trefecta RDR ABS RK comes equipped as follows:

  • Trefecta upper frame and powertrain in high grade aluminium with adjustable trail angle.

  • Available in 26" or 27.5" wheel sizes.

  • Trefecta 1480wh battery pack with integrated BMS CE/UN certified.

  • TQ 500w 120nm mid engine.

  • BluBrake integrated high speed eBike ABS System (With off mode for stunts).

  • Gates CarbonDrive.

  • Enviolo Sport 360 IGH with electronic control.

  • Magura Boltron USD fork and rear damper both with 150mm of travel.

  • Magura MT hydraulic callipers with MDR-P floating disc brakes F:220mm R:203mm.

  • Seatpost dropper.

  • Road Kit (RK) Supernova head and tail lights, rear cargo rack, front and rear mudguards.

  • ApplePlay prepared dock.

  • 3 year international warrantee on parts.

(Please consider that all images and video's of the Trefecta RDR on this page are relatively rough pre-production prototypes and not finished to VDL series production standards as the delivered perks will be!)

 

Press Highlights

 

Reliable Partners

Our development and production partners are the most renowned in the industry and include VDL, Magura, TQ, BluBrake and SBS. The fact that manufacturing and final assembly is carried out by VDL in Eindhoven guarantees a timely and professional result to automotive industry standards.

Blubrake is the developer of the only high speed pedelec ABS (anti-lock braking system) for e-bikes that can be fully integrated inside the frame and that can drastically increase safety for all kinds of e-bikes, from city to mountain, from trekking to cargo. A light and invisible technology for a safer and more enjoyable cycling experience.

Smart Battery Solutions sees electricity as more than a source of energy. It is the basis for creativity and innovation. The result: mobile and stationary power storage systems at the highest level of our time. Smart Battery Solutions brings the future of battery technology into the present and into the Trefecta RDR.

Minimal Risk

The funds received will go towards delivering the perks to the Indiegogo patrons that invested in our campaign. As such we have the same goal as our patrons in getting the Trefecta RDR into serial production. With a minimum target of 25 units we have kept our feet on the ground and risk of failure is very low.

The funds required are needed to complete the project and start serial production. The bullet points below list the key investments we still need to make.

  • Make the necessary changes to the steel mould for high pressure aluminium injection.
  • Powertrain, invest in custom extrusions to optimise design and strength.
  • Fine tuning the electronic system for optimum performance.
  • Enough capital to finance the start of production.

The biggest risk we believe to be timing; will we manage to get all the components produced and procured in time to meet our own schedule? To minimise this risk we operate with proper program management and have included additional time in our project schedules in order to compensate for some of the inevitable delays that occur in such complex projects. The successful development and production of the military Trefecta DRT Pro (currently undergoing long term operational testing with several countries on international peacekeeping missions) and its civilian counterparts shows our ability to get complex projects done right and on time.

Team Trefecta

Over 10 years ago, a complimentary team was assembled, ranging in specialties from engineering to electronics, and from sales to marketing. A melting pot of expertise in automotive, aerospace, public transportation and consumer product development has been put into our vehicle in this period of time. The diversity in backgrounds finds its roots in Germany, Switzerland and The Netherlands. The result is a progressive approach towards development, production, marketing and distribution, which lets Trefecta Mobility stand for true innovation.

We are very proud to introduce the new Trefecta RDR speed pedelec, a more affordable version of our famous Trefecta DRT Pro race pedelec. The bike has been designed to tackle almost any terrain and to transport you in style thanks to sophisticated suspension and styling, a powerful motor with unusually long range (due to a large battery).
The Trefecta RDR represents the culmination of 7 years work to develop and produce an eBike powerful and durable enough for international military peacekeeping and professional use. The goal is to lock-in and secure the final investment needed to bring the core technologies developed to the consumer market in serial production.
The range of special perks on offer is highlighted by the Trefecta RDR ABS RK (10 units available at this special offer first come first served price) offering extraordinary value for money.
No Competition

Unmatched Performance
The new Trefecta RDR uses either a 250w, 500w or 920w mid-drive motor from German brand TQ. Whichever power output you choose there’s a stunning 120Nm of torque available. That’s more than twice what most mid-drive motors will provide.

Unmatched Design
We have chosen to finish the Trefecta RDR's in natural aluminium, the upper frame untreated while the powertrain is finished in matt black. Aluminium is a durable and fully recyclable material that forms its own protection through natural oxidation, thus giving a wonderful patina through life. A nod to classic racing motorcycles of yesteryear that had aluminium fuel tanks, thereby building a fun yet sustainable bridge between our past and our future mobility requirements.

Unmatched Pleasure
The greatest value that the RDR offers is pleasure! The pleasure of driving, discovering, getting further than you ever were, building better health or arriving relaxed at work in an environmentally friendly way without traffic jams. The Trefecta RDR already offers you the mobility solution of the 21st century at the lowest cost per kilometer. That is unmatched pleasure combined with an attractive value proposition.
Your Equipment
The Trefecta RDR ABS RK comes equipped as follows:

Trefecta upper frame and powertrain in high grade aluminium with adjustable trail angle.
Available in 26" or 27.5" wheel sizes.
Trefecta 1480wh battery pack with integrated BMS CE/UN certified.
TQ 500w 120nm mid engine.
BluBrake integrated high speed eBike ABS System (With off mode for stunts).
Gates CarbonDrive.
Enviolo Sport 360 IGH with electronic control.
Magura Boltron USD fork and rear damper both with 150mm of travel.
Magura MT hydraulic callipers with MDR-P floating disc brakes F:220mm R:203mm.
Seatpost dropper.
Road Kit (RK) Supernova head and tail lights, rear cargo rack, front and rear mudguards.
ApplePlay prepared dock.
3 year international warrantee on parts.



(Please consider that all images and video's of the Trefecta RDR on this page are relatively rough pre-production prototypes and not finished to VDL series production standards as the delivered perks will be!)
 
Press Highlights

 
Reliable Partners
Our development and production partners are the most renowned in the industry and include VDL, Magura, TQ, BluBrake and SBS. The fact that manufacturing and final assembly is carried out by VDL in Eindhoven guarantees a timely and professional result to automotive industry standards.
Blubrake is the developer of the only high speed pedelec ABS (anti-lock braking system) for e-bikes that can be fully integrated inside the frame and that can drastically increase safety for all kinds of e-bikes, from city to mountain, from trekking to cargo. A light and invisible technology for a safer and more enjoyable cycling experience.
Smart Battery Solutions sees electricity as more than a source of energy. It is the basis for creativity and innovation. The result: mobile and stationary power storage systems at the highest level of our time. Smart Battery Solutions brings the future of battery technology into the present and into the Trefecta RDR.

Minimal Risk
The funds received will go towards delivering the perks to the Indiegogo patrons that invested in our campaign. As such we have the same goal as our patrons in getting the Trefecta RDR into serial production. With a minimum target of 25 units we have kept our feet on the ground and risk of failure is very low.
The funds required are needed to complete the project and start serial production. The bullet points below list the key investments we still need to make.

Make the necessary changes to the steel mould for high pressure aluminium injection.
Powertrain, invest in custom extrusions to optimise design and strength.
Fine tuning the electronic system for optimum performance.
Enough capital to finance the start of production.

The biggest risk we believe to be timing; will we manage to get all the components produced and procured in time to meet our own schedule? To minimise this risk we operate with proper program management and have included additional time in our project schedules in order to compensate for some of the inevitable delays that occur in such complex projects. The successful development and production of the military Trefecta DRT Pro (currently undergoing long term operational testing with several countries on international peacekeeping missions) and its civilian counterparts shows our ability to get complex projects done right and on time.
Team Trefecta
Over 10 years ago, a complimentary team was assembled, ranging in specialties from engineering to electronics, and from sales to marketing. A melting pot of expertise in automotive, aerospace, public transportation and consumer product development has been put into our vehicle in this period of time. The diversity in backgrounds finds its roots in Germany, Switzerland and The Netherlands. The result is a progressive approach towards development, production, marketing and distribution, which lets Trefecta Mobility stand for true innovation.

story:
A baby Ninja is born

We believe that in the 21st century you don’t need a two-ton machine to transport a single passenger in the city. Small, personal vehicles are cheap, fun and super versatile. They can turn tedious commuting into an adventure! 

Precisely for this reason we decided to build the best micro-vehicle out there. In short - Narcine gives you the style & comfort of a large moped in half the size of a bicycle. You can ride and store it practically anywhere.

 

As Featured in:


 

Innovation, based in Bulgaria

We started Narcine back in 2016 by building a couple of low-fidelity prototypes. Over time we got useful and encouraging feedback from our community which inspired us to refine our models. Gradually, we became obsessed with the idea of finding the recipe for the smallest viable scooter that still looks cool and dignified. 

 

1. Social: Moving on two wheels has many advantages, but this is our personal favorite: you can actually meet, talk and connect with people. 

2. Compact size: We've deliberately kept the wheels small and compensated with the clever sitting position. As a result, Narcine is half the size of a conventional bicycle and will fit in elevators, storage rooms or closets. When folded, two of these ninjas can get into the trunk of your family hatchback. 

3. Comfort: it is important and we want to guarantee you a silky-smooth ride, even when riding on cobblestones or rough terrain. Sit back, relax and travel over 50km on a single charge. The seat can be adjusted to match riders with different heights. 

4. Safety: we take it seriously. Quality materials, powerful brakes and superior handling - Narcine makes sure you have the control and stability needed to stay out of trouble.

5. Style: Delivering a product of high quality is paramount to us. We've put tremendous effort to design a vehicle that is as stylish as it is functional. 

 

Specifications

In order to reduce weight, we use only high-quality aluminum for the chassis. The seat and handlebar tubes are made out of steel to avoid any compromise with durability. All mechanical components have undergone rigorous tests, including rear-world operation. We've made sure they meet all strength and rigidity criteria and that there's no slack or excessive wearing in the folding joints over time. 

The design is very simple and maintenance is brought to a minimum. The brake calipers and the tires can be changed in a DIY manner or with the help of local bike service. Charging is done via regular electrical outlet - charging times vary in the range 4-6 hours depending on the battery capacity.

In terms of battery capacity, we offer two options - 12Ah and 20Ah, Li-ion batteries with 18650-type cells. Respectively, the possible ranges per single charge are - 30km. and 55km. You can order the larger battery as an additional extra to the selected perk. 

 

Vibrant colors 

We've picked four elegant and expressive color variations for you to choose from: AZZURO, MAMBA, CHERRY and ORANGE. Pick your favorite and ride in style!

 

Perks

One frame size fits all riders, thanks to the clever design and seat adjustment. For the first 10 units we offer special Early-bird prices: $1,129 (37% off the retail $1,799). The regular price for the scooter during the campaign is $1,349 (25% off the retail $1,799). If you want you can order the battery upgrade (20Ah) and extend the range up to 55km. for +$169.

Timeline

 

Team

We are a team of dreamers and makers. We are good at following our goals and working relentlessly to serve our community. We are not good at sitting aside and quietly observing problems.

 

Risks & Challenges

We've already spent more than three years on testing and improving our prototypes. Better still, we already have early adopters that are using the scooters every day and giving us valuable feedback about their real-world experience. The frames, handlebars and seats are produced by our trusted local manufacturers and for the electrical parts we're using only the finest components from our suppliers overseas. We assemble, test and quality control each unit, leaving no room for compromise. The design and engineering stages are done, what's left is to setup production lines and scale up the manufacturing. 
 

In the summer we have scheduled a procedure for obtaining certifications & regulatory testing. This is a complex and time-consuming process, which may be a reason for possible delays or unforeseen difficulties. Minor changes to the design and specifications may occur.

We assemble, test and quality control each unit, leaving no room for compromise. The design and engineering stages are done, what's left is to setup production lines and scale up the manufacturing.  
In the summer we have scheduled a procedure for obtaining certifications & regulatory testing. This is a complex and time-consuming process, which may be a reason for possible delays or unforeseen difficulties. Minor changes to the design and specifications may occur.

story:
I’ve started and run multiple businesses before, and even sold one to Apple Computer. So I know what it takes to carry through on all the big and little tasks to get a company going. And we at Booster Batteries know electric vehicles are the future and we want to be a big part of that.

As an engineer, I love finding solutions to problems. Especially when those solutions can really make a difference in people’s lives. So when I heard of biking friends being stranded miles from home with a dead battery or having to push up a long hill because their battery wasn’t powerful enough, I wanted to find a perfect solution. Bigger batteries are available, but they’re VERY expensive. Plus it seemed wasteful to replace the expensive existing stock battery and replace it with something even more expensive.

So why not just add to the existing stock battery instead? Just like adding an extra battery to a flashlight to make the bulb burn brighter, a Booster Battery connected to the stock battery can add more power or greater range. 

To get our first round of distribution we’ll need at least $20k. That will give us the final testing and certification we need to start shipping product. Any extra funds raised will allow us to add additional perks and start making Booster Batteries for more varieties of eBikes. Even if we don’t make our $20k goal, we’ll still be shipping out our perks. Remember, we already have factory samples of Booster Batteries and are currently finalizing production.

Our first perks are Booster Batteries that fit right inside the triangle frame box of the very popular Sondors eBikes. We have both Power Boosters - that provide more hill-climbing power - and Range Boosters - that allow the bikes to go a greater distance on a single charge. These Booster Batteries will come with everything needed to connect up to the existing Sondors battery, including all cables and even a special charger for the Power Booster.

We’ll also offer a solar charger that can be used to recharge the Power Booster off sunlight alone, so it’s perfect keeping your eBike charged while camping. This solar charger can also be kept on the dashboard of a car to help keep your car battery fully charged and ready during periods when the car isn’t used - such as in an airport parking lot.

We’ll be adding other perks over time to help make your Sondors eBike more usable. Such as hard-to-find items like gearing and racks and fenders. But we’ll soon add additional booster batteries for other bikes, skateboards, wheelchairs, and maybe someday even for cars!

Even if you don’t have a Sondors, or even an eBike, yet, you can still help us in the push to get more people out of cars and onto bikes. With an eBike, even injuries or bad hips and knees can’t stop you from getting where you’re going. Please use the share tools on this site to get the word out!

story:
Perk        

BICYCLOAD series

 

Different sizes but same large stowage ! 

 

Demonstration of simply water resistance stainless box !

Controlling by user's two hands is more safety and stabled way of operating. 

 

Effective inner sizes : L396mm(15.6 inch) x H270mm(10.63 inch) x W80mm(3.15 inch)

 

Suggested distribute weight : max. 15kgs

 

Suggest to lock with the winding type wire dial lock for crime prevention (lock is excluded)

 

 

FAQs

General

Q1. Will you inform us if there any adjustment on the package content?  

YES, please note that the adjustment happens only for the inevitable reasons such as the discontinued condition on the current adopting accessories. Or modifications on the bike frame and the built-in boxes if the final production stage needs some procedure improvements.

!!! We will give an open updates on Indiegogo to announce the adjustment news to every backers as soon as we are informed by the suppliers.

 

Q2. What is the recommended maximum rider weight? 

The weight limit of the BICYCOLAD series bike is up to 120 kgs (264 lbs) including luggage.

Approx. weights of BIYCYLOAD series bike :
Full frame set + built-in stainless box 10~11kgs (22~24.25 lbs)
Wheel set 5~6kgs (11~13 lbs)
The rest of accessories 5~6kgs (11~13 lbs)
!!!  We cannot warranty the frame and the components lifetime span if the rider is heavier than the limit. Also, it will cause the damage on the spokes and the wheel bearing or wear out upon the chain and sprocket etc quickly which can be affected on the safety riding eventually.

 

Q3. What is the suggested max. loading weight of BICYCLOAD built-in boxes?  

The weight limit of the built-in stainless box is up to 15 kgs (33 lbs) and the PP (Polypropylene) box is up to 5 kgs (11 lbs) by placing distribute evenly.

!!! We cannot warranty the built-in boxes and its components lifetime span if the loading object are loaded without distributing evenly or loading heavier than the limit. By doing that, it will damage the structure of the built-in box and makes the riders unsafe on their biking.

 

Q4. Does BICYCLOAD series follow the tested?  

Yes, BICYCLOAD series L frame has been tested and accepted by ISO 4210 and JIS D 9301.

!!!  The other two sizes, M & S frame, are currently set up for customized request to fulfill more different height of riders. Thus, we will process the test once we obtain the orders from the campaign and before delivery to you. Also, we will give an open updates on Indiegogo to announce to every backers as soon as we receive the testing result.

 

Q5. Does the BICYCLOAD series come assembled?  

Absolutely. The BICYCOLAD series ships safely packed with 70% assembled.

!!! We may adjust the % of assembling for reducing the volume of shipping package due to the international shipping policy of each country.

 

Q6. How to assemble the BICYCLOAD series when delivered to my door?  

Each BICYCLOAD series package will include the instructions. You can do it yourself or take it to a local bike shop.

 

Q7. Do you offer membership?  

Yes, we will save your data after you claimed our perk from this campaign. After we delivering to you, we will provide you the official membership card by e-mail.

!!!  After purchasing our products, you automatically become the member of STARTS JUMP without paying any fees. Each member's data is confidential and we will only use it for important purpose such as warranty, special event, or exclusive hot news etc. We will not use that to bother any members for the commercial activities or promotions.

 

Q8. Do I need to register any information to active the product warranty?  

No, your product warranty service is automatically linked into your membership.

!!! BICYCLOAD series bike is made in Taiwan and will be shipped from Taiwan.

  • 2 years warranty is covered for the frame including all the built-in boxes 
  • 1.5 year warranty is covered for the fork

 

Shipping & Shipment

Q9. Where can I check the total cost including the shipment?  

After selecting a perk, you will be able to see the total cost after indicating your shipping address. Please check Indiegogo's article at here

 

Q10. Who is responsible for the fees after receiving international package?  

The backer is responsible for any additional fees such as VAT, GST, duties, and taxes etc.　These fees are vary from country to country.  

!!!  According to the different harmonized system and other importing additional fees of each country, all of backers better to make sure to check the regulations in your country before pledging a perk. If you need some information from us, please email at ideal@startsjump.com

 

Q11. Where can I update my shipping address?  

Please read the article on Indiegogo here.

!!!  After selecting a BICYCLOAD series perk, please make sure the information that you fill out on Indiegogo is the correct one for us to arrange the shipment and be able to reach you when the package is arrival.

 

Q12. Can you ship to worldwide?  

Sorry, we try to make it happen but there are some factors such as high cost of shipping and some other evaluations. If you find your area is not available, please email your address to us at ideal@startsjump.com for our assisting .

!!!  We will contact you as soon as we find out that your area could be added in our service.

 

Q13. Can I get a refund?  

Please make sure every details before your purchase and kindly read Indiegogo's refund policy here.

!!!  After each backer's purchase, still there is a possibility that we may find out your area is not able to service for the delivery. Thus, we will need your prior understanding to process the refund when the campaign is live and not ended.

 

Maintenance & Warranty

Q14. How do I take care of the BICYCLOAD series bike?  

Maintenance is carried out as on a regular bicycle and every professional bicycle shop will be able to maintain our bicycle as well.

 

Q15. How do I take care of the BICYCLOAD built-in boxes?  

Maintenance is carried out as simple as you follow the instruction steps which we will include in the same package with bike.

!!!  You can also send us an email to ask for the maintenance in video.

 

Q16. How often do I need to replace the brakes and/or tires?  

Brakes and tires on your BICYCLOAD series should last as long as those on a typical bike.

 

Q17. Where can I buy repair parts and components?  

Any parts and components related with the built-in boxes are custom-made for us, so you will be able to buy it only from us.

!!!  Other components are able to buy from any professional bike shop. For sure, you can feel free to e-mail us if you find hard to obtain it from the shop.

 

Q18. Do you offer warranty for bike parts?  

We only cover for the bike frame including all of built-in boxes and the fork. And sorry that we will not cover for the bike parts when it is considered as consumables.

!!! BICYCLOAD series bike is covered with 2 years warranty for the frame including all the built-in boxes. For the fork is covered with 1.5 year warranty.

 

Q19. How to obtain the warranty service if I am international?  

First, we will need to evaluate on each of your conditions then decide how we could service for you as more effective way.

!!!  If we negotiate with you for the minimal charging, it is inevitable situation due to the high costs of shipping and customs. Your priority understanding will be grateful for us.

 

 

***If you could not find what you're looking for here*** 

please contact us at ideal@startsjump.com

 

Sincerely from the STARTS JUMP Team   www.startsjump.com

!!!  After selecting a BICYCLOAD series perk, please make sure the information that you fill out on Indiegogo is the correct one for us to arrange the shipment and be able to reach you when the package is arrival. Q12. Can you ship to worldwide?   Sorry, we try to make it happen but there are some factors such as high cost of shipping and some other evaluations. If you find your area is not available, please email your address to us at ideal@startsjump.com for our assisting .

!!!  We will contact you as soon as we find out that your area could be added in our service. Q13. Can I get a refund?   Please make sure every details before your purchase and kindly read Indiegogo's refund policy here.

!!!  After each backer's purchase, still there is a possibility that we may find out your area is not able to service for the delivery. Thus, we will need your prior understanding to process the refund when the campaign is live and not ended. Maintenance & WarrantyQ14. How do I take care of the BICYCLOAD series bike?  Maintenance is carried out as on a regular bicycle and every professional bicycle shop will be able to maintain our bicycle as well. Q15. How do I take care of the BICYCLOAD built-in boxes?   Maintenance is carried out as simple as you follow the instruction steps which we will include in the same package with bike.

!!!  You can also send us an email to ask for the maintenance in video. Q16. How often do I need to replace the brakes and/or tires?   Brakes and tires on your BICYCLOAD series should last as long as those on a typical bike. Q17. Where can I buy repair parts and components?   Any parts and components related with the built-in boxes are custom-made for us, so you will be able to buy it only from us.

!!!  Other components are able to buy from any professional bike shop. For sure, you can feel free to e-mail us if you find hard to obtain it from the shop. Q18. Do you offer warranty for bike parts?   We only cover for the bike frame including all of built-in boxes and the fork. And sorry that we will not cover for the bike parts when it is considered as consumables.
!!! BICYCLOAD series bike is covered with 2 years warranty for the frame including all the built-in boxes. For the fork is covered with 1.5 year warranty. Q19. How to obtain the warranty service if I am international?   First, we will need to evaluate on each of your conditions then decide how we could service for you as more effective way.

!!!  If we negotiate with you for the minimal charging, it is inevitable situation due to the high costs of shipping and customs. Your priority understanding will be grateful for us.  
***If you could not find what you're looking for here*** please contact us at ideal@startsjump.com
 Sincerely from the STARTS JUMP Team   www.startsjump.com

story:
Reflector for night visibility

 

 

  • What scooters will the scooter dock fit on? The standard aluminum folding kind with a “T” type stem.
  • What is the Scooter Dock made of? Metal, plastic, and a magnet
  • What color options are available? Currently only the metal silver color
  • How many screws attach the scooter dock to the scooter? 3 (included)
  • How many screws to attach it to the wall? 2

Kick scooters are great toys for kids  and adults. We have 4 kick scooters yet it seems they multiply, we always have a few extra scooters in the garage. In 2014 we had had it with kick scooters; it seemed that our kick scooters were left wherever especially in high traffic areas. The bottom of the stairs, next to, and under vehicles, they seem to sneak up behind you and pose a hazard to everyone.

It was at this point the idea of hanging a kick scooter on the wall with a magnet started.  The first attempt was a strip of sheet metal on the wall. Over the last few years and with the help of some great engineers the idea has turned into a awesome product. It has not been easy to get to this point but we are proud of the product that has been created. The scooter dock solves the problem of kick scooter storage. It makes storing and accessing kick scooters multiple times a day easy. We hope you think this product is as cool as we do, and we now need your help to start tooling and kick off production.

After successfully launching multiple products on indiegogo and delivering those products to backers we are confident with your help we can make the scooter dock a success.

story:
About Rydiah Rhoden

My name is Rydiah Rhoden, I am a freshman biology major at Clark Atlanta University. I am  18 years old and I'm from Philadelphia,PA. Here at CAU I founded two businesses RyDesignz and Rydes. 

 

About Rydes

  • Rydes is a ride-share business created specifically for college students. At this moment we're only based in the Atlanta University Center ( Clark Atlanta University, Spelman College and Morehouse College) I started Rydes last semester as a Freshman at Clark Atlanta University. The reason I started Rydes was because one of my closest friends told me how much they were paying to go back and forth to work each day. She was working to pay off her school fees and as a college student I know that it's very important to save money.  Soon after starting Rydes, other students started asking for Rydes as well and that's when I realized that students are actually looking for a cheaper way to travel- especially students within the AUC  where more than half of the students are from out of state. 

How did it work? 

Last semester, AUC Students would text me with their pickup and drop-off location and the number of passengers. I would then give them an estimate for their Ryde, I would pick them up...drop them off and even wait for them if needed. 

This semester, because the demand for Rydes is increasing, I've been holding informational sessions and recruiting other students to become a driver. While in the process of hiring other students, I realized that it's very difficult to connect Ryders with drivers without the development of an app. I'm not always available to respond to text messages this semester due to my academic schedule and I do not want to give up on this idea because so many students actually need transportation off campus. As an out of state student myself,  I know not to go anywhere alone and I often have to look over my shoulder, 

 

  • After speaking with several app developers the estimated price to develop an app is between $10,0000-$20,000
  • If i do not reach my entire goal, I will put the funds into a business account for Rydes and continue to raise funds by hosting a series of fundraising events on and off campus. 

 

Risks & Challenges

My first time completing a Ryde was on October 21st, 2017! Since then, Rydes have been going through a lot of trials and tribulations, there were days where we received no Rydes at all and there were days when I wanted to give up on the idea as a whole- but I didn't. As Rydes continues to expand, I know that there will be a lot more risks and challenges, but I am willing to grow and learn from these challenges. Rydes is something I am extremely passionate about, it's not for me it's for my peers and other college students. I know that this is a great Idea and I really hope that others can see it too. 

Even if you can not contribute to the development of an app for Rydes you can still show your support by following @AUCRydes on Instagram and twitter and sharing this campaign with others. I truly appreciate the support from everyone and Rydes will be expanding soon!

story:
Our Mission

Driving2Save was founded in October 2017 to build a brighter future by creating and empowering a community of conscientious drivers.

This is an increasingly important mission because each year in the U.S.:

Since our founding, we have leveraged our online and social media platforms to encourage tens of thousands of drivers to make small changes in their behavior that can substantially reduce their risks on the road and save them hundreds of dollars per year.  We want to make an even greater impact. With more than 220 million registered drivers in the U.S., turning these small changes in individual behavior into habits would produce major improvements in safety, air quality, and environmental health that benefit us all.

Developing Our App — Where the Rubber Meets the Road for Driving2Save

As our community members have told us, and we know from experience, it is hard to remember everything we need to do to save money, drive safer, and reduce our emissions. The Driving2Save App will make it easy for everyone to develop better driving habits by providing drivers with customized and timely reminders, real-time alerts, and post-drive feedback. The Driving2Save App will improve lives and substantially increase our positive impact.

How it Works

Set-Up Is Easy

During set-up, you will answer questions that allow you to customize the App to match your car, routines, and feedback preferences.  With the App, you will get an assistant rather than a backseat driver. 

Using the App Is Even Easier

Pre-Drive Prompts

Before you get behind the wheel, the App will give you the option of checking traffic and picking a route to save time, aggravation, and gas.  At various intervals, it will also remind you to check your tire pressure, remove excess weight from your car, and remove your unused roof rack (if you have one) in order to improve safety and fuel economy.  If you have a child and/or a pet, the App will ask whether they are coming with you to ensure they are not left unattended at the end of the drive.

Driving Alerts

During your drive, the App will monitor acceleration and braking (and several other driving characteristics) for behavior that reduces fuel economy and/or poses safety risks.  Based on your preferences, the App will issue a real-time audio alert (to avoid distracted driving) each time it detects certain behavior, such as: overly aggressive acceleration; severe braking; or excessive speed.  (The alert will also be briefly displayed on the screen as a backup notification). By issuing real-time alerts, the App will enable drivers to take immediate corrective action to increase their safety and improve their fuel economy.

If there is a child and/or a pet in the car, the App will issue a post-drive reminder to make sure you do not leave either of them unattended in the car.

Post-Drive Reports

After your drive, the App will issue you a digital “report card” that grades your drive, notes your achievements, and lists the corrective alerts that were issued during your drive.  With a tap of your finger, you can get detailed information on each aspect of your drive.  The report reinforces good driving habits and ensures drivers identify areas for improvement.  The report can also be shared automatically with third parties.

Positive Feedback

Although corrective alerts are important, a positive user experience combined with positive feedback will ensure that drivers continue to use the App and realize all the financial, health and safety, and environmental benefits of doing so. The App has several mechanisms for providing positive feedback, including: 

  • Highlighting when your gas mileage exceeds the EPA Combined Estimate (which means you are saving money on gas and reducing your emissions);
  • Celebrating milestones and achievements and making it easy to share them on social media; and
  • Displaying your driving trends so that you can see your progress over time.  

The App’s Features Deliver Significant Savings,
Safety and Environmental Benefits

The App is Perfect For:

Parents

The health and safety of our children is our number one concern as parents, and the App has many features that can help us keep them safe and provide us with peace of mind, from correcting our aggressive driving behavior, to ensuring we do not leave a child unattended in a car, to monitoring teen driving.

The App has been designed to provide peace of mind to parents of teen drivers (like our Founder): The report sharing function is ideal for parents who want to monitor how safely their teens are driving. Parents can automatically receive a report via email every time their teen finishes a drive. And because the teen knows that every drive is being monitored, he or she is likely to drive much more responsibly. If a parent does not receive a driving report from their teen driver following a drive, this means the teen has either removed the parent from his or her sharing list or elected not to use the App in conjunction with a particular drive. Either way, the failure to receive a report alerts a parent to potentially irresponsible driving by their teen driver.   

The App has other health and safety benefits for parents and their children as well.

When sitting in traffic, the air inside our cars contains extraordinary levels of pollution. This pollution has been linked to asthma and other respiratory illnesses, and is especially harmful to children and the elderly.  With so many parents driving their children to and from school and extra-curricular activities in heavy traffic, it is critical that they take steps to reduce the pollution in their cars. The best way to do this is to recirculate the air. The App will monitor vehicle sped over time and issue an alert to recirculate the air whenever it determines the vehicle is likely sitting in traffic.

 

Pet Owners

Just as no child should be left unattended in a hot car, nor should any pet.

The App will remind drivers to take their pets with them after they have parked their cars.

Anyone who drives their own car for a living

If you drive your own car for a living, the more it costs you to operate and maintain your car, the less money you take home. The App helps you save money on gas and certain maintenance costs. It also improves your safety on the roads, which is especially important if you are responsible for the well-being of passengers.

Even with Tire Pressure Monitoring Systems (TPMS) included in all cars for the past decade, many drivers still drive on underinflated tires because they drive older cars or their TPMS does not show individual tire pressure (and only alerts when pressure is catastrophically low). This is not only a safety hazard, but it substantially reduces fuel economy, costing them an extra $60/year on gas and reducing the life of their tires. It takes two minutes every two weeks to avoid these costs by checking tire pressure.  The Driving2Save App supplies the necessary reminder.

 

Anyone who wants to save money

In addition to saving drivers money on gas and vehicle maintenance, the App can also help them save money on car insurance. There are now many insurance providers that use Apps or sensors to monitor their insureds’ driving. For responsible drivers, this often results in a substantial reduction in their premiums. The Driving2Save App has been designed to alert drivers to behaviors that would be considered risky by many insurers. Thus, drivers who consistently avoid triggering corrective alerts from the Driving2Save App, and who participate in a monitoring program with their insurance company, could substantially reduce their insurance premiums.

Eco-Conscious Drivers

If you drive a gas-powered car, the best way to be more eco-conscious is to increase your fuel economy, which will reduce your particulate matter and greenhouse gas emissions.  The Driving2Save App has many features designed to save you money and help you save the planet by increasing your MPG.

Unnecessary idling is one of the worst driving behaviors for your pocketbook and our planet:  You burn gas and produce emissions without actually moving. It is the driving equivalent of leaving all the lights on in your empty house.  And just like leaving the lights on unintentionally, many of us idle inadvertently several times a week, including when we start our car before we are ready to drive and when we wait in our car with the engine running before picking up a child or spouse. The Driving2Save App will prevent this by monitoring vehicle speed and distance.  If it detects excessive idling, it will issue an alert.

The World’s Most Useful Driving App

The Driving2Save App delivers in ways that other Apps cannot.

  • By including vehicle maintenance and other pre-drive reminders, and issuing real-time audio driving alerts, the Driving2Save App includes more features and functionality to promote safe and efficient driving than other driving Apps.
  • Enabling users to select functions and feedback mechanisms, the App serves as a valued assistant rather than a backseat driver, eliminating the unpleasant user experience that has plagued many first-generation safe driving Apps.  
  • Explicitly protecting driver data, users do not have to worry that their information is being shared with insurance companies and other third parties.  
  • Reducing operations and maintenance costs, the App will more than pay for itself.

With these and other features, and the ability to add functionality over time, the Driving2Save App will enable anyone who is interested in protecting his or her family, saving money, or helping the environment to become a more conscientious driver. And by building a community of conscientious drivers, we can have an enormously positive impact on health, safety, and the environment. For all these reasons, the Driving2Save App will be the world’s most useful driving App. 

We Need Your Help to Develop this Amazing App

We need to raise $95,900 to develop this App and improve the lives of drivers everywhere. Please support our campaign and help make the roads safer, healthier, and less costly for everyone. Back us today.

We are running an “all or nothing” campaign. If we do not reach our goal and raise enough money to complete the development of the App, our backers will not be charged.  

We are off to a great start. The functional requirements for the App have been developed and documented by Driving2Save, and the Wireframe for the App has been completed by MPH International.  Members of our community have signaled their support for the campaign.  Now we just need to raise the money. All of the funds we raise will go toward the full development of the App, from the back end infrastructure, to coding and testing, to inclusion in the App Store and Google Play.

If we raise more than our target, we will put the additional funding to good use.
Our options include:

  • Shortening the development timeline by adding resources to the development team; and
  • Incorporating advanced functional requirements in App v1.0 that were not included in the initial design because of their cost.

Perfect Perks

If you back us, you don’t just get the satisfaction of supporting a worthy cause.  We have awesome perks to show our appreciation to our backers, ranging from a download of the App, to waterless car wash products, to aftermarket aerodynamic enhancements that improve MPG!

We are grateful to Aero Cosmetics for supporting our Campaign by making Wash Wax ALL - the best line of waterless car wash products - available to our backers. Going waterless is the fastest, greenest, and least expensive way to give your car a high-quality wash and wax. We also appreciate Aerohance’s support for our Campaign by making their GasPods kits available as a special "thank you" to our backers. Our testing has shown that these easily-installed and removable aftermarket aerodynamic enhancements substantially improve MPG on several types of vehicles.

A Perk for Every Budget

*Funding level does not include shipping costs, which will be added at checkout. Wash Wax ALL and GasPods perks are available to backers in US and Canada, only.

Other ways you can help

  • Join our community by liking our Facebook Page and subscribing to our Newsletter.
  • Visit our Site and pledge to implement one of our driving tips. You will be helping yourself and your fellow drivers.
  • Spread the word about Driving2Save and this Campaign. Every person we reach is an opportunity to make a positive impact. Indiegogo makes it easy to spread the word. Please do so.

Thank you for your support!

App Development Timeline

Our Team

Functional Requirements Development

Brian Goebel, Founder, Driving2Save, in consultation with the Driving2Save Scientific Advisory Board, developed the Functional Requirements for the App.  In his management consulting and analytics careers, Brian led the functional requirements development process on dozens of IT and business transformation projects.

App Design and Development

  

MPH International designed the Driving2Save App in close collaboration with Brian Goebel, and will lead its development following the successful Indiegogo campaign.  MPH International designs, builds and operates (DevOps) cutting-edge mobile and web apps. They have built solutions ranging from deep domain B2B apps leveraging machine learning to mobile and hybrid consumer apps such as a social network, dating app and more. The founders have built software companies with market valuations exceeding $2B, including an IPO and an acquisition by Microsoft. MPH International has expertise in various modern technologies such as React/Redux, Scala, Java/Spring, Firebase, Angular and much more. Beauty, scalability, performance and security are core to everything they build.   

Risks and Challenges

There are two principal risks and challenges we face on this project.  First, development could take longer than estimated.  We believe that development can be completed in 6-7 months, but we cannot guarantee that this timeline will be achieved.  If we were to encounter development delays, we would have two options:  (a) let the development proceed on a longer timeline (while making every effort to minimize the additional time); or (b) reduce functionality to speed development.  Although we cannot commit to a particular course in advance, we would prefer to maintain functionality in the App, as we believe it is one of our greatest differentiators.

Second, development could be more costly than estimated.  We have prepared a detailed budget in collaboration with MPH International, and we believe that the App development can be completed if we reach our funding target in this campaign.  But we cannot guarantee that this budget will be sufficient to develop the App as designed. If we were to encounter a funding shortfall, we would have three options:  (a) reduce functionality to keep the project at or below budgeted cost; (b) if modest, cover the cost increase out of cash flow or additional investor funds; or (c) if substantial, seek additional funding via Indiegogo. Although we cannot commit to a particular course in advance, we would prefer to maintain functionality in the App, as we believe it is one of our greatest differentiators.

Please support our Campaign

Funding the development of this App is something you can feel good about. It will help people save lives, money, time, and the planet every time they get behind the wheel. Thank you for your support!

It is the driving equivalent of leaving all the lights on in your empty house.  And just like leaving the lights on unintentionally, many of us idle inadvertently several times a week, including when we start our car before we are ready to drive and when we wait in our car with the engine running before picking up a child or spouse. The Driving2Save App will prevent this by monitoring vehicle speed and distance.  If it detects excessive idling, it will issue an alert.The World’s Most Useful Driving AppThe Driving2Save App delivers in ways that other Apps cannot.
By including vehicle maintenance and other pre-drive reminders, and issuing real-time audio driving alerts, the Driving2Save App includes more features and functionality to promote safe and efficient driving than other driving Apps.
Enabling users to select functions and feedback mechanisms, the App serves as a valued assistant rather than a backseat driver, eliminating the unpleasant user experience that has plagued many first-generation safe driving Apps.  
Explicitly protecting driver data, users do not have to worry that their information is being shared with insurance companies and other third parties.  
Reducing operations and maintenance costs, the App will more than pay for itself.
With these and other features, and the ability to add functionality over time, the Driving2Save App will enable anyone who is interested in protecting his or her family, saving money, or helping the environment to become a more conscientious driver. And by building a community of conscientious drivers, we can have an enormously positive impact on health, safety, and the environment. For all these reasons, the Driving2Save App will be the world’s most useful driving App. We Need Your Help to Develop this Amazing AppWe need to raise $95,900 to develop this App and improve the lives of drivers everywhere. Please support our campaign and help make the roads safer, healthier, and less costly for everyone. Back us today.We are running an “all or nothing” campaign. If we do not reach our goal and raise enough money to complete the development of the App, our backers will not be charged.  We are off to a great start. The functional requirements for the App have been developed and documented by Driving2Save, and the Wireframe for the App has been completed by MPH International.  Members of our community have signaled their support for the campaign.  Now we just need to raise the money. All of the funds we raise will go toward the full development of the App, from the back end infrastructure, to coding and testing, to inclusion in the App Store and Google Play.If we raise more than our target, we will put the additional funding to good use. Our options include:
Shortening the development timeline by adding resources to the development team; and
Incorporating advanced functional requirements in App v1.0 that were not included in the initial design because of their cost.
Perfect PerksIf you back us, you don’t just get the satisfaction of supporting a worthy cause.  We have awesome perks to show our appreciation to our backers, ranging from a download of the App, to waterless car wash products, to aftermarket aerodynamic enhancements that improve MPG!We are grateful to Aero Cosmetics for supporting our Campaign by making Wash Wax ALL - the best line of waterless car wash products - available to our backers. Going waterless is the fastest, greenest, and least expensive way to give your car a high-quality wash and wax. We also appreciate Aerohance’s support for our Campaign by making their GasPods kits available as a special "thank you" to our backers. Our testing has shown that these easily-installed and removable aftermarket aerodynamic enhancements substantially improve MPG on several types of vehicles.A Perk for Every Budget*Funding level does not include shipping costs, which will be added at checkout. Wash Wax ALL and GasPods perks are available to backers in US and Canada, only.Other ways you can help
Join our community by liking our Facebook Page and subscribing to our Newsletter.
Visit our Site and pledge to implement one of our driving tips. You will be helping yourself and your fellow drivers.
Spread the word about Driving2Save and this Campaign. Every person we reach is an opportunity to make a positive impact. Indiegogo makes it easy to spread the word. Please do so.
Thank you for your support!App Development TimelineOur TeamFunctional Requirements DevelopmentBrian Goebel, Founder, Driving2Save, in consultation with the Driving2Save Scientific Advisory Board, developed the Functional Requirements for the App.  In his management consulting and analytics careers, Brian led the functional requirements development process on dozens of IT and business transformation projects.App Design and Development  MPH International designed the Driving2Save App in close collaboration with Brian Goebel, and will lead its development following the successful Indiegogo campaign.  MPH International designs, builds and operates (DevOps) cutting-edge mobile and web apps. They have built solutions ranging from deep domain B2B apps leveraging machine learning to mobile and hybrid consumer apps such as a social network, dating app and more. The founders have built software companies with market valuations exceeding $2B, including an IPO and an acquisition by Microsoft. MPH International has expertise in various modern technologies such as React/Redux, Scala, Java/Spring, Firebase, Angular and much more. Beauty, scalability, performance and security are core to everything they build.   Risks and ChallengesThere are two principal risks and challenges we face on this project.  First, development could take longer than estimated.  We believe that development can be completed in 6-7 months, but we cannot guarantee that this timeline will be achieved.  If we were to encounter development delays, we would have two options:  (a) let the development proceed on a longer timeline (while making every effort to minimize the additional time); or (b) reduce functionality to speed development.  Although we cannot commit to a particular course in advance, we would prefer to maintain functionality in the App, as we believe it is one of our greatest differentiators.Second, development could be more costly than estimated.  We have prepared a detailed budget in collaboration with MPH International, and we believe that the App development can be completed if we reach our funding target in this campaign.  But we cannot guarantee that this budget will be sufficient to develop the App as designed. If we were to encounter a funding shortfall, we would have three options:  (a) reduce functionality to keep the project at or below budgeted cost; (b) if modest, cover the cost increase out of cash flow or additional investor funds; or (c) if substantial, seek additional funding via Indiegogo. Although we cannot commit to a particular course in advance, we would prefer to maintain functionality in the App, as we believe it is one of our greatest differentiators.Please support our CampaignFunding the development of this App is something you can feel good about. It will help people save lives, money, time, and the planet every time they get behind the wheel. Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

The Driver's Elbow Pad is a patent-pending "elbow pillow" for long-distance drivers to be more comfortable and less distracted by pain (even if only momentarily), therefore safer. When long distance drivers "rest" their arm on the door's window frame and rotate their arm to safely hold the steering wheel with both hands, this position exposes the Ulnar Nerve, normally concealed inside the elbow. It is then exposed to bumpy roads and "torsional vibrations" of the engine pistons firing thousands of times per minute, which causes the door to vibrate slightly but non-stop. The Driver's Elbow Pad prevents and soothes this pain naturally.

Surveys at random truck stops reported that 56% of truck drivers have experienced this pain but often don't report it to managers or medical staff due to fear of having their hours cut. When drivers, especially truck drivers in control of a 40-ton fully loaded rig are not distracted by pain, even during momentary flair-ups, they can better focus on their driving and are safer for everybody on the road. 

There are 3.5 Million truck drivers in America alone, that average 55 years old and sit in the same position for up to eleven hours a day to earn an average of $48,000 a year while being away from home for weeks or months at a time! 85% of all American goods are handled by truckers. In addition to (or instead of) wanting one or some Driver's Elbow Pad(s) for yourself, you can also contribute to buy these devices for professional drivers.

For each $10 perk contributed (#2), we will provide a Driver's Elbow Pad to an often under-appreciated, hard working truck driver.

There are also 210 Million licensed drivers in the U.S., many are near-full-time drivers (commuters, taxi/Uber drivers, police, sales reps, delivery drivers and recreational enthusiasts). We are offering a variety of perks--from a single unit for one driver, to groups of 2, 4, 20, 50, or 100 for larger fleets. Driver's Elbow Pads are guaranteed to fit your vehicle with windows that roll up and down (or return the unit and we will refund the cost of the unit).

Prior to production, we received market validation from fleet owners and managers (Safety, HR & Operations managers) that are excited for this unique, long-lasting, inexpensive (less than 1/2 hour's wage) comfort device to be available. The more funds we raise and the more contributors share this campaign with others, the quicker we will collectively make the roads safer for us all! Please "use the Indiegogo share tools!"

Initial marketing efforts were attending fleet safety conferences, direct e-mail and telemarketing to trucking managers, and truck-driver distributors. Like many in-demand products, the largest challenge is letting people know that "a better mouse trap" has been built and is now available. The Driver's Elbow Pad (DEP) offers several advantages over predecessors:

* The DEP 2" thick pad provides much more padding than previous models with 1/4" pad ;

* The DEP comes in two pieces (frame and pad) for easy washing;

* The DEP frame is made of ABS plastic (for -40 to +185 degrees Fahrenheit), rather than prior        metal frames, to not scratch windows.

Please let us help you help others! Together we can help so many others drive more safely. 

No tools are required for installation, as the frame slides vertically between the window and weather stripping then  horizontally to allow the driver to comfortably and safely hold the steering wheel with both hands. Each unit includes: ABS Plastic Frame, 2" Thick High-Density Foam Pad, Fleece Cover, and instructions on shipping box.

The severe truck driver shortage is well-documented. According to Business Week, “The U.S. government projects that 330,000 new truckers will be needed by 2020.” Let's do what we can to keep the drivers we have more comfortable and safer on the road. They need your help!

TESTIMONIALS:

“I’m really enjoying the Driver's Elbow Pad!  I thought I would use it primarily on long trips but I find it very convenient around town also… it's a great product and I’ve already had several people ask me, “Where did you get that? I need one.”  Lapsley H.

"I've been driving (trucks) for over 26 years, with almost 3 million miles safe driving. I've never found a product that's been this comfortable..." Brian S.

“I’ve been driving trucks for 30 years and this is the best thing, comfort wise, to come along since the air ride seat!”  Gary C.

“’The average cost of an indemnity claim...was $18,587...by avoiding just one Worker’s Comp claim, a trucking firm could realize significant ROI.”  Deborah R., Director of the Worker’s Compensation Program at California’s Schools Insurance Authority

According to hurttrucker.com "Shoulder, elbow and wrist injuries (often referred to as upper extremity injuries) are common for professional trucker drivers. The causes of these injuries include...driving with one elbow on the window frame..." see http://hurttrucker.com/trucking-injuries/should...

You can help in any (or all) of three ways:

  • Buy one (or some) for yourself, family, friends or work mates;
  • Donate even further discounted (not the $30 MSRP, nor $20 offered here at Indiegogo, but $10-as Perk #2) Driver's Elbow Pads for us to deliver to professional truck drivers at a truck stop at the intersection of north/south and east/west Interstate freeways (I-5 & I-80) for wide distribution ;
  • Share this campaign with others to make drivers more comfortable, less distracted by pain, and improve public safety for ALL of us.

Get Driver's Elbow Pads for yourself or others, or donate one/some to professional drivers and make the freeways safer for us all!

story:
Flying saucer ideal vertical take off aircraft

patent pending in USA 

 

IS THIS SCIENCE FICTION OR IS THIS REAL?

It looks like science fiction, but it's very real - 5 seats , 700 hp VTOL aircraft . One day, seeing flying saucer air vehicles will be as normal as seeing now helicopter.

HOW IT WORKS?

this is flying saucer form , enclosed , single rotor VTOL aircraft.
Take off is similar to helicopter, horizontal flight is with elements of plane.
Result - safe,more efficient, unique aircraft with unique capabilities.

IS IT A DRONE?

No, isn't . Drones use multi propeller  systems . Flying saucer have single rotor, much bigger and more powerful , same as helicopters but enclosed due safety and airflow vectoring reasons , it able to lift 5 people minimum.
Drones technology allow to lift only limited small weight loads - 2 people for approx 20 minutes .

WHY NOT HELICOPTERS ?

BY UBER PRESENT HELICOPTERS ARE :

''prohibitively expensive to operate as part of a large-scale transportation service. They are energy-inefficient and very expensive to maintain, and their high level of noise strongly limits use in urban areas '' ....

We work on safer , more efficient , more affordable alternative for helicopters .

 

What We Need 

Your support will allow us to show our prototype in Las Vegas 2018 aviation show  , 

to have a booth there cost 35700$ .

https://www.rotor.org/fox/vfpcgi.exe?IDCFile=CO...

Below prices for booth at Las Vegas 2018 helicopter show :

Las Vegas 2018 heli show (http://heliexpo.rotor.org/) .

We will  show safe and efficient  VTOL aircraft that will change our life .

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

visit us at Facebook - Citycopter  , www.city-copter.com

Retired aviation industry engineers contact us  ,  join our team  .

This amazing VTOL aircraft must fly !

This is aircraft long time we dreamed about :
