story:
You Give 110% Everyday!

 

Relax A Bit and Enjoy Life On Your New Rumble AIR.

 

Your contribution will be used to bring the Rumble AIR into production and we've provided a wide variety of perks for you to choose.

 

Hurry up! Once our IndieGoGo campaign is fully funded and we begin production, prices will rise. Take advantage of your special one-time pricing.

 

Join our mission to become your solution to urban commuting.

 

Adventures will breeze by in comfort and you’ll relax riding your Rumble AIR each day after working as hard as you do. Reserve your energy for tomorrow. When you own an AIR, every day is an adventure with these exciting specifications:

 

Tackle any challenge with a powerful 750W electric motor to propel you forward on your next adventure.

 

At 66lbs, your Rumble AIR is lightweight, agile, and ready to go anywhere ensuring "pumping iron" isn't your newest hobby.

 

With a standard seven-speed gear system, relax into your journey riding something comfortable and familiar.

 

Need to escape? Imagine the feeling of freedom on your Rumble AIR. Effortlessly explore at speeds of 28 mph for an astonishing 90-mile possible range.

 

Boasting a robust aluminum frame, Rumble Air is ready for your adventures and built to last.

 

Nothing kills adventure like your phone running on empty. Wirelessly recharge your tiny sidekick and never miss a photo opportunity again.

 

Every AIR is built with a Tektro Brake System to ensure you stay safe. Enjoy your adventure knowing you are able to react with split-second precision at any time.

 

Broaden your horizons. Get the edge you need and enhance your adventures by up to 40 extra miles of range.

 

With a diameter measuring 20" combined with 3" wide treads, your tires will keep you stable and comfortable on-road and trail alike.

 

Introduce excitement into your life. Your Rumble AIR is hand-assembled to ensure smooth sailing over the asphalt skies.

 

When you're filled with energy and just need that extra boost. Your Rumble AIR will keep you going up to 50 miles.

Detailed Specifications: 

  • Motor: 750W
  • Aluminum Frame & Forks
     
  • Internal Battery: Samsung Lithium-Ion | 48V 14.5AH
  • Removable
  • Optional Range Booster External Battery
  • Throttle Range: Single Battery 38 miles - Dual Battery 75 miles 
  • Pedal Assistance Range - Single Battery 50 miles - Dual Battery 90 miles
     
  • Top Speed: 30 mph 
  • 7 Speed Bicycle Gear System
  • Tektro Brake System
     
  • Built-In Wireless Phone Charger
  • Hand Assembled -  Ensuring Attention To Detail & High-Quality Standards
  • Total Bike Weight: 66 lbs / 30 kg
  • Wheel Dimensions: 20" Diameter / 3" Wide Treads

 

 

Designed with you in mind and painstakingly hand-crafted in our facilities with the finest attention to detail.

 

 

Built from the finest components, we leveraged the latest technology to create a bike with it all.

 

 

We rigorously designed and researched the AIR to ensure the latest in electrical technologies combined to develop an electrical bike that checks all your boxes.

 

Rumble AIR is planned to ship starting in June. For Hawaii, Alaska, and International orders, additional shipping fees will be calculated when your Rumble AIR is ready. Trust in Rumble Motors and we will satisfy you with our track record of delivering over 200 bikes. 

Our original IndieGoGo campaign was a tremendous success. As we speak, our StartEngine CrowdFunding Campaign is performing great. Trust Us.

 

We Finish What We Start.

 

Rumble AIR is inevitable. Join us and experience the thrill yourself.

 

Any contribution to Rumble Motors is an investment in your future.

 

We've most recently been featured on TopSpeed.com (EV Motorcycle News: April 2020 - Top Speed). Our Rumble V3 was also featured in the Season Three Premiere Episode of HBO's WestWorld.

 

 

Rumble Motors pushes the edge of technology. We are the future and it shows in our designs.

 

Rumble AIR is the next chapter in YOUR saga. Get ready for your adventure!

 

 

Imagine joining Club Awesome. Your Reward? An IndieGoGo exclusive Rumble AIR sticker and your very own shoutout on our @RumbleMotors Instagram story.

Why? Because we think your AWESOME!

 

Think of how great you'll feel when you turn heads in your IndieGoGo exclusive Rumble Air "Glow" T-Shirt.

You’ll get benefits from our "You're Awesome" perk too because it is true, is it not?

 

Take flight across the asphalt skies of opportunity and receive a special price for your Rumble Air.

Reward yourself for decisive action and leave your competition wanting for second place. Seize this opportunity before it disappears.

Limited Quantity Offer - Only 10 Available.

(Hawaii, Alaska, & International shipping fees will be calculated and charged before delivery)

 

Rumble Air is your license-free solution to urban commuting. Leave troubles behind and imagine miles of freedom on the Rumble Air. With an astonishing lightweight aluminum frame, your AIR is built to last. Reserve your energy for tomorrow.

When you own an AIR, every day is an adventure.

Pre-Order Your AIR Today!

(Hawaii, Alaska, & International shipping fees will be calculated and charged before delivery)

 

Know what is better than a Rumble Air? Double the fun! Your Rumble Air will be lonely. Have a heart and order one for your significant other or a friend and you will never journey alone.

(Hawaii, Alaska, & International shipping fees will be calculated and charged before delivery)

 

You’re A Go-Getter. Up your game and enjoy a private Rumble marketing photo-shoot, featuring you and your new Rumble AIRs.

Your image is everything, let us turbocharge you & seize your chance to work with our World Class Photographer and Head of Brand Development.

(Shoot Details Arranged At Later Date)

 

Woah! You want to be in our commercial? Along with your own private photo-shoot, you'll be featured in our next sixty second spot for the Rumble AIR.

This is your chance. Seize it.

(Shoot Details To Be Arranged At A Later Date)

 

Personal time with Rumble Motors entrepreneurs. A mouthwatering dinner. No expense spared. Enjoy the opportunity of a lifetime and we'll travel to meet you.

(Dinner Details To Be Arranged At A Later Date)

 

Need to go the extra mile?

Travel everywhere you desire with our add-on battery that gives the power boost you need. This external battery will nearly double your ability for excitement on your Rumble AIR. With 90 miles of adventure & relaxation now at your fingertips, what will you do?

 

Rumble Motors is your premier choice in electrical vehicles. To honor your trust in us, we strive to provide you, our customer, with the sustainable cutting-edge products you want at an affordable price you will gladly pay.

Since inception, Rumble Motors has developed three generations of vehicles. Despite this relentless pace of product development, it has shipped over 200 units. Customers to date have been private individuals, but Rumble Motors is aggressively courting distributors.

With its completed production facility in Sweden and a new Sacramento facility currently in the planning stage, the company believes it can increase the production schedule of third-generation e-Bikes by tenfold.

Our Swedish/American team's design and manufacture every detail to ensure your satisfaction and enjoyment anywhere in the world.

Our new Rumble AIR is sure to satisfy your need to move and is the solution to your need for eco-friendly transportation with a boost of excitement.

As the accelerated demand for change grows, and countries continue to enact environmental initiatives, the worlds demand smaller vehicles, which address your concerns, will continue.

 

Get Ahead Of The Curve.

Be Your Solution.

Order your Rumble AIR Today.

 

 

Reza‘s lifelong passion for Café racer motorcycles began in 1977 when he began modifying his very first Honda bike. The future of electric motorcycles is now fueled by his passion and skills as an industrial Engineer.

 

Alex leads our Design Department and is the key behind Rumble Motors' aggressive product development. With his Industrial Design skill-set, we continue to refine our products every year while developing exciting new products.

 

Niaz brings his public relations experience to Rumble Motors and handles all of our International Communications.

 

RJ manages our sales team for both domestic and international customers and works closely with all our distribution partners worldwide.

 

Already a successful entrepreneur, Rasmus sold his company and now shepherds our company’s growth and profit. His experience with startup companies is being used to create long-term value for our customers.

 

Joacim’s background is sales and marketing with a passion for project management. He works closely with our design team for parts acquisition and quality control. His guiding hand is pivotal to our streamlined production and prototyping processes.

 

Jeremy is a professional photographer, cinematographer, and graphic designer with over fifteen years and counting mastering his craft. He is the mastermind behind much of the recent Rumble Motors social media content and continues to drive brand development strategies forward into the future.

 

Jonathan brings his experience in Strategic Vision and Project Management. He's a retired USAF Major who served as C-17A Evaluator Pilot, Antarctic Ice Landing Instructor and Air Force 2 Instructor Pilot during his 13 years of service. His education and experience make him an invaluable source of knowledge and counsel.

 

Jordan is an up-and-coming visual storyteller whose passion is copywriting, illustration and now, cinematography and photography. His work blends seamlessly with Jeremy and the duo has been rapidly producing world-class promotional material for Rumble Motors.

 

Andrew is a 4x World Champion Kickboxer and Social Media Mastermind. Andrew has a passion for adrenaline and Rumble Motors. His assistance is invaluable in crafting Rumble Motors' rapidly evolving Social Media presence.

 

Sage is the youngest person ever featured on the cover of Sport Karate Magazine and is world renown in UFC and Kickboxing with a 15-0 record. He is our brand ambassador. He has a passion for electric vehicles, owns a Tesla 3, and loves riding his Rumble Classic Café Racer every day.

 

As our Managing Director, Janet oversees, develops and executes our business strategies. She provides strategic advice to our CEO and Board of Directors while also preparing and implementing business plans to facilitate important business milestones.
story_txt:
You Give 110% Everyday! Relax A Bit and Enjoy Life On Your New Rumble AIR. Your contribution will be used to bring the Rumble AIR into production and we've provided a wide variety of perks for you to choose. Hurry up! Once our IndieGoGo campaign is fully funded and we begin production, prices will rise. Take advantage of your special one-time pricing. Join our mission to become your solution to urban commuting. Adventures will breeze by in comfort and you’ll relax riding your Rumble AIR each day after working as hard as you do. Reserve your energy for tomorrow. When you own an AIR, every day is an adventure with these exciting specifications: Tackle any challenge with a powerful 750W electric motor to propel you forward on your next adventure. At 66lbs, your Rumble AIR is lightweight, agile, and ready to go anywhere ensuring "pumping iron" isn't your newest hobby. With a standard seven-speed gear system, relax into your journey riding something comfortable and familiar. Need to escape? Imagine the feeling of freedom on your Rumble AIR. Effortlessly explore at speeds of 28 mph for an astonishing 90-mile possible range. Boasting a robust aluminum frame, Rumble Air is ready for your adventures and built to last. Nothing kills adventure like your phone running on empty. Wirelessly recharge your tiny sidekick and never miss a photo opportunity again. Every AIR is built with a Tektro Brake System to ensure you stay safe. Enjoy your adventure knowing you are able to react with split-second precision at any time. Broaden your horizons. Get the edge you need and enhance your adventures by up to 40 extra miles of range. With a diameter measuring 20" combined with 3" wide treads, your tires will keep you stable and comfortable on-road and trail alike. Introduce excitement into your life. Your Rumble AIR is hand-assembled to ensure smooth sailing over the asphalt skies. When you're filled with energy and just need that extra boost. Your Rumble AIR will keep you going up to 50 miles.Detailed Specifications: 
Motor: 750W

Aluminum Frame & Forks 
Internal Battery: Samsung Lithium-Ion | 48V 14.5AH
Removable
Optional Range Booster External Battery
Throttle Range: Single Battery 38 miles - Dual Battery 75 miles 

Pedal Assistance Range - Single Battery 50 miles - Dual Battery 90 miles 
Top Speed: 30 mph 
7 Speed Bicycle Gear System

Tektro Brake System 
Built-In Wireless Phone Charger
Hand Assembled -  Ensuring Attention To Detail & High-Quality Standards
Total Bike Weight: 66 lbs / 30 kg
Wheel Dimensions: 20" Diameter / 3" Wide Treads
  Designed with you in mind and painstakingly hand-crafted in our facilities with the finest attention to detail.  Built from the finest components, we leveraged the latest technology to create a bike with it all.  We rigorously designed and researched the AIR to ensure the latest in electrical technologies combined to develop an electrical bike that checks all your boxes. Rumble AIR is planned to ship starting in June. For Hawaii, Alaska, and International orders, additional shipping fees will be calculated when your Rumble AIR is ready. Trust in Rumble Motors and we will satisfy you with our track record of delivering over 200 bikes. Our original IndieGoGo campaign was a tremendous success. As we speak, our StartEngine CrowdFunding Campaign is performing great. Trust Us.  We Finish What We Start.  Rumble AIR is inevitable. Join us and experience the thrill yourself. Any contribution to Rumble Motors is an investment in your future. We've most recently been featured on TopSpeed.com (EV Motorcycle News: April 2020 - Top Speed). Our Rumble V3 was also featured in the Season Three Premiere Episode of HBO's WestWorld.  Rumble Motors pushes the edge of technology. We are the future and it shows in our designs. Rumble AIR is the next chapter in YOUR saga. Get ready for your adventure!  Imagine joining Club Awesome. Your Reward? An IndieGoGo exclusive Rumble AIR sticker and your very own shoutout on our @RumbleMotors Instagram story.Why? Because we think your AWESOME! Think of how great you'll feel when you turn heads in your IndieGoGo exclusive Rumble Air "Glow" T-Shirt.You’ll get benefits from our "You're Awesome" perk too because it is true, is it not? Take flight across the asphalt skies of opportunity and receive a special price for your Rumble Air.Reward yourself for decisive action and leave your competition wanting for second place. Seize this opportunity before it disappears.Limited Quantity Offer - Only 10 Available.(Hawaii, Alaska, & International shipping fees will be calculated and charged before delivery) Rumble Air is your license-free solution to urban commuting. Leave troubles behind and imagine miles of freedom on the Rumble Air. With an astonishing lightweight aluminum frame, your AIR is built to last. Reserve your energy for tomorrow.When you own an AIR, every day is an adventure.Pre-Order Your AIR Today!(Hawaii, Alaska, & International shipping fees will be calculated and charged before delivery) Know what is better than a Rumble Air? Double the fun! Your Rumble Air will be lonely. Have a heart and order one for your significant other or a friend and you will never journey alone.(Hawaii, Alaska, & International shipping fees will be calculated and charged before delivery) You’re A Go-Getter. Up your game and enjoy a private Rumble marketing photo-shoot, featuring you and your new Rumble AIRs.Your image is everything, let us turbocharge you & seize your chance to work with our World Class Photographer and Head of Brand Development.(Shoot Details Arranged At Later Date) Woah! You want to be in our commercial? Along with your own private photo-shoot, you'll be featured in our next sixty second spot for the Rumble AIR.This is your chance. Seize it.(Shoot Details To Be Arranged At A Later Date) Personal time with Rumble Motors entrepreneurs. A mouthwatering dinner. No expense spared. Enjoy the opportunity of a lifetime and we'll travel to meet you.(Dinner Details To Be Arranged At A Later Date) Need to go the extra mile?Travel everywhere you desire with our add-on battery that gives the power boost you need. This external battery will nearly double your ability for excitement on your Rumble AIR. With 90 miles of adventure & relaxation now at your fingertips, what will you do? Rumble Motors is your premier choice in electrical vehicles. To honor your trust in us, we strive to provide you, our customer, with the sustainable cutting-edge products you want at an affordable price you will gladly pay.Since inception, Rumble Motors has developed three generations of vehicles. Despite this relentless pace of product development, it has shipped over 200 units. Customers to date have been private individuals, but Rumble Motors is aggressively courting distributors. With its completed production facility in Sweden and a new Sacramento facility currently in the planning stage, the company believes it can increase the production schedule of third-generation e-Bikes by tenfold.Our Swedish/American team's design and manufacture every detail to ensure your satisfaction and enjoyment anywhere in the world.Our new Rumble AIR is sure to satisfy your need to move and is the solution to your need for eco-friendly transportation with a boost of excitement.As the accelerated demand for change grows, and countries continue to enact environmental initiatives, the worlds demand smaller vehicles, which address your concerns, will continue. Get Ahead Of The Curve. Be Your Solution. Order your Rumble AIR Today.  Reza‘s lifelong passion for Café racer motorcycles began in 1977 when he began modifying his very first Honda bike. The future of electric motorcycles is now fueled by his passion and skills as an industrial Engineer. Alex leads our Design Department and is the key behind Rumble Motors' aggressive product development. With his Industrial Design skill-set, we continue to refine our products every year while developing exciting new products. Niaz brings his public relations experience to Rumble Motors and handles all of our International Communications. RJ manages our sales team for both domestic and international customers and works closely with all our distribution partners worldwide. Already a successful entrepreneur, Rasmus sold his company and now shepherds our company’s growth and profit. His experience with startup companies is being used to create long-term value for our customers. Joacim’s background is sales and marketing with a passion for project management. He works closely with our design team for parts acquisition and quality control. His guiding hand is pivotal to our streamlined production and prototyping processes. Jeremy is a professional photographer, cinematographer, and graphic designer with over fifteen years and counting mastering his craft. He is the mastermind behind much of the recent Rumble Motors social media content and continues to drive brand development strategies forward into the future. Jonathan brings his experience in Strategic Vision and Project Management. He's a retired USAF Major who served as C-17A Evaluator Pilot, Antarctic Ice Landing Instructor and Air Force 2 Instructor Pilot during his 13 years of service. His education and experience make him an invaluable source of knowledge and counsel. Jordan is an up-and-coming visual storyteller whose passion is copywriting, illustration and now, cinematography and photography. His work blends seamlessly with Jeremy and the duo has been rapidly producing world-class promotional material for Rumble Motors. Andrew is a 4x World Champion Kickboxer and Social Media Mastermind. Andrew has a passion for adrenaline and Rumble Motors. His assistance is invaluable in crafting Rumble Motors' rapidly evolving Social Media presence. Sage is the youngest person ever featured on the cover of Sport Karate Magazine and is world renown in UFC and Kickboxing with a 15-0 record. He is our brand ambassador. He has a passion for electric vehicles, owns a Tesla 3, and loves riding his Rumble Classic Café Racer every day. As our Managing Director, Janet oversees, develops and executes our business strategies. She provides strategic advice to our CEO and Board of Directors while also preparing and implementing business plans to facilitate important business milestones.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The world's smallest and the lightest ECE-R129 child car seat

designed for all children over 15 months old.

 

We care about child safety.

If only child car seat small enough to store on every car, then children will be well protected. That is the reason for us to develop Taxie®. Our design allows transportation like Taxi and Uber to carry a child car seat all the time. Children between 15months to 12 years old will protect at the latest ECE-R129 standard.

Taxie® by Trafold® created to help drivers provide a better service. Taxie® designed for children of 76cm and above with a scalable product the size of a piece of hand luggage. Just unlock the base, flip it over, adjust the headrest, and you are good to go. When you finish, simply fold it back up and store it in the boot – leaving plenty of room for passenger luggage. 

 
 

 Award-winning Design


A professional car seat needed to design for children of different height and weight. We carefully designed the car seat and tried hard to provide the best protection during impacts from different directions. We first study children in every age level and use that data to design the car seat then we use the computer impact simulation technology widely used in the automobile industry to improve and fine-tune the structure and design.
Therefore, we designed Safe-T® Clamp and Safe-T® Wing

 

Safe-T® Clamp

not only effectively hold car seat onto the vehicle seat, but also can use hold the build-in child seat belt in place while being used as a booster seat.

Safe-T® Wing

located on both sides of the car seat, allow the car seat to adjust its side protection volume without weakening car seat protection structure. So that all children over 76cm will be protected.
Moreover, we removed all unnecessary steps for installation, and the result is Taxie® is 25% quicker to install.

Taxie® is a foldable child safety seat designed for taxis and cabbies.

We see there is growing concern about the hygiene of public transport, and that lead us to develop Safe-T® Shield protection.

 

Safe-T® Shield

Taxie®'s unique Safe.T® Shield application on child car seats. Keeps taxi drivers and passengers safe. Trafold® has developed Safe.t® Shield and incorporated it into the Taxie® child car seat. 

But how can this work?
1. The integral bacterial and fungal protection
2. Easy clean coating
3. Night Safety Feature

Safe-T® Shield Sanitized hygiene seat stops bacteria and fungi spreading, and it's very easy to clean.

 

Compare to other child car seats

* Taxie® by Trafold® is a convertible child car seat that has been designed and engineered to comply with worldwide regulatory standards. On delivery, Taxie® will comply with UN ECE R129/03 for most countries.

Taxie® is the smallest ECE-R129 child car seat with the dimension 304x551x440mm (12x21.7x17.3inch)

Installation for a child over 95cm

Installation for a toddler under 105cm

 

Test and Risk

 

Taxie® has been tested based on the ECE-R129 standard, and we are confident to go into production to prepare for the final test.

With the early help from the Automotive Research & Testing Center (ARTC) and now our Computer Aid Engineer analyzes specialist, Taxie® professional car seat has pass CAE test on both front/rear/side-impact requirement stated in ECE-R129. CAE is a professional tool that widely uses in the automobile industry. To allow automakers to reduce product development cost and time while improving the safety, comfort, and durability of the vehicles they produce.

 

We are confident that Taxie® will not reject by regulatory approval as Taxie® has been designed and engineered to meet or exceed the regulatory standards.

However, it is definitely our intention to provide refunds if we are prevented from launching Taxie® due to the regulatory approval process.

We are monitoring the possible schedule impact caused by Covid-19. And we will notice supporters when there is any impact.

Timeline

The award-winning team

The team in London:

Richard Choi - Founder

Victor Tardieu - Marketing Strategy Advisor

Steve Clemenson - Investor Relations Director (Europe)

Caleb Chan - Investor Relations Director (Asia)

 

The R&D team in Taipei:

David Kang - Industrial Design Director

Dennis Yeh - Engineering Director

Emma Chen - Colour and Material Trim Specialist

JungJian Huang - Engineer Specialist

 

Join our referral program now!

Click on the image, or the link below:

https://taxie-a-professional-child-car.kickboos...

story:
Introducing SROB ebike

This SROB ebike is 750W high power foldable ebike

  • 26" frame with front & rear suspensions
  • 48V 11.6A downtube Li-ion battery (36V 14.5A Europe) 
  • 750W high power mid motor (250W Europe) 
  • one(1) year warranty
  • and it is foldable ebike 

Video file direct link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iSZJHYWYkZI

 

    Why SROB ebike ?

    This is good design ebike with downtube battery as below, 

       downtube battery pack

    • it is easy to put on and take off from ebike
    • it makes good weight balance compare with top tube or rear rack battery ebike 
    • we use Panasonic Li-ion battery only
    • 48V 11.6A(USA,S Korea) or 36V 14.5A(Europe,etc)

      it is foldable ebike

    • take off the battery frame, then you can fold it.
    • you can carry this ebike by car.
    • winter, you may need to keep ebike inside at home

      mid motor drive

    • good weight balance compare with hub motor
    • it is simple to repair, also easy when flat tire. 
    • we used same motor kit from Baffang
    • BBS-02 48V750W for USA, South Korea, etc
    • BBS-01 36V250W for Europe, etc

      front & rear suspension

    • it is very comfortable compare single suspension
    • it can also protect frame, motor, battery & other sub parts from impact when you riding. 

      LCD display & PAS control

    • easy to check PAS level, speed & etc of ebike
    • Baffang C951 for all versions

      safety power connector 

    • it is waterproof connector 
    • please dis-connect when you fold ebike 

    Please note: 

    • SROB ebike is dual suspension ebike, but it not MTB(mountain bicycle), because the battery, motor, sub frames are not designed for MTB. 
    • Thumb throttle lever is option for USA only according to different polices for each countries. Please check your local law.
    • Top speed of SROB is 32km/hr(20mph,USA) or 25km/hr(16mph,Europe, etc).   
    • We send out SROB as 60% assembled ebike, and you will need to assemble & adjust remained 40%.  

     

    Our perks

    Please find our perks 

    ​

    options

    Please note: 

    • SROB ebike has 7 speed gears and cable type disc brake. 
    • Thumb throttle lever is option for USA only according to different polices for each countries. Please check your local law. 
    • Wheels, fixed on frame by nuts, not QR levers. 
    • The color of frame, white is standard and if you want to change it to yellow, please write YELLOW on your address. 
    • The weight of SROB is 22kg(48.4Lbs) without battery, and 25.5kg(56.1Lbs) with battery. 
    • The shipping, we will send out MAY 2017 from China, and local delivery at June 2017.
    • The shipping cost for national(USA) is 199USD, and International 249USD per ebike. Please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% customs in USA, varies internationally, also you need to pay sales tax or VAT. 
    • Please refer to Indiegogo's policy, it is non refundable. more details in FAQ sections. 

    Schedule:

        

     

    who make SROB ebike

    The SROB ebike, designed by Unitech in Korea, and mass production in Ocean Bicycle in China. Please contact by email or visit our web site to get some more detail. 

      SK Baek, Founder

    • Design & development control for SROB
    • Patent owner in S Korea
    • unibicycle@unibicycle.com
    • www.unibicycle.com
    • www.srobbicycle.com

        Dorothy Niu, Co-founder

    • Production & Quality control for SROB
    • Factory owner in China
    • oceanbicycle@oceanbicycle.com.cn 
    • www.oceanbicycle.com

    Co- founder's sales team in China. Our co- founder has more than 10 years experience on sales & manufacturing, and we are offering one(1) year warranty for this ebike. Please visit our web site or check FAQ section for detail. 

    Co- founder's factory in China

    SROB ebike test samples, it has good design & good performance. We will get certification for USA and EU before production. 

     

     

      FAQ, please read before asking us 

      -------------- General  ---------------

      Is it foldable ebike? 

      • Yes it is, when you disconnect power connector & release 2 QR levers, you can take off battery frame from ebike, then this ebike is foldable as normal foldable bike.
      • Assemble sequence is opposite way, please refer campaign video.

      Is it safe?

      • Yes, this frame design is very safe and still using in many countries.
      • also we are testing it to confirm our design & safety. 

      Is it MTB(mountain bicycle)? why it is not MTB? 

      • We designed dual suspensions ebike, but this is not MTB,  
      • Because the motor, battery, and sub frames are not designed for MTB. 

      Is it patent design?

      • Yes it is, USA, China, S Korea and many countries.

      Why the battery frame is not simple to remove? 

      • For safety, we designed it with 2 QR levers & nuts with safety design. 
      • please refer campaign video file about 2 QR levers.   

      How is the ebike made? does the ebike come assembled? 

      • We have multiple suppliers in China including ebike parts as motor, battery pack, and 60% to be assembled by our co- founder's factory in China, Ocean bicycle Industry Group, in Tianjin China. www.oceanbicycle.com

      How is the quality?

      • Our co- founder's factory has more than 10 years experience on sales & manufacturing, and we are offering one(1) year warranty for our ebike. Please check warranty section for detail. 

      What is the maximum rider weight & heights of rider?

          

      The frame size of ebike?

      • This is very common size for adult, please refer frame size below, 

      The production ebikes be same as photo? 

      • No. there will be some changes to improve quality, and we will explain all on Indiegogo.

      Color of ebike? 

      • There is two colors white & yellow.
      • White color is standard and you can change it to yellow, please write YELLOW in your address. 

      Does the ebike comes with fenders? 

      • No there will be no fenders, but you can buy as accessories at your local shops. 

      Where to buy ebike? 

      • Currently this is only the option, and you can buy in on-line site from May 2017. 
      • but we are offering 30% cheaper price than retail price on this campaign.

      ​Do we have any chance to test-ride? 

      • No it is not possible, but we will prepare some of video files on Youtube so you can check.

      Is it possible to upgrade the ebike by customers themselves?

      • Fenders, pedals & rear rack only
      • and we do not recommend you replace any part by yourself. Any changes on the ebike will make the warranty invalid.

      Can I buy the battery bracket only, so I can change my bike myself?

      • No, it is not safe, the battery bracket to be supplied only for service. 

      What is the meaning of SROB and future of SROB ebike?

      • SROB is brand name of Unitech Korea & Ocean bicycle for new design ebike. 
      • We will keep design, also keep update to improve quality. 
      • Also new models coming, please visit our web site www.unibicycle.com for future information. 

       

      -------------- Warranty --------------

      Do you offer a warranty?

      • We are offering one(1) year or 3,000km warranty on all parts for "non-human" damage
      • to be finished when come anything shorter one    
      • consumable parts are not included in warranty as tires, tubes, brake pads, etc. 

      What is the replacement parts?

      • You will need to have in case of "human damage".
      • You can buy it www.aliexpress.com and it to be delivered from China. 
      • We will open it by May 2017, but in case of normal purchasing parts, like fenders, tires, tubes, pedals you can buy it at your local shop.

       

      ------------- Technical & Performance --------------

      What is mid motor?

      • it is assembled on BB(bottom bracket), and making power on BB to drive as normal mid motor kits.
      • we are using same motor kit from Baffang, it is BBS01, BBS02. 

      What are the motor specs?

      • max speed: 32km/hr(20mph) or 25km/hr, we programmed it for your safety.
      • weight of SROB is 22kg(48.4Lbs) without battery, and 25.5kg(56.1Lbs) with battery.

       

      Is it same motor kit as Baffang BBS01 or BBS02 ?

      • yes it is, and crank tooth is 46T

      Can I buy without motor or battery?

      • No you cannot, but you can use it as replacement part after warranty period. 
      • In case of battery, please be sure voltage & (+)(-) terminal.

      What is PAS(pedal assist control system)?

      • The motor will make power when you pedaling, so no pedaling no power. 
      • it has three(3) steps from PAS0 ~ PAS3
      • PAS0 is no power, PAS1 is 33%, PAS2 is 66% and PAS3 will make 100% power of motor. 

      Can I buy or add thumb throttle lever?

      • It is is option for USA only according to different polices for each countries, 
      • Please check your local law, also we do not recommend for safety reason. 

      What is speed limitation program on controller? 

      • The motor will not support power after speed limitation for your safety.
      •                         (Europe & etc)                                                       (USA)                                              

      Can I change max speed? 

      • No, you cannot according to different polices for each countries, 
      • and if you change it, warranty to be expired. 

      What is power cut off of controller?

      • If there is too high power keep working, it will make high temperature on controller, and controller will cut off power to protect electric circuit.
      • It to be returned when temperature going down. 

      Can I see circuit diagram of SROB? 

      • please refer below

      How much maintenance does the motor require?

      • No, you don't need to do.

      What are the battery specifications?

      • SROB has batteries 48V or 36V please refer below table
      • We use only Panasonic Li-ion cells only, and battery pack to be made by qualified supplier. We will list up local suppliers as well, so you can buy it at local places.

      Can I change motor or battery voltage from 36V to 48V ?

      • No, you cannot. please refer above table for your country. 
      • if you already have BBS motor or batteries, you can use it after warranty period. 
      • please be sure voltage & terminal (+),(-) should be same as SROB, 

      Can I change other battery pack?

      • No, we recommend original & service battery pack in www.aliexpress.com only
      • local distributors or suppliers to be listed before May 2017. 

      How do I know when to head back home before losing battery power?

      • You can find battery power indicator on LCD. It is Baffang C951 for all versions.

      What is power of battery?

      • There will be much different using power on PAS mode, generally you can go to 60-80km.
      • We are offering 557W(48V) or 522W(36V) power of battery, and you can compare with other battery pack. normally, many ebike has 36V 10A battery pack. It is 360W, and 70% power of SROB battery.

      How far can I go on a full battery charge?

      • There is three level of PAS from PAS1(level1) to PAS3(level3), and PAS3 will make high power but it will make shorter range. If you want to go long distance, please use PAS1 and need to use as high power pedaling. 
      •                (low power pedaling)                                              (high power pedaling)

      How long does it take to charge the battery? 

      • 5-6 hours when completely empty.

      Do you offer a 120V and 240V battery charger?

      • Yes, it comes with charger, and it is free voltage AC 120V ~ 240V.
      • this charger has certification to use in USA and EU.

      Does the battery lock to the ebike at all?

      • Yes, please lock the key always during riding, if not it can be dropped when impact comes.
      • please lock the battery through hole as below to protect battery stolen problem. 
      • the size of hole for lock is 28mm, so please check the size when you buy chain lock. 

      Can the battery be easily removed and charged inside my house?

      • Yes, you can use it as normal downtube batteries. 
      • please refer campaign video file to check. 

      Can I charge the battery pack by pedaling to increase range?

      • No, it will not be charged, but the pedaling to be increased range.

      How often do I need to replace the brakes and/or tires? 

      • It will be same as normal bicycle

      How does the ebike handle on sand, grass, or dirt?

      • Grass and dirt are no problem

      Does it have gears?

      • It has 7 speed gears on rear wheel.

      Where can ebikes be serviced?

      • Please refer warranty sections. You can ask service parts to repair.

      Is there a water bottle mount?

      • Yes it has, top of frame there is two fixing nuts, we provide nuts only

      Will you sell a rear rack?

      • No, we do not, but you can buy it at your local shop.

      Do I need to remove the wheels if I need to put it in a car?

      • No, you don't need to remove wheels. 
      • You can load SROB ebike after take off battery & sub frame. 
      • this is image of loading for 2000cc engine passenger car. 

       

      ------------- Legal --------------

      Where can the ebike be used?

      • It can be used as bicycle, but please do be sure to check your local laws.

      Do I need a special permit or license?

      • Normally no license, but please do be sure to check your local laws. 

      Will this comply with the laws in Europe?

      • Yes, 250W & 25km/hr is ok, but please do be sure to check your local laws.

      What is the top speed of the ebike?

      • 25km/hr or 32km/hr, we programmed it according to different polices for each countries
      • Please do not change top speed. 

      Do I need to wear a helmet? 

      • Yes, we highly recommend it for your safety. 

       

      ------------- Payments and shipping --------------

      If I have a trouble to use Paypal?

      • Sorry, we can accept Paypal only on this campaign.

      How much is the shipping cost?

      • National(USA) is $199 and International is $249 per one(1) bike. 
      • In case of China, please contact Ocean Bicycle in China.    

      Is the ebike available in store for picking up?

      • No, it is not available. we will have off line shop later in each countries.

      How fast is the shipping?

      • We will send out at May 2017 from China, and local delivery at June 2017. 

       

      ------------- Customer support --------------

      Who do I contact in case of questions?

      • Please refer FAQ first, and leave message on Indiegogo or contact us by email.

      Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

      • The backers are responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% customs in USA, varies internationally, also you need to pay sales tax or VAT.
      • In case of China, please contact Ocean Bicycle in China. 

      How do you handle refunds?

      • Please refer to Indiegogo's policy.
      • We are offering 30% cheaper price than retail price, also it is non-refundable.

      Can I have better price as B2B business?

      • Yes you can, please contact Ocean Bicycle in China, MOQ is 50 ebikes

      Can I have business partnership for SROB ebike?

      • Yes you can, it is patent design, and we want to have partnership for each countries.
      • please visit www.unibicycle.com or www.oceanbicycle.com for questions.

       

      End of FAQ section, thank you ------------------------
story_txt:
Introducing SROB ebike
This SROB ebike is 750W high power foldable ebike

26" frame with front & rear suspensions
48V 11.6A downtube Li-ion battery (36V 14.5A Europe) 
750W high power mid motor (250W Europe) 
one(1) year warranty
and it is foldable ebike 

Video file direct link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iSZJHYWYkZI
 


Why SROB ebike ?
This is good design ebike with downtube battery as below, 




   downtube battery pack

it is easy to put on and take off from ebike
it makes good weight balance compare with top tube or rear rack battery ebike 
we use Panasonic Li-ion battery only
48V 11.6A(USA,S Korea) or 36V 14.5A(Europe,etc)






  it is foldable ebike

take off the battery frame, then you can fold it.
you can carry this ebike by car.
winter, you may need to keep ebike inside at home






  mid motor drive

good weight balance compare with hub motor
it is simple to repair, also easy when flat tire. 
we used same motor kit from Baffang
BBS-02 48V750W for USA, South Korea, etc
BBS-01 36V250W for Europe, etc






  front & rear suspension

it is very comfortable compare single suspension
it can also protect frame, motor, battery & other sub parts from impact when you riding. 






  LCD display & PAS control

easy to check PAS level, speed & etc of ebike
Baffang C951 for all versions






  safety power connector 

it is waterproof connector 
please dis-connect when you fold ebike 



Please note: 

SROB ebike is dual suspension ebike, but it not MTB(mountain bicycle), because the battery, motor, sub frames are not designed for MTB. 
Thumb throttle lever is option for USA only according to different polices for each countries. Please check your local law.
Top speed of SROB is 32km/hr(20mph,USA) or 25km/hr(16mph,Europe, etc).   
We send out SROB as 60% assembled ebike, and you will need to assemble & adjust remained 40%.  

 

Our perks
Please find our perks 
​
options

Please note: 

SROB ebike has 7 speed gears and cable type disc brake. 
Thumb throttle lever is option for USA only according to different polices for each countries. Please check your local law. 
Wheels, fixed on frame by nuts, not QR levers. 
The color of frame, white is standard and if you want to change it to yellow, please write YELLOW on your address. 
The weight of SROB is 22kg(48.4Lbs) without battery, and 25.5kg(56.1Lbs) with battery. 
The shipping, we will send out MAY 2017 from China, and local delivery at June 2017.
The shipping cost for national(USA) is 199USD, and International 249USD per ebike. Please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% customs in USA, varies internationally, also you need to pay sales tax or VAT. 
Please refer to Indiegogo's policy, it is non refundable. more details in FAQ sections. 

Schedule:
    
 

who make SROB ebike

The SROB ebike, designed by Unitech in Korea, and mass production in Ocean Bicycle in China. Please contact by email or visit our web site to get some more detail. 



  SK Baek, Founder

Design & development control for SROB
Patent owner in S Korea
unibicycle@unibicycle.com
www.unibicycle.com

Production & Quality control for SROB
Factory owner in China
oceanbicycle@oceanbicycle.com.cn 
www.oceanbicycle.com



Co- founder's sales team in China. Our co- founder has more than 10 years experience on sales & manufacturing, and we are offering one(1) year warranty for this ebike. Please visit our web site or check FAQ section for detail.

SROB ebike test samples, it has good design & good performance. We will get certification for USA and EU before production.

Because the motor, battery, and sub frames are not designed for MTB.

Yes it is, USA, China, S Korea and many countries.

We have multiple suppliers in China including ebike parts as motor, battery pack, and 60% to be assembled by our co- founder's factory in China, Ocean bicycle Industry Group, in Tianjin China. www.oceanbicycle.com

to be finished when come anything shorter one

it is assembled on BB(bottom bracket), and making power on BB to drive as normal mid motor kits.

yes it is, and crank tooth is 46T

The motor will make power when you pedaling, so no pedaling no power. 
it has three(3) steps from PAS0 ~ PAS3
PAS0 is no power, PAS1 is 33%, PAS2 is 66% and PAS3 will make 100% power of motor.

It is is option for USA only according to different polices for each countries, 
Please check your local law, also we do not recommend for safety reason.

The motor will not support power after speed limitation for your safety.

                        (Europe & etc)                                                       (USA)                                              

Can I change max speed? 

No, you cannot according to different polices for each countries, 
and if you change it, warranty to be expired. 

What is power cut off of controller? 

If there is too high power keep working, it will make high temperature on controller, and controller will cut off power to protect electric circuit.
It to be returned when temperature going down.

please refer below

this charger has certification to use in USA and EU.

story:
The stock EBR 1190RX/SX cylinders are made of nicasil-coated aluminum. This is a very heat-efficient material, but not the strongest you can put in the cylinder. Spun-cast ductile iron is much stronger, especially in the areas where the EBR cylinders are cracking.

When EBR first started producing these motors, they approached LA Sleeve to help them develop a stronger sleeve, but abandoned the project at it's completion because EBR filed for bankruptcy. We will take this idea to full fruition, but cannot without funding from other owners of the motorcycle. It will be stock bore.

This indiegogo is a way to officially have progress markers towards giving us the solution to the problem we all fear.
story_txt:
The stock EBR 1190RX/SX cylinders are made of nicasil-coated aluminum. This is a very heat-efficient material, but not the strongest you can put in the cylinder. Spun-cast ductile iron is much stronger, especially in the areas where the EBR cylinders are cracking.
When EBR first started producing these motors, they approached LA Sleeve to help them develop a stronger sleeve, but abandoned the project at it's completion because EBR filed for bankruptcy. We will take this idea to full fruition, but cannot without funding from other owners of the motorcycle. It will be stock bore.
This indiegogo is a way to officially have progress markers towards giving us the solution to the problem we all fear.

story:
INTRODUCING THE

 

TRACK1 is a powerful off-road electric board

with an all-terrain track.

 

 

*Because this is an all-terrain board and is designed for numerous terrain types the Track1's speed and range can vary significantly.

 

 

 

 

TRACTION

An off-road board needs good traction, but traditional off-road skateboard wheels are too small providing poor grip. One of the reasons tanks have tracks is because the 'contact patch' of a track is significantly larger than a wheel providing superior traction and pressure distribution. In fact the TRACK1 has the contact patch of a 30 inch wheel making it possible to traverse different types of terrains.

 

 

HOW DOES IT RIDE?

The riding experience of the TRACK1 is similar to a surfboard and snowboard, you lean with your whole body. Its fluid and responsive to a riders motions making for a fluid and enjoyable riding style. The tracks patented tire-like form factor ™ allows for deep carving angles giving a rider the feeling of turning on a bank, and because the board is driven from the rear a rider can use the thrust to intentionally over-steer making for a more dramatic turn... like drifting off-road. Thrust can also assists when riding out of hard turns. 

 

TECHNOLOGY BEHIND THE TRACK

Track technology hasn't changed significantly over the past couple of decades, but recent advancements in battery technology and aerospace materials make this an ideal time for advancements.

Building the track from the ground up allowed us to take off-road technology to the next level! The track itself is an all encompassing device. It houses the powertrain components, creates thrust, provides serious traction, and steers the board. In addition to it being extremely compact its also the first ever track with a tire like form-factor ™.

The track's tread itself is the bread and butter behind why the TRACK1 rides so well. Thinking about most tracks, they have a block of rubber or metal with no real sophistication in function or design. The TRACK1 is the first of its kind with a tread similar to a mud-terrain tire, on a track. These tread lugs provide the traction of a large mud tire, and the technology of a clearing tread, with the smooth ride of a street tire. 

 

 

The Deck is crafted from many layers of Carbon Fiber, Kevlar and a core material to give the TRACK1 unparalleled strength and reduced weight. The FLUX team uses their extensive material engineering backgrounds in advanced composites and nanotechnology to craft the finest board possible with some of the most advanced processes available. Each deck is hand made in-house for the very best quality in every board. 

 

The utility handlebars are a good option for those who are new to board riding, or just need more utility from the TRACK1. The handlebars are made from aluminum, chromoly and carbon fiber for a little flexibility and maximum durability. Perfect for beginners or advanced riders, the handlebars open new opportunities for the TRACK1. 

 

 

There are many challenges with a revolutionary new product, but we have spend a great deal of time and money on intense research and development with numerous prototypes to make the TRACK1 the most versatile, all-terrain capable, compact and portable off-road vehicle to date. 

We aim to ship the first TRACK1 boards beginning next year. The TRACK1 is currently in the final phases of testing to insure our engineering is dead-on and to provide you with the best possible product available before we finalize our manufacturing. We are currently working hard on many of the final details, specifications, and materials which is why not all aspects are listed.

 

We are continuously trying to pack the most power with the most compact form factor in the TRACK1, pushing the limits on all types of electric motors and controllers, from our current 50,000rpm BLDC to our latest low KV torque monster DC series motor. Currently working on custom low KV (low RPM, high torque) motors and controllers to fit into the compact TRACK1 package is our primary focus.  This is why the motor specifications are not provided in detail. At the moment, the motor is over 5hp with a reduction providing an insane amount of torque! More torque than any other eBoard... ever! We are putting all types of technology combinations through their paces to insure the best possible off-road performance and reliability for you!

 

FLUX began in Seattle, WA with the dream to create fun, electric off-road vehicles for everyone! FLUX started out as a bootstrapped operation creating the most compact yet powerful electric driveline's possible. 

 

FLUX was founded by Michael Menendez in 2016. Michael is not new to startups or pushing the envelope of technology. He has been building EV's since 1999, and was the CTO of a major tech startup in Silicon Valley. He has run large teams single handed, always with limited resources. Michael has deep proven roots in design, engineering and manufacturing always getting the job done. He has a proven track record in the manufacturing sector of driving products to market with a fast paced iterative design, engineer methodology and a superior design for manufacturing (DFM) mindset.

FLUX is a completely vertical company, able to design, engineer, prototype, test, and manufacture the highest quality components available. We are 'old-school' and believe in craftsmanship over cost and apply that passion to the TRACK1!

FLUX needs your support to keep the gears turning!

Thank you for your support!

 

TRACK1 loaded up in Hawaii getting ready for the beach!

TRACK1 used for gathering firewood and family fun camping.

TRACK1 is always the life of the party!

 

Is the battery removable?

Yes, with little effort the battery can be removed and swapped with an extra battery for extended range.

 

What type of battery is it?

We use 18650 lithium ion cells to construct our own custom sized batteries for safety, durability and reliability. It is one large packaged encased battery with a plug connection to the board. Our battery is currently the most powerful on the market to provide you with the most range possible. 

 

What is the boards range?

Depending on the rider's weight, the terrain type, and the average speed the boards range is 8-15 miles per a full charge.

 

Can I purchase more than one battery?

Yes, Track1 owners can purchase extra batteries directly from Flux.

 

How fast does the board go?

Depending on the terrain being ridden the board can travel at speeds up to 20 mph.

 

How water resistant is the board?

The Track1 is sealed to be water resistant and go through deep water and snow. However, extreme and extended exposure can cause the board to be susceptible to water damage. We recommend not submerging the board.

 

What types of terrains can the board ride?

The Track1 has been designed to ride all-terrains including but not limited to street, sand, snow, and dirt. Its up to you!

 

Does the board have bindings?

Yes, and they can be adjusted by the rider or removed altogether.

 

Can the board be ridden at night?

Yes, the board can be equipped with very powerful LED headlights for night riding.

 

What is the weight limit on the board?

We are trying to increase the weight limit, but its at 230lbs right now.

 

Does the TRACK1 have brakes?

Yes, the board uses the motor and reduction to slow down, and even lock up the track. The brakes are very good.

 

Warranty?

Flux Design Co has a 'make it right' mentality. Due to the extreme use the TRACK1 can be put through we have to look at each case individually. We will honor manufacturer defects and work with you to find a solution. We are a small company that wants to share this technology with the world, so expect us to support you as you support us.

Its fluid and responsive to a riders motions making for a fluid and enjoyable riding style. The tracks patented tire-like form factor ™ allows for deep carving angles giving a rider the feeling of turning on a bank, and because the board is driven from the rear a rider can use the thrust to intentionally over-steer making for a more dramatic turn... like drifting off-road. Thrust can also assists when riding out of hard turns.  TECHNOLOGY BEHIND THE TRACKTrack technology hasn't changed significantly over the past couple of decades, but recent advancements in battery technology and aerospace materials make this an ideal time for advancements.Building the track from the ground up allowed us to take off-road technology to the next level! The track itself is an all encompassing device. It houses the powertrain components, creates thrust, provides serious traction, and steers the board. In addition to it being extremely compact its also the first ever track with a tire like form-factor ™.The track's tread itself is the bread and butter behind why the TRACK1 rides so well. Thinking about most tracks, they have a block of rubber or metal with no real sophistication in function or design. The TRACK1 is the first of its kind with a tread similar to a mud-terrain tire, on a track. These tread lugs provide the traction of a large mud tire, and the technology of a clearing tread, with the smooth ride of a street tire.  

 

The Deck is crafted from many layers of Carbon Fiber, Kevlar and a core material to give the TRACK1 unparalleled strength and reduced weight. The FLUX team uses their extensive material engineering backgrounds in advanced composites and nanotechnology to craft the finest board possible with some of the most advanced processes available. Each deck is hand made in-house for the very best quality in every board.  The utility handlebars are a good option for those who are new to board riding, or just need more utility from the TRACK1. The handlebars are made from aluminum, chromoly and carbon fiber for a little flexibility and maximum durability. Perfect for beginners or advanced riders, the handlebars open new opportunities for the TRACK1.   There are many challenges with a revolutionary new product, but we have spend a great deal of time and money on intense research and development with numerous prototypes to make the TRACK1 the most versatile, all-terrain capable, compact and portable off-road vehicle to date. We aim to ship the first TRACK1 boards beginning next year. The TRACK1 is currently in the final phases of testing to insure our engineering is dead-on and to provide you with the best possible product available before we finalize our manufacturing. We are currently working hard on many of the final details, specifications, and materials which is why not all aspects are listed. We are continuously trying to pack the most power with the most compact form factor in the TRACK1, pushing the limits on all types of electric motors and controllers, from our current 50,000rpm BLDC to our latest low KV torque monster DC series motor. Currently working on custom low KV (low RPM, high torque) motors and controllers to fit into the compact TRACK1 package is our primary focus.  This is why the motor specifications are not provided in detail. At the moment, the motor is over 5hp with a reduction providing an insane amount of torque! More torque than any other eBoard... ever! We are putting all types of technology combinations through their paces to insure the best possible off-road performance and reliability for you! FLUX began in Seattle, WA with the dream to create fun, electric off-road vehicles for everyone! FLUX started out as a bootstrapped operation creating the most compact yet powerful electric driveline's possible.  FLUX was founded by Michael Menendez in 2016. Michael is not new to startups or pushing the envelope of technology. He has been building EV's since 1999, and was the CTO of a major tech startup in Silicon Valley. He has run large teams single handed, always with limited resources. Michael has deep proven roots in design, engineering and manufacturing always getting the job done. He has a proven track record in the manufacturing sector of driving products to market with a fast paced iterative design, engineer methodology and a superior design for manufacturing (DFM) mindset.FLUX is a completely vertical company, able to design, engineer, prototype, test, and manufacture the highest quality components available. We are 'old-school' and believe in craftsmanship over cost and apply that passion to the TRACK1!FLUX needs your support to keep the gears turning!Thank you for your support! TRACK1 loaded up in Hawaii getting ready for the beach!TRACK1 used for gathering firewood and family fun camping.TRACK1 is always the life of the party! Is the battery removable?Yes, with little effort the battery can be removed and swapped with an extra battery for extended range. What type of battery is it?We use 18650 lithium ion cells to construct our own custom sized batteries for safety, durability and reliability. It is one large packaged encased battery with a plug connection to the board. Our battery is currently the most powerful on the market to provide you with the most range possible.  What is the boards range?Depending on the rider's weight, the terrain type, and the average speed the boards range is 8-15 miles per a full charge. Can I purchase more than one battery?Yes, Track1 owners can purchase extra batteries directly from Flux. How fast does the board go?Depending on the terrain being ridden the board can travel at speeds up to 20 mph. How water resistant is the board?The Track1 is sealed to be water resistant and go through deep water and snow. However, extreme and extended exposure can cause the board to be susceptible to water damage. We recommend not submerging the board. What types of terrains can the board ride?The Track1 has been designed to ride all-terrains including but not limited to street, sand, snow, and dirt. Its up to you! Does the board have bindings?Yes, and they can be adjusted by the rider or removed altogether. Can the board be ridden at night?Yes, the board can be equipped with very powerful LED headlights for night riding. What is the weight limit on the board?We are trying to increase the weight limit, but its at 230lbs right now. Does the TRACK1 have brakes?Yes, the board uses the motor and reduction to slow down, and even lock up the track. The brakes are very good. Warranty?Flux Design Co has a 'make it right' mentality. Due to the extreme use the TRACK1 can be put through we have to look at each case individually. We will honor manufacturer defects and work with you to find a solution. We are a small company that wants to share this technology with the world, so expect us to support you as you support us.

story:
ESPAÑOL

Mi nombre es Carlos Casallas, tengo 34 años de edad, soy técnico automotriz, trabajo en mecánica hace 17 años, vivo en Bogotá Colombia, me apasionan los vehículos y es necesario un cambio de conciencia pensando en el cuidado del medio ambiente para no seguir contaminando, eso me llama la atención de los VEHÍCULOS ELÉCTRICOS ya que es una tecnología más limpia e innovadora, CON TU AYUDA queremos realizar la conversión de un vehículo prototipo e impulsar estas conversiones en mi país.

 

¿QUÉ ESTAMOS BUSCANDO?

Necesitamos USD 20.000 para un vehículo eléctrico prototipo, este dinero será invertido de esta forma:

  • Compra de vehículo a convertir. USD 2.000
  • Compra de baterias de litio, motor eléctrico y accesorios importados desde China. USD 10.000
  • Gastos de importación e impuestos. USD 2.000
  • Modificación de la licencia del vehículo para cambiar el tipo de combustible a "Eléctrico". USD 300
  • Fabricación de soportes para motor y baterías, fabricación del acople del motor eléctrico. USD 2.200
  • Compra de cables de conexión, contactores, relés y demás accesorios. USD 1.000
  • Pago de arriendo de taller (servicios, herramienta y mano de obra). USD 1.500
  • Imprevistos. USD 1.000

Si estás en Colombia con tu donación puedes participar en todo el proceso de la conversión :), si estás en otro país y si quieres puedes recibir todo el registro de video y fotográfico del proceso de la conversión en tiempo real :)

Si no se recauda el dinero completo, se buscarán inversionistas externos para completar el dinero y llevar a cabo la conversión del vehículo prototipo.

 

¿QUÉ IMPACTO TIENE TU APORTE?

¿Sabías que mueren más de 17.000 personas diarias en el mundo por la contaminación ambiental?, pero en 5 años de usar un vehículo eléctrico se ha dejado de emitir al medio ambiente más de 20.000 kilos de gases contaminantes, con tu ayuda en este proyecto estás contribuyendo a disminuir este número de muertes.

 

Riesgos y desafíos 

Hay un riesgo inicial y es no conseguir los recursos económicos completos para la conversión del vehículo prototipo, en este caso el plan B es buscar inversión externa.

Hay un desafío y es que en mi país Colombia no hay mucha conciencia ambiental lo cual representa trabajo para que las personas interioricen esta visión.

Otro desafío es que los precios de la conversión inician en USD 8.000 y hay que trabajar en que las personas comprendan que son más las ventajas que las desventajas como el ahorro de dinero en combustible y en mantenimiento.

 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Ayúdanos a difundir esta campaña en caso que no puedas aportar económicamente para que más personas puedan apoyar una forma real de cuidar el medio ambiente.

Si requieres más información con gusto será otorgada.

Carlos Casallas

Whatsapp: +573123063674 - Escríbeme aquí: https://goo.gl/kUxzMe

Mail: carloscasallas@gmail.com

Síguenos en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ecovehiculos.co/

Youtube: https://youtu.be/a-H7E9YvFiw

Visítanos en https://www.ecovehiculos.co

 

 

ENGLISH                                                   

My name is Carlos Casallas, I am 34 years old, I am an automotive technician, I work in mechanics 17 years ago, I live in Bogotá Colombia, I am passionate about vehicles and it is necessary to change our mind thinking about caring for the environment so that we do not continue to pollute , That calls my attention to ELECTRIC VEHICLES as it is a cleaner and innovative technology, WITH YOUR HELP we want to carry out a conversion of a prototype vehicle and boost these conversions in my country.

 

THAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR?

We need USD 20,000 for the prototype electric vehicle, this money will be invested like this:

  • Purchase vehicle to convert. USD 2,000
  • Purchase of lithium batteries, electric motor and accessories imported from China. USD 10,000
  • Import charges and taxes. USD 2,000
  • Modification of the license of the vehicle to change the type of fuel to "Electric". USD 300
  • Manufacture of supports for motor and batteries, manufacture of coupling of electric motor. USD 2,200
  • Purchase of connection cables, contactors, relays and other accessories. USD 1,000
  • Payment of workshop lease (services, tool and labor). USD 1,500
  • Unforeseen. USD 1,000

If you are in Colombia with your donation you can participate in the whole process of the conversion :), if you are in another country and if you want you can receive all the video and photo recording of the conversion process in real time :)

If the full money is not collected, external investors will be sought to complete the money and carry out the conversion of the prototype vehicle.

 

WHAT IMPACT IS YOUR CONTRIBUTION?

Did you know that more than 17,000 people die every day in the world due to environmental pollution? But in 5 years of using an electric vehicle, more than 20.000 kilograms of polluting gases have not been released to the environment, with your help in this project is contributing to decrease this number of deaths.

 

Risks and challenges

There is an initial risk and is not getting the full economic resources for the conversion of the prototype vehicle, in this case plan B is to seek external investment.

There is a challenge and is that in my country Colombia does not have much environmental awareness which represents work for people to internalize this vision.

Another challenge is that conversion prices start at USD 8,000 and i have to work on people understanding that there are more advantages than disadvantages such as saving money on fuel and maintenance.

 

Other ways you can help

Help us spread this campaign in case you can not contribute economically so that more people can support a real way of caring for the environment.

If you require more information you will be gladly granted.

Carlos Casallas

Whatsapp: +573123063674 - Write me here: https://goo.gl/kUxzMe

Mail: carloscasallas@gmail.com

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ecovehiculos.co/

Youtube: https://youtu.be/a-H7E9YvFiw

Visit us in https://www.ecovehiculos.co

story:
Overview

Capricorn X is the world’s first carbon battery integrated, foldable, electric bike. Capricorn X envisions and captures the heart of the global capital of technology and bicycle metropolis: Tokyo, Japan. Since 2014, our technology provider PJP Eye has researched and developed a carbon battery called "Cambrian™"at their research center in Kyushu University: Fukuoka, Japan. This innovative battery is here to change the world, from Japan. The battery is made from organic materials but doesn't use rare metals which harm the earth making it recyclable.  The battery has a  life cycle of  more than 10,000 times compared to 3000 times in the case of Li-ion batteries. This is why we are proud to present the 10-year warranty on our battery.

 



The big feature of this battery for the e-bikes is Super RapidCharging Technology ™ Compared to other bikes out on the market whose charging time is more than 4 hours, our Capricorn only needs 20 min to get fully charged. You can then travel another 18 miles/30km easily with a top speed of 15 mph/25km/h!  In the time it takes for you to enjoy a cup of coffee, you recharge your bike back up to full power. Since our battery can accept large electric currents, with certain types of proprietary EV chargers, our Capricorn can be charged.

Not only the battery, but our Capricorn also has all the functions bikes need to have for daily use. Capricorn X changes the way you travel by the whole new level of convenience. 

 

 

 

Lab6 emerged from the most innovative city in the world - Tokyo. Short for Laboratory 6, Lab6 was created to develop and distribute products using the world's most innovative technology - carbon battery, "Cambrian™". Cambrian was developed by PJP Eye Ltd. inherited business from Power Japan Plus famous for its Dual Carbon Battery. 

 

 

 

Hiroaki Nishina, the chairman of Lab6 and CEO of PJP Eye LTD. runs two UN organizations in NYC. Nishina and PJP Eye's goal is to create a sustainable world with carbon battery "Cambrian". Currently our Capricorn integrates a single carbon battery inside, however  in the future we plan to mass produce dual carbon batteries. Our dream is to deliver electricity to anyone anywhere on this planet.

                          

For our first step, we intend to make everyday travel sustainable. Capricorn X is our first and best product offered right now in the market. 

 

We have completed mass production of Capricorn X and are currently optimizing parts, configurations, and logistics. To scale up the production, we have set a goal of $150,000 for this campaign. We want to give these bikes to everyone around the world so they can experience the ease of new technology. 

 

 

Everyone who  participates in our Super RapidCharging campaign will get it at least 20% off of the retail price – and will be the first to be offered a 10-year premium battery warranty for no charge.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

          

               Adjustable Saddle and Strong Braking Power - Disc Brake

                            

              Foldable Pedal Attachment for Assist and Front and Rear Suspension for Smooth Riding

                    

            Front Light to Light the Way and A Tail Lump for Extra Safety in your Community

 

 

 

 

 

 

A wise man once said that you need to fail and hit rock bottom before you can succeed. Although we haven't quite hit rock bottom, we definitely faced challenges. At times it's been tough, but we've learned from our mistakes and emerged stronger. In particular, we’ve nailed two key areas the last year - manufacturing and logistics.  

We're now ready and confident that all points from ordering to delivery will live up to expectations.

 

 

We’re not only building a bike or a brand but rather planting the seeds for a vision of a sustainable carbon future  with our backers. We’re constantly improving both the bikes and our own performance, listening to feedback intently.

In essence, our bikes are made by each one of you. Everyone who purchases a bike, gives us feedback and cuts down on global emissions is making a difference. Lab6 is creating a sustainable world: for everyone, built by everyone.

 

 

We won the Tech Rocketship Award from the British Embassy of Tokyo for the future of the mobility award 2020. 

These are our proud partners :

 

 

We’ve worked very hard on improving every aspect of our company. We’ve built our team and product from the ground up, sporting the best battery technology on the market from Japan. Our team comes from strong, diverse professional backgrounds and is capable of delivering a killer bike that outdoes anything on the market.

 

 

 

 

 

Track Record In Japan

Lab6 has already been successful in Japan.  On Makuake, publicly a listed crowdfunding platform in Japan, Lab6 Capricorn has already raised around 100,000 USD. It was actually one of the most expensive products that Makuake has listed. 

Others are talking about us too

Our Cambrian Battery has been patented and its intellectual property is strictly protected. 

Additional questions? 
Contact us at hello@laboratory6.net

PRESS & PR: Mail: i.okina@laboratory6.net
