story:
Get a FREE Kick Bike!

Here's how: 
  1. Share our campaign with your network using left hand side buttons for sharing via Facebook or Twitter or G+
  2. The one who brings the most contributions gets the FREE Kick Bike if the campaign gets fully funded.
You have nothing to loose, just win!
(note: if you share our campaign on Facebook or Twitter, we can see your name, number of referrals and total contribution in the campaign statistics)

The Kick Bike is the most affordable, versatile, stylish, electric scooter
by far.

We believe that transport can be Eco-Friendly, Low-Cost, Fast and most importantly Entertaining. We have picked up the best components on the market to complete The Kick Bike – affordable electric urban scooter.


"The gadget you’ve always wanted but never got – is finally AFFORDABLE for everyone!"




The bigger the wheels, the better control.

When you need to get quickly to any place in overcrowded city you need to control your Kick Bike.  16“ front and  12“ back wheel brings perfect maneuverability and stability.




From meeting to meeting without sweat
and with a style.

High capacity battery and powerful engine are not for chickens. It allows you to feel the speed - 15,5 mph. You can drive for up to 28 miles per single charge.
So you will reach all your business partners in a minute.



A new dimension of transportation

Do you want browse the city and its surroundings quietly and effortlessly? Or make a small shopping? The Kick Bike is great for any tripaholic or shopaholic. You and your bag can weight up to 265 lbs.

 The Kick Bike  is not a scooter only for passive transportation. Thanks to its design with low platform it allows use for sport as a regular scooter. Active riding also extends range of the scooter and the ride can be finished using only human power in case of empty battery. 

"On the way to have some fun, to school or work you won't get sweaty unless you want to."



The Kick Bike Technical Specifications



What Makes The Kick Bike Unique?




Advantages of The Kick Bike

  • powerful motor allows you to climb any hill
  • high capacity battery provides better range
  • bigger wheels means better maneuverability, stability and riding comfort
  • speed of 15,5 mph (25 kph) is fast yet safe
  • range of The Kick Bike was tested with 225 lbs (102 kg) rider!


    • Bit of history
    We have a long experiences with development and construction not only electric products. For example electric scooter or  electric kick bike for less air pollution ('95). You can find more about development history on our web page.




Legality

Laws and regulations regarding electric vehicles, and electric scooters vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product in your area and abide by your local laws.


Why we need your help?

Funding will be used for enabling cost effective mass-production. We need to complete assembly spaces,  equip with tooling, produce and purchase The Kick Bike components.


Risks

We have built two kick bike prototypes which you could see on a video or on the pictures above. Both were extensively tested and only minor issues were found and easily removed. We do not expect any major issues affecting quality or cost of the kickbikes. However there is a small risk which could affect terms of delivery as we are dependent on external suppliers.



Perks

Mudguards - $25  High quality mud guards - comes mounted on our Kick Bike

                       


Fast charger - $59  - extra charger - decrease charging time to 2 hours! Shipping need to be increased by $10

                       


LCD Display - $59  - equip your Kick Bike with LCD display showing the riding speed, a single mileage and cumulative mileage, riding time, power-assist gear, motor power and temperature, battery voltage and charge status, brake status and ambient temperature. Comes installed on your Kick Bike

                       


Extra Battery - $149  - easy to swap battery. Have one of your batteries always on a charger! Only for purchase with The Kick Bike. Shipping need to be increased by $20

                       

The Kick Bike - early bird - $449  First 100 Kick Bikes for very special price - 55% OFF retail price. Estimated delivery time February 2016

The Kick Bike - $499  next 200 Kick Bikes - 50% OFF retail price. Estimated Delivery March 2016



The Kick Bike available colors

 
                      RED                                        BLUE                                        WHITE



Shipping

Shipping is $199 for USA, Canada, Mexico, Australia and Europe and will be requested separately along with your shipping address after your Kick Bike is ready to be shipped! For shipping we use UPS services and delivery time is up to 7 days. Right after your Kick Bike is shipped, you will be provided with tracking number.

Shipping need to be adjusted for "hard to reach" destinations. In such case we'll contact you and share with you the exact cost for shipping. 

Please contact us with query for shipping outside USA and Europe.



We appreciate your support

If you like The Kick Bike but you can not purchase one, please share our campaign with your friends. You can find us on Facebook, Twitter, G+ (links below).

Please find a story behind The Kick Bike and much more on our web site .

We appreciate your support. 

The Kick Bike team


CHECK FOR UPDATES HERE

story:
Introduction

I was recently fortunate enough to be able to spend 2 weeks with a loan Renault Zoe. I was so impressed with the car, I ordered one.

What I was not impressed with however, was the quality of the experience for Android users. Sure, the app sort of works... just... but it's a pretty painful experience.

As the founder of an Android Development company, I knew I could do better and deliver (within the constraints of Renault's system), the app the car deserves.

Of course, there are lots of ways to improve and enhance the app, but it makes sense to make the development a step by step process so backers can see real benefits in their day to day usage of the Zoe, right from the off.

What We Need & What You Get

Of course, software development is expensive, but this IndieGoGo isn't about raising the funds to do a full development, it's about having an achievable target to demonstrate that there is enough interest in the app, and to put the things in place that means my company, O Labs, part of MoDaCo Solutions, can develop and support 'My Zoe' for a period of 2 years.

We have 2 levels of perks to support the development, one for individuals (Zoe owners), and one for companies (e.g. Renault dealers, accessory suppliers).

For individuals

  • A £5 contribution will get you the My Zoe app, including any future in app purchases, updates, etc.
  • You will also get your name on a 'wall of fame' within the app, thanking you for your backing.
  • The app will not contain advertising, however it will contain subtle (and non-intrusive) co-branding from supporting companies (see below). We are 100% committed to ensuring this branding doesn't detract from the app usage experience and will liaise with you, the backers, to help us achieve this goal.
For companies

  • Would you like to be seen as a progressive, innovative company that is supporting Renault Zoe owners? Perhaps you are a Renault dealer that would love a captive audience for future upgraders. Perhaps you sell Zoe related accessories. This is the perk for you.
  • The perk is priced at £2,500 for the 2 year supported period, which is less than £25 a week for some genuinely innovative branding. Only 4 'slots' are available (you can purchase multiple).
  • We will work closely with you to ensure your co-branding is as effective as possible, without detracting from the user experience.

How the app will be developed

O Labs is an experienced software development company, but we aren't going into this project blind. Today, we already have a test version of the app that performs better than the Renault offering, and most importantly fixes a few bugs. Annoyed at the standard app forgetting your login? Us too. Fixed. Curious as to why the units switch between miles and kilometres at random? Us too. Fixed.

We have the following plans for the project (but after funding, will liaise with backers in a support forum to plan additional features):

  • Day 1 after campaign completion: App release with fixes and improvements mentioned above
  • Day 1 after campaign completion: Release of a JSON based API allowing developers and enthusiasts to retrieve their car data programmatically
  • Planned: Switch from a webview based app as is currently used to use native controls for improved performance and design
  • Planned: Use push notifications to configure alerts within the app
  • Planned: Integrate with Tasker for automated actions in the app
  • Planned: Provide an Android Wear version of the app for monitoring the car from your wearable
  • Possible: Integrate with the CAN bus for additional information
  • Possible: Liaise with our contacts at Renault to enquire about development for the R-Link

Risks & Challenges

Although O Labs is a very experienced consultancy that has developed a large number of mobile apps (a number of apps you may use today are MoDaCo Solutions clients, O Labs' parent company), there are always risks related to development.

We are experienced at mitigating such risks, but these could include:

  • Renault unexpectedly shutting down access to ZE Services
  • ZE Services breaking (again)

Other Ways You Can Help

As well as backing the campaign, it will be really helpful if you can let other Renault Zoe owners know about our plans. 

Spread the word!

I can't wait to enjoy 'My Zoe' for my car, I hope you are excited too.

story:
Thundrblade Electric Inline Skate

Let's Storm the Streets!

Thundrblade is a high quality carbon inline skate frame with a battery-powered motor inside. It has a wireless controller, swappable batteries and can be attached to your favorite inline skate boot. The frame fits two offroad wheels or LED wheels for evening fun.

 

Thundrblade features a system of regenerative brakes that can be used even while skating without the motors on. Electric assist mode is in development as well. With it you can experience the thrill of speed without a drop of sweat as you carve through the streets.

Electric inline skates: the pros

 

Thundrblade: the better powered option

Deciding between skates and other powered last mile solutions? You don’t have to give up your favorite mode of transport anymore! Safer, easier to learn and more maneuverable on crowded streets, Thundrblade surpasses powered boards. Feel more in control (and don’t send a powered bullet of a board crashing into people or cars if you fall).

 

Ride electric or not, it’s your choice!

Thundrblade inline skate system is a hybrid - that means it will never leave you stranded without juice in the batteries. Ran out of spare batteries? Use it as normal skate! Switch between motors and your own power within seconds. Regen brakes naturally work in both cases.

 

Batteries running low? Swap ‘em!

Rather than a heavy big battery we went for lighter, swappable ones, so your feet are always light enough for your tricks or commute. Swapping the battery doesn’t require tools and can be done on the go.

Two wheels for comfort

Drain covers, tactile tiles or historic pavement in the way? Don’t feel the uneven surfaces and cracks thanks to the 110 and 125 mm size of our wheels.

 

Want to know more about Thundrblade technology? Read our FAQ!

What can I do with a pair of TBs?

Commute with Thundrblade

You can finally skate to work or school and not come in all sweaty! Thundrblade is a perfect last mile solution, especially paired with an open boot. No need to carry your work shoes extra, just wear them!

 

Why use Thundrblade:

With electric skates, crowded sidewalks are no longer a problem. Watch our video to see how easily you can change from sidewalk to streets with Thundrblade

Avoid traffic with ease! On Thundrblades, you can easily maintain a 25-30 km/h speed, which is quicker than a car in a rush hour in many cities anyway and faster than any bicyclist.

125 mm PU wheels can take drains and even those pesky tactile pavement tiles.

Never again worry about parking or traffic, just take your Thundrblades! It’s also better for the environment.

Be a professional on skates! Our Thundrblade Complete Setup comes with everything you need out-of-the-box. 

Power(ed) workout

Is skating your favorite exercise, but your more experienced friends left you behind on that weekend group ride again?

If you’re recuperating after an illness, or just getting into condition, ride in assist mode and have a lot more fun!

Why use Thundrblade:

Use the assist mode to warm up safely and then use your own power to skate.

Go offroad with ease. BMX trails, parks, rougher country trails are not a problem with offroad wheels.

Give your dog a workout too! Watch how Daniel e-skates with his dog.

 

Let them try to catch you!

Explore!

If you love exploring new cities, it’s time for Thundrblade. Experience urban areas, parks or even countryside without your feet hurting after a long day of sightseeing! Watch how Daniel explored Tokyo, Osaka and even Aoi Matsuri festival in Kyoto.

Why use Thundrblade:

See more landmarks and sights in a day

Get a unique “feel” for the city

With motors on your feet you don’t feel the weight of your backpack

Take things off the road with our offroad wheels! Watch a video of a BMX trail ride.

Imagine how much you could see at a fair :)

 

Get to know your city a lot better!

Tinkerer

Have you seen our motorized frames and immediately thought of ways to use them in your own skate rigs? Do you want them completely your way? By all means, start crafting!

Why use Thundrblade:

Try out many rigs! Our carbon frame is compatible with most skate boots on the market and two wheel sizes. Watch a wheel and boot change on the early prototypes(final design will change).

No need to compromise! Build what suits you.

 

See what you can create with our motorized inline frames. Back the Thundrblade Frame System perk and receive a pair of frames, batteries, wheels all the tools necessary. We won’t even assemble them together for you!

ElecTricks

With Thundrblade, you can do a host of tricks! While not suitable for grinding, a lot of fun awaits you, especially with the LED wheels.

 

What can I do with my Thundrblades?

Check out the LED wheel fun

Ever tried going 25mph fast in reverse?

Skated with only one Thundrblade?

Skate off-road

Have a lightsaber duel!

Jump obstacles and ramps with more speed.

 

Kill the boredom, have some fun and make awesome trick videos yourself with the Thundrblade Complete Setup perk - a set of blades, a Carbon Fiber freestyle boot, offroad and LED wheels. You can’t grind, but you can fly!

 

How it works

Thundrblade is a "Frame System" which means all the electronics, batteries and motors are inside the frame. You can use your preferred skate boot with Thundrblade or you can get our Complete Setup that comes with high-end carbon fiber skate boots so you can Thundrblade right out-of-the-box.

Compatible with UFS and SSM 165mm

Examples of boots

 

Push the Wireless Remote Controller stick forward to accelerate and pull it back to brake. The brake is especially useful on long descents since you can control your speed safely maintaining both feet on the ground and optimal body balance.

 

To go in reverse the same logic applies, pull backward. When in Reverse push forward to brake.

 

LED Wheels increase visibility and safety for night skating.

 

Thundrblade also comes with off-road tires.

 

You can skate normally or use the motors at any time. Our exclusive motor disengage system allows skating without any resistance when using human power just like a normal skate

 

Swap batteries on the fly for an unlimited range.

 

Uphills are officially fun! Thundrblade can go up inclines of up to 20% rate.

 

Thundrblade can handle jumps and urban skating. This makes easy to avoid obstacles such as curbs and oncoming traffic.

 

What do people say about Thundrblade

 

“When dreams finally become reality.”

Zach Ralston

“I need these in my life.... but like now, not next year :D”

Chris Dennis 

"Amazing!﻿"

Andra Leys de Andrade

"This is the future! Great job and thanks for making my dream of seeing motorised skates a reality!﻿"

 

Konarali​

"This is the dream﻿​"

 

hapaboy99​

"I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR THIS GOD BLESS YOU PEOPLE﻿"

 

Jun Minami​

 

Watch Ken’s testimonial:

Please turn on subtitles for this video on the little gear on the bottom right of the video player.

More reviews:

Tiago Inline Skater review:

The Lino Life review:

 

It's about time

E-boards have been on the market for over a decade and e-skates are still nowhere to be found. Let's put inline skating back on the map!

Since Thundrblade is actually easier to skate than normal inline skates, it has the potential to appeal to people that would never skate otherwise. We will take inline skating to people that have never skated before.

We've had test riders with no previous skating experience being able to ride Thundrblade in about 10 minutes on average.

 

Back Thundrblade today

We have been working hard, with no funds or fancy tools, for the past 2 years to bring this dream to reality. More than 20 prototypes and countless tests later, we have a great prototype. Now is the time to show the world that skating is the best way to move around, both for leisure and transportation! For that, we need funding, and only you can help us make this happen! Back us or refer us to friends, and then storm the streets on Thundrblades!

 

Referrals - How to win a FREE Thundrblade pair.

From June 5th until June 25th you can get other people to contribute to the campaign using your Personal Referral Link.

Their contributions will accumulate until June 25th if they access the campaign page using your Personal Referal Link.

Every 100 Dollars accumulated from contributions through your Personal Referal Link, you will earn 10$ off your next purchase.

Every 5000 Dollars accumulated through your Personal Referral Link, will earn you a FREE PAIR OF THUNDRBLADE, plus all the discounts accumulated.

All the referral rules are in the campaign update #03

Watch the following video to learn how to get your Personal Referral Link. Must be a backer to participate.

 

 

 

Stretch goals

These are features we will only be able to implement if we get enough funds. Let's keep sharing so we can make it through all of the goals to have a better product for everyone.

  • 150k

    1. LED wheel color choice available.

Choose from white, blue and red.

  • 200k

    1. Electric Assist Mode. 

The electric assist mode will require aditional R&D, and a custom electronic project, so we will need more funds to put it into the first generation.

This mode will allow the skater to just skate normally and have the motors extend their gliding phase making uphills feels like flats and flats like downhills. No worrying about accelerating, but you can still use the remote to brake.

  • 250k

    1. Automatic Motor Disengage

The motor will automatically engage when accelerating or braking, but it will disengage for cruising without resistance. This will increase the range by about 10% and give a more natural feeling of skating.

 

 

Prototype Gallery

 

Risks & Challenges

There is still some more R&D to be done before production. We will make custom motors, batteries, and electronics. Prototyping these custom components may take up more time than expected due to unforeseen circumstances.

Our partners have a lot of experience in manufacturing and crowdfunding, so you can rest assured we will be able to overcome all the hurdles and deliver a great product.

Common Fibers designs and develops products utilizing fully carbon fiber designs.  While becoming the leading name in the carbon fiber consumer goods space, Common Fibers is excited to partner with Thundrblade to bring this amazing idea to reality. With Common Fibers' help, your pair of Thundrblades will hold up to years of use. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please back us by any amount, just click on the pink button "BACK IT" at the top right of the page and choose the perk you can.

Share our campaign with your friends and family. Remember to use Indiegogo's share tools right beside the pink "BACK IT" button. 

We want to hear from you. If you have any ideas, suggestions or want to ask something, please don't hesitate to contact us via the contact form or by emailing us: info@thundrblade.com

We value and appreciate all your feedback.

T-shirt

FAQs

Q: Can I skate normally with Thundrblade?

A: Yes, Thundrblade is designed to skate just like a normal inline skate when you want to or when batteries are dead.

Q: Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we will ship worldwide.

Q: How much is the shipping cost?

A: The shipping cost will be paid before we ship your Thundrblade, we didn't add it into our Indiegogo campaign just to make sure you don't pay more than you need, we will ship it with the lowest rate possible in April 2019 to your country.

Q: Is Thundrblade hard to learn?

A: Thundrblade is easier to skate than a normal inline skate since it has regen brakes, and you don't need one-foot balance to push. We will have video tutorials on how to ride and skate with Thundrblade.

Q: Can I grind with Thundrblade?

A: No, Thundrblade is not meant for grinding.

Q: Can I do tricks/jumps with Thundrblade?

A: Yes, Thundrblade can withstand anything a normal Urban skate can. It can handle tricks and jumps

Q: Can I Thundrblade if it's rainy outside?

A: Thundrblade components can withstand rain, but the motors and brakes will not work optimally when the pavement is wet. We advise the use of off-road tires and disengage of the motor for wet pavement skating.

Q: What happens when I need spare batteries or parts later in the future?

A: We will sell all the parts including the batteries on our website

Q: If I break my remote controller will I be able to order a new one?

A: Yes, we will offer replacement controllers on our website.

Q: Can I test ride a Thundrblade?

A: Unfortunately we have only one prototype available right now, so test riding is going to be difficult until we have the production version ready.

Q:  What is the max weight limit for Thundrblade?

A: The maximum weight limit is 120kg/270pounds

Q: Does Thundrblade come in different sizes? 

A: Thundrblade frame is only one size, but our complete setup has all shoe sizes from US 6/EU 38 to US10.5 EU 44. Refer to the sizing chart bellow. If you have feet bigger or smaller than this we suggest getting the Thundrblade Frame System option and looking for a skate boot from a different brand.

Q: How much doesThundrblade weigh?

A: Thundrblade is 2.3kg/5 pounds for each foot in a complete setup including boots and batteries, the same as a normal aggressive inline skate.

Q: What is the range per fully charged battery?

A: In 100% electric mode is 12km/7miles, in assist mode is 20~30km/13~20 miles depending on how much the skater pushes with their own power.

Q: What is "Regenerative Braking"?

A: When you brake Thundrblade, it uses its motors to apply resistance to the wheels generating electricity in the process. This electricity is put into the batteries recharging them.

Q: Can I recharge the batteries skating using the Regenerative Brakes?

A: Yes, you could, but it would take a really long time. Regenerative brakes extend the total range of Thundrblade, especially in the case of a really long downhill where you control your speed using the regenerative brakes.

Q: How long does it take to charge the battery?

A: The Thundrblade battery pair charges fully in around 2 hours

Q: Can I order spare batteries/charger?

A: Yes. There's a perk for extra batteries, just add the value to your pledge.

Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

A: The backer is responsible for import duties and taxes, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. 

Q: Can I buy Thundrblade in bulk to sell in my country?

A: Yes, you can. There's a reward with 5 pairs, or send us an email to info@thundrblade.com and we will get back to you.

Q: Can I get a refund?

A: Please refer to Indiegogo's policy here
story_txt:
Thundrblade Electric Inline Skate
Let's Storm the Streets!


Thundrblade is a high quality carbon inline skate frame with a battery-powered motor inside. It has a wireless controller, swappable batteries and can be attached to your favorite inline skate boot. The frame fits two offroad wheels or LED wheels for evening fun. Thundrblade features a system of regenerative brakes that can be used even while skating without the motors on. Electric assist mode is in development as well. With it you can experience the thrill of speed without a drop of sweat as you carve through the streets.

Electric inline skates: the pros Thundrblade: the better powered option
Deciding between skates and other powered last mile solutions? You don’t have to give up your favorite mode of transport anymore! Safer, easier to learn and more maneuverable on crowded streets, Thundrblade surpasses powered boards. Feel more in control (and don’t send a powered bullet of a board crashing into people or cars if you fall). Ride electric or not, it’s your choice!
Thundrblade inline skate system is a hybrid - that means it will never leave you stranded without juice in the batteries. Ran out of spare batteries? Use it as normal skate! Switch between motors and your own power within seconds. Regen brakes naturally work in both cases. Batteries running low? Swap ‘em!
Rather than a heavy big battery we went for lighter, swappable ones, so your feet are always light enough for your tricks or commute. Swapping the battery doesn’t require tools and can be done on the go.

Two wheels for comfort
Drain covers, tactile tiles or historic pavement in the way? Don’t feel the uneven surfaces and cracks thanks to the 110 and 125 mm size of our wheels. Want to know more about Thundrblade technology? Read our FAQ!

What can I do with a pair of TBs?
Commute with Thundrblade
You can finally skate to work or school and not come in all sweaty! Thundrblade is a perfect last mile solution, especially paired with an open boot. No need to carry your work shoes extra, just wear them!

 

Why use Thundrblade:
With electric skates, crowded sidewalks are no longer a problem. Watch our video to see how easily you can change from sidewalk to streets with Thundrblade
Avoid traffic with ease! On Thundrblades, you can easily maintain a 25-30 km/h speed, which is quicker than a car in a rush hour in many cities anyway and faster than any bicyclist.
125 mm PU wheels can take drains and even those pesky tactile pavement tiles.
Never again worry about parking or traffic, just take your Thundrblades! It’s also better for the environment.
Be a professional on skates! Our Thundrblade Complete Setup comes with everything you need out-of-the-box. 
Power(ed) workout
Is skating your favorite exercise, but your more experienced friends left you behind on that weekend group ride again?
If you’re recuperating after an illness, or just getting into condition, ride in assist mode and have a lot more fun!
Why use Thundrblade:
Use the assist mode to warm up safely and then use your own power to skate.
Go offroad with ease. BMX trails, parks, rougher country trails are not a problem with offroad wheels.
Give your dog a workout too! Watch how Daniel e-skates with his dog.
 Let them try to catch you!

Explore!
If you love exploring new cities, it’s time for Thundrblade. Experience urban areas, parks or even countryside without your feet hurting after a long day of sightseeing! Watch how Daniel explored Tokyo, Osaka and even Aoi Matsuri festival in Kyoto.

Why use Thundrblade:
See more landmarks and sights in a day
Get a unique “feel” for the city
With motors on your feet you don’t feel the weight of your backpack
Take things off the road with our offroad wheels! Watch a video of a BMX trail ride.

Imagine how much you could see at a fair :) Get to know your city a lot better!
Tinkerer
Have you seen our motorized frames and immediately thought of ways to use them in your own skate rigs? Do you want them completely your way? By all means, start crafting!
Why use Thundrblade:
Try out many rigs! Our carbon frame is compatible with most skate boots on the market and two wheel sizes. Watch a wheel and boot change on the early prototypes(final design will change).

No need to compromise! Build what suits you. See what you can create with our motorized inline frames. Back the Thundrblade Frame System perk and receive a pair of frames, batteries, wheels all the tools necessary. We won’t even assemble them together for you!
ElecTricks
With Thundrblade, you can do a host of tricks! While not suitable for grinding, a lot of fun awaits you, especially with the LED wheels. What can I do with my Thundrblades?
Check out the LED wheel fun

Ever tried going 25mph fast in reverse?
Skated with only one Thundrblade?
Skate off-road

Have a lightsaber duel!

Jump obstacles and ramps with more speed.
 
Kill the boredom, have some fun and make awesome trick videos yourself with the Thundrblade Complete Setup perk - a set of blades, a Carbon Fiber freestyle boot, offroad and LED wheels. You can’t grind, but you can fly!
 
How it works
Thundrblade is a "Frame System" which means all the electronics, batteries and motors are inside the frame. You can use your preferred skate boot with Thundrblade or you can get our Complete Setup that comes with high-end carbon fiber skate boots so you can Thundrblade right out-of-the-box.
Compatible with UFS and SSM 165mm


Examples of boots

 
Push the Wireless Remote Controller stick forward to accelerate and pull it back to brake. The brake is especially useful on long descents since you can control your speed safely maintaining both feet on the ground and optimal body balance.


 
To go in reverse the same logic applies, pull backward. When in Reverse push forward to brake.

 
LED Wheels increase visibility and safety for night skating.

 
Thundrblade also comes with off-road tires.
 
 
You can skate normally or use the motors at any time. Our exclusive motor disengage system allows skating without any resistance when using human power just like a normal skate

 
Swap batteries on the fly for an unlimited range.

 
Uphills are officially fun! Thundrblade can go up inclines of up to 20% rate.

 
Thundrblade can handle jumps and urban skating. This makes easy to avoid obstacles such as curbs and oncoming traffic.

 
What do people say about Thundrblade “When dreams finally become reality.”
Zach Ralston
“I need these in my life.... but like now, not next year :D”
Chris Dennis 
"Amazing!﻿"
Andra Leys de Andrade
"This is the future! Great job and thanks for making my dream of seeing motorised skates a reality!﻿"
 
Konarali​
"This is the dream﻿​"
 
hapaboy99​
"I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR THIS GOD BLESS YOU PEOPLE﻿"
 
Jun Minami​
 
Watch Ken’s testimonial:
Please turn on subtitles for this video on the little gear on the bottom right of the video player.

More reviews:
Tiago Inline Skater review:

The Lino Life review:


 

It's about time
E-boards have been on the market for over a decade and e-skates are still nowhere to be found. Let's put inline skating back on the map!
Since Thundrblade is actually easier to skate than normal inline skates, it has the potential to appeal to people that would never skate otherwise. We will take inline skating to people that have never skated before.
We've had test riders with no previous skating experience being able to ride Thundrblade in about 10 minutes on average.
 
Back Thundrblade today
We have been working hard, with no funds or fancy tools, for the past 2 years to bring this dream to reality. More than 20 prototypes and countless tests later, we have a great prototype. Now is the time to show the world that skating is the best way to move around, both for leisure and transportation! For that, we need funding, and only you can help us make this happen! Back us or refer us to friends, and then storm the streets on Thundrblades!
 
Referrals - How to win a FREE Thundrblade pair.
From June 5th until June 25th you can get other people to contribute to the campaign using your Personal Referral Link.
Their contributions will accumulate until June 25th if they access the campaign page using your Personal Referal Link.
Every 100 Dollars accumulated from contributions through your Personal Referal Link, you will earn 10$ off your next purchase.

Every 5000 Dollars accumulated through your Personal Referral Link, will earn you a FREE PAIR OF THUNDRBLADE, plus all the discounts accumulated.

All the referral rules are in the campaign update #03
Watch the following video to learn how to get your Personal Referral Link. Must be a backer to participate.
 

 
 
Stretch goals
These are features we will only be able to implement if we get enough funds. Let's keep sharing so we can make it through all of the goals to have a better product for everyone.

150k
LED wheel color choice available.

Choose from white, blue and red.

200k
Electric Assist Mode. 

The electric assist mode will require aditional R&D, and a custom electronic project, so we will need more funds to put it into the first generation.
This mode will allow the skater to just skate normally and have the motors extend their gliding phase making uphills feels like flats and flats like downhills. No worrying about accelerating, but you can still use the remote to brake.

250k
Automatic Motor Disengage

The motor will automatically engage when accelerating or braking, but it will disengage for cruising without resistance. This will increase the range by about 10% and give a more natural feeling of skating.
 
 
Prototype Gallery

 

Risks & Challenges
There is still some more R&D to be done before production. We will make custom motors, batteries, and electronics. Prototyping these custom components may take up more time than expected due to unforeseen circumstances.
Our partners have a lot of experience in manufacturing and crowdfunding, so you can rest assured we will be able to overcome all the hurdles and deliver a great product.

Common Fibers designs and develops products utilizing fully carbon fiber designs.  While becoming the leading name in the carbon fiber consumer goods space, Common Fibers is excited to partner with Thundrblade to bring this amazing idea to reality. With Common Fibers' help, your pair of Thundrblades will hold up to years of use. 


Other Ways You Can Help
Please back us by any amount, just click on the pink button "BACK IT" at the top right of the page and choose the perk you can.
Share our campaign with your friends and family. Remember to use Indiegogo's share tools right beside the pink "BACK IT" button. 
We want to hear from you. If you have any ideas, suggestions or want to ask something, please don't hesitate to contact us via the contact form or by emailing us: info@thundrblade.com
We value and appreciate all your feedback.

T-shirt

FAQs
Q: Can I skate normally with Thundrblade?
A: Yes, Thundrblade is designed to skate just like a normal inline skate when you want to or when batteries are dead.
Q: Do you ship worldwide?
Yes, we will ship worldwide.
Q: How much is the shipping cost?
A: The shipping cost will be paid before we ship your Thundrblade, we didn't add it into our Indiegogo campaign just to make sure you don't pay more than you need, we will ship it with the lowest rate possible in April 2019 to your country.
Q: Is Thundrblade hard to learn?
A: Thundrblade is easier to skate than a normal inline skate since it has regen brakes, and you don't need one-foot balance to push. We will have video tutorials on how to ride and skate with Thundrblade.
Q: Can I grind with Thundrblade?
A: No, Thundrblade is not meant for grinding.
Q: Can I do tricks/jumps with Thundrblade?
A: Yes, Thundrblade can withstand anything a normal Urban skate can. It can handle tricks and jumps
Q: Can I Thundrblade if it's rainy outside?
A: Thundrblade components can withstand rain, but the motors and brakes will not work optimally when the pavement is wet. We advise the use of off-road tires and disengage of the motor for wet pavement skating.
Q: What happens when I need spare batteries or parts later in the future?
A: We will sell all the parts including the batteries on our website
Q: If I break my remote controller will I be able to order a new one?
A: Yes, we will offer replacement controllers on our website.
Q: Can I test ride a Thundrblade?
A: Unfortunately we have only one prototype available right now, so test riding is going to be difficult until we have the production version ready.
Q:  What is the max weight limit for Thundrblade?
A: The maximum weight limit is 120kg/270pounds
Q: Does Thundrblade come in different sizes? 
A: Thundrblade frame is only one size, but our complete setup has all shoe sizes from US 6/EU 38 to US10.5 EU 44. Refer to the sizing chart bellow. If you have feet bigger or smaller than this we suggest getting the Thundrblade Frame System option and looking for a skate boot from a different brand.

Q: How much doesThundrblade weigh?
A: Thundrblade is 2.3kg/5 pounds for each foot in a complete setup including boots and batteries, the same as a normal aggressive inline skate.
Q: What is the range per fully charged battery?
A: In 100% electric mode is 12km/7miles, in assist mode is 20~30km/13~20 miles depending on how much the skater pushes with their own power.
Q: What is "Regenerative Braking"?
A: When you brake Thundrblade, it uses its motors to apply resistance to the wheels generating electricity in the process. This electricity is put into the batteries recharging them.
Q: Can I recharge the batteries skating using the Regenerative Brakes?
A: Yes, you could, but it would take a really long time. Regenerative brakes extend the total range of Thundrblade, especially in the case of a really long downhill where you control your speed using the regenerative brakes.
Q: How long does it take to charge the battery?
A: The Thundrblade battery pair charges fully in around 2 hours
Q: Can I order spare batteries/charger?
A: Yes. There's a perk for extra batteries, just add the value to your pledge.
Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?
A: The backer is responsible for import duties and taxes, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. 
Q: Can I buy Thundrblade in bulk to sell in my country?
A: Yes, you can. There's a reward with 5 pairs, or send us an email to info@thundrblade.com and we will get back to you.
Q: Can I get a refund?
A: Please refer to Indiegogo's policy here

story:
website: www.frizon.cn

PROTOTYPE:

We made prototype with 4.97 inch transparent AMOLED.

Mass production will be using 6 inch screen.

FRIZON is a futuristic HeadUp Display with a transparent screen as display medium and technologies including gesture control, speech recognition and Cloud, providing services for navigation, telephone, message alerts, music, radio, vehicle information monitor, automobile data recorder and driving data Cloud analysis.

With FRIZON, your car will become a smart one leading you a premium driving experience that more than safer.

FRIZON works with vehicle simultaneously, the screen will automatically rise when the engine starts up, and the screen will automatically lay down when the engine is off. With the humanization design ,the screen is manually adjustable that the angle and position will automatically remember.

Activate the functions of interface switching, navigation, music and phone calls by gesture and speech with high recognition accuracy. Imagine just shake your hand at the front of the screen then the music changed, or let's say "FRIZON, please play the next song" like Siri, it's easy.

The built-in GPS and MAPS provide you accurate piece-wise navigation display to prevent you from missing any important intersection.

Speed, engine RPM, tire pressure, coolant temperature, fuel consumption, mileage, etc. will show on the screen other than bothering to look at the dashboard.

FRIZON helps to make or answer calls easily or listen to music when navigation is performed but keep the route displaying on the screen, the phone-call voice via FRIZON is clear by using MEMS microphone.

Massages and notifications of social software on the phone will be displayed ,FRIZON will read them out that you don't have to check on your phone.

Local or online music, radio broadcasting are available on FRIZON.

The HIFI module is employed to offer better sound quality. Connect FRIZON with  your car to play sound via Bluetooth, AUX, and enjoy the beautiful sound !

Detailed vehicle data and driving data will be collected through OBD that grants you a clear and intuitive picture of the car and your driving habits. You can get those data by referring to the APP any time and any where.

FRIZON keeps recoding happenings all the way on to prevent driving accidents and disputes and share anything interesting or scenery during the journey.

On the basic of the report GLOBAL STATUS REPORT ON ROAD SAFETY by the World Health Organization, 130 million people died in traffic accidents in 2015, which has become the most outstanding cause of death for people aged from 15 to 29.

Suppose that you are driving a car at a speed of 60MPH that means the car moves 85 feet per second. For a glimpse on the instrument or the phone for two seconds, the car may well move forward nearly passing two basketball courts, during which you may fail to respond to any emergency and run into dangers. In this regard, FRIZON is developed to help you keep focusing on the road.

FRIZON resembles a car-doctor , it specially maintains a healthy state of the car. Car dashboard will indicate certain car troubles, though, that is far from sufficient. Like on a half way, the car may come across a break down and the dashboard invisible, which provokes somehow a headache. But with FRIZON, an overall solution is provided. It will detect if there is any electrical failure in different systems such as ignition, air conditioning and emission and so on during driving. Besides that, it will continuously monitor indicators of the car including voltage and coolant temperature, and pops up timely with a reminder once an exception occurs.

You may find it difficult to remember data such as mileage and volume of fuel consumption on a monthly basis. FRIZON like a car manager will surely put you at ease as it will accurately keep record of driving data, for which you can refer to the APP and share the information freely. In addition to these basics, FRIZON will also work statistics on data of driving habits such as average speed, maximum speed, times of rapid acceleration / rapid deceleration and time of speeding and the like to help the driver better understand and improve driving habits.

The effect of HUD display is essential. In the preliminary research, multiple proposals for HUD display are tested including LCD, DLP, LCoS and TFT, which turn out to be either obscure in the sun, unstable in the hot summer or with a small viewing angle that the prevents the person from watching the screen clearly. For sake of perfection these proposals are given up though they may perform well under certain conditions. Finally a transparent display screen is proposed and is believed to be the best one for HUD as all defects are therefore resolved. As guaranteed, FRIZON can provide the best display effect and stability even in bright sunlight. The driver can adjust the seat freely without adjusting the screen each time accordingly. The temperature range for stable operation covers as wide as from -49 to 185 Fahrenheit degree to adapt to the coldest in winter and the hottest in summer. This explains the magic of FRIZON.

We did the first generation before.Excellent industrial designers, hardware engineers, software engineers and cloud engineers have been engaged in the development of HUD with transparent screen since 2014 ,we carried out the first generation of products. The first one connects the phone via Bluetooth and relies on navigator on the mobile to display navigation information, and accesses to data such as speed and rotational speed and the like from the car computer via OBD, wining great response in the market. However, shortcomings exist including a small screen and absence of built-in navigator.

Therefore, development on the second generation –FRIZON has been carried out in April 2015. Based on the first generation, various crucial technologies has been accumulated to assist for the development of Frizon in the light of collection of data of the car, adaptation to car models, processing  of navigation information and adaptation to mobile phone models.

Significant improvement has been achieved in FRIZON in all aspects including screen technology, built-in navigator, music, radio and other entertainment systems, cloud connectivity and driving record, making it a truly intelligent HUD. With more than one year of development, the cause of FRIZON is coming to production, a moment that calls for your help to promote this technology to the market for more people to enjoy pleasant driving experiences and even save young lives.

A lot of difficulties have been overcome in the development process of FRIZON.

For example, center console made of ordinary ABS material may come with slight deformation if under sun exposure for a long time in the summer as it is the hottest part in a car. In this regard, PC material is used to for its resistance to high temperature and all other internal components are tested at high temperatures, enabling it to achieve the vehicle regulatory standards for normal operation at 185 Fahrenheit degree.

Another example is that at night time the screen emitting light will cause a reflection on the front windshield and thus some problems. Multiple solutions are tested and finally a tailor-made optical film is used to attach to the surface of the screen to completely eliminate such reflection.

And in a durability test for the motor that controls the automatic lifting of the screen, gear teeth snap occurs. Therefore, tests have been carried out on dozens of motors, among which a motor with an internal structure of full copper is selected as it ensures the stability of the automatic lifting system of the screen.

With respect to the design of Screen UI, simplicity and cool features are focused at core and any complicated information will run contrary to the original intention of the product. The key information is displayed on the most appropriate design. Certainly, you may change it in the APP if it is not his appetite.

You can switch each function through Infrared-based gesture recognition that ensures that even in the case of dim lights in the tunnel or at night the gesture can be accurately identified every time.

All these above are details indeed as great importance is attached to them trying the best to achieve and provide perfect products and services.

In fact it varies a lot between sample development and mass production, for the latter well control on the molds and processing quality as well as the supply chain and the like are required. And cost will increase if failing to reach the required volume of stock. In this regard, risks are well reduced thanks to experiences of massive production for the first generation of product and cooperation with Japanese teams. Your help matters more as with more supporters, the risk goes down and the cost likewise.

We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way.

We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

Can GPS navigation be able to use  when there is no network services?

Yes. You can save the offline map in advance to the FRIZON device, so you can use the navigation function at any time.

Where can GPS navigation be used ?

Currently it can use FRIZON navigation as long as google map supports the area. Subsequently we will be based on the needs of users to support more areas. 

May FRIZON interfere with my sight when driving ? 

FRIZON using a transparent display, so that you can observe the information and road surface at the same time, will not affect your sight, and to provide you with a safe and comfortable driving experience. 

Which mobile phone system is FRIZON adaptive to?

FRIZON is compatible with Android and apple devices.

Is there a traffic camera in FRIZON?

Yes,FRIZON camera is used to record video or image, you can view and share through APP.

What are the technical parameters of FRIZON?

Part of the technical parameters may be changed according to the overall design of the product, the specific technical parameters will be subject to the final product.

Can FRIZON upgrade?

Sure,you can upgrade the FRIZON system through the network, and you can automatically update or set up your own manual updates. 

If there are other issues, please contact the FRIZON team, our email address:

IGG-SUPPORT@frizon.cn

Your help matters more as with more supporters, the risk goes down and the cost likewise.We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way.We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!Can GPS navigation be able to use  when there is no network services?Yes. You can save the offline map in advance to the FRIZON device, so you can use the navigation function at any time.Where can GPS navigation be used ?Currently it can use FRIZON navigation as long as google map supports the area. Subsequently we will be based on the needs of users to support more areas. May FRIZON interfere with my sight when driving ? FRIZON using a transparent display, so that you can observe the information and road surface at the same time, will not affect your sight, and to provide you with a safe and comfortable driving experience. Which mobile phone system is FRIZON adaptive to?FRIZON is compatible with Android and apple devices.Is there a traffic camera in FRIZON?Yes,FRIZON camera is used to record video or image, you can view and share through APP.What are the technical parameters of FRIZON?Part of the technical parameters may be changed according to the overall design of the product, the specific technical parameters will be subject to the final product.Can FRIZON upgrade?Sure,you can upgrade the FRIZON system through the network, and you can automatically update or set up your own manual updates. If there are other issues, please contact the FRIZON team, our email address:IGG-SUPPORT@frizon.cn

story:
Disclaimer:  Moboster is NOT another electric skateboard, if you're looking for just another electric skateboard, we are sorry to disappoint.

 

 

With a unique drive system often used in robotics, the Moboster doesn't require tilting, shifting, or balancing to steer, making it extremely stable and easy to master.  All maneuvering is done through a specially-designed remote control.

 

You don't even need to be on the Moboster to drive it.

 

When you power up, the dual-motor back wheels auto-start in brake mode, so you can step on with confidence.  Anyone can learn to ride the Moboster in SECONDS.

 

Lightweight and foldable, the Moboster goes where you go. You’ll never have to worry about where to leave your vehicle again.

 

Above deck add-ons and hardware upgrades allow Moboster to be more than just a one-use vehicle, but instead, a multi-purpose moving platform.

*The handlebar in the image is a sample design and will be redesigned before final production.

Handlebars, seats, cargo containers, camera stabilizers, and whatever you can think of, can all be attached in place with the Attachment Socket.  We personally would love to make the Go-Kart seats when we can.

 

The Upgrade Port, situated at the front of Moboster, allows future hardware add-ons to fully utilize the vehicle's robotic drive system,  unleashing its true potential.  Here are some examples:

We believe the upgrades and add-ons as the true value of Moboster and is working hard to bring them to our users as quickly as possible.  With your support, Moboster can start auto-following you in no time!

 

The 5V USB Power Output designed to charge the remote control can also charge all your electronic goodies.  The high capacity battery can charge an iPhone 7 from empty to full 22 times. Your phone will never run out of juice again.

 

Quick Specs 

*We limited the top speed and diverted power to torque to keep Moboster safe and highly maneuverable in urban environments.

 

What can Moboster do for you now?

  • Daily commuters can easily carry Moboster onto buses or subways without bumping into someone with their vehicle.
  • Students can save time and energy from walking around big campuses.  Moboster can easily be stored in lockers or under your seats.
  • Drivers can leave Moboster in the trunk in case of unexpected empty gas, or when you can't find a good parking space.
  • Carrying heavy groceries to your car will be a breeze.
  • Kids will have a blast sitting on the Moboster and ride it like a giant RC car.

How would you use your Moboster?

 

What makes the Moboster so easy to ride? 

Riding on four wheels, the Moboster has an obvious advantage towards stability.  But unlike skateboards, the robotic drive system maneuvers by using wheel speed differentiation and it's controlled by a precision Bluetooth remote, eliminating the need to shift your balance to turn.  Moboster stays parallel to the ground at all times.

 

The Remote-Controller also have a Crusie Control button for those wide open roads.


While riding, the front wheel sensors constantly monitor alignment, and through advanced algorithms, adjust individual motor speed accordingly to eliminate front wheel drag and misalignment.

 

Portability is practicality

In order to blend seamlessly with each rider’s commuting preferences, keeping the Moboster portable was crucial.  We want the Moboster to be right there whenever you need it.  By using premium materials such as carbon fiber and heat-treated aluminum, combined with amazing engineering, the Moboster weighs less than half of a hoverboard but can carry weights up to 330 lbs. 

The foldable body allow easy storage and carrying without sacrificing standing space.  While riding, the dual-lock mechanism keeps Moboster flat and away from unexpected folding.  The locks can be quickly disengaged with a simple lever at the front of the Moboster.

 

Small socket, big revolution

The on-deck attachment socket can house various add-on accessories like handlebars, seats, and much more.  The Moboster’s unique drive system, flat stable surface, and its 330-lbs payload capacity together ensure that you are no longer confined to use your vehicle one way, instead, it comes with endless possibilities.  

 

Smart vehicles get smarter

With its robot-like maneuverability, the true potential of the Moboster lies in the capacity to take on additional hardware and sensors so it can continuously evolve and transform itself.   The CAN Bus Upgrade Port would allow multiple sensors to communicate with the microcontroller through a single pathway, and custom software API will ensure easy integration.  Moboster will become the core platform for a new generation of modular transportation. We plan to work with the developer community to create a fascinating future for the Moboster.

 

 

Quality without a big price tag

Crafted by a team of professionals who have worked for renowned tech and auto organizations like Tesla, ASUS, and NASA, the highest standards in engineering and design can be expected from the Moboster. As a startup situated in OEM central, Taiwan, the Moboster is built with quality parts you’ll find in many smartphones or pretty much any modern computer, and with amazingly affordable pricing.

 

Kevin Chiu - Founder of Moboster

As a serial entrepreneur, Kevin has run both digital and hardware tech startups, giving him extensive knowledge of the development and sourcing processes.  His passion and resourcefulness have driven him to accomplish goals requiring skill sets far different from his previous studies and line of work. 

Kevin’s love for travel has taken him all over the world. He’s lived in Canada, Japan, and Taiwan extensively.  Having experienced diverse urban living environments and all sorts of methods of transport, he still wasn't able to find a satisfying "last-mile" vehicle that could aid him in short distance travels.  Kevin wanted something portable and reliable, a device that wouldn’t require constant focus on balance and exhaust him before reaching his destination. He wanted something that would give him the freedom to go anywhere quickly, without being limited by where the bus stop is, or finding a close enough parking space.  After three years of intensive development, the Moboster was born. 

 

Gearlab - Industrial Design

Gearlab is an industrial design agency that has won numerous international awards including Red Dot and iF awards.  Their work is sophisticated and elegant, while at the same time, keeping ergonomics and user experiences at the core.  The founders of Gearlab are passionate about outdoor activities and have a line of urban bicycles, which made the collaboration with Moboster a great fit.

 

Engineering Team

Moboster wouldn't be possible without the incredible work from a talented team of engineers. Led by an ex-Tesla engineer, the team has extensive experience with electric vehicles and motorsports. They continuously pursue the highest standards of quality and ingenuity.  All of the engineers have previously worked on projects that went into mass production, and the Moboster won't be an exception.  The company behind the team is currently going through VC evaluation and funding and thus wishes to remain anonymous for the time being.

 

 

Moboster is currently a fully functional prototype built with mass production specifications.  Our team of engineers has extensive manufacturing and sourcing experience, so we are very confident that the Moboster can and will be produced.  The challenge will be to match our quality standards with the timeline for development and tooling, and this is where funding becomes most necessary.  With substantial funding, we can accomplish more by using advanced tooling methods and shorten the adjustment time, meaning there will be more time to ensure the final product is on par with our quality standards.  The biggest risk will be during the manufacturing process, where delays could happen due to reasons outside of our control.

 

We have many great plans for Moboster.  This is just the beginning!  The unique natures of Moboster's functionality will allow an incredible amount of extended usage via software and hardware upgrades.  We want to collaborate with developers from diverse categories such as robotics, IoT, autonomous driving, just to name a few.  But we can't do this without your support. You can help us by backing a perk or simply share our campaign to your friends.   We promise the future for Moboster will be an interesting one, and we hope you can join us on the adventure,  Thank you for supporting Moboster.

 

Q. Is Moboster an electric skateboard?

A. Not at all.  Moboster was designed from the ground up and relies on a very different drive system to maneuver when compared to an electric skateboard.

 

Q. What makes Moboster different from other electric rideables?

A. Moboster is a unique platform that utilizes a robotic drive system very similar to ones you see in most wheeled robots (like the ones you see in battlebots).

 

Q. What’s so good about robotic drive systems?

A. The system uses wheel speed differentiation to turn left and right, which means Moboster stays parallel to the ground at all times.

 

Q. What’s wheel speed differentiation?

A. The difference in individual wheel speed.  Moboster is powered by two motorized rear wheels, and when one wheel turns slower than the other, it creates drag and turns the vehicle.

 

Q. How much weight can Moboster hold?

A. Moboster is built to withstand 330 lbs of payload.

 

Q. Why is the top speed only 10 mph?

A. Moboster is designed to operate in urban environments, often crowded with pedestrians and obstacles.  To keep Moboster safe for both the rider and others around the vehicle, we have limited the top speed to 10 mph.

 

Q. How long does the battery last?

A. Moboster can run for 11.2 miles on a single charge.  The range varies with road conditions and incline.

 

Q. Why doesn’t Moboster have more range?

A. We wanted to keep Moboster lightweight and portable, so we had to balance between range and weight.  Moboster uses the most advanced battery systems available with the highest power density, but unfortunately, the range is still limited by current battery technology.  Also, in our studies, most use case scenarios for small electric rideables won’t go over the 10 miles range.

 

Q. Is the battery swappable?

A. Currently no.  Swappable batteries require more moving parts and separable connectors, which can become highly unreliable due to vibration.  In order to eliminate vibration, it would mean more parts to secure the batteries and thus making Moboster heavier.

 

Q. How did you keep the price low?

A. Our engineers are all seasoned professionals who are highly experienced with sourcing and manufacturing.  Our headquarter is located in Taiwan, where a lot of the high-end electronics are manufactured.  Being close to our supply chain also cuts a lot of the cost down.

 

Q. How can you guarantee that Moboster will be delivered?

A. All our engineers have worked on products that went into mass production, and Moboster won’t be an exception.

 

Q. Did Moboser’s lead engineer really worked for NASA?

A. Yes he did.

 

Q. When will the attachments and hardware upgrades be available?

A. We have many of them planned, and once we have our initial funding, we’ll get designing right away.  This is also why this campaign is so important to us, it speeds up the creation of all the neat things that can be added to the Moboster.

 

Q. Why aren’t there any stretch goals?

A. We want to be focused on making the best product possible within the timeline we have set, stretch goals would bring a lot of uncertainties to that.  So for now, no stretch goals are planned.  But, that’s not set in stone.

 

Q. How will I keep the firmware updated?  Will there be a phone app?

A. Yes, a phone app is in the plan, and we’ll reveal the app as soon as it’s ready for the public.  The app will be able to update Moboster’s firmware, along with other fun tweaks, either through WiFi or Bluetooth.  We also have an extra secret sauce called Particle Electron, and will reveal more on that later on as well.

story:
The best thing is that you don’t have to use credit cards as you pay in cash and you don’t get to pay until you are in the car. This saves you many hassles of making a purchase before your passengers get in the vehicle, which can often lead to complications and arguments.

Let's support carpool without intermediaries! because yesterday they asked 15%. today 20%. and tomorrow? Companies not making profit chronically can just rise those fees and they are already doing it. Unlock your abundance by not paying any fees. Reward your local economy: don't loose 20% or more every time. WE can do it.

This is the alternative that everyone needs to start using because it allows drivers and passengers to improve their economy. The passengers save by only paying the driver and the drivers increase their economy by keeping their earnings and providing an even better service to their clients.  

You can get in touch via Facebook, Whatsapp, Viber and mobile devices with no limitations and no moderation, but the best part of it all is that there are no fees at all!

We are looking for people who are interesting in backing up this project because they see the value in carpooling and the value in networking too!

This is your chance to help get rid of the middleman and keep things entirely between the driver and the passengers!

This is going to encourage a much better economy and a much better lifestyle!

Uber drivers are using this trick to make sure the company doesn’t underpay them

freeecar.com - keep running the NO FEE carsharing Worldwide

FreeeCar started in December 2016 from our passion for traveling and our desire to offer a good and free carpool service. With NO any fee.

Share Car Cost, with NO Fee

Our Goal is to provide free carsharing as a new community experience for all travelers all around the World.

Give all money to the driver and avoid paying any Fees to some companies

Enpower your local economy by not paying any fee between 10 and 50%. All money to the driver, please! More money to drivers!

CHOOSE travel mates and discover more about them

Speak them freely. With NO limitations or moderators. It's a new dimension to live 100% your travel experience even before the travel. Because it's important to discover the best travel mates for you. We give you the opportunity to get a full communication before traveling. And it can be done for free. From today you can save a lot of money and travel comfortable.

The more we are the more effective it is. Let's create the biggest free carsharing community

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need tons of likes and shares and YOUR support
  • We provide an effective alternative way of transportation with NO fee and no Middleman!
  • Bond and network with others NO moderators & save hassles, complications & arguments
  • Save a lot of money and improve passegers and drivers economy

The Impact

  • In 2008 we successfully founded the free website Emacchinari the most visited website to sell used machinery in Italy
  • This project is already growing with limited funds. We needs more funds as the goal to keep out the middleman is a big deal that can be done with a bit larger support thanks to my marketing background
  • Discover the best travel mates
  • Save € / $ / £ every time you move
  • Let's change the carsharing rules together
  • Add carsharings requests and find offers for free
  • Moving is better while sharing emotions during the journey

Risks & Challenges

The more we are the more effective carsharing WITH NO FEE will be. We want to grow this project enough to be indipendent from any kind of funding by 2 years.

The raised money will be used:

  1. to promote (half of the money for marketing in the Country of fundraisers and half in for worldwide developement)
  2. to add new functions to the website

Other Ways You Can Help FreeCar

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Sharing in Facebook, Twitter, newspapers and blogs can help us
  • Share this fundraising campaign at the maximum level
  • Post your travel journey in freeecar
  • Moving is about sharing emotions. Let's move today for a more democratic and people's carpool with no fee www.freeecar.com

 

------------------------------------------

ESPANOL - SPANISH

------------------------------------------

Visita freeecar.com - sige difundiendo el servicio de los coches compartidos SIN CUOTA en todo el mundo

FreeeCar empezo en Deciembre 2016 con la pasion por los viajes y el deseo de ofrecir un extraordinario servicio  SIN CUOTAS para compartir a los coches. 

Comparte a los Gastos del Coche, sin Cuota

Eso quieremos hacerlo. Para todo el mundo

Dejar todo el dinero al conductor y no pagar algo a companias

Porque eso reinforca la economia local, gastos de eso tipo enfluyen entre el 10 y el 50%. Todo el dinero tiene que ir al conductor, por favor!

Mira a este articulo - Uber drivers are using this trick to make sure the company doesn’t underpay them

ELIGE a los companeros de viaje y descubre mas sobre de ellos

Un sistema mas abierto. Donde se puede contactar liberamente. Sin Blokeos, Limitaciones y moderadores. Porque es MAS democratico. Una mejor experiencia que empieza desde antes de viajar. Encuentrar a los mejores companeros de viaje es muy importante. El carpooling no es un servicio de Taxi si no una ocasion para vivir al 100%. Ahorra mucho dinero y vive una experiencia unica desde hoy!

Lo mas somos lo mas efectivo es. Vamos a crear una comunidad que no existia, la del coche compartido mundial y gratis FreeeCar

Que Necesitamos Y Que Recibes

  • Necesitamos > crecer con campanias promocionales, likes y compartir
  • Necesitamos > contribuciones para promover el Carpool Gratuito en todo el mundo y mejorarlo
  • Que recibes: una modalidad de transporte alternativa y gratis
  • Que recibes: Encuentras mas rapido y facil a los companeros para compartir el coche
  • Que recibes: Encuentra mas viajes y mas facil
  • Que recibes: AHORRAS MUCHO DINERO y LO DEJAS TODO ENTRE DE LA TUYA COMUNIDAD

El Impacto

  • En 2008 creiamos Emacchinari la pagina mas visitada en Italia para vendere maquinarias usadas
  • Compartir Coches puede ser SIN CUOTA
  • Descubrir MAS companeros de viaje
  • Ahorrar € / $ / £ cada vez que viajas
  • Vamos a cambiar las reglas del "compartir coche" juntos
  • Anadje pedidas y ofertas de coches compartidos ahora y gratis

​Riesgos Y Desafios

Lo MAS somos MAS es efectivo el servicio. Quieremos render el projecto indipendiente de todas formas de crowdfunding en 2 anos. En este tiempo vamos a anadirle nuevas funciones y crecer en numeros. 

  • Inviatamos a todos los pasajeros y conductores en participar en este projecto
  • Crear una alternativa al transporte. PAGANDO SOLO AL CONDUCTOR
  • Tenemos una vision mundial

Otras formas para Ayudar FreeeCar

Si no puedes enviar tu contributo, eso no significa que no puedes ayudar:

  • Anadie te en la pagina Facebook FREEECAR.com www.fb.me/Freeecar
  • Escribe en eventos de facebook y en grupos de coche compartido - informa las personas de la existencia de FreeeCar para hacerle ahorrar el 10-50% del total spectante a los conductores
  • Haz Twitte y escribe a periodicos y blogs y youtubers todo eso
  • Haz un poco de fracaso allì a fuera sobre de la campania de FreeeCar
  • Comparte la campania de crowdunding the FREEECAR en IndieGoGo igg.me/at/Freeecar
  • Utiliza a los instrumentos de Indiegogo para compartir y defundir al mensaje (y a todos los instrumentos que puedas encontrar allà afuera!

The best thing is that you don’t have to use credit cards as you pay in cash and you don’t get to pay until you are in the car. This saves you many hassles of making a purchase before your passengers get in the vehicle, which can often lead to complications and arguments.
Let's support carpool without intermediaries! because yesterday they asked 15%. today 20%. and tomorrow? Companies not making profit chronically can just rise those fees and they are already doing it. Unlock your abundance by not paying any fees. Reward your local economy: don't loose 20% or more every time. WE can do it.
This is the alternative that everyone needs to start using because it allows drivers and passengers to improve their economy. The passengers save by only paying the driver and the drivers increase their economy by keeping their earnings and providing an even better service to their clients.  
You can get in touch via Facebook, Whatsapp, Viber and mobile devices with no limitations and no moderation, but the best part of it all is that there are no fees at all!
We are looking for people who are interesting in backing up this project because they see the value in carpooling and the value in networking too!
This is your chance to help get rid of the middleman and keep things entirely between the driver and the passengers!
This is going to encourage a much better economy and a much better lifestyle!
Uber drivers are using this trick to make sure the company doesn’t underpay them


freeecar.com - keep running the NO FEE carsharing Worldwide
FreeeCar started in December 2016 from our passion for traveling and our desire to offer a good and free carpool service. With NO any fee.
Share Car Cost, with NO Fee
Our Goal is to provide free carsharing as a new community experience for all travelers all around the World.
Give all money to the driver and avoid paying any Fees to some companies
Enpower your local economy by not paying any fee between 10 and 50%. All money to the driver, please! More money to drivers!
CHOOSE travel mates and discover more about them
Speak them freely. With NO limitations or moderators. It's a new dimension to live 100% your travel experience even before the travel. Because it's important to discover the best travel mates for you. We give you the opportunity to get a full communication before traveling. And it can be done for free. From today you can save a lot of money and travel comfortable.
The more we are the more effective it is. Let's create the biggest free carsharing community

What We Need & What You Get

We need tons of likes and shares and YOUR support

We provide an effective alternative way of transportation with NO fee and no Middleman!
Bond and network with others NO moderators & save hassles, complications & arguments
Save a lot of money and improve passegers and drivers economy



The Impact

In 2008 we successfully founded the free website Emacchinari the most visited website to sell used machinery in Italy
This project is already growing with limited funds. We needs more funds as the goal to keep out the middleman is a big deal that can be done with a bit larger support thanks to my marketing background
Discover the best travel mates
Save € / $ / £ every time you move
Let's change the carsharing rules together
Add carsharings requests and find offers for free
Moving is better while sharing emotions during the journey


Risks & Challenges
The more we are the more effective carsharing WITH NO FEE will be. We want to grow this project enough to be indipendent from any kind of funding by 2 years.

to promote (half of the money for marketing in the Country of fundraisers and half in for worldwide developement)
to add new functions to the website

Sharing in Facebook, Twitter, newspapers and blogs can help us
Share this fundraising campaign at the maximum level
Post your travel journey in freeecar

story:
Uber has been one of the biggest enablers of free-market capitalism in the last decade, allowing persons with just the use of their car and smartphone, to successfully launch their own business, work their own hours, earn a decent wage, and take charge of their lives. As Ethiopia continues to strive for economic development and the betterment of its people, we look to create similar opportunities within our country. My name is Habtamu Tadesse, founder of ZayRide, and I am currently on the fast track to transforming the taxi hailing sector in Ethiopia.

Since its launch in our capital city of Addis Ababa, ZayRide has already gained over 15,000 registered users, and completed over 1000 rides. Feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, with persons spending less times waiting for taxis, no longer needing to walk long distances to main roads just to get a ride. Safety is one of our biggest concerns, and drivers go through extensive background checks, so we know who they are, where they are, and what they look like. The ZayRide app itself has been built to function on slower internet speeds, so it has the potential to be applied anywhere in Africa, with minimalized features and low resolution images.

Although we have managed to grow the business to it’s current level of success, I believe that ZayRide, that began with nothing more than my own personal savings, has the potential to go much further. That is why I have begun this campaign, in the hopes of raising US$100,000.

With the funds raised, I am hoping to hire a software engineer and developer to further improve upon the existing app interface. I am also in the process of trying to set up a ZayRide call center, that would not only provide much needed jobs, but allow persons without smart phones to call and request our service. In an effort to help spread the love, we would also like to implement a training course, that would teach local drivers to speak basic English – a necessary skill in the third largest international diplomatic community in the world.

To those who donate, thank you for your contribution, and I hope that you will continue to follow ZayRide’s progress in the coming year. Even if you are unable to donate at this time, sharing this campaign with family and friends would go a long way in helping to spread the word. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to send a message. Ethiopia has one of the fastest growing economies in the world, let us help it grow a little faster.

Habtamu Tadesse

story:
The Brass tacks

The guys at Second Stroke Mopeds have harnessed the craft...  Restoration, repair and ground-up builds have been our specialty.  We have serviced the NYC area for the last 10 years.  During this time, our customers have asked for THIS, time and time again...

"I want a vintage moped for all the moped benefits, but I want it to run brand new"

We have the answer... it's a new bike built by us, inspired by the mopeds of yesteryear.

WE ARE NOT TALKING ABOUT ANOTHER ELECTRIC BICYCLE!  This is the 1st of its kind.

Street Legal Electric Moped.  Built by moped kings.  Buy it, register it, ride it.  Only a Driver's license needed in most States.

Follow the progress on our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/mopedproblems

We have spent a year designing, prototyping and building the proper tools to make MOTO in full production... Now, we need your help make it happen.

 

What's next?

In the production world, its all about MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity)  To get this rolling the way we envision it, you have to go hard.  Which is why we need 150 units ordered to get the ball rolling.

Lucky for us, we have enough stock to complete the first 40 bikes!  (we are going to launch this product with AT LEAST 40 bikes, no matter what)

BUT, to break past that threshold, we need your commitment. 

Why Trust us?

We are all about transparency, more than most businesses.  

Our YouTube channel is packed with reviews and tutorials for mopeds and electric bikes, but we also keep a weekly Vlog of our MOTO progress and shop happenings.  

Vlog highlights of the MOTO:

Check us out.  Subscribe if you want to stay in touch ;-)

Specs

- 1700 watt motor w/ built-in gear reduction

- 60v35ah battery.

- 40amp controller

- 3 speed options adjustable on the fly (30mph, 35mph, 40mph)

- 60 mile max range
