story:
TRANSPORT REFUND – Your unique stop to claim refunds for transportation problems

Ever experienced delays while travelling in train or bus? Or cancelled or delayed flights? Or denied boarding? Or lost luggage?

Have you always been compensated and got refunded?

Transport-Refund app will change your way of dealing with such problems. You will get a clear answer on the amount of your refund. You will be assisted to forward your claim in order to obtain compensation.

You only have to answer a few simple questions on your case. The Transport-Refund app facilitates every step.

The app covers flight, train and bus

For the first time, an app will cover the three main ways of transport. Domestic or international flights, train and bus service, for a multitude of countries.

It will provide answers in case of late or cancelled flights, trains and buses. Boarding denied, lost luggage, discrimination for disabled persons. It will help to implement rights without the need to research and read complex legal texts.

The app is entirely customized

The app will run on the website transport-refund.com, on IPhone and all other smartphones.

Users may use it in their own language and for their specific situation. The questions to which a reply is expected have the only purpose to provide a clear and adapted statement as to their rights.

The statement provided will consider the user’s specific situation (transport type, routes, problem).


Simplifying to the most possible extent any claim procedures

Answers may be provided by clicking simply on the alternatives suggested by the app. After 5-7 answers (depending on the user’s concrete case), appears a clear statement. This indicates the exact amount that the operator has to refund. Even while being on the trip, the user knows exactly what to do. This takes only a few minutes.


In a second phase, the user may – but is not obliged to - require assistance to defend his case with the operator. Documents may be uploaded online.

No fee has to be paid by the user for getting a correct answer as to the extent of his rights. Only in case assistance is provided and results in a refund that a fixed fee is due.

No need to read long and complicated legal texts. No need to request information from the operator and to research its general terms and conditions.

We are raising money to finish the app

We have up to now developed algorithm for four countries in three languages.

All the funds raised will be used to finalize the app and ensure its correct functioning.

All statements provided by the app will need to consider international law, national rules and general terms of transport operators, whatever applicable. A lawyer has therefore to check the specific situation for each country covered by the app. Correct and reliable information is the essential result of the app.

Translation has to be made to offer users the choice to use the app in their own language.

At the launch of the app, it will provide up-to-date and reliable information for more than 35 countries and in more than 20 languages.

The funds raised will serve to pay lawyers and transport experts in the respective countries for ensuring the reliability of the information. As well as translators and engineers to integrate this information into the app.

A budget of USD 8,000 per country

We foresee for each country (on the basis of a number of 35 countries) lawyer and translation costs of USD 8,000.

Integration of country’s specific algorithm will cost USD 20,000.

Cross Borders, an internationally working consulting firm, the right partner for this project

We at Cross Borders have worked in the field of passenger rights for many years. A brochure has already been written three years ago. Since then, we are working on moving the advice to the entirely digital world and providing a tool to facilitate at most the process of requesting information and claiming refunds.

We are passionate at providing simple but effective tools for citizens. “Simple” means for us to ensure that complex subjects are rendered understandable and usable, through a great quality work.

Thank you for your support. Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Do not forget to use the Indiegogo share tools.

Patrick Goergen, Campaign Director
Cross Borders s.e.c.s.

story:
GLEAMFIRE is a high-efficiency car washing system. Its patent pending design filters your wash water, providing a superior clean while requiring less water and less effort than using a bucket.


GLEAMFIRE cleans better than conventional wash methods by filtering out dirt. If you really care about your car's finish, you wash it by hand. Until now, that's meant using a bucket—but the bucket has a fatal flaw: the dirt you take off your car accumulates in the bucket, where it sloshes right back onto your wash mitt. After a while you might as well wash your car with sandpaper.


By filtering the water, GLEAMFIRE removes abrasive particles. That means the grit you take off your car stays off. No more rubbing it into the finish. No more changing out bucket water halfway through a wash.



Those filters also mean GLEAMFIRE saves water. It only takes 1.5 gallons to clean a car. That's a 50-85% reduction compared to a bucket wash. We all know water is a precious resource, whether we live under water restrictions or not. When you use less water, you also use less soap, which means less runoff and less waste. That's easier on the planet and easier on your wallet.

We support the Water Use it Wisely initiative.



GLEAMFIRE is easy to use. No squatting or kneeling required. The handle locks so you can carry it around, and since it uses less water it's a lot lighter than a bucket. Once you load the wash mitt into the unit, you have everything in one tidy, self-contained package, making it easy to move from one area of your car to another. No more long walks to the bucket, no more slopping water all over the place, no more bending and kneeling. Just a fast, efficient wash. 



Wash your way with GLEAMFIRE. Whether your car is in the garage, on the street, in the driveway, or on blocks in a cornfield, GLEAMFIRE can wash it there. Have a favorite wash soap? You can use it (you just won't need as much, because you're saving water). No hose? No problem. Just use a no-rinse soap and a microfiber towel (we include them with the system, along with a nice fresh wash mitt).


 Podcast Interview - April 21, 2015


  "A 1.5 Gallon Car Wash?" April 24, 2015


 Podcast Interview - April 28, 2015



Can't believe it until you see it for yourself? Here's a 15-minute demo video.



It all started because of founder John Lohavichan's love of keeping his car shiny. Ever since high school, John has washed and waxed his cars by hand.


When John moved to New England, winter car washing presented a problem. 

A hose was out of the question as his garage had no drain, and it was below freezing outside. Using a bucket meant freezing hands, a wet floor and, very dirty wash water. He knew there had to be a better way.

One day, John was pondering this problem as he fed the fish in his aquarium.

And then inspiration struck!

The water in the fish tank stays clean because it circulates through filters. If he used a similar approach with car wash water, he reasoned, it would be possible to clean better while using a lot less water.


The next day he began experimenting with a discarded soda bottle and Gleamfire was born.

But it didn't stop there. Over one and a half years, 13 different prototypes were built. We also collaborated with three design firms to refine our vision.

 DGF Technologies

 GenesisTek

 Bleck Design Group




Today, GLEAMFIRE's patent pending design has come a long way from the soda bottle:





By pre-ordering a Gleamfire, you will help bring high-efficiency car washing to life. The funds raised will be used for tooling so that we can start manufacturing. 





VISION


John Lohavichan is the Founder of Gleamfire. He wanted to figure out a new way to wash his car in his garage during the winter. Thinking about this problem while feeding his fish gave the spark to try filtering car wash water and Gleamfire was born. He’s an MBA from Vanderbilt University and has 20 years of experience as a Product Manager building software products for startups and financial firms. 


INDUSTRIAL DESIGN & ENGINEERING : Bleck Design Group 

GENERAL COUNSEL : Jane Freedman Law, LLC

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY : Craig Smith

PUBLIC RELATIONS : Torch Communications

STRATEGIC ADVISOR : Mark Greene




All future dates are estimates and subject to change.




Manufacturing is not a trivial task--it is the core of bringing a great product to life. At Gleamfire, we've done the advance work in exploring manufacturing options. To do this we engaged manufacturers all over the world with our Request for Quote package. We really wanted to understand the trade-offs in manufacturing Gleamfire before we started. 


We also visited manufacturers--most importantly injection molding facilities--to see and understand how everything works!

We do expect problems, delays and issues. That's normal for making something great and new. We have assembled the right team, who can rise to the challenge to face and overcome these obstacles.




Why pre-order a Gleamfire?
We've assembled the best deals in return for your early support. These are savings that won't be offered when Gleamfire is sold at retail. Just our way of thanking you for believing in us.
To pre-order simply scroll to the bottom of this screen and press the big pink button labeled "Select a Perk" or "Contribute Now" then select the Gleamfire deal you want.



DISCLAIMERS

Gleamfire will be manufactured on a best-effort basis. This simply means that we will do our best but we can't guarantee a timeframe when it will be delivered. Also despite our best efforts we may be unable to deliver the Gleamfire product.

So because it's the right thing to do, if we are unable to deliver the Gleamfire product, then we will offer a full refund to all who request one.

Also please note that designs, features and specifications are subject to change.

Our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy as stated on our website: www.gleamfire.com are incorporated by reference.

By pre-ordering Gleamfire via IndieGoGo you agree and accept these terms.

Primary contact methods:

Email: support@gleamfire.zendesk.com

Twitter: @gleamfire

After a while you might as well wash your car with sandpaper.



By filtering the water, GLEAMFIRE removes abrasive particles. That means the grit you take off your car stays off. No more rubbing it into the finish. No more changing out bucket water halfway through a wash.






Those filters also mean GLEAMFIRE saves water. It only takes 1.5 gallons to clean a car. That's a 50-85% reduction compared to a bucket wash. We all know water is a precious resource, whether we live under water restrictions or not. When you use less water, you also use less soap, which means less runoff and less waste. That's easier on the planet and easier on your wallet.


We support the Water Use it Wisely initiative.






GLEAMFIRE is easy to use. No squatting or kneeling required. The handle locks so you can carry it around, and since it uses less water it's a lot lighter than a bucket. Once you load the wash mitt into the unit, you have everything in one tidy, self-contained package, making it easy to move from one area of your car to another. No more long walks to the bucket, no more slopping water all over the place, no more bending and kneeling. Just a fast, efficient wash. 








Wash your way with GLEAMFIRE. Whether your car is in the garage, on the street, in the driveway, or on blocks in a cornfield, GLEAMFIRE can wash it there. Have a favorite wash soap? You can use it (you just won't need as much, because you're saving water). No hose? No problem. Just use a no-rinse soap and a microfiber towel (we include them with the system, along with a nice fresh wash mitt).







 Podcast Interview - April 21, 2015

  "A 1.5 Gallon Car Wash?" April 24, 2015


 Podcast Interview - April 28, 2015


Can't believe it until you see it for yourself? Here's a 15-minute demo video.









It all started because of founder John Lohavichan's love of keeping his car shiny. Ever since high school, John has washed and waxed his cars by hand.

When John moved to New England, winter car washing presented a problem. 

A hose was out of the question as his garage had no drain, and it was below freezing outside. Using a bucket meant freezing hands, a wet floor and, very dirty wash water. He knew there had to be a better way.

One day, John was pondering this problem as he fed the fish in his aquarium.
And then inspiration struck!
The water in the fish tank stays clean because it circulates through filters. If he used a similar approach with car wash water, he reasoned, it would be possible to clean better while using a lot less water.

The next day he began experimenting with a discarded soda bottle and Gleamfire was born.



But it didn't stop there. Over one and a half years, 13 different prototypes were built. We also collaborated with three design firms to refine our vision.

 DGF Technologies

 GenesisTek

 Bleck Design Group



Today, GLEAMFIRE's patent pending design has come a long way from the soda bottle:








By pre-ordering a Gleamfire, you will help bring high-efficiency car washing to life. The funds raised will be used for tooling so that we can start manufacturing. 








VISION
John Lohavichan is the Founder of Gleamfire. He wanted to figure out a new way to wash his car in his garage during the winter. Thinking about this problem while feeding his fish gave the spark to try filtering car wash water and Gleamfire was born. He’s an MBA from Vanderbilt University and has 20 years of experience as a Product Manager building software products for startups and financial firms. 


INDUSTRIAL DESIGN & ENGINEERING : Bleck Design Group 

GENERAL COUNSEL : Jane Freedman Law, LLC
INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY : Craig Smith
PUBLIC RELATIONS : Torch Communications
STRATEGIC ADVISOR : Mark Greene




All future dates are estimates and subject to change.












Manufacturing is not a trivial task--it is the core of bringing a great product to life. At Gleamfire, we've done the advance work in exploring manufacturing options. To do this we engaged manufacturers all over the world with our Request for Quote package. We really wanted to understand the trade-offs in manufacturing Gleamfire before we started. 




We also visited manufacturers--most importantly injection molding facilities--to see and understand how everything works!

We do expect problems, delays and issues. That's normal for making something great and new. We have assembled the right team, who can rise to the challenge to face and overcome these obstacles.









Why pre-order a Gleamfire?
We've assembled the best deals in return for your early support. These are savings that won't be offered when Gleamfire is sold at retail. Just our way of thanking you for believing in us.
To pre-order simply scroll to the bottom of this screen and press the big pink button labeled "Select a Perk" or "Contribute Now" then select the Gleamfire deal you want.


















DISCLAIMERS
Gleamfire will be manufactured on a best-effort basis. This simply means that we will do our best but we can't guarantee a timeframe when it will be delivered. Also despite our best efforts we may be unable to deliver the Gleamfire product.
So because it's the right thing to do, if we are unable to deliver the Gleamfire product, then we will offer a full refund to all who request one.
Also please note that designs, features and specifications are subject to change.
Our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy as stated on our website: www.gleamfire.com are incorporated by reference.
By pre-ordering Gleamfire via IndieGoGo you agree and accept these terms.


Primary contact methods:

Email: support@gleamfire.zendesk.com
Twitter: @gleamfire

story:
KLY-MAX Super Sealant by Anti-Drag Technologies, LLC will forever change the future of surface protection. In a multi-billion-dollar a year industry, we are setting the NEW standard for surface protection.  We are the only surface sealant proven to reduce drag, improve your vehicles performance and mileage by up to 10% GUARANTEED.

"...does reduce drag, the question of why it decreases drag is still unanswered."

Melvin H. Snyder, President

Wichita State University

Dept. of Aeronautical Engineering

As the price of fuel increases out of control there have been no cost effective ways to save money, let alone increase performance while making your vehicle look better and protecting its finish.  KLY-MAX Super Sealant does all that and much more.  

Anti-Drag Technologies, LLC is very involved in our communities. We are helping student athletes by reducing brain injuries and concussions caused by helmet to helmet contact.

Independent tests have shown that the unique drag-reducing capabilities of KLY-MAX Super Sealant on football helmets allows glancing blows rather than blunt force helmet to helmet contact.  It reduces the chance of concussion or brain injury. 

Note: A portion of every sale will go towards reducing the incidence of athletic brain injury.

“We have been using the product for 3 months and the the results have been truly amazing!"  L. Boese also stated, "KLY-MAX Super Sealant has worked so well on our football helmets, that I have just begun applying it to all our lacrosse helmets and soon to be applied to batting helmets for both our men's and women's programs.”

L. Boese, Santa Ana CA

Athletic Equipment Inventory Manager 

We are asking for supporters to help us raise funds and be the first to receive this breakthrough product and help us introduce KLY-MAX Super Sealant to the world.  Anti-Drag Technologies, LLC has removed any risk of participating in the funding of our project, as we are proud to say that we are debt free and in full production as a solely owned company.

The challenge we face as a small independent company is getting our message out. We believe the power of the people is our solution.  We are raising funds to run a digital and social media marketing campaign.  Your contribution will be used to drive awareness through social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram and other marketing medias.  Indiegogo allows small companies like us with breakthrough products to display their technology and create awareness about its benefits.  Join us in introducing the award winning KLY-MAX Super Sealant to the world.

KLY-MAX Super Sealant! Get Some! You will feel the difference!!!!

story:
The most feat-uristic and cost-effective board structure!!

Half of the skateboarding community buys more than 4 skateboards per year! The durability of skateboards is pretty much the same, since the main deck material is maple and used by most brands. Even if one buys a wooden board reinforced with Carbon Fiber, at more than double the price, they must always remember that wood and Carbon Fiber don't have the same consistency. Therefore, when humidity starts degrading wood, then the process of delamination starts between the two materials. In addition, these cannot be recycled.


Capsule skateboards and longboards, sold at approximately the same price as wooden ones, give the solution to these problems. They are made of materials having the same consistency and properties, therefore eliminating the risk of delamination and are 100% recyclable. 

No breaking, delamination or chipping during your skate or downhill session.
 

 
 
 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

                                             

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

How are your boards FULLY RECYCLABLE & ECO-FRIENDLY ?

All Capsule boards are made of 100% fully recyclable polymer material and can save millions of maple trees. Once the board reaches the end of its life cycle it can be recycled by grinding it back to granulates, making it usable to make new boards.

It is important to know that, one maple tree takes 60 years to grow and is cut down to manufacture approximately 50 wooden skateboards. Each maple tree saved every year can reduce pollution by 54KgCO2/year.

Just imagine that 15 Capsule skateboards can replace 50 wooden skateboards and save 1 maple tree. So, with every Capsule board you purchase you save 4 years of growing up a maple tree!

Finally, our boards are not only UNBREAKABLE and can last much longer but they are also WATERPROOF and weather resistant, eliminating any chipping and delamination risks. We estimate that every Capsule board can replace in average 4 wooden boards that a skater/longboarder will typically need to buy in a year.

How are your boards 6x STRONGER & SAFER ?

We have been conducting research and experimentation for the last 4 years to find the perfect material that, not only can replace the current ply-wood boards but, can take the sport to another level. Through our research we also managed to create a board which provides enhanced performance at an affordable cost, making the experience even more enjoyable.

Failure was not an option for us. We have been in the lab testing different materials’ combination to achieve maximum impact absorption, strength, durability, flexibility and less fatigue for the skater.

Capsule products have  a strength level, more than 6 times higher than any wooden skateboard that exists in the market at present. At the same time it keeps an unparalleled performance with optimal flexing strength which allows you to pop higher. And, the experience remains the same throughout the life of the boards!

 

How are your boards SLIDING FASTER?

The feeling of speed is exciting to this type of sport! So, of course, making it slide faster was something we wanted to achieve, no questions asked! We’ve tested several coatings and films and, it took us almost a year to find the most advanced coating film which can be cured at high temperatures. This provides a lower friction coefficient for faster sliding while at the same time it passed all our scratch tests giving a much longer surface durability.

Maximum speed experience achieved!

 

How are your boards POPPING HIGHER?

The combination of materials used allowed us to develop boards combining flexibility and strength which is the key for a higher pop. This was no easy task and, again, it required a lot of careful experimentation to find the optimal combination. And, of course, we worked on keeping it simple for our customers! So, one just needs to press the kicktail and just pop sky high!

This was made possible because of our amazing team which has more than 50 years of accumulated knowledge and expertise in advanced materials, engineering simulations, material lab testing methods etc. We couldn’t have done it without them!

story:
The background

Integrity is our first value, we believe that following our values will eventually give results, sometimes against the current is scary and challenging, however only few days ago the European Bicycle Manufacturers Association welcomes EU anti-dumping measures on e-bikes from China. That's why We have chosen to wait. Studying the new scenario and after our first launch we decided to only focus on MAGMA,  giving up on the other part of the project YoEL, we just don't feel comfortable to promise to you something uncertain and unpredictable. 

Our vision

Magma will be totally manufactured and assembled in Europe. Feel free, if you have the opportunity, to come and visit our facilities in Sicily or Scotland (spectacular places). 

We don't want to produce our products in China, then re-route to some other countries and then deliver to you, it is clearly out of control.  We are not saying "China is devil", absolutely not, clearly some parts and components are made in China, nevertheless they have extraordinary and sophisticated technologies and manufacturers, however manufacturing our bike there and then ship to you it's something we don't want to pursue, we don't want to brake laws and send our products around the world loosing control and risking jail or penalties. In addition, with your money we don't feel comfortable to play these games or lie to you, just to market our product with a low entry price hiding all the additional expenses you are going to pay later. (probably some of you already experienced this scenario, leaving you disappointed about crowdfunding projects)  

Potentially we could export Magma to sell in the Asian market, all the way around! 

And after the last news about EU-USA trade agreement, we feel even more comfortable to sell in USA too.  

You are helping us to startup a unique product, we are not trying to trick you and marketing a "decal/brand" on 10years old free-mould design products.  

No hidden costs. No games. 

 

Pedale88 is a sincere, independent and ethical correct bicycles company and we prefer cutting our margins to see growing organically our community. 

 

INTRODUCING MAGMA

Only Limited Magma available at £948 (€1050/$1250)

 

Our Geometry 

Product Specification Details MAGMA

  ​ Frame CrMo Tensile strength RM: 750 N/mm2 in house tested and CE

 Motor 250/1000W Brushless (MAC)

 Front fork P88 custom made

Battery SAMSUNG 48V 3.5E Cells

Rim Al alloy, 20”*4”*36H* - Tyres KENDA 20”x 4.0” or Vee 20" x 4.25"

Handlebar P88 custom made 61cm wide 

 Stem P88 custom made with teflon custom attachment

 Transmission GATES Carbon Belt 132T  -  24T/55T single speed

 PAS integrated in-built motor torque sensor

 Display Highly sensitive colour LCD with 9 levels of electric assist 

 Brakes System Hydraulic Discbrake, Tektro Auriga 180mm Ecomp

 Seat post P88 custom made vegan Italian leather

  • Front Light integrated 
  • N.W. 22kgs(With Battery)
  • Freewheel Gates
  • Performance Grip 
  • Intelligent controller 
  • Throttle Optional on 250W EU version
  • Charger AC110V--240V

 

Stretch Goal if we reach 200 units 

 

 

FAQ

If you can not find what you're looking for here, please check our website (www.pedale88.com)   or  leave us a comment here. Or contact us at sales@pedale88.com

Q: when can I expect the bike to arrive at my door?

We’ll go into production immediately after - for a Christmas delivery.  We already arranged the frame and parts material for 200 bikes. Customers will be updated via email and social/blog updates along the way.

Q: Will you the bike arrive as described?

Everything we’ve advertised is confirmed. Probably we are going to give some extra cm to the saddle, and use a memory foam inside the saddle.

Q: Why did you launch first on Kickstarter and then IndieGoGo? 

Well, we realised IndieGoGo has a more inherent audience for our product and we can extend the campaign after the new EU regulations, so we needed to reach and get a brand new strategy to see our Magma around the world. 

Q: Why is Magma cheaper now than the first launch? 

 We had numerous meetings with our suppliers, explaining our plans and visions. They agreed to cut their margins to see the project starts. We have their support because they love the product and visions. The price is safe to guarantee to be safe in business and offer the lowest price possible. 

Q: Does Magma come in different sizes? 

No. Magma is built in one frame size to fit a variety of riders 5'2" (160cm) and above (Vincenzo is 6'6" 198cm). Sitting in different positions on the saddle will allow for a comfortable upright riding position and plenty of room to move around to find your comfort.

Q: What colours does it come in?

Signature Grey, Matte Black, Magma Red and Ferrari Yellow. 

Q: What is called the shipyard where you are manufacturing the frames?

Tec Service Italia S.r.l. http://www.tsiweb.eu/  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltBR0jpab-Q

Q: Can I use Magma in rain and mud?

Yes, all our connectors are completely waterproof and protected, Fenders and rack will be added as accessories once the campaign will finish and you can add them with 20% off on the retail price. 

Q: Is Magma single speed? How can I handle different ride scenarios? 

Yes, 24T/55T and our in-built motor torque sensor will just give you the right amount of power you need.  

A torque sensor is a constant effort bike (the speed will vary if your effort changes).

Now the benefits of the torque sensor bike are:

  • it will use less battery power and your range will be longer
  • It feels more naturally like a bike – you control the speed through your pedals, the more you push the faster you go. So for example at the traffic light the sensor will compensate your effort giving you the right amount of power to take the bike rolling, you don’t have to fiddle with the controls much, you will feel like flying! 

Q: How much weight can Magma handle? 

Magma looks really thin and fragile but is built with Italian chromoly 25crMo4 Tensile strength RM: 750-1000N/mm2 which is durable, high quality and light. Sourced in Milan and coated with naval technologies, the frames will be practically untouchable by the elements, making it last forever, it can handle riders up to  130kg.

Q: Can I put a friend on the back?

Yes, you can but ride carefully at your own risk. Max ‘total’ rider weight is rated at 130kg.

Q: What’s the top speed?

The Magma EU can reach a top speed of 16 mph (25 km/h) in street-legal using pedal-assist, with throttle power up to 6 mph. Magma + in off-road, pedal-assist power continues through to 55km/h mph.

Q: Is it street legal?

Magma 250W EU is totally legal in Europe. Magma + is not legal on public roads.  You will need to refer to your local laws for specifics.

Q: Do I need a license to ride Magma?

No. You will need to refer to your local laws for full details. It is possible to limit top speed with minor programming details which we make readily available on our website.

Q: Can I ride the bike without the motor?

Yes, you can pedal Magma just like any other bike.

Q: How fast can I go with just the throttle?

Magma's throttle will provide continuous power to the motor up to 6 mph on EU version (set it on the display)

Q: How much does Magma weigh?

It weighs approximately 22kg, however we are continuously working with our engineers to drop  the weight, complete with battery and all parts. 

Q: How long does Magma battery last? How far can I go?

The battery inside Magma and Magma +  are built to last up to 60 miles (80km)  with the pedal assist - depending on rider weight, terrain, and other factors. 

Q: Can I lock the battery? Is the battery removable?

Our batteries are protected by a locking mechanism and securely located in the down tube. You can remove it and take it home or charge on the bike.

Q: How long does it take for the battery to charge?

From fully depleted to fully charged, the battery takes around 5-6 hours to charge with the stock 2A charger. Using any other chargers besides the provided charger (or Quick Charger) will void the warranty.

Q: How do I charge the battery?

You can either charge the battery while it is on the bike or take the battery off the bike and charge it using any normal household outlet.

Q: Does the bike come with a charger?

Yes.  The bikes ship with our standard 2A charger.

 Q: Does pedaling or breaking Magma charge the battery?

 No.

Q: Can I ride Magma on the sand or snow?

Sure you can but make sure you do a detail cleaning afterwards so you don’t wreck your drive train. That’s not under warranty.

Q: Can I choose different tires?

Sure we are going to give you the opportunity to swap to the Vee Rubber  

Q: Do you ship outside the EU?

Yes

Q: What assembly is required?

Install the quick-release front wheel, install the pedals, tighten the stem and you’re ready to go.

Q: How is Magma delivered and is it easy to assemble?

Magma comes delivered with instructions and requires minimal assembly. If you don't have much experience with bikes, we recommend that you visit your local bike shop to ensure your safety.

Q: How much does shipping cost?

Shipping is FREE by UPS Included in the cost of the bike in EU states. 

Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  

- 1 Year coverage on electrical components

- 2 Year coverage on mechanical components

- Lifetime coverage on frame

We do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes, and belt due to normal wear. 

Q: What kind of accessories do you currently have or can I expect in the near future?

We are regularly working to develop more accessories and options based on demand. Please let's discuss about it, we are developing  side bags, racks, net...

Q: What about spare parts? Can any bike shop assist me?

Magma battery is custom made and available to buy from us, the same about the frameset  which is hand made in our Italian Factory. The rest of the components are standard, meaning that you can upgrade your bike as you desire with other parts.

Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes?

The backer is responsible for tax. Within EU states no hidden prices. No additional Tax. 

Q: Can I test ride a Magma ?

Test rides are currently only available at our office in Glasgow UK and Pozzallo Italy . Please contact us to schedule an appointment.

Q: Can I get a refund?

Please refer to Indiegogo's refund policy.

 

Learn More

Transparency starts here

We will be using only Italian chromoly 25crMo4 Tensile strength RM: 750-1000N/mm2 which is durable, high quality and light. Sourced in Milan and coated with naval technologies, the frames will be practically untouchable by the elements, making it last forever.

We work with China and Taiwan daily, this allows us to build the bicycles to our specifications and offer more affordable, and simple products. When we build Magma in Italy it’s something different for the emotions, we can feel the final goal and the people and their stories involved, which we will introduce with your pledge.

As with all overseas trades and suppliers, unforeseen complications can pop up, we will always try our best to mitigate them. 

The project is ambitious, we will have the support from Shanghai and our factory manager to complete on time and to the specifications, we can use trusted on market components without complicating the manufacturing process and deliver on time. They have more than 15 years experience in bike building and they are happy to be part of our project. 

Our mechanics in U.K. will be trained on the specific components and the quality check will be followed closely to assure the perfect process by Lorenzo. 

Every bike will be CE certificated, not just printed on the box,  every welding certificated, every part you are buying will be traceable from day1. Transparency and engagement in the process are our first priority.

The framesets once finished and coated in Sicily will be shipped to U.K. by sea where the assembling process will be finalised, being in Europe this means we will have It in the U.K quickly. We prefer to ship our final products from U.K. from our first campaign we know it’s reliable and already assured by our existing contract with UPS.

The motor and all the components will be shipped from MAC Motor (and Samsung for battery cells), I'm in touch with one of the cofounders and they are happy to cooperate with this project, they invited us to Interbike International Expo in USA on next September, they are leaders in the electric bike motors and we are proud to use their products.

The belt drives system will be shipped from Germany, where I’m daily in contact with Chris and Frank from Gates (Bosh' Sister), they assisted us from day 1, supporting last year with our Crono and again a streamlined process as they are within Europe .

We are forecasting with safe margins the supply capacity, we can be sure to supply 300 frames within a month using one single dims, if the demands are bigger we can double it easily using 2 dims and 2 productions lines.

From our first campaign we learned that for customers outside the EU it would have been really efficient to ship a container, shipping a container it means we can add spare parts for the after sales assistance.

For EU customers forget any issues, this is an EU product so it will be extremely easy to manage.

Our plan is to place a local Hub per country which has more than 100 backers.

For a hub we’d be able to guarantee a local storage for parts and replacements, making it even easier for our customers. This is something we learned from our previous campaign.

We are proud to start this project firstly for the social impact, the shipyard in low working demand, so providing work to 30 employees converting part of the structure to a modern business model. 
And bring on the market a unique product to feel proud to use everyday knowing the story you are supporting.

Summing up:

Italy(MAGMA frameset)-Scotland(assembling and storing)-China (motor and batteries)- Germany (belt and sprockets)

Deliveries will be managed directly with UPS and FREE on bikes within EU.

To non EU customers obviously there will be import and VAT fees to be paid, we want to be transparent on it too.

We prefer to be clear now and not disappoint anyone.

We just want to make sure you will have the best products and get Involved in our project as parts of it. 

Once the production starts in Sicily, we want to plan an open day for you backers in Sicily , visiting our facilities and one of the best place in Italy for food and holidays.
story_txt:
The background Integrity is our first value, we believe that following our values will eventually give results, sometimes against the current is scary and challenging, however only few days ago the European Bicycle Manufacturers Association welcomes EU anti-dumping measures on e-bikes from China. That's why We have chosen to wait. Studying the new scenario and after our first launch we decided to only focus on MAGMA,  giving up on the other part of the project YoEL, we just don't feel comfortable to promise to you something uncertain and unpredictable. Our visionMagma will be totally manufactured and assembled in Europe. Feel free, if you have the opportunity, to come and visit our facilities in Sicily or Scotland (spectacular places). We don't want to produce our products in China, then re-route to some other countries and then deliver to you, it is clearly out of control.  We are not saying "China is devil", absolutely not, clearly some parts and components are made in China, nevertheless they have extraordinary and sophisticated technologies and manufacturers, however manufacturing our bike there and then ship to you it's something we don't want to pursue, we don't want to brake laws and send our products around the world loosing control and risking jail or penalties. In addition, with your money we don't feel comfortable to play these games or lie to you, just to market our product with a low entry price hiding all the additional expenses you are going to pay later. (probably some of you already experienced this scenario, leaving you disappointed about crowdfunding projects)  Potentially we could export Magma to sell in the Asian market, all the way around! And after the last news about EU-USA trade agreement, we feel even more comfortable to sell in USA too.  You are helping us to startup a unique product, we are not trying to trick you and marketing a "decal/brand" on 10years old free-mould design products.  No hidden costs. No games.  Pedale88 is a sincere, independent and ethical correct bicycles company and we prefer cutting our margins to see growing organically our community.  INTRODUCING MAGMAOnly Limited Magma available at £948 (€1050/$1250) Our Geometry Product Specification Details MAGMA  ​ Frame CrMo Tensile strength RM: 750 N/mm2 in house tested and CE Motor 250/1000W Brushless (MAC) Front fork P88 custom madeBattery SAMSUNG 48V 3.5E CellsRim Al alloy, 20”*4”*36H* - Tyres KENDA 20”x 4.0” or Vee 20" x 4.25"Handlebar P88 custom made 61cm wide  Stem P88 custom made with teflon custom attachment Transmission GATES Carbon Belt 132T  -  24T/55T single speed PAS integrated in-built motor torque sensor Display Highly sensitive colour LCD with 9 levels of electric assist  Brakes System Hydraulic Discbrake, Tektro Auriga 180mm Ecomp Seat post P88 custom made vegan Italian leather

Front Light integrated 

N.W. 22kgs(With Battery)

Freewheel Gates

Performance Grip 

Intelligent controller 

Throttle Optional on 250W EU version

Charger AC110V--240V
 Stretch Goal if we reach 200 units   FAQIf you can not find what you're looking for here, please check our website (www.pedale88.com)   or  leave us a comment here. Or contact us at sales@pedale88.comQ: when can I expect the bike to arrive at my door?We’ll go into production immediately after - for a Christmas delivery.  We already arranged the frame and parts material for 200 bikes. Customers will be updated via email and social/blog updates along the way.Q: Will you the bike arrive as described?Everything we’ve advertised is confirmed. Probably we are going to give some extra cm to the saddle, and use a memory foam inside the saddle.Q: Why did you launch first on Kickstarter and then IndieGoGo? Well, we realised IndieGoGo has a more inherent audience for our product and we can extend the campaign after the new EU regulations, so we needed to reach and get a brand new strategy to see our Magma around the world. Q: Why is Magma cheaper now than the first launch?  We had numerous meetings with our suppliers, explaining our plans and visions. They agreed to cut their margins to see the project starts. We have their support because they love the product and visions. The price is safe to guarantee to be safe in business and offer the lowest price possible. Q: Does Magma come in different sizes? No. Magma is built in one frame size to fit a variety of riders 5'2" (160cm) and above (Vincenzo is 6'6" 198cm). Sitting in different positions on the saddle will allow for a comfortable upright riding position and plenty of room to move around to find your comfort.Q: What colours does it come in?Signature Grey, Matte Black, Magma Red and Ferrari Yellow. Q: What is called the shipyard where you are manufacturing the frames?Tec Service Italia S.r.l. http://www.tsiweb.eu/  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltBR0jpab-QQ: Can I use Magma in rain and mud?Yes, all our connectors are completely waterproof and protected, Fenders and rack will be added as accessories once the campaign will finish and you can add them with 20% off on the retail price. Q: Is Magma single speed? How can I handle different ride scenarios? Yes, 24T/55T and our in-built motor torque sensor will just give you the right amount of power you need.  A torque sensor is a constant effort bike (the speed will vary if your effort changes).Now the benefits of the torque sensor bike are:
it will use less battery power and your range will be longer
It feels more naturally like a bike – you control the speed through your pedals, the more you push the faster you go. So for example at the traffic light the sensor will compensate your effort giving you the right amount of power to take the bike rolling, you don’t have to fiddle with the controls much, you will feel like flying! 
Q: How much weight can Magma handle? Magma looks really thin and fragile but is built with Italian chromoly 25crMo4 Tensile strength RM: 750-1000N/mm2 which is durable, high quality and light. Sourced in Milan and coated with naval technologies, the frames will be practically untouchable by the elements, making it last forever, it can handle riders up to  130kg.Q: Can I put a friend on the back?Yes, you can but ride carefully at your own risk. Max ‘total’ rider weight is rated at 130kg.Q: What’s the top speed?The Magma EU can reach a top speed of 16 mph (25 km/h) in street-legal using pedal-assist, with throttle power up to 6 mph. Magma + in off-road, pedal-assist power continues through to 55km/h mph.Q: Is it street legal?Magma 250W EU is totally legal in Europe. Magma + is not legal on public roads.  You will need to refer to your local laws for specifics.Q: Do I need a license to ride Magma?No. You will need to refer to your local laws for full details. It is possible to limit top speed with minor programming details which we make readily available on our website.Q: Can I ride the bike without the motor?Yes, you can pedal Magma just like any other bike.Q: How fast can I go with just the throttle?Magma's throttle will provide continuous power to the motor up to 6 mph on EU version (set it on the display)Q: How much does Magma weigh?It weighs approximately 22kg, however we are continuously working with our engineers to drop  the weight, complete with battery and all parts. Q: How long does Magma battery last? How far can I go?The battery inside Magma and Magma +  are built to last up to 60 miles (80km)  with the pedal assist - depending on rider weight, terrain, and other factors. Q: Can I lock the battery? Is the battery removable?Our batteries are protected by a locking mechanism and securely located in the down tube. You can remove it and take it home or charge on the bike.Q: How long does it take for the battery to charge?From fully depleted to fully charged, the battery takes around 5-6 hours to charge with the stock 2A charger. Using any other chargers besides the provided charger (or Quick Charger) will void the warranty.Q: How do I charge the battery?You can either charge the battery while it is on the bike or take the battery off the bike and charge it using any normal household outlet.Q: Does the bike come with a charger?Yes.  The bikes ship with our standard 2A charger. Q: Does pedaling or breaking Magma charge the battery? No.Q: Can I ride Magma on the sand or snow?Sure you can but make sure you do a detail cleaning afterwards so you don’t wreck your drive train. That’s not under warranty.Q: Can I choose different tires?Sure we are going to give you the opportunity to swap to the Vee Rubber  Q: Do you ship outside the EU?YesQ: What assembly is required?Install the quick-release front wheel, install the pedals, tighten the stem and you’re ready to go.Q: How is Magma delivered and is it easy to assemble?Magma comes delivered with instructions and requires minimal assembly. If you don't have much experience with bikes, we recommend that you visit your local bike shop to ensure your safety.Q: How much does shipping cost?Shipping is FREE by UPS Included in the cost of the bike in EU states. Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  - 1 Year coverage on electrical components- 2 Year coverage on mechanical components- Lifetime coverage on frameWe do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes, and belt due to normal wear. Q: What kind of accessories do you currently have or can I expect in the near future?We are regularly working to develop more accessories and options based on demand. Please let's discuss about it, we are developing  side bags, racks, net...Q: What about spare parts? Can any bike shop assist me?Magma battery is custom made and available to buy from us, the same about the frameset  which is hand made in our Italian Factory. The rest of the components are standard, meaning that you can upgrade your bike as you desire with other parts.Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes?The backer is responsible for tax. Within EU states no hidden prices. No additional Tax. Q: Can I test ride a Magma ?Test rides are currently only available at our office in Glasgow UK and Pozzallo Italy . Please contact us to schedule an appointment.Q: Can I get a refund?Please refer to Indiegogo's refund policy. Learn MoreTransparency starts hereWe will be using only Italian chromoly 25crMo4 Tensile strength RM: 750-1000N/mm2 which is durable, high quality and light. Sourced in Milan and coated with naval technologies, the frames will be practically untouchable by the elements, making it last forever.We work with China and Taiwan daily, this allows us to build the bicycles to our specifications and offer more affordable, and simple products. When we build Magma in Italy it’s something different for the emotions, we can feel the final goal and the people and their stories involved, which we will introduce with your pledge.As with all overseas trades and suppliers, unforeseen complications can pop up, we will always try our best to mitigate them. The project is ambitious, we will have the support from Shanghai and our factory manager to complete on time and to the specifications, we can use trusted on market components without complicating the manufacturing process and deliver on time. They have more than 15 years experience in bike building and they are happy to be part of our project. Our mechanics in U.K. will be trained on the specific components and the quality check will be followed closely to assure the perfect process by Lorenzo. Every bike will be CE certificated, not just printed on the box,  every welding certificated, every part you are buying will be traceable from day1. Transparency and engagement in the process are our first priority.The framesets once finished and coated in Sicily will be shipped to U.K. by sea where the assembling process will be finalised, being in Europe this means we will have It in the U.K quickly. We prefer to ship our final products from U.K. from our first campaign we know it’s reliable and already assured by our existing contract with UPS.The motor and all the components will be shipped from MAC Motor (and Samsung for battery cells), I'm in touch with one of the cofounders and they are happy to cooperate with this project, they invited us to Interbike International Expo in USA on next September, they are leaders in the electric bike motors and we are proud to use their products.The belt drives system will be shipped from Germany, where I’m daily in contact with Chris and Frank from Gates (Bosh' Sister), they assisted us from day 1, supporting last year with our Crono and again a streamlined process as they are within Europe .We are forecasting with safe margins the supply capacity, we can be sure to supply 300 frames within a month using one single dims, if the demands are bigger we can double it easily using 2 dims and 2 productions lines.From our first campaign we learned that for customers outside the EU it would have been really efficient to ship a container, shipping a container it means we can add spare parts for the after sales assistance.For EU customers forget any issues, this is an EU product so it will be extremely easy to manage.Our plan is to place a local Hub per country which has more than 100 backers.For a hub we’d be able to guarantee a local storage for parts and replacements, making it even easier for our customers. This is something we learned from our previous campaign.We are proud to start this project firstly for the social impact, the shipyard in low working demand, so providing work to 30 employees converting part of the structure to a modern business model. And bring on the market a unique product to feel proud to use everyday knowing the story you are supporting.Summing up:Italy(MAGMA frameset)-Scotland(assembling and storing)-China (motor and batteries)- Germany (belt and sprockets)Deliveries will be managed directly with UPS and FREE on bikes within EU.To non EU customers obviously there will be import and VAT fees to be paid, we want to be transparent on it too.We prefer to be clear now and not disappoint anyone.We just want to make sure you will have the best products and get Involved in our project as parts of it. Once the production starts in Sicily, we want to plan an open day for you backers in Sicily , visiting our facilities and one of the best place in Italy for food and holidays.

story:
Car Shades is the world's first remotely controlled sunshade and security screen for your car.  Every shade is individually made for the make and model of your vehicle.

What started as just an idea to address local vehicle break ins, has become a passion to create a product that should already have existed.

After six months of developing the idea and a further year building many types and versions of prototypes, we are proud to unveil the latest version of Car Shades - a remote control sunshade and security screen for your car.

These shades can be manufactured for all types of vehicles and are specifically made to fit the make and model of your car.

 

 

 

 

 

Shades are available in a wide range of colors, patterns and designs, to fit a variety of cars, trucks and vans.

 

Easy to use and provides privacy in your car when you need it most.

 

Keep your car cool in the sun with one touch shade opening and closing.

 

Car Shades sleek design ensures it fits seamlessly into the interior of your car.

 

 

Simple design, easy to use.

 

 

 

All Car Shades are built to fit seamlessly into the interior of your car.  The low profile design ensures that the view out of your windows is not being obscured.

Car Shades attaches to the window frames of your car via velcro tape and can easily be removed and adjusted.  As well as easily removable and changeable shades, each frame also comes with an extra long power cable that can be plugged directly into the cars power adapter.

 

What's Included

* Power Adapter supplied for select products only
** Key Fob Control available for an additional surcharge
*** Control Unit (Large Power Adapter) supplied for select bundle purchases only

 

 

Made to Measure - designed specifically to fit the make and model of your vehicle.  Measurements used for each Car Shade are taken from the vehicle manufacturer's specification and will fit most unmodified vehicles.

 

 

Artist's Portal

Installing Car Shades not only provides your car with an extra level of safety and helps shields your vehicle from the sun, it also allows you to express your individual style with our wide range of shades in various colors, patterns and designs.

As part of our ongoing product development we are building a new portal on carshades.net to give artists from around the world access to upload their designs for shades onto the site.  

The portal will give artists a chance to get their work seen by millions and give our customers a chance to purchase unique designs for shades from a growing catalogue of products.

 

 

Car Window Guide

The following guide shows the names used for particular windows in a standard left hand drive vehicle. If you require a bespoke order, please quote the windows names mentioned below.

 

Perks

Choose the perk that's best for you and get up to 27% OFF only during the campaign.

 

Early Bird Pricing

Pair - Side Window Pack

$79 USD  $109 USD  (27% OFF)

Included Items

  • 2x Car Shades - Side Window
  • 2x Shade
  • Power Adapter
  • Remote Control

Pair - Auxiliary Window Pack

$44 USD  $61 USD  (27% OFF)

Included Items

  • 2x Car Shades - Auxiliary Window
  • 2x Shade

Single - Side Window Pack

$54 USD

Included Items

  • Car Shades - Side Window
  • Shade
  • Remote Control

Single - Windshield Pack

$74 USD

Included Items

  • Car Shade - Windshield
  • 2x Shade
  • Remote Control

Pair - Windshield Pack

$129 USD  $149 USD  (13% OFF)

Included Items

  • 2x Car Shade - Windshield
  • 4x Shade
  • Power Adapter
  • Remote Control

Van Bundle

$131 USD  $154 USD  (14% OFF)

Included Items

  • 2x Car Shades - Side Window
  • Car Shades - Windshield
  • 4x Shade
  • Power Adapter
  • Remote Control

Coupe Bundle

$246 USD  $289 USD  (14% OFF)

Included Items

  • 4x Car Shades - Side Window
  • 2x Car Shades - Windshield
  • 8x Shade
  • Control Unit
  • Remote Control

Sedan Bundle

$289 USD  $339 USD  (14% OFF)

Included Items

  • 4x Car Shades - Side Window
  • 2x Car Shades - Windshield
  • 2x Car Shades - Auxiliary
  • 10x Shade
  • Control Unit
  • Remote Control

 

Contributions

If the offers above aren’t what you’re looking for but you would still like to support us, all contributions are gratefully received.  Please drop us an email: campaign@carshades.net and we will get back to you.

All contributions above £30 (USD) will receive a gift offer as a thank you and to welcome you to the Car Shades family.

 

Car Shades - Designed For You.

 

Please SHARE this campaign with your friends, family, car owners and tech lovers.

We really appreciate your support!

story:
HerRide Hailing Inc is solving a problem too many women experience daily : and we need your support 

How safe do you feel as a women driver or rider in a ride hailing vehicle?
HerRide is 100% dedicated to the safety of our women riders & drivers

HerRide is North America’s first ride hailing membership services for women by women 

This is for all the women who have felt bothered or uneasy while using ride-hailing services. 
For the women who have gotten out of the vehicle close to their home as too uncomfortable having the driver see where they live. For every women who has had to fake a phone call or mention a non-existent partner during the ride to ensure safety.  Sadly for women who have held an object of self defence in their hand to feel protected.  HerRide is for you

HerRide will put ALL women in the driver’s seat of their own safety & comfort while enjoying the benefits of community as a member. 
 

Our subscription platform allows you to purchase a membership for not only yourself, but for your Mom, daughter, sister, friend, colleague. Who are the women in your life you want to show how much you care?
 

Support us to empower female drivers & riders alike.  HerRide allows drivers to not only make money under the safest conditions by knowing a women member is in the backseat, but enjoying the best commissions in the industry! Drive when, where AND have no worries about the who! 
 

We appreciate your support in helping us fast track our launch across North America and are thrilled to usher in a new era of ride-hailing.  We won’t hit the brakes until every women everywhere feels safe & unbothered.  That’s simply done by supporting and choosing HerRide!

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We need additional funding to continue to develop our app, marketing initiatives, attracting top talent & lining up our priority launch cities 
  • Be part of the call to action to make your city a safe place for women to travel freely & unbothered 
  • Be a HerHero ! Every  donation will put us closer in the drivers seat to being in your city.  We want to hear your stories! 
  • Be Moved with HerRide! Every $100 donation will gift you a 1 yr membership ( retail value $155.88) to enjoy as a thank you for inviting us to your city 
  • Do your part in fostering a new era of ride-hailing for women by women 

The Impact

 

  • We recently engaged Angus Reid to conduct a national survey and it supports our projections: 82% of women would pay for a women driving women membership platform 
  • Men would buy for their wife, daughter n Mother 
  • HerRide respects women gig workers & we want to attract to our community 
  • We need you to get in the fast lane of our launch

Risks & Challenges

  • Our biggest challenge we see is satisfying demand & we are proactively working to have city opening teams, removing municipalitbarriers & socializing the HerRide movement through a strategic PR campaign 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone can support through donations, we would love to hear from you if you have a product or service we could offer to our membership through our partnership collaborations. 
Alternatively, if you are an employer with a large population of females in your workplace  ie healthcare, hospitality, education, government, technology, municipalities 

email me at mmorrison@herride.com  or info@herride.com

Check out our website @ www.herride.com

 

  • Watch for us on social media and be part of the HerRide Community! 
     
  • Twitter:         @HerRide_CA
  • Facebook:    @HerRideHome
  • Instagram:   @HerRideHome
  • Don’t forget to share on Indiegogo platform

Don’t forget to share on Indiegogo platform

story:
Design and power on a big pair of fat tires. Start riding the most badass and highest performing e-bike in the market with all-terrain tires, up to 750w of power and a unique frame.

In January 2019, two colleagues decided to start a new journey. 

Over the last few years, we have been working night and day to create Juana, looking for partners all over the world to offer the best quality and the most fun experience to ride.

Today, we are proud to  invite YOU to be part of that journey. Today, we seek your help to start production and allow the world to enjoy the Juana experience.

 

Are you a leader or a follower? Join the #Juanafamily, simply the best e-bikes.

 

We have designed an e-bike that will make your friends jealous, your mother cautiously amazed,  and your partner drool. We’re here to delight you and awe the people around you, all while providing one of the best e-bikes on the market. 

Juana is built with a strong and resistant aluminum frame, able to hold up to 150kg of weight. Its astounding design allows to accommodate passengers from 1.50m up to 1.90m,

Start flowing in style. Start riding with attitude. Get anywhere in a flash with up to 750w and 40km/h. Best in class Samsung batteries guarantee quality and up to 45km autonomy in a single charge.

Juana has the best you can ask for: Shimano 6-speed gears with easy gear shifting for seamless riding, LCD display to track your speed and all your adventures and Tektro disc brake system for a secure and clean break.

For our launch, we are offering four unique colours: Night Black, Red Santa, Silvery Grey and Olive Green.

 

 

Juana boasts of a very powerful motor of up to 750W combined with an impressive up to 48V battery and controller across all models. You will feel the acceleration and speed instantly. The fast experience one pedal away. 

We’ve introduced Shimano 6-speed gearing with improved easy-gear shifting. Go through your adventures without breaking a sweat. No battery? No problem. 

It also includes an LCD display in black and white with 6 different assist levels by default. We also offer the option to upgrade to a Colour SMART beautiful display for only 80 € (110 € market value).

Your safety is at the core of Juana, so we have geared with Tektro disc braking system, including levers and calipers,. We’re currently offering new generation hydraulic braking systems for 110€ upgrade, which provides smoother braking with less braking force. 

 

 

 

 

Best things come in two. For that reason we have brought two different Juanas, very similar, but at the same time very different.

Don't get fouled by the appearances as at first glance they seem identical. We are glad to present: Juana La Cubana and Juana la Loca.

The major difference between them is the power. Juana La Cubana has a 250w36v Bafang motor and a 36v13.6ah samsung battery with a maximum speed of 25km/h. On the other hand, Juana La Loca has a 750w48v Bafang motor and a 48v17.5ah samsung battery with a maximum speed of 45km/h.

But there's more. Juana La Loca comes equipped with a big badass motorcycle front light and a thumb throttle.

Juana la Cubana is fully compliant with the EU regulation. Juana la Cubana falls into the "pedaled" category, which means you can ride it like any normal bike, on public and private streets and without any license, license plate or vehicle registration

Even though Juana la Loca can be legally sold in the EU, it can not be ridden on public streets without doing a prior vehicle registration with your local traffic administration. It is considered a "motor cycle" and therefore needs a license and an assurance. Juana is not responsible for doing vehicle registrations and use the clients does.

You can check all the specs in the next table:

We recommend European riders to select Juana la Cubana (250w) since you will be able to ride it anywhere without the need of a license, license plate or vehicle registration.

 

 

 

 

We are Alex and Pablo, two best friends from Spain. We both share a passion for bicycles, design and sustainability. Our vision was to create cool, unique and powerful e-bikes that are not only extremely fun to ride but also would drop jaws along its way.

We are hungry and knowledgeable - Pablo has extensive experience in the mobility industry and Alex in manufacturing and logistics. We also share entrepreneurial skills and business development talents. This unique mix , brings out the best of both to ensure an enormous success.

 

 

 

Even though Juana is already incredible as it comes, we understand if you want additional add-ons to make your Juana as unique as possible and to fit it to your needs.

 

 

 

We don't like to over complicate things.

 

We are dreamers, but we also keep our feet on the ground. That is why our goal is to raise 20.000€. This amount will be enough for us to start producing the first Juanas and spread the word.

If you back our project for a Juana, get ready to be treated like you deserve – early backers will have the unique opportunity to fully customize their own Juana. 

If we don't reach the goal, we will continue to work and listen to your feedback. Money will be refunded and we promise to come back stronger than ever. We won't stop working, we want to be the best.

We won't lie, this will not be an easy journey, but we are dreamers, we are fighters, we are hard workers and we will never stop reinventing ourselves. E-bike regulation is strict and has many limitations. Moreover, import and export barriers are difficult to overcome. 

While we will find more hurdles on the way, we are not afraid. We see problems as challenges and we love them. We never said this would be easy but impossible does not exist in our dictionary.

 

 

We want to lead the future of mobility by taking care of our planet, but we cannot do it alone.

Don´t worry if you cannot make a contribution - spreading the word is one of the best ways you can help. Indiegogo’s sharing functionalities are great, but any other way you can spread our work will be greatly appreciated. Mention us on Twitter, share the Juana on your Instagram story (https://www.instagram.com/juanacletas/), or post our bikes on your Facebook feed. 

 

Join our journey. Join the #Juanafamily. Make some noise.

story:
Short Summary

Our band is trying to build funds to help cover the costs of shooting 4 new music videos. to achieve this, we are projecting to be short by roughly $1500.

  • With your contribution we will be able to cover to expenses of a director and videographer, as well as paying for locations and items needed on set such as lights and rights.

What We Need

We will be shooting the music videos starting 11/14/2019 and ending 11/19/19. During that time we will need:

  • Locations
  • Funding for hired help
  • tons of extras - who tend to get hungry and thirsty between shots

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Locations: big open areas such as warehouses / bar scene or venue
  • Sharing our music and sharing our goals with friends/ family who could potentially invest in our goals

And that's all there is to it.

story:
We've all heard of a friend whose tires and rims were stolen and had to spend thousands of dollars in new ones. 

Tire robbery is a huge problem around the world: In México around every 5 minutes there is a tire robbery, in the US around every 7 minutes, in Argentina every 5 minutes, just to  mention some  countries. 

For thieves it is easy and fast money (they need around 90 seconds to steal your tires) and the security devices in the market can't stop them to rob you, they just break the locking lug nuts and level sensors active the alarm when they lift the car and it is too late.

An average set of tires and rims cost between $500 and $2,000 USD and all of us work hard to buy our stuff to allow easy money lovers steal them.

Locke-T solves this problem by activating the alarm in the moment that one sensor is removed from the screw. Thieves will run away in that moment leaving behind the tire in the car.


How does it work?


To steal a tire, the thieves have to remove the screws, but what would happen if before they can remove these, the alarm goes off? Yes, they will run away leaving the tire behind.

To accomplish this goal, we have developed the Locke-T Sensors. These devices are attached to one screw in each wheel in the car. Using Bluetooth Low Energy technology, they send a signal every 5 seconds to the master device connected to the alarm system inside the car, this way if the sensor is removed, it will send a signal and the alarm will go active. If someone breaks the sensors, the master will not receive the signal and the alarm will go active.

For de screw detection we used presence sensor like "push button". The PCB has two pins, when they are in contact (push button pressed) the sensor is detected and if someone tries to remove it, the pins will not be in contact (push button released) and the alarm will go active.

In short words: There is no way to take off a tire without the alarm being activated.


Monitoring the state and the battery


Monitor the state and the battery of the Sensors is a very important task because this way your tires and rims will be protected all the time. You can do this with your smartphone with Android or iOS App and it is very simple.


With the Locke-T App you can put the system in StandBy mode if you need to change a tire, and start it again once you have finished.


How to install Locke-T 


Install process of the System is very simple.

For the master: You have to connect it to the car's battery and to the Alarm System.

For the sensors: You need to put the battery on and put one sensor in one screw of each wheel.

Once is done, you just need to add a new system with your smartphone and the Locke-T App and follow the steps to add all the sensors. Once you have finished this step your tires and rims will be protected!


Setting up a new system or sensor


If you have lost a Locke-T Sensor or you need to replace it, you can do it with the Locke-T App and it is very simple. Follow the steps inside the app and it will be active in a few minutes!


Why we need your help

This is our first campaign and the first time we launch a product at international level and we want to get it right. We do know how to develop technology devices and how to manufacture, but we need your help to spread the word so we can keep going on the development and launch our first production.

We will be asking some of our first contributors to be a part of our BTP (Beta Testing Program) where they will get a Locke-T Beta version to test it and give us some feedback to  get it perfect.


Where we are in the development

We have finished the prototype of the Locke-T Sensors plastic case and we are developing the first set of electronics prototypes of these and the Locke-T master. We are in the stage of writing the code for the wireless communication protocol between the Locke-T Sensors, Master and Smartphones. The next stage is Testing the electronic prototypes with the code and the App and make the first Debug.


Development Timeline

June / July 2015.-  App, Master and Sensor Code writing

August 2015.-  Alfa PCB testing and corrections 

September 2015.-  Beta PCB testing 

October 2015.- Alfa plastic case testing and corrections (if any)

November / December 2015.- Beta plastic case testing and Beta testing with contributors.

January 2016.- Public Release


What you get with your order of Locke-T

Each Locke-T System Comes with the following:

  • 1 Master
  • 4 Screw Sensors (with CR2032 batteries included)
  • Power and signal wires
  • Free LOCKE-T App to be downloaded from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store 

Challenges

In every technology development there are several challenges. In the Locke-T development the first one was to design a PCB as tiny as a watch battery that could fit in the screw head and the rim, and we made it possible. Then the next challenge was to make a beautiful but simple design for the Sensor capable to operate under extreme climate and the heat of the screw when you hit the road, and we got it. The next challenges are the correct code writing and the Alfa and Beta testing of the PCB's but we are getting the job done.


Technical Details 

The Sensor measures are 23x30 mm like shown in the image above. This makes it fit perfectly in the rim and it is available for the 2 most common measures of screws: 17mm and 3/4".


IMPORTANT: PLEASE SELECT THE CORRECT MEASURE OF YOUR SCREWS (17mm OR 3/4").

  • Operational Temperature Range: -40 to 85ºC
  • Locke-T Sensor Battery Life: up to 1 year (at 25°C rated temperature)
  • Wireless communication: Bluetooth 4.0
  • Locke-T Master Power Source: 12-24 VDC (car's battery). 
  • Locke-T Sensor battery: CR2032 (common watch battery)
  • Detection mode: 2 laminated pins working as a push button (if making contact with the screw, the sensor is active and detecting. If is not making contact with the screw, the sensor is active but not detecting the screw). 

Extra Sensor for your spare tire?


If you have your Spare Tire exposed in the back of your car, you can get One Extra Sensor and Add it to your Locke-T System. Each System can monitor and communicate with up to 5 Sensors.


FAQs:

  • What is the Locke-T warranty?
        The Locke-T is covered by 1 year limited manufacturer's warranty.
        We dedicate all our efforts to your complete satisfaction, so if you have any                 problems please contact our support team at contact.locke.t@gmail.com and             we will back to you as soon as possible to fulfill your request.

  • How much is shipping?
        International orders will require an additional contribution for shipping on top of         the amount paid for the Perk (please see the details listed in each of the Perks).

  • How you manage International orders?

       For international customers:  Please add the required additional contribution           for shipping only.  Note that the buyer is responsible for all duties, taxes, or                 other fees which may be added on import/delivery.

        * If you forgot to add the additional contribution to your order, please place a               separate order with the required amount and we will link it to your original                     order.


  • Which mobile devices does Locke-T App work with?
         Locke-T works only with Android and iOS smartphones with Bluetooth 4.0.                  Please ensure you update to latest OS, at least Android 4.3 and iOS7.1.

  • Does the Locket master send a notice to my phone if there is any problem?
        Yes, but only if you are in the range of 30 m line of sight. This is due Bluetooth             4.0 range, but remember: The important thing here is to set the alarm ON if             there is something wrong with your tires (If someone is trying to steal them). 

  • What if I have 13/16" or 7/8" screws in my car's tires?
         Please send us an email with the size of your car's screws size and we will                      consider it for the next production.

  • What happens if there is more than one person using my car?
         You can share your Locke-T installed on your tires with your family and friends.          A key will be send to their email address that will be used to log in to their                      Locke-T account.

  • Do the Locke-T Sensors can handle the extreme conditions such as the tire is exposed to?
        Yes, Locke-T Sensors are made to work in extreme conditions such as rain and           mud to ensure long durability and reliability.

  • How often should I replace the Sensors batteries?
        Locke-T Sensors uses common CR2032 batteries that will last up to one year,             you can change the batteries whenever you want and it is a very easy task.

  • Who should I contact for further questions about Locke-T and my order?
         Please contact us to: contact.locke.t@gmail.com and we will get back to you as          soon as possible to fulfill your request.

Other ways you can help

Please help us to spread the word about Locke-T with your friends and family and share this great product with them, it might save them hundreds of dollars in new tires.

Together we can reduce Tire Robbery around the world!

To contact us directly, you can write to us at: contact.locke.t@gmail.com


THANK YOU!

Other ways you can help

Please help us to spread the word about Locke-T with your friends and family and share this great product with them, it might save them hundreds of dollars in new tires.
Together we can reduce Tire Robbery around the world!
To contact us directly, you can write to us at: contact.locke.t@gmail.com

THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

We are Mack and Joe from M&J technology and our product is the automatic turn signal. The goal of our product is to making driving safer for our customers and help prevent accidents on the roadways. It is saddening to us to watch families suffer year after year from car accidents that could have been avoided if the driver would have made a smarter decision. Our product will take some of the human error out of driving and allow our customers to get from point A to point B safely. 

What We Need & What You Get

We believe that we need 1,000,000 dollars to get started and get this idea into the hands of experts who can further develop this product and make it become a reality. We are offering our donors the following perks for their generous contributions

 $1- thank you email

 $5- feature on website

 $20- auto turn signal t-shirt

 $2,000- free installation when product launches 


Risks & Challenges

The risks of this project are that the technology may not be easily developed, we will have to find the right people and the right tools to get this into automobiles. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute you can still help us by getting this idea out into the fast growing world of technology and into the hands of people who would be willing to work with us.
