story:
The idea of the Leafxpro became real when we decided that riding our bicycles on sunny days just wasn't enough. We questioned ourselves why people tend to use limiting transportions when they can have the freedom of just picking up their bikes and ride as they please without the stress of car congestions, schedules or overcrowded buses and trains! So we started thinking that there had to be an efficient, durable, versatile, comfortable, stylish, ergonomic and easy to use way to ride from A to B, even with bad weather conditions.

During the last two years we researched, designed and tested the best materials and structures so we could create the easiest and safest bicycles umbrella: the Leafxpro!

We need your help to speed up the manufacturing process so we can deliver to the promise of becoming a sustainable mobility product and improve peoples lives.

Thanks for your support!


                   





The Leafxpro kit is modular so that the user can adjust the degree of protection depending on all kind of weather conditions.

There are two accessories that can be attach to the Leafxpro: the Storm Accessory and the Baby Accessory.

The Storm Accessory provides rear and side protection to the rider, and the two side panels can be detached through a couple of zippers.

The Baby Accessory provides protection to children transported in their baby seats. This accessory can also be combined with the Storm Accessory to provide safety to both, the rider and the child.


STORM ACCESSORY





BABY ACCESSORY











After placing the permanent fasteners on the bike, the Leafxpro is very easy to assemble or disassemble without the need of special tools.

This mounting process is simple and fast (about 1 minute) with just a few steps:

- The structure is removed from the bag and expanded;

- The structure is secured by fasteners to the bike;

- The structure is tensioned




The Leafxpro and it's accessories are highly adjustable to the height of the user,  optimizing therefore the aerodynamics of the product and the comfort for the user. 


                  


To create a protective material that is light, functional, easy to use and secure,
our engineers had to take inspiration from mother nature.
The main goal was to create a product with a high performance form factor and at the same time it needed to be resistant enough to withstand winds up to 50mph (80km/h) so it wouldn't gain the umbrella effect.

We submitted the Leafxpro to a lot of tests so we could find out the true resistance of the entire structure and the most impressive one is shown below where the entire structure of the Leafxpro supports the weight of the bicycle without any dificulty! Truely impressive!


RESISTANCE TEST




Aerodynamics was a critical in the development process of the structure. It was essential because through it cyclists can easily overcome the resistance of air, even when there are very strong headwinds!

The wedge-shaped form factor of the front, combined with all aerodynamic flow channels on the side and rear, provide a smooth ride.





The Leafxpro and it's accessories are highly compatible with almost any city bike!


Your bicycle may have a handlebar with different formfactors (straight, curved or U-shaped). The only requirement is it must have a width between 48cm and 65cm.


















The Leafxpro is lightweight, compact and easy to transport. It accommodates quite easily anywhere and it can also be carried on the bike or on the back of the cyclist in a simple and quick way.

Weight: 2 lbs. (+/- 900gr)
Dimensions: height +/- 30in (75cm);  width +/- 2,5in (7cm)


 

       PRACTICAL INSIDE POCKETS


               









DOWNLOAD



WANT TO BE OUR RETAILER?

geral@leafxpro.com



TEAM

Co-Founder and CEO: Teresa C. Lima

Co-Founder and Engineer: Manuel B. Miranda
Engineer: Bruno A. Magalhães
Graphic Designer: André Sobreiro
Motion Designer & Marketeer: Cláudio Barbosa

story:
SMARTIE - The Smartest, Safest & Lightest eBike...EVER!

Designed with innovative technology and safety features to give you the best riding experience possible! SMARTIE can go 20mph and up to 35 miles on a single charge!

Super lightweight &  folds up in seconds. SMARTIE only weighs 16 kg and it's designed to fit small spaces (offices, car trunk, apartments, etc) and get you where you want to go all without breaking a sweat. Although, you can if you want to!

 

 

 

Why Did We Develop SMARTIE?

We believe that more people should get outside and be active! SMARTIE is a high tech & fun way of getting to work or around town that doesn't require the use of your car. It's great for getting exercise and it helps cuts down on car pollution. Plus, did we mention...It's Fun!

Quick & Easy Folding Design

 

Quickly fold up SMARTIE in seconds! Easily fits in your car trunk, office space, apartment. Take it on the bus, subway, etc!

 

 

Integrated Bluetooth App

You can control many of the bike's features directly from your phone! Change the handle bar light color; Lock the bike's motor when not in use; Turn headlight on/off; View the bike's speed & distance traveled; Use GPS & maps to get around.

 

We knew that the SMARTIE had to be safe. That why we loaded it with safety features!

 

Bright, Integrated Headlight

The bright headlight helps you see where you're going when it's dark out. It also helps you be seen. The light runs on the bike's battery power so you never have to worry about changing batteries.

 

 

Colorful Handle Bar Side Lights - Choose & change the light color (red when braking.)

 

We know that bikes can sometimes be hard to see... so we made the SMARTIE to be seen from all sides! It' s safe & it's cool!

The side lights can be changed to the color of your choice when running and they turn red when you brake.

 

 

Large, Flashing Tail Light

The large tail light helps increase your visibility. It helps you stand out and be seen!

 

 

 Front & Rear Disc Brakes 

We've also included front & rear disc brakes to give you safe, reliable stopping power. 

 

 

__________________________________________________________________________________

Three Models to Choose From

 

  • SMARTIE - 250W  This model has no throttle and is legal in the UK / EU. It has a 250 watt motor and can go 18 mph.
  •  
  • SMARTIE - 250W+ Has a 250 watt motor & thumb throttle.  It can go 18 mph.
  •  
  • SMARTIE - 350W Has a 350 watt motor and thumb throttle.  It can go 20 mph.

All SMARTIE models have the same innovative technology & safety features.

*All models are street legal in the US - no license required!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Three Ways to use SMARTIE

 

1.  Ride just like a regular bike. Go ahead...break a sweat if you want to.

2. Three levels of pedal assistance. You can choose a little help, some extra help...or a lot  of help! 

3. Go full throttle! (Available on 250W+ / 350W models) Feeling tired after a long day at work? No problem! Jump on and power home!

______________________________________________________________________________________

 

SMARTIE Electric Bike - Has Been Featured On:

 

        

    

     

    Technical Specs:

     

    36V 250W & 350W Bafang Motor (depending on model)

    9ah LG Brand Battery

    Weight: 16 kg (35lbs) with battery / 13.6 kg (30lbs) w/o battery

    3 Levels Pedal Assistance

    Thumb Throttle - 18 mph  250W + / 20 mph 350W

    Fits Riders from 5'0" - 6'2"

    Max Load: 240lbs

    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Choose Your Color

    Five Beautiful Colors To Match Your Unique Personality:

    Matte Black w/red wheels; Matte Black w/blue wheels; Brilliant Blue;  Amazing Green & Bright Red

     

     

    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    PERKS

     

     

    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

     

    Who's Behind The SMARTIE?

     

     

    Tammy Bates

     

    The creator of SMARTIE, is an entrepreneur who is passionate about the environment and successfully created a startup company in the field of solar energy.

    She has several years experience in product development and manufacturing and has established business relationships all over the world. 

    She is now very excited to pursue her real passion...helping to get more people outside and on bikes!

    "I wanted to create an electric bike that made people want to get outside...and out of their cars.  I knew that it had to be safe...and fun! Most people wanted something super lightweight on top of it so, we came up with the SMARTIE."

     

    What We Need & What You Get

    Our goal in creating this campaign was to offer a great e-bike to the public at a low price. With the help from our contributors we will be able to get production costs  way down and pass on the huge savings. That's how we can offer the SMARTIE at such a low Early Bird price!

     

    With Your Contribution

    You can help us achieve our goal of getting more people outside, biking and being active! Plus...you get an AWESOME electric bike you can be proud to own!

     

     

    Risks & Challenges

    We are very confident that we will meet our shipping timeline. We have a good working relationship with our manufacturer and have no reason to believe that there will be any delays.

    With that being said, there are always unexpected challenges that may occur which could delay shipping. While we don't anticipate any of that, we believe it's best to be upfront about the possibility....even if it's very slight.

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

     

    We realized not everyone can contribute financially, however there are other ways to help out. Please share this campaign on your social media outlets, etc. It will help out a lot! : )

    _____________________________________________________________________________________

     

    Frequently Asked Questions:

     

    Q:  How much weight can SMARTIE handle?

    A: SMARTIE can handle up to 240lbs / 109kg

    Q:  What size rider does this fit?

    A:  SMARTIE is designed to fit riders from 5'0 to 6'2"

    Q:  How much does SMARTIE weigh?

    A: SMARTIE weighs 13.6 kg (30lbs) without battery & 16 kg (35lbs) w/ battery

    Q: Can the battery be removed?

    A: Yes, the battery has a lock and it can be removed

    Q: How is SMARTIE delivered and is it easy to assemble?

    A:  SMARTIE is shipped 100% fully assembled. However, you may want to have it tuned up and checked out at your local bike store once you receive it.

    Q: Can I still bike SMARTIE if the battery runs out of power?

    A: Yes of course! If the battery runs out of power you can still ride SMARTIE the same as you would a regular bicycle.

    Q: How far can I ride on battery power?

    A: SMARTIE comes with a 9ah LG lithium ion battery. You can go up to 35  miles on a single charge.

    Q: Can I charge the battery by pedaling?

    A: No. Regenerative braking require a Direct Drive Motor which is heavy and not typically used in ebikes. They don’t offer a freewheeling mechanism that insulates the rider from the motor. That’s fine when your battery is charged but once your battery runs out of juice it means that when you pedal, not only do need to move yourself and the bike, but you also need to push against the resistance of the heavy motor. That can make for some very tired legs!

    Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  

    A: The SMARTIE ebike and battery comes with an 18 month manufacturer's warranty. Should you encounter any production related default during that time frame, simply contact our customer support and we'll take care of it. As many elements of a bike may get damaged due to normal cycling use, we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes, chain etc.

    Q: What is your return policy?

    A: SMARTIE is so confident that you'll love your ebike that we offer a 14 days money back guarantee after you've received it, if you are not satisfied. 
    However, if you decide to return it, the SMARTIE ebike must be in new and re-sellable condition.

    Q: Do I need a license to ride SMARTIE?

    A: No. SMARTIE is made to be 100% street legal. All models are street legal in the US. We also have a UK /EU Legal version of SMARTIE (250W and No Throttle.)

    The 250W motor is by default limited according to EN15194 to the top speed of 25 km/h (15.5 mph) and the 350W is limited to 32 km/h (20 mph)

    Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?

    A: The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing.

    Q: Can I get a refund?

    A: Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy Here

story:
About

We started and are based out of proud and strong Lethbridge, Alberta. We started because of you. We started because you demanded an airline that took care of you when flying at a height we never thought could be reached. You are family and together we will reach greater heights 

The problem in the Airline industry today is that consumers are currently treated as Cattle, Sort of like a number on the screen. These companies now focus on the amount of money they can Squeeze out of each individual Client. Before loyal airlines was started One of The clients I interviewed talked about how she spent over 200 dollars Cad on baggage fees for a vacation trip to Mexico, isn’t that ridiculous, but that isn’t even the tip of the iceberg the U.S. airline industry rake in $4.6 billion last year alone on baggage fees. Think about the last time you paid baggage fees 

Secondly, There are a lot of high-cost low-quality airlines out there. Individuals pay up to 200 dollars per trip just to fly out of the Lethbridge Airport in a dingy propeller plane alone. In America the pay half of what we pay and fly out of a regional jet.

Finally, there is no consumer loyalty. Airlines Overbook flights just so they will be able to make the maximum profit per-fight. Which causes paying consumers to lose their seats. There was even a publicized incident, which I am sure you all know about, where they forcibly dragged a paying customer of the plane. when the whole world was outraged, they did some digging into his background and tried to shame him for losing his medical license. Isn’t that just disgusting?

Let’s Talk about the loyal Airline Advantage? Your First Baggage Free up to 25kg, Free Food While Traveling any distance longer than 25 mins, A hostess Included in every flight and Finally first-Class Service for every single costumer.

We aren’t Done there we will have the best in class seating options out of any Airline, Free wifi, Free outlets for charging your devices and lots of leg room so you will be able to stretch out. Our Planes Will also have longer maintenance interval and a 99.5 percent dispatch reliability so you can fully be confident that we will get you to your destination safely and on time.

Risks and challenges

Timeline and budget

Other Ways You Can Help

Sign Up to our newsletter on our website www.loyalairlines.ca

About
We started and are based out of proud and strong Lethbridge, Alberta. We started because of you. We started because you demanded an airline that took care of you when flying at a height we never thought could be reached. You are family and together we will reach greater heights 
The problem in the Airline industry today is that consumers are currently treated as Cattle, Sort of like a number on the screen. These companies now focus on the amount of money they can Squeeze out of each individual Client. Before loyal airlines was started One of The clients I interviewed talked about how she spent over 200 dollars Cad on baggage fees for a vacation trip to Mexico, isn’t that ridiculous, but that isn’t even the tip of the iceberg the U.S. airline industry rake in $4.6 billion last year alone on baggage fees. Think about the last time you paid baggage fees 
Secondly, There are a lot of high-cost low-quality airlines out there. Individuals pay up to 200 dollars per trip just to fly out of the Lethbridge Airport in a dingy propeller plane alone. In America the pay half of what we pay and fly out of a regional jet.
Finally, there is no consumer loyalty. Airlines Overbook flights just so they will be able to make the maximum profit per-fight. Which causes paying consumers to lose their seats. There was even a publicized incident, which I am sure you all know about, where they forcibly dragged a paying customer of the plane. when the whole world was outraged, they did some digging into his background and tried to shame him for losing his medical license. Isn’t that just disgusting?
Let’s Talk about the loyal Airline Advantage? Your First Baggage Free up to 25kg, Free Food While Traveling any distance longer than 25 mins, A hostess Included in every flight and Finally first-Class Service for every single costumer.
We aren’t Done there we will have the best in class seating options out of any Airline, Free wifi, Free outlets for charging your devices and lots of leg room so you will be able to stretch out. Our Planes Will also have longer maintenance interval and a 99.5 percent dispatch reliability so you can fully be confident that we will get you to your destination safely and on time.
Risks and challenges
Timeline and budget

Other Ways You Can Help
Sign Up to our newsletter on our website www.loyalairlines.ca

story:
Is it a motorcycle?  A  moped?   It’s a bicycle with an electric motor.

Bikes made by local craftsmen

Hand made part

Highest quality materials


In the media


Awards


Kosynier gives you an amazing number of possible ways the bike can be built just for you. Our frame allows a modular construction of the bike depending on ideas.


Do you prefer a touring version of the retro electric bike?

Kosynier deLux


maybe you'd like the sports version?

Kosynier Boardtrack


How about a cruiser without the electric motor?

Kosynier Cruiser


Supporters of Kosynier


Kosynier is handcrafted

It's very important to us that as many components as possible are made by local craftsman.

Whenever possible parts will be hand made out of the highest quality materials. Chrome moly tubing is used for the frame, leather is of the highest quality





Kosynier - our familie & craftsmen


Our craftsmen are some of the best in their trade.  They are fantastic people! Many of them didn't take any payment when helping us get started. Instead they wished us success and hope we make it! This gave us wings


Kosynier - specially for you with 6 cameras

Order a Kosynier and see how yours will be assembled.  We have prepared a special idea.  Each assembled bike will be recorded with six cameras . You will receive a video in our special player of your bike being built. You can choose which camera you would like to view with.

                                                

Kosynier on smartphone

We will prepare a special smartphone app, this will provide support for your bike


Kosynier is electric

technical specifications of drives


Kosynier - technical specification


Kosynier Speed- limited edition


It will be something out of the ordinary


Inspired by classic motorcycles that set speed records!  Thus the creation of a unique version, designed by our crew member Mateusz Przystał, who took part in the design of the interior of the latest Ferrari!  It will be an extreme version and production limited to only 31. It will have a electric drives, with a minimum of 8000W on both wheels.  Fairings on the bike will be hand crafted from aluminum. The front fairing is made of carbo fiber. We have already started working on it. We will present it without the front fairing here on indiegogo also on May.

                                                      


Kosynier - testing


 We tested and we will continue to test our bikes in many, and sometimes even extreme places. We want to ensure that they will be made with the highest quality.  But we also have a lot of  fun at the same time.  Here you can also see testing in the winter scenery in one of the most remote parts of Poland, the Bieszczady Mountains.

Next movie...


Kosynier - We Need Your Help

The money will be used for the purchase of materials, from which we can build our bikes. We need to purchase very large quantities of chrome moly tubing for the frames, high quality leather, and other materials to create fenders, seats and “engine” mounts. With support we will be able to cast the aluminum for the fake engine to put the batteries in them.  Your money will help us to buy larger quantities of electric motors and batteries at a lower price.  We can also create the app much quicker.  We dream of the day, when you could see our bikes in stores in Paris, New York, Tokyo or Sydney.  We will be grateful for every dollar!


Kosynier - Timeline


Kosynier - what does it mean?

Kosynier is a Polish partisan in the 19th century.  Armed with a scythe, they fought for their freedom.  Their main motto was „Bronic i Zywic", what does this mean "defend and feed". They were proud, quick, brave and heroic. Poster designed by a very talented graphic artist Jakub Różalski.

                                              


Kosynier - the team

 His is a team assembled with family members and friends.


Kosynier for local children

When we start production, a portion of every sale will go towards the education of the local children. We will organize workshops in design, new technologies, 3D printing, camera operating and many other skills to help develop the imagination and skills of the children.

Why?

Marcin at a young age was a social activist. He organized festivals and charities, so that children from poor families could go on vacation. Later he took on the role of cultural director in his small town. The Bielawski brothers garage is always full of kids. Whether their own, their friends or neighbourhood kids, they are always delighted to see the kids, and the kids love spending time with them.

We want to show them nothing is impossible!!! Even living in a small town, you can realize your dreams throughout the world


 Kosynier – where is it?


 Buk is a small town (population of 6000) near Poznan in western Poland. It is an agricultural and industrial area, where there are many very skilled craftsmen. It is said that the area is a mixture of traits of Poles and Germans. Polish creativity and hard work and German precision. Residents really support us.  Every time we are out, we get best wishes and that they keep their fingers crossed, they tell us they are proud that someone in our small town has created something so cool.

story:
Hello my friends. My name is Nuridin Kaliyev and I am founder of forwarding company TCR GROUP. I have a good background in banking, finance an accounting, marketing and taxation. And my experience is helping me in my business. I am 36 old year and I have started my private business two years ago. At the start we operated as general forwarding agent and we had no own vehicles. I have put turnover capital in business to cover running costs. After 1 year we have took several obsolete trucks and trailers in rent, but it requires a lot of time and funds for repairement. Within last two years we managed to sign long term cotracts with several local and international companies here in Kazakhstan.They are Wilo, IdealTrade, PCA Group, Danone and many others.

But most clients reqires forwarding companies to have a new trucks and trailers in their park to be sure that cargo and goods are in safety. 

For this purpose we have apllied for bank loans in Kazakh banks, but it was unsuccesfull as banks requires collateral covering loan for 200%. We have no such collateral in our assets. 

At the moment there are 5 managers in my staff and our business was growing last two years. 

 

 

What do we want?
Our goal is to raise funds to purchase of new DAF truck with trailer. There are official delear of DAF trucks in Kazakhstan - Bosfor Motors LLC (www.bosformotors.kz/en). So we will have additional warranty for all trucks from producer. 

What we will get - we will be able to:
1) expand the geography of our activities. We will be able to transport cargo not only on the  inside Kazakhstan, but also to other countries of Central and Middle Asia
2) attract new customers and increase traffic for current customers

Our company is a team of young and dedicated professionals. Now our team is trusted by many large companies. And we want to expand our business and give our customers the opportunity to be the market leader.

Of course, there are a lot of other competitors on the market. Our main difference in the market:
1) Mobility.
2) Flexibility in decision-making.
3) Customer focus.
4) Easy adaptation to changing market conditions.

We are not a new company, we are already operating business, which is looking for the opportunity to reach a new level. Due to our advantages, we help our customers to deliver goods on time and without any problems.

story:
Adorable Practicality

After growing fed up with the disposable lookalike cars being pushed out by the industry, we decided to put our hearts, minds and wallets to work in developing a car that fits today's needs, but reminds us of an era when cars were truly adorable. We have spent years working on road-tested prototypes, which never cease to turn heads, and are now coming out on Indiegogo to give the world a chance to become part of our story. Nobe vehicles are the perfect fusion of ageless beauty and modern technology. There is room for three people, and luggage, with range and speed to match — Nobe can easily manage the daily commute, in all weather conditions, and will be happy joining you for a roadtrip as well. The Tripulse 3-wheel drive system optimises stability and output, giving better traction than most cars on the road today, even on sand and snow. The Delta Frame cage comes from our background in building racing cars and utilises the triangular shape of the car for extra strength. Unlike most other cars, the Nobe can also be endlessly upgraded with new bodies, seats, batteries and even motors, putting an end to our throwaway society.

Our mission is to change the car industry by bringing fun, class and sustainability back. We have worked incredibly hard to reach this point and hope you will join us in getting your own Nobe, and to make a sustainable, fun future for everyone.

 

Unique Technology

 

✅Three wheel layout optimised for efficiency, speed and stability

✅ Tripulse all-wheel drive system gives traction in all conditions

✅ Delta Frame safety cage based on race car technology

✅ Innovative dual-battery system

✅ Quality and style both in engineering and design

✅ Car panels are recyclable

Structurally the triangle is the strongest geometric shape — stronger than rectangles or squares. Nobe's triangular shape not only helps to improve drag, it provides a sturdy foundation. The engineers at Nobe have backgrounds in developing racing cars, and that knowledge has been used to develop the unique Delta Frame which provides a strong safety barrier. As the frame is separate from the panels, panels can be changed without causing structural problems. If an accident occurs, the frame can also be safely and easily mended to keep that Nobe on the road.

The Tripulse drive system delivers balances power to all three wheels, giving Nobe superior traction compared to regular 2-wheel-drive cars. Nobe can easily tackle difficult conditions and has great ground clearance to allow it to get through snow and slush. Tripulse also allows Nobe to turn in tight circles, which makes city driving pleasurable.

The twin battery system allows you to plug our unique battery bag for those occasions when you need that extra bit of range.

Additionally Nobe has all the usual practical features you would expect from a daily driver, such as air-conditioning, lighting, ABS regenerative brakes and audio.

A Car for Life

At Nobe, we are making electric driving desirable with an upgradeable, recyclable and sustainable car that doesn’t compromise on style. We want to build a future that means end to the notion of the disposable car, and we have four roads to achieving it:

  • We will make it easy for you to upgrade the batteries, motors and other electronics as technology evolves and we advance the Nobe model, meaning your vehicle is cutting edge for its entire, very long, lifespan.
  • We’ll make it possible for you to upgrade other hardware too. Whether it's wear and tear, external damage or simply a desire to change its colour, you can swap exterior panels for new and recycle the old ones with us.
  • We are a sustainable car maker that will never knowingly contribute to waste. Nobe belongs on the road, not the scrapyard.
  • The Nobe production facilities will be Nanofactories, making max 2000 cars per year, with new markets emerging we will bring new Nanofactories to these markets and not waste energy on shipping.

 

Nobe team

Our history

In 2016 we set out to build a modern classic car where vintage design wasn’t the only thing that would stand the test of time. We dreamed of building a vehicle that harked back to decades past, yet innovative in sustainable design, protecting the planet without compromising driving experience.

Over the past three years we worked tirelessly to develop a model that blended classic car design with innovative technology and are now ready to let our first vehicle onto the road.  

 GENEVA MOTORSHOW: Out of 139 cars BBC picked 10, Nobe 100 among them!

 

  1. https://edition.cnn.com/business/live-news/geneva-motor-show-2019/index.html
  2. https://www.topgear.com/car-news/geneva-motor-show/gallery-these-are-wackiest-cars-geneva-motor-show?fbclid=IwAR0AAYse_bPS9PA6ynbk5mWYnPTR1TqM3-SAxmnUEYDRD-JZ2Fi_oRIci1s#13
  3. https://www.autocar.co.uk/slideshow/hidden-treasures-geneva-motor-show-0
  4. https://www.motortrend.com/news/forbidden-fruit-cars-2019-geneva-motor-show/
  5. https://www.bbc.com/news/av/business-47496026/geneva-motor-show-what-s-the-quirkiest-car-on-display

 

The world’s first Nobe 100 is now a working reality, and a classic car for the future. Born out of one man’s desire to change the world of automobile manufacturing, Nobe is a traffic stopping, head turning smile-maker. It is a three-wheeled electric vintage fantasy of a vehicle, built for anyone looking to live in the spotlight with a cleaner and greener conscience. 

 

Peter Vesterbacka, ex-brand manager at Rovio, Angry Birds

"I fell in love with Nobe the very moment I saw it and pre-ordered the first one. It is a very cool car with an extra special look that also proves there is no need for electric vehicles to look boring. The thing I like about the Nobe 100 is the originality of design and extremely fine developed finish. Every part of the vehicle is made to be easily replaceable, upgradable and reusable.

I have been to 2 test drives and the guys are making excellent progress!"

 

 

The Nobe 100

The Nobe 100 and Nobe 100 GT is the first vehicle to come out of the Nobe HQ, Tallinn. The three-wheel, all-wheel drive EV is a feat of engineering and design thinking. Designed with the vintage sports car in mind, it is a vehicle to make you stop and stare, and a timeless classic for the future of driving. 

 

A really fast car

Nobe’s engineers have turned the manufacturing process on its head, inventing a new way to both build and experience a car. With every element of hardware and software fully upgradeable and recyclable, it stands to bring about an end to the disposable car and create a more sustainable way of driving for today and future generations. 

With top speed of 130 km/h and a maximum 72 kw power, Nobe satisfies the needs of driving enthusiasts and is specially designed with superior grip and 3-wheel drive control for safety in all conditions. With a battery range of up to distances of 260 km, drivers needn’t worry about staying close to home, come rain, snow or shine.

story:
FOR THE BEST RIDE EVER YOU'LL NEED RUBBER BANDS,  PUSHPINS

AND THE JIGLESS

_____________________________________________________________________________

Building  a bicycle from scratch  is a multidisciplinary experience, an excited fabrication process involving art and science, combining design and engineering for the sake of creating a unique bond between the machine and you. With the JIGLESS kit you are about to expand and redefine the D.I.Y concept like never before. taking it to next level of F.I.Y - fabricate it yourself.

_____________________________________________________________________________

The  best bicycle you will ever ride is  a bicycle you build your self, and it should be simple. 

_____________________________________________________________________________


_____________________________________________________________________________


Replacing frame geometry  data for  more communicative, easy to follow visuals.

_____________________________________________________________________________


_____________________________________________________________________________

The JIGLESS kit is simple to assemble just a using pushpins and rubber bands. From setting up  tubes and connectors

_____________________________________________________________________________


_____________________________________________________________________________

To cruising your bike in the urban jungle.

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

Building a bicycle frame is accessible to anyone, anywhere.

_____________________________________________________________________________



_____________________________________________________________________________

JIGLESS is about Reinventing  the way bicycle frame is fabricated.                                  After deep observation on bicycle  frame manufacturing and production technologies, long research and study on materials and engineering, extensive experience in building custom made bicycle, designing fixtures and jigs and riding my bikes thousands of miles, it's about time initiating the first fully operational domestic fabrication unit, unleash the power of 3D desktop printer, in the favor of a new  bicycle frame building concept, made by YOU. 

_____________________________________________________________________________


_____________________________________________________________________________

The JIGLESS kit is  a  comprehensive  bicycle frame building method, based on 3d parametric printed parts, for anyone who wish to explore and challenge the domestic fabrication capabilities. 

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

Parametric 3d printed Micro-Structures.

 one of many issues the project deal with is reducing kit's parts weight without  compromising accuracy and tolerance. this led to a whole new building concept: MS (about 2-5 gram each) holding and connecting tubes in place during the making process. the overall package weight  (printed and metal parts for frame) is around 1 kg. in fact the JIGLESS is the lightest bicycle frame building complete system ever produce before. why is that so important?  it reduces the shipping cost dramatically for you. 

____________________________________________________________________________



 

_____________________________________________________________________________


The JIGLESS kit contains a full set of pre cut light aluminum  profiles+tubes and 3D printed parts made of PLA. No special tooling or heavy duty hardware is needed for the JIG (it's jig less, remember?) setup and the frame building process. In fact the kit includes one screw only.

_____________________________________________________________________________


_____________________________________________________________________________

Tubes and profiles are pre-cut to precise measurement,  no need for tube mitering. 

_____________________________________________________________________________






_____________________________________________________________________________

Beta version JIGLESS kit.

 the kit includes all the essentials:

Printed  parts
Lug-cores (tube connectors) 
Micro-structures 

Metal parts
full tube set and dropouts  


_____________________________________________________________________________





_____________________________________________________________________________

Each tube is easy set to accurate position by the JIGLESS micro-structures and lug-cores auto alignment concept. 

_____________________________________________________________________________

JIGLESS beta frame.



Aluminium and jeans bicycle.

...second jigless bicycle frame is now on thy way, updates soon..

_____________________________________________________________________________

Simplicity by accessibility:  domestic manufacturing outcomes should be hi end and low cost. the process of making should be silent, clean and generally speaking, maintain a minimum impact on the surroundings, i would like an extra small footprint please...  for that reason: A workshop, heavy industrial machinery, expansive power tool, exotic hand tools and professional experience are not required to execute your own made jigless frame project.  

_____________________________________________________________________________

THE JIGLESS METHODIs divided into 4 modules, each module consist of easy to follow steps for completing your bicycle frame:

1. setup - denim harvest, measuring, masking, marking tubes

2. tacking - connecting tubes and lugs cores together

3. wrapping - reinforcing lugs and tubes with composite (epoxy+denim fiber) 

4. finishing -  filing, sanding, coating lugs

*Exclusive footage and Detailed  tutorials will be published during the campaign.



_____________________________________________________________________________

MAKE IT ACCESSIBLE BY ALL MEANS

Economical - design the inclusive concept to be affordable. to do so we share some responsibilities: b(u)y your self  means getting tools+materials+disposals (some are part of any basic household) will save you a lot of money while letting me focus on the jigless kit critical design attributes. all the  "around the kit stuff"  can be bought at any local hardware shop or over the internet. the kit includes all the essentials (tubes, profiles,lugs cores and microstructure) all other 'means of production' are easy to get any where. Less than 1 kg package weight - saves a lot on international shipping rate. 

Location - no need for designated space for building your bicycle frame, most making process can be done in your living room, while listing your favorite music.

Schedule - at your own pace. after work, on weekends, the next holiday,  it should take about 15-20 hours to complete one frame.

Tools* - your old basic tool box should be enough, check the b.o.m for a full list. 

Materials* - at your local hardware\online shops.

Know how - fully documented footage,  video tutorials of the making process, will be published on the indiegogo campaign page as well as on tagmenot.com               no need for professional skills or pre knowledge. bring on just tons of curiosity..

More info - useful links covering many aspect of  bicycle at the bottom of the page.

*while waiting your kit to arrive, you can take care the b.o.m (bill of materials and tools) so you are ready to start your project as soon as you get your kit.

_____________________________________________________________________________

THE PERK 

One perk only, Simple and straightforward approach: a perk is the jigless kit.  

 144 $ for all metal and 3d printed parts to build your own bicycle frame. 

first crowdfunding stage - the campaign  goal is to place 100 hand made (your hands) jigless bicycle on road.
100 kits is 14,400 $ for initiating fully domestic fabrication site at our house. according to house infrastructures and  resources and without interfering family daily routine,  the first batch will be 100 jigless kits. 

reaching the projects finance goal will lead to second phase of the project. (read more about it in "what else need to be done" section)

You may choose from 3 different frame  sizes S1, M2 or L3
How tall are you?

155cm-165cm\5'1"-5'5"-  choose frame  S1  

165cm-175cm\5'5"-5'9" choose frame M2 

175cm-185cm\5'9"-6'1" choose frame  L3


You get all essentials for building your bicycle frame project.

The JIGLESS  frame building kit (the perk) includes all tubes and  connectors: 

Printed  parts 

Lug-cores (tube connectors) 

Micro-structures 

Metal parts

full tube set and dropouts  made of light aluminum

1 down tube

1 top tube

1 seat tube

1 head tube (ready for headset install)

1 bottom bracket shell (made of cromo 4130), 68 m"m width, english threaded

2 chainstay aluminium  profiles

2 seat tube  aluminium profiles

laser cut 2 horizontal  aluminium dropout

1 screw 4mm|30mm

 

***the perk does not include international air shipping fare*** 

Dear internationals supporters, add 25$ shipping  cost to the perk

Dear local supporters, add 10$ shipping  cost to the perk

how do i contribute to the jigless project

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word about the JIGLESS concept across all of your social media channels. thank you.

_____________________________________________________________________________

THE BICYCLE

You are building your very own single speed bicycle.

the frame  is  designed   specifically for the jigless project.

3 frame sizes to choose from: how tall are you?

 155cm-165cm\5'1"-5'5"-  choose frame  #S1 

165cm-175cm\5'5"-5'9"  choose frame  #M2 

175cm-185cm\5'9"-6'1"  choose frame  #L3


The bicycle can be configured to accommodate any riding style, depends on components you choose to install after frame is done.








The  bicycle frame you build will accept:

1-1/8" threadless headset

120, 130, 135  O.L.D rear wheel (follow instructions  about dropout microstructure)

27.2 mm\28.6 mm seatpost  (27.2 with shim)

68mm English thread bottom bracket

Accommodate  650-700\32mm and 26\1.5" tires

More info about body and frame sizing at bottom of the page.  useful links section at bottom.

_____________________________________________________________________________

The first beta frame based on the jigless method is proved  and realized the concept potential, still there some  aspects that need to be addressed  before it can be delivered to you.

what else need to be done to fulfill the domestic fabrication unit vision?
Expanding domestic fabrication  capabilities! 

first phase funding:  the engineering and design flexibility inherited in the fabrication process will allow further fixtures and advanced micro-structure to be developed during the campaign. 

Optimizing and  improving metal parts and 3d printed  parts manufacturing and assembly line. 

Video and audio production equipment (buying or renting) for live session recording, hands on tutorials  of the making process.

Graphic design, technical  illustrations, packaging.

if reaching project set goal:  100 Jigless kits before campaign ends ,the jigless project  may continue to second phase funding:

Complete development range of frame sizes, geometries and styles.  (a vertical dropout for gears and disc brakes mounting, internal cable routing  and later on tandem and fat bike frames).

Establishing a bicycle  frame building institute, conducting workshops, teaching the jigless method and spreading the domestic fabrication concept  for as many people as possible.

Offering  fully personalized bicycle frame based on the rider preferences,  biomechanics and style.

Publishing an e-book.  the know how of domestic fabrication.

Developing  app\software 

If you're excited about the JIGLESS project and want to help out, keep in mind that sharing links to the campaign by email or social media is one of the very best ways to spread the word.

_____________________________________________________________________________

CRAFTECHNOLOGY 

The fabrication process by JIGLESS  offers an encounter of analogical product with digital technology resulting in hi tech craft outcome.

_____________________________________________________________________________




_____________________________________________________________________________

HIGH END HOME MADE expanding the boundaries of domestic fabrication means that people can revalue their daily objects by being part of the making process. by providing accessible  F.I.Y scenarios you may take meaningful part in manufacturing Decentralization. building your own bicycle frame is an independence declaration,  it's about regain control over our abilities, making a clear and bold statement about who  you are in a post industrial era,  or simply enjoying your creation and the way it rolls and sounds on pavement.

_____________________________________________________________________________





_____________________________________________________________________________

Desktop  3d printing becomes a legit mean of mass personalization production, custom accurate, high tolerance low cost parametric parts can easily be changed and reproduced. anywhere, any time.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Smart lug core was designed specifically to meet requirements  of the JIGLESS.





 5th.gen LugCore

2nd,gen LugCore
            
_____________________________________________________________________________ 

COMPOSITE MATERIALS: the fiber part

upcycling your used (or favorite one) blue jeans and transform it  into a  denim micarta  - super strong tube connector







My favorite  pair of jeans. 


Rotary cutter for fabrics




Denim fiber ribbons


Finished denim micarta lug, epoxy resin and fibers. 


Aluminum and jeans, lugs sculpting to take final shape


After filing and sanding, the remains: denim dust and P.L.A particles. most printed parts of the jigless kit will be consumed throughout the making process. no worries about storing parts after building has complete.

_____________________________________________________________________________

COMPOSITE MATERIALS: THE EPOXY PART







 Epoxy spec to look for :

1.  room temperature curing

2. 40 -50 minute pot life 

3.  low viscosity.

*epoxy resin and hardener is not included in the JIGLESS kit due to air shipping regulations.  check out more info section. 

_____________________________________________________________________________

  TOOLING

 The JIGLESS method is about reducing tooling cost,  95% of labor is done with a simple half rounded  rasp and file. available on any online and  local hardware store.





You won't need ear protection.
_____________________________________________________________________________ 

 DISPOSALS 



Saving money means you put your effort into it, you will need to acquire some basic items, which can be bought from your local hardware store, pharmacy, online shops, or found in your tool box.


____________________________________________________________________________

Things you might have or get while waiting your jigless kit to arrive, check your toolbox for tools and materials before you buy. 


 4-In-1 Rasp & File

                                     

 Rubber Mallet

Screwdriver

 Adjustable Wrench

 Measuring Tape

 Contour Rotary Cutter

 Scissors 


 General-Purpose Gloves

 Safety Glasses

 Dust Mask

Metal Epoxy Putty

 PVC Insulating Electrical Tape

Push Pins 

 Rubber Bands 

3M Aluminum Oxide Sandpaper, 9 in x 11 

 Denatured Alcohol Solvent

 Plastic bowl

Vaseline 

 

MDF Panel  10-15 mm thick x 700 mm. x 1000 mm

 0.500 in. x 30 in. x 40 in. 

White Paper Towels 

_____________________________________________________________________________
The jigless process table


_____________________________________________________________________________
AFTER FRAME IS SET AND DONE
2 options: either you have all necessary tools for complete installation by your self, or you go to your LBS (local bicycle shop) and let them install all parts for you, installing components the right way needs to be done by proper tools and experience.

           

                            +

fork
stem
handlebar

pedals

_____________________________________________________________________________

The jigless kit and assembly instructions were developed  according to TAG.ME.NOT best knowledge and practice. By using JIGLESS KIT, you accept the inherent risk of fabricate things yourself. tag.me.not is  not responsible on your making process and results. 

Always make sure you use your mind and senses, engage with your surroundings, because no one can do so for you.

_____________________________________________________________________________Q&A

1. can i use the JIGLESS kit to build a lot of bicycle frames?

 A kit is  one  bicycle frame. if you are planning  to become a professional bike builder you should look for heavy duty  equipment and  professional training.

2. is there any special tools needed for the project?

if you will look at your toolbox you might find most tools

3. do i need a workshop for my frame project?

most process can be done at the comfort of your  living room.
4. do i need pre knowledge or advanced technical skills to make my own frame?
the jigless kit was designed for use by a person that never thought he will build a bicycle. having additional knowledge or maker skills it's always a good idea, but totally necessary.
5. does the jigless kit includes wheels, saddle, handlebar...?
the kit includes all frame structure essentials (metal tubes and printed parts).
no other components is supplied with kit.

_____________________________________________________________________________Q&A
1. can i use the JIGLESS kit to build a lot of bicycle frames?
 A kit is  one  bicycle frame. if you are planning  to become a professional bike builder you should look for heavy duty  equipment and  professional training.2. is there any special tools needed for the project?
if you will look at your toolbox you might find most tools
3. do i need a workshop for my frame project?
most process can be done at the comfort of your  living room.
4. do i need pre knowledge or advanced technical skills to make my own frame?
the jigless kit was designed for use by a person that never thought he will build a bicycle. having additional knowledge or maker skills it's always a good idea, but totally necessary.


5. does the jigless kit includes wheels, saddle, handlebar...?
the kit includes all frame structure essentials (metal tubes and printed parts).
no other components is supplied with kit.

story:
What surrounds us affects us more than we can imagine. We are all accustomed to the visual pollution caused by constantly growing number of cars parked on sidewalks, yards, and even lawns. We do not even notice it, but take a moment to look around and you will find that instead of green and nice environment around us there is one large parking lot.

According to world's statistics, the number of households with two or more cars has accelerated by more than half a million in the past year, This creates a major issue to find a room for all family vehicles in the yard or garage. Furthermore, people are used to store many other things in garage, so it limits space for both car, and other things like bike or lawn mower. Obviously, it’s not comfortable and it creates a risk of car being scratched. Besides, home owners who have no garage are exposed to car theft or vandalism actions. Also, they are more sensitive to weather impact.

CARLIFT is a Smart Solution of this Problem

Our proposed underground car parking system ensures owner’s comfort, guarantees full vehicle protection, and at the same time has no visual impact on surrounding area. Our system is designed to accommodate almost any type of car, including luxury ones and SUV’s.

Compared with traditional garage, up to 70% less land area & up to 50% smaller building volume are needed for parking an equivalent number of cars.
This gives its owner such benefits as:
- adding more parking spaces;
- utilizing more area for non-parking purposes;
- maintaining a clean environment by maximizing green spaces.

The system involves installing a concrete pit that is equipped with elevating platform (hydraulic scissors lift  with up to 5 tons (11023.11 lbs) load capacity) which hosts the vehicle on the required level (ground floor or basement). 

The pit walls are made of reinforced concrete and are waterproof. It is entirely invisible from outside, as top platform is covered with the same material as nearby ground (asphalt, gravels, grass, etc.), thus ensuring that the system blends in perfectly with surrounding area.

We are not the ones, who have invented this type of parking, but we are definitely the first to present you a really smart and user friendly underground car parking system. 
Let us introduce our unique features below:

With garage car lift, you can double your parking space by parking car underneath another one. This way cars can be moved independently. No need to pick and choose who gets garage privileges anymore! No need of planning parking according to who needs to leave the house first!

It helps to position car on parking platform and avoid any damage during parking lot movement. System consists of infrared sensors and LED display – located in front of driver’s eyes, to navigate and inform driver on car position by showing animated instructions.

GPS location tracker identifies once system owner's smartphone has reached “home zone” and thus sends automatic notification on the mobile phone asking for a confirmation on lift movement. You can also set desired distance, or create a time schedule in the app window “settings”.

Installation incorporates a fast-charging station, mounted in the pit, and an electrical socket, integrated in a convenient location on the platform's pillar for charging electric vehicles, while your car is parked underground. 

A fully automated ventilation (AV) system to obtain continuous air exchange, to control and reduce air humidity, to prevent condensation, and to reduce moisture from cars (rain, snow, ice, etc.). Our AV system considerably helps to prevent mold and corrosion. It consists of ventilation unit with heat exchanger, air temperature & air humidity sensors, and carbon monoxide sensor.

System is intended to remove accumulated water from the pit (appearing due to precipitation, ground water leakage, melted snow on car wheels, etc.). Water is removed to ground or user’s existing rainwater drainage system. A circular gutter around the upper platform is set up to prevent water entering the pit. At the bottom of the pit a slope is created and a drainage pump is installed. Next, two water level electrodes are mounted. Once the first electrode is triggered, the drainage pump automatically turns on. If the second electrode is triggered- user receives a warning through smartphone.

Designed to protect lifting platform from freezing shut to the ground during winter. It consists of an electrical heating mat going over the entire ground-level lifting platform, outdoor and indoor temperature sensors, and relative humidity sensor. The control box measures the weather parameters and according to a control algorithm, determines when there is a risk of freezing. Once risk is detected, electrical heating mat automatically turns on and heats the platform. Another sensor is installed inside the platform's construction, to protect platform from overheating.

In a standard CARLIFT set, hydraulic scissors lift has 5 tons (11023.11 lbs) load capacity (lower and upper platform loads up to 2,5t (5511.6 lbs). It can also be customized upon request, adapting to heavier vehicles, i.e. SUV`s or trucks. 

The system is designed to protect surrounding ones and avoid any injuries when system operates in automatic mode (platform starts raising automatically when user reaches “home zone”).
The following measures are taken to avoid any possible injuries of kids or pets being near the parking place: audible alarm automatically turns on during parking lot movement. In case motion detector with 6 m (19.7 ft) radius detects any movement, the system stops and user receives notification through the app. The audible alarm and motion detector are installed in the manual control panel outside.

You can control whole underground car parking system through our smartphone application. Everything, starting from inside/outside temperature, air humidity, settings of all devices are displayed and can be configured through the app.

How it works:

  • Whole system is controlled by the main controller, installed in the control box;
  • All devices (sensors, switches, electric motors, etc.) are connected to the main controller;
  • The main controller is connected to the Internet via Cable, or Wi-Fi;
  • Main controller is constantly exchanging data with the app – sends information on each device and receives control commands from the app.
  • In case of troubles with communication, or internet connection loss, you can always reach main functions in manual control mode.
  • Main controller  keeps history data of all parameters, so our engineers are available to connect to each individual CARLIFT system and troubleshoot most of the problems remotely via internet.
  • To prevent unauthorized logins, all accounts are password protected.

 

CARLIFT Smartphone Application

 

Color Themes

Four application themes are available: Dark Grey, Marine Blue, Forest Green and Indigo Purple. Because we all love to customize our life.. and apps! :)

CARLIFT smartphone application is suitable both for Android and iOS operating systems, and will be available at App Store and Google Play.

With CARLIFT our environment could look greener. Just imagine, clean, aesthetic, comfortable and safe environment. We could have green yards, flower gardens, chill zones, and kids playgrounds instead of parking lots near our homes.

According to European insurance companies there are multiple car damage and property loss cases registered in car parking lots. This indicates that such parking is a perfect place to thieves and offers poor security. 
With CARLIFT's anti-theft system , you'll be able to feel absolutely calm.
How it works:
There are position switches on both, lifting platform and service trapdoor. If an unauthorized opening is detected an audible alarm turns on and user receives an immediate notification on mobile. CARLIFT can also be connected to user's burglar system, and immediately notify security company of a break-in case.

The main controller can be connected to the internet via a cable or Wi-Fi. Keep in mind, that you can use CARLIFT in manual mode and internet connection is not vital for system to operate.

A service trapdoor is installed to get to underground space by ladder for system maintenance and repairs. The service trapdoor is locked with electromagnetic lock (which is unlocked by turning a key on the outside control panel). The inside light automatically turns on once position switches located on service trapdoor are triggered. 

CARLIFT offers its user remote monitoring and failure diagnosis of all devices (e.g. defrost, drive assist, ventilation, drainage, motion detector, etc.) and gauges (e.g. temperature, CO level, water level) through the app. If any fault is detected, user receives notification. It is possible to fix multiple issues remotely through the app.
User can always connect with our maintenance specialists (24/7 customer support) for their advice or troubleshoot. 

 

Our Perks 

Since now we are at the concept stage , it wouldn't be right to offer our backers an early bird deal or CARLIFT product as a perk.

However, we really want to offer you something that will always remind you that you have supported our idea of CARLIFT and contributed towards creating a greener environment, as well as, a better parking experience for people!

  • Public Acknowledgement - a public acknowledgement for contributing will be posted across all our social media accounts after campaign is over. This perk is included in all subsequent rewards.

  • Contributor Certificates (Bronze, Silver, Gold) -  silk-screen printed and framed certificate with a shiny sticker and signature of CARLIFT‘s founder. It will remind that you have contributed to creation of a more beautiful world through innovative technologies.

  • Platinum Contributor Certificate - laser engraved stainless steel plate on a fine wood base as a sign of our appreciation. Certificate also has a shiny sticker and signature of CARLIFT‘s founder. It will remind that you have contributed to creation of a more beautiful world through innovative technologies.


Risks & Challenges

We are aware of the number of obstacles we may face on the way to achieving our goal, however we are determined to work hard and introduce CARLIFT to the market.

In case we don’t reach Indiegogo's crowdfunding campaign's goal, we will:

- do our best to fulfil the perks;

- keep our backers updated on the status of their perks, as well as, on the rest information concerning our project development;

- invest what is left into improving our project and raising funds needed for manufacturing functioning prototype.

Meet the Team

 

Brief Summary

CARLIFT is a smart underground car parking solution that doubles parking space and provides a better security than a locked garage. Our product is of high-quality, innovative and rare to find, what definitely makes its owner stand out from the crowd. Our competitive advantage is comfortbale and multifunctional remote control & management of parking system. CARLIFT products come in standard sizes or can be customized and adapted upon client's request.

Standard Parameters


How Much? Price for the basic CARLIFT set is going to be $ 10,000.




Extras:

  • Architectural project (topographic photography, geodetic measurements, alignment with existing engineering communications, building permit);
  • Excavation and concreting work (according to the drawings and instructions provided, carried out in conjunction with the construction works of the building, or hired contracting works);
  • Installation (fixed or mobile crane to install the system in the pit);
  • Finishing of the upper platform (coating matching the surrounding land e.g. gravel, grass, asphalt, tiles, or aluminum);
  • EV Charging Station (or integrating existing one);
  • Transportation costs (depending on distance, country and region).

It will be a big investment, but its advantages make completely worth it. The investment will eventually pay for itself as being INNOVATIVE, PRESTIGIOUS, COMFORTABLE & SAFE. 

Already have a garage?

With CARLIFT you can transform your existing garage into a chill area, home cinema, laundry, gym, or kid’s playroom, and you will never have to fear that you will scratch your car while pulling a lawn mover.

Our Product Stage

It is a fully developed concept which includes 3D renderings, demonstrating product functionality and appearance, electro mechanics, engineering, and IT solutions.

Our Timeline

Our Mission, Vision & Business Goals for 2019-2020

 

What We Need 

    To accomplish our goals we need to raise a $85,000. 
    We need your help to make it real. Your support will make private parking more comfortable & safe, as well as, contribute to the greener environment.

    Why Do We Need This Money?

     

    The Story of CARLIFT

    My name is Liutauras. I am an engineer, a husband, a daddy of eight-year-old’s daughter, as well as a founder of CARLIFT. A few years ago, my family and I have built a private house on a countryside. I was watching my daughter playing with other kids near the house, and an idea grew in mind - we all want to live in a green, cozy and beautiful environment. But in a reality cars are getting more and more into our space. Instead of green healthy neighborhood we live in one huge parking lot. Kids are forced to play around the cars and inhale toxic fumes, rather than on the green yards and playgrounds.

    I have shared my idea and vision with more people.. And one day we became a real team. We told ourselves - we will create a product that will not only help millions of people to live in a cleaner, greener and more comfortable environment, but this product will be better than anything else that has been created so far. We have been working on technical and IT solutions for more than a year, and today we are ready to produce a prototype of the smartest underground parking system. To make it real, we need further investments and therefore we need your help.

    Support us, together we can do this!

story:
1. Do you know that each year 8 million air passengers are entitled to compensation for a delayed, canceled or overbooked flight? Surprisingly, only 2 percent of those passengers file a claim with airlines!

 

2. Do you know that you can be entitled to compensation of up to $700 when your flight is delayed, or canceled?

 

3. Do you know that you can be entitled to reimbursement of up to $1,600 when your luggage is damaged, delayed, or lost on an international flight?

4. What are we raising funds for and how do we plan to pull it off?

We are asking for your support to help us spread the word on our great social project. First, we are planning to start an advertisement campaign on Chicago's Blue Line Trains, which run to O'Hare Airport. The minimum monthly fee for such advertisement is $3,000. We need to advertise our service for at least 3 months to have a successful campaign. If we receive more than $10,000 during our Indiegogo campaign, we will be able to share information about our services on a larger scale. 

In exchange for your support, we have created several types of membership plans to our services. The description of the plans is in the pledge section.

5. Which passenger flight rights are violated most frequently?

The most frequently violated air passenger right is the right for reimbursement and compensation. There is a great Latin phrase: “ignorantia legis neminem excusat,” which basically means that ignorance of law excuses no one. For air passengers, this phrase means that even when one doesn’t know or use his or her rights, it doesn’t mean that one doesn’t have or cannot use those rights. As a matter of fact, perhaps because of this reason, the law allows one to file a flight-related claim up to 2 years (or even 7 years in UK) after the issue occurred.

It is important to keep in mind, however, that the kinds of rights afforded to air passengers depend on the country of their residence. They also depend on one’s departure and arrival points. In what follows we make some important distinctions: 

A. In the United States, for example, in the event of domestic delays and cancelations, airlines are not statutorily obligated to compensate anything, and this is a cold and cruel fact. In the event of overbookings in the US, consumer rights protection allows compensation of up to $1350 when you are bumped from a flight.  

More information about your rights in the event of an overbooking in the US is available on our website: 

www.eurodelays.com

 

B. European Union air passenger regulations have a different approach to targeting flight-related issues and efficiently protect air passengers. 

For example, in the events of a flight delay, cancelation, or overbooking, one can receive up to $700 in cash compensation. Some of our clients have received several thousand dollars in compensation for just one flight. Additionally, in some specific circumstances, airlines have to provide their customers hotel accommodations as well as food and refreshments. When dealing with extraordinary circumstances such as strikes, social events, weather conditions, etc. the air passenger has the right to be reimbursed for their ticket. Seat downgrading and luggage issues are also taken into account in the EU consumer protection laws.

To know more about your rights when traveling on an international flight to or from a EU member country please check our website: 

https://www.eurodelays.com

6. Some of the scenarios when flight-related issues are compensated or reimbursed. For more details please visit our website:

 www.eurodelays.com

7. Risks and challenges

There are absolutely no risks, since from the time of our establishment, we have already helped thousands of air passengers.

 

Thank you for your trust in our mission, 

Valeriy V. Sirotyuk, Esq.

CEO & Founder, EuroDelays
story_txt:
1. Do you know that each year 8 million air passengers are entitled to compensation for a delayed, canceled or overbooked flight? Surprisingly, only 2 percent of those passengers file a claim with airlines!


 
2. Do you know that you can be entitled to compensation of up to $700 when your flight is delayed, or canceled?



 
3. Do you know that you can be entitled to reimbursement of up to $1,600 when your luggage is damaged, delayed, or lost on an international flight?


4. What are we raising funds for and how do we plan to pull it off?
We are asking for your support to help us spread the word on our great social project. First, we are planning to start an advertisement campaign on Chicago's Blue Line Trains, which run to O'Hare Airport. The minimum monthly fee for such advertisement is $3,000. We need to advertise our service for at least 3 months to have a successful campaign. If we receive more than $10,000 during our Indiegogo campaign, we will be able to share information about our services on a larger scale. 
In exchange for your support, we have created several types of membership plans to our services. The description of the plans is in the pledge section.
5. Which passenger flight rights are violated most frequently?
The most frequently violated air passenger right is the right for reimbursement and compensation. There is a great Latin phrase: “ignorantia legis neminem excusat,” which basically means that ignorance of law excuses no one. For air passengers, this phrase means that even when one doesn’t know or use his or her rights, it doesn’t mean that one doesn’t have or cannot use those rights. As a matter of fact, perhaps because of this reason, the law allows one to file a flight-related claim up to 2 years (or even 7 years in UK) after the issue occurred.
It is important to keep in mind, however, that the kinds of rights afforded to air passengers depend on the country of their residence. They also depend on one’s departure and arrival points. In what follows we make some important distinctions: 
A. In the United States, for example, in the event of domestic delays and cancelations, airlines are not statutorily obligated to compensate anything, and this is a cold and cruel fact. In the event of overbookings in the US, consumer rights protection allows compensation of up to $1350 when you are bumped from a flight.  
More information about your rights in the event of an overbooking in the US is available on our website: 
www.eurodelays.com


 
B. European Union air passenger regulations have a different approach to targeting flight-related issues and efficiently protect air passengers. 

For example, in the events of a flight delay, cancelation, or overbooking, one can receive up to $700 in cash compensation. Some of our clients have received several thousand dollars in compensation for just one flight. Additionally, in some specific circumstances, airlines have to provide their customers hotel accommodations as well as food and refreshments. When dealing with extraordinary circumstances such as strikes, social events, weather conditions, etc. the air passenger has the right to be reimbursed for their ticket. Seat downgrading and luggage issues are also taken into account in the EU consumer protection laws.
To know more about your rights when traveling on an international flight to or from a EU member country please check our website: 
https://www.eurodelays.com

6. Some of the scenarios when flight-related issues are compensated or reimbursed. For more details please visit our website:
 www.eurodelays.com




7. Risks and challenges
There are absolutely no risks, since from the time of our establishment, we have already helped thousands of air passengers.
 
Thank you for your trust in our mission, 
Valeriy V. Sirotyuk, Esq.
CEO & Founder, EuroDelays

story:
Every summer, scenes like this play out all around the world. Lives lost, families destroyed and communities shattered. Tragic and heartbreaking; but this can be prevented. 

Have you ever arrived at your destination, but can’t recall the drive there? Forget why you came into the room? Walk out and back again, and you’ll probably remember. Can’t find your keys? Retrace your steps and you’ll likely find them in the shopping bag, or your jacket pocket.

In other circumstances, these same memory lapses can have disastrous consequences. And they do, to 37 American families every summer, whose children have died after being left in the car on a sunny day. Most of the time, these cases happen to dependable, loving parents and carers, who made a single mistake with the worst imaginable consequence.

 

Think this can't happen to you? Think again.

This statistic is brutally open. This happens. A lot. In most cases to responsible parents who never imagined that this could happen to them.

We’ve designed a simple device that can be used in any car that reminds the driver to check the back seat before exiting.

We designed the Clever Elly to meet our safety requirements, while continuing to support how you use your car.

We wanted a device that doesn’t require complex installation or setup, and can be easily powered by any car’s existing features. All cars have a cigarette lighter, but they are usually occupied by cell phone or navigation system chargers. So we have built Clever Elly with a dual USB Car Charger.

As soon as the car powers off, Clever Elly will issue a verbal alert to check your backseat. Cars already sound off plenty of beeps and signals, so we know that an explicit reminder is necessary. We also know that people tend to zone out on repeating alerts, so we’ve included ten different alerts that play at random.

With adoption of this device by many users, like you, we are aiming to show car manufacturers  how important it is to build in this simple warning into all future cars. Such warnings should be the new standard in automotive safety.

In most cases it doesn't even need to be complex, or costly to be effective. Yet it can save so many lives and prevent so many tragedies and near misses. 

 

Remember to check the back seat, it's a good habit.

Even beyond children, we tend to forget all sorts of things in the backseat; laptops, handbags and groceries and even pets. Clever Elly reminds you to check your back seat, exactly when you’re most likely to forget.

 

Who Are We?

We’ve been friends since high school, and have stood side by side while we grew from (allegedly) irritating teenagers to responsible adults. In the last seven years, we’ve each had children, and this role of fatherhood has proven the most challenging. We’ve known the extreme effects of sleep deprivation, and felt the surge of love as they fall asleep drooling on our chests. We’ve each felt the joy and burden of raising children, the overwhelming need to keep them safe and protected. 

It was during one of our discussions around things we should be terrified might happen to our kids that we came up with the idea for Clever Elly. We were all heavily invested into our respective jobs, but felt that this was too important to wait. We’ve been working on this project since that night, and we can’t wait to see Clever Elly in cars across the world, preventing tragedy.

 

Timeline

Clever Elly is not yet in production. We are determined to see it through. We have already done most of the engineering, built and tested various prototypes and made all necessary arrangement with the assembly manufacturer,  But to make the production viable and get CleverElly out to the world at the right price point, we need backing of users like you. 

 

Risks And Challenges

As with any product, there are risks associated in the manufacturing process – component availability, quality issues, region-specific regulations, etc. To manage this, we’ve carefully selected a manufacturing partner with demonstrated success in this product type, and will provide on-site support and oversight during critical manufacturing stages.

While we’ve tested our prototypes widely, and will continue to do so with production-line product, there is a chance that Clever Elly may not work to full specification in all vehicles. We’re working on a comprehensive testing plan, and a response plan to ensure that our backers are kept happy.

As we are based in Australia, there may some further risks associated in international delivery. We’ve already consulted with informed bodies to assist in identifying and meeting specific requirements, but the nature of working across multiple economies and countries is an issue that requires continuous monitoring. We’re on it!

 

Ways You Can Help

  • Get Clever Elly for yourself, your close ones or others.
  • Join us on Facebook, to help spread the message to Always check the back seat before exiting.
  • Like and share our Facebook page  https://www.facebook.com/cleverellyofficial/
