story:
< Existing products>

< MADBOARD >

Zero Start is one of the features in MADBOARD's acceleration system.

You can launch the board from the zero-speed, so you can get your balance on the skateboard.

Zero Start also has a smooth acceleration, It's easy to handle the board for beginners

 

Manipulation is too annoying when driving on a road, Cruise mode solves that !!

Press the mode changer button for 2 seconds at a certain speed !

MADBOARD will move at the set speed and you enjoy the scenery and wind comfortably

Cruise mode cancel: Press the Break and mode change button

 

 You can remove the battery pack comfortably

By changing the battery pack, you can double your enjoying time

**Only taking about 45minitues, you can recharge the battery**

 

The dual Hub motor is helping you to enjoy the riding on the inclined road

When decelerating, MADBOARD uses e-abs brake to charge the batter (regenerative motor)

Powered by dual hub motor, it can drive on asphalt and unpaved roads !

 

You can choose the 3 different driving modes while you are on the ride !!

 

E-Mode(Easy)

For beginners on a flat road

Low speed with easy control

(* E-mode can speed up to 10KM/H)

N-Mode(Normal)

If you're used to E-Mode, try N-Mode!

Enjoy the dynamic speed of the ride!

(* N-Mode can speed up to 21KM/H)

F-Mode(Fast)

Time to get in the extream world!

Feel the wind at full speed!

(* F-Mode can speed up to 31KM/H)

Control the MADBOARD in Skateboard and Kick Scooter Mode

 

**Easy to hold and manipulate during the ride**

 

 

**Attach the controller on the steering handle**

 

 

It's easy to use!

**Feel the different grooves with the Skateboard mode!**

 

For the safety reason, you can ride the MADBOARD only when the controller is connected with the board

 

 

Our battery pack is special! We used LiFePo4 battery!

LiFePo4 battery is 3 times more efficient and safer than usual batteries

Each battery pack contains B.M.S (Battery Management System) to keep you safe from the battery troubles

 

 LiFePo4 battery is the best in safety than Li-ion or polymer type battery

 It is also environmental and can charge and discharge more than 1800 times

 We use safe batteries to give you the dynamic and safety simultaneously

 

The main body of MADBOARD is largely divided into two parts; AL(Aluminium) and PC(Polycarbonate)

 

 

We have been developing a safe and practical personal mobility product from the year 2015. 

The body, battery and all of the parts are the original development of our team.


MADBOARD will be produced and delivered from the Republic of Korea(South Korea) with the high quality to our customers.

Hope you have an enjoyable time with our MADBOARD

 

Co-founders

B.S & Juno

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

*notice

 Laws and regulations pertaining electric skateboards or electric kickscooters vary by country, state, county, and municipality. You are responsible in making sure that it is legal to ride in your area, so please make sure you investigate your local regulations.  

Skateboarding, and especially on electric powered boards, is an inherently dangerous sport and safety equipment should be used at all times, especially a helmet. Don’t be too cool for safety equipment and risk your life. Even the pros use a helmet and pads. Always watch out for cars while riding on surface roads open to traffic and follow all local rules. Always skate within your abilities and use common sense while riding.  

Your board can become unresponsive and loose power and brakes at any moment due to many factors like: dead remote battery, unintentional release of the throttle, radio interference, dropping the remote control, regenerative overcharging of a full battery, or other. This will turn the board into an unpowered skate without brakes, so learn how to slow down by sliding and only ride your board at speeds that where you would be able to stop without power or brakes.  

MEDFUTURE accepts no liability should you injure yourself using any products sold under our brand names.

story:
Alien Electronics LTD is a UK company that was established in 2012. In the early years we began by researching and developing products for the radio control and electric vehicle market. Initially we supplied parts for private and commercial clients.  However, over the last few years, with a background and passion for electric mobility, we have begun to design and develop full electric vehicles. 


 

  • This campaign is important to us as we will be able to launch our first complete electric vehicle in mass production and then start the next new vehicle development we have been working on. 
  • Being in this market already has helped us to develop the vehicle in full and has kept the relationship with our longstanding partners and suppliers very strong. We have made most of the necessary agreements with our manufacturers prior to launching this campaign. This helps to minimise risk for any potential obstacles and delays along the way. 

 

​

 

  • We chose INDIEGOGO  because we believe that our backers will play a crucial role in the launch and further development of this vehicle. Through INDIEGOGO  we’re not just pre-selling our product, we are joining a passionate community of innovators and visionaries. We are really excited about the launch and the continuation of our journey.  Most importantly we are excited about fulfilling our promise to our backers.
     
  • Making a revolutionary product is never easy.  You have our assurance though that we will always try our best to make sure everything goes according to plan and to meet the promised deadlines successfully once we reach our funding goal.

 

​

  • All the funds will be used for the mass production and future development of additional "add on" parts that can be easily swapped making the product fully upgradable.  This means that any new part can be used on an existing PREDATOR with no need to buy the latest model.
  • We really appreciate all the help of contributors, existing clients and people that can simply share this project and spread the word. Everyone who helps us in the making of the PREDATOR V4R , will get it at lower price and will be the first to be offered exclusive perks and a special  cupon code to be used in our webstore for a special discount on every product.

 

 

The all new  APS PREDATOR V4R combines the most important aspects, we believe people today are looking for, in an electric vehicle; Innovation, safety, performance and materials. With the PREDATOR V4R our engineering experts have designed and developed a top spec product with the help and assistance of customer feedback over the years. The V4R has been extensively tested to ensure a user friendly electric longboard with top end components. An electric longboard is not a toy, it is an electric vehicle, and as such the use of composite, metal, and aerospace grade materials make the difference in the look, weight and handling of the board. Every part of the Longboard, from a simple washer to the main battery has been designed and made to the highest specification. We have tested and compared our board with many electric longboards that the market offers today, from the cheapest to the most expensive to ensure that the V4R is the best all round product. Due to different client requirements the complete electronics and hardware assembly have been designed in a way that the rider can easily swap to any deck in 10 minutes by using the hardware provided. All the parts used are standard longboard fitment. We have created a deck that is ergonomic to suit a large variety of clients. The ride experience is perfectly balanced, and the product is not too extreme or too moderate. All parts including the deck size, wheels, trucks, electronics have been designed to meet the best compromise between performance and comfort.

 

 

The beautifully designed Maple and CARBON FIBRE deck allows fantastic control and stability when riding and provides at the same time flexibility and vibration absorption. The custom made SONY battery pack gives an Incredible 48 Km range. The innovative speed controller and motors combo allows a top speed of 55 Kmph.  These performances are possible thanks to the 2x long stator sensored brushless HUB motors with 1600 Watt peak power per motor. Power output, brake force and riding mode can be selected by the user through the remote control (and an APP in second development) so anyone can choose the power output most suitable. Safety first.

 

 

A weight and pressure sensor added on to the deck can detect the rider position then smart cut off the power to reduce the risk of the rider falling off. If the sensor will detect a complete loss of the rider weight the board will automatically stop.

For the ultimate in electric skateboard technology and performance, look no further than the PREDATOR V4R.  An exciting addition to city transportation. 

 

All of what you have read about our product so far is the result of years of extensive research and testing. The outcome is an uncompromising, perfectly balanced longboard, with a sleek design, sharp edges and impressive performances.  Compact, light and easy to carry in an urban environment, this is a crafted product we designed with a passion for innovation. 

 

 

 

 

COMPONENTS USED FOR THE PRODUCT:

 

DUAL SENSORED ELECTRONIC SPEED CONTROLLER:

The dual channel ESC has been developed for perfect control of the power train. The new ECU is able to monitor engine speed, vehicle speed, and other factors then ensure a perfect power output for a smooth ride. The 2 motors are separately controlled to ensure optimal traction. This function can be tuned by selecting the different riding modes. Here are a few of the ESC specifications;

  • power of 45A continuous current for each motor with a peak of 100A
  • field-oriented control for a more precise and efficient operation
  • refresh rate of the throttle signal 50Hz to 450Hz
  • optical signal transmission system to avoid interference
  • high performance microprocessor
  • temperature, voltage, current and signal loss protection
  • integrated energy recovery system that uses the motors as a generator while braking to recover battery energy
  • programmable riding mode

 


DUAL SENSORED HUB BRUSHLESS MOTORS:  

These motors have been developed for maximum reliability and designed for maximum efficiency. The problem with skateboard HUB motors is the heat. Heat generation means loss of efficiency, therefore power. With the design and parts used for the internal components, these motors are more efficient. Their case includes a CNC designed FAN that helps to cool the motor during the rotation. The air is forced inside the motor from the middle of the deck and expulsed from the external by the holes on the outside plate. Internal components are all waterproof. Ceramic bearngs help to keep the temperature lower and are maintenance free. The motors are 95% Freewheeling if not powered so the board feels like a normal longboard if pushed. An 83mm size urethane wheel is used on the motor. This can be easily replaced if needed, simply by taking off the retainer outside plate and pulling out the wheel. The longer length of the motor can, magnet and stator make them more powerful compared to the majority of the HUB motors available on the market. 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

ABS ELECTRONICS ENCLOSURE:  

The Electronic cover has been made by an injection moulding process. Here is located the core of the system, the logic and power board. The integrated 5V USB port is perfect to charge the remote control, but can be used for any device that requires a 5V supply like a smartphone or similar. The design incorporates an integrated handle for transportation. This helps the user to keep the deck vertical instead of horizontal so the transport in urban environments is much easier as the board takes up less space.

 


11S3P - 18650 SONY BATTERY PACK:  

Why Sony? Well, the brand speaks for itself. We chose the SONY VTC6 after a long period of testing. Compared with other high end batteries these run at a slightly higher voltage and lower temperature by delivering a higher current. Very few batteries can handle high current as well as these. Why 11S3P? Most of the battery packs used on electric skateboards are 10S2p or 4P. Using 11S means having a higher voltage.  The advantage is to have a lower current draw, so the motor can run cooler, and at a higher speed. 3P with a 3000mah cell means a 9000mAh battery pack. 9000mAh gives an impressive range of 48 Km with top performances, and still keeps the weight low compared with a bulky 4P battery.

 

 

 
 




 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

BATTERY CHARGER:

INPUT: 100-120 \ 220-240v AC, 50-60 Hz

OUTPUT: 5Ah - 46.2v

CHARGER PLUG: EU standard with US, UK, AU adapter

ALLOY CASE with FAN and LED light for charging indicator

FUSED

 


ABS BATTERY ENCLOSURE: 

As is the Electronic enclosure, the battery cover has been made by an injection moulding process. A useful LCD display  has been added to check the battery status.

 
 
 
 
 

 

BMS (battery management system):  

The BMS has been developed by a Chinese company specialising in PCM/BMS/CMB/PCB exclusively. To ensure best quality, the company is not only equipped with advanced manufacturing facilities, but also with an in house strict QC management system and it employs well experienced engineers and skilful workers. With its small size this BMS is built in the battery to keep everything as compact as possible. With its impressive continuous current of 80A and pulse of 120A, the BMS can deliver the current that the motor needs during hard acceleration and heavy working conditions. Cell voltage balance, temperature monitor, cut off protections, gauge monitor are just few of the BMS features.

 


184MM CNC MACHINED ALIEN PRECISION TRUCK: 

The advantages of using precision trucks is to have more precise tolerances on all the components for a better riding experience that is fluid and responsive. The bushing design provides a stable center without compromising on maneuverability and the wheels have a better grip on the ground.

 
 
 





 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

BUSHINGS:

Bushings, pivot cups and washers are probably the smallest parts of the hardware, but very important in terms of comfort and control. The main factor to consider is their shape and durometer. Rider weight and riding style are important aspects.  We chose the bushing to have a perfect balanced Longboard that is stable at high speed and keeps a good agility. The bushing washers are Titanium CNC machined.


CERAMIC BEARINGS:  

Bearings are an important part of any set up. Si3N4 bearings are lighter, harder, and stronger. They are designed to handle more friction and be cooler, which allows them to roll faster and longer. Titanium coated with a built-in spacer, they have a much higher heat tolerance than steel ball bearings. Ceramic bearings are waterproof so there is no risk of rust if not lubricated. These bearings are used on the front wheels and in the HUB motors.

 

 




 
 
 


 
 
 

 

CNC MACHINED TITANIUM BOLTS:

Every bolt, from the trucks kingpin to the case screws are made in Titanium grade 5. Why did we choose to use expensive Titanium hardware? To give you an idea, a 5-grade Titanium bolt is 4 times stronger than a 316 stainless steel bolt at nearly half of the weight.

 

DECK:  

A 7 ply Canadian maple and 1 ply CARBON FIBRE structure make the 40" deck extremely light and strong. The electronics and battery are separate in 2 different boxes placed on the rear and front of the board. This makes the deck extremely flexible in the middle and gives the feeling of riding on a normal longboard.

 

 


 
 
 
 
 


 
 

REMOTE CONTROL:

The ergonomic remote control has 2 modes to familiarise with the performances, perfect for beginners with low mode and first-time users. High mode will allow the system to use its full power and acceleration with hill climb capabilities of up to 30% grade. Forward and reverse action on the trigger can be reversed to better suit the riders style. The LCD display on the remote will show the rider info like real monitor motors temperature, battery capacity, speed and others useful information. Riding mode can be selected to best suit any rider requirements.


WHEELS:  

The well-known 83mm Alien wheels are the perfect balance for traction and slide response. Not as hard as 76mm and not as soft as 90mm, these 83mm wheel with a 78A durometer will allow a good grip and low wheel wears. The core design reduces weight while providing precision riding. Excellent traction control and smooth riding

 
 




 
 
 
 



 


LIGHTS: 

LED lights are used on the front and rear of the deck to add safety and visibility during night rides. The lights are super bright CREE LED, integrated in both the front and rear ABS enclosures of the deck.
story_txt:
Alien Electronics LTD  is a UK company that was established in 2012. In the early years we began by researching and developing products for the radio control and electric vehicle market. Initially we supplied parts for private and commercial clients.  However, over the last few years, with a background and passion for electric mobility, we have begun to design and develop full electric vehicles. 

 

This campaign is important  to us as we will be able to launch our first complete electric vehicle in mass production and then start the next new vehicle development we have been working on. 

Being in this market already has helped us to develop the vehicle in full and has kept the relationship with our longstanding partners and suppliers very strong. We have made most of the necessary agreements with our manufacturers prior to launching this campaign. This helps to minimise risk for any potential obstacles and delays along the way. 
 
​
 


We chose INDIEGOGO  because we believe that our backers will play a crucial role in the launch and further development of this vehicle. Through INDIEGOGO  we’re not just pre-selling our product, we are joining a passionate community of innovators and visionaries. We are really excited about the launch and the continuation of our journey.  Most importantly we are excited about fulfilling our promise to our backers. 
Making a revolutionary product is never easy.  You have our assurance though that we will always try our best to make sure everything goes according to plan and to meet the promised deadlines successfully once we reach our funding goal.

 

​

All the funds  will be used for the mass production and future development of additional "add on" parts that can be easily swapped making the product fully upgradable.  This means that any new part can be used on an existing PREDATOR  with no need to buy the latest model.
We really appreciate all the help of contributors, existing clients and people that can simply share this project and spread the word. Everyone who helps us in the making of the PREDATOR V4R , will get it at lower price and will be the first to be offered exclusive perks and a special  cupon code to be used in our webstore for a special discount on every product.
 

 




The all new  APS PREDATOR V4R combines the most important aspects, we believe people today are looking for, in an electric vehicle; Innovation, safety, performance and materials. With the PREDATOR V4R our engineering experts have designed and developed a top spec product with the help and assistance of customer feedback over the years. The V4R has been extensively tested to ensure a user friendly electric longboard with top end components. An electric longboard is not a toy, it is an electric vehicle, and as such the use of composite, metal, and aerospace grade materials make the difference in the look, weight and handling of the board. Every part of the Longboard, from a simple washer to the main battery has been designed and made to the highest specification. We have tested and compared our board with many electric longboards that the market offers today, from the cheapest to the most expensive to ensure that the V4R is the best all round product. Due to different client requirements the complete electronics and hardware assembly have been designed in a way that the rider can easily swap to any deck in 10 minutes by using the hardware provided. All the parts used are standard longboard fitment. We have created a deck that is ergonomic to suit a large variety of clients. The ride experience is perfectly balanced, and the product is not too extreme or too moderate. All parts including the deck size, wheels, trucks, electronics have been designed to meet the best compromise between performance and comfort.
  
 
The beautifully designed Maple and CARBON FIBRE deck allows fantastic control and stability when riding and provides at the same time flexibility and vibration absorption. The custom made SONY battery pack gives an Incredible 48 Km range. The innovative speed controller and motors combo allows a top speed of 55 Kmph.  These performances are possible thanks to the 2x long stator sensored brushless HUB motors with 1600 Watt peak power per motor. Power output, brake force and riding mode can be selected by the user through the remote control (and an APP in second development) so anyone can choose the power output most suitable. Safety first.
 

 
A weight and pressure sensor added on to the deck can detect the rider position then smart cut off the power to reduce the risk of the rider falling off. If the sensor will detect a complete loss of the rider weight the board will automatically stop.

For the ultimate in electric skateboard technology and performance, look no further than the PREDATOR V4R.  An exciting addition to city transportation. 

 
All of what you have read about our product so far is the result of years of extensive research and testing. The outcome is an uncompromising, perfectly balanced longboard, with a sleek design, sharp edges and impressive performances.  Compact, light and easy to carry in an urban environment, this is a crafted product we designed with a passion for innovation. 
 

 

 

 
COMPONENTS USED FOR THE PRODUCT:
 


DUAL SENSORED ELECTRONIC SPEED CONTROLLER:
The dual channel ESC has been developed for perfect control of the power train. The new ECU is able to monitor engine speed, vehicle speed, and other factors then ensure a perfect power output for a smooth ride. The 2 motors are separately controlled to ensure optimal traction. This function can be tuned by selecting the different riding modes. Here are a few of the ESC specifications;

power of 45A continuous current for each motor with a peak of 100A

field-oriented control for a more precise and efficient operation
refresh rate of the throttle signal 50Hz to 450Hz


optical signal transmission system to avoid interference
high performance microprocessor
temperature, voltage, current and signal loss protection

integrated energy recovery system that uses the motors as a generator while braking to recover battery energy
programmable riding mode

 
DUAL SENSORED HUB BRUSHLESS MOTORS:  
These motors have been developed for maximum reliability and designed for maximum efficiency. The problem with skateboard HUB motors is the heat. Heat generation means loss of efficiency, therefore power. With the design and parts used for the internal components, these motors are more efficient. Their case includes a CNC designed FAN that helps to cool the motor during the rotation. The air is forced inside the motor from the middle of the deck and expulsed from the external by the holes on the outside plate. Internal components are all waterproof. Ceramic bearngs help to keep the temperature lower and are maintenance free. The motors are 95% Freewheeling if not powered so the board feels like a normal longboard if pushed. An 83mm size urethane wheel is used on the motor. This can be easily replaced if needed, simply by taking off the retainer outside plate and pulling out the wheel. The longer length of the motor can, magnet and stator make them more powerful compared to the majority of the HUB motors available on the market. 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 


ABS ELECTRONICS ENCLOSURE:  
The Electronic cover has been made by an injection moulding process. Here is located the core of the system, the logic and power board. The integrated 5V USB port is perfect to charge the remote control, but can be used for any device that requires a 5V supply like a smartphone or similar. The design incorporates an integrated handle for transportation. This helps the user to keep the deck vertical instead of horizontal so the transport in urban environments is much easier as the board takes up less space.
 
11S3P - 18650 SONY BATTERY PACK:  
Why Sony? Well, the brand speaks for itself. We chose the SONY VTC6 after a long period of testing. Compared with other high end batteries these run at a slightly higher voltage and lower temperature by delivering a higher current. Very few batteries can handle high current as well as these. Why 11S3P? Most of the battery packs used on electric skateboards are 10S2p or 4P. Using 11S means having a higher voltage.  The advantage is to have a lower current draw, so the motor can run cooler, and at a higher speed. 3P with a 3000mah cell means a 9000mAh battery pack. 9000mAh gives an impressive range of 48 Km with top performances, and still keeps the weight low compared with a bulky 4P battery.
 
 

 
 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 
 

 
 
 


BATTERY CHARGER:
INPUT: 100-120 \ 220-240v AC, 50-60 Hz
OUTPUT: 5Ah - 46.2v
CHARGER PLUG: EU standard with US, UK, AU adapter
ALLOY CASE with FAN and LED light for charging indicator
FUSED
 
ABS BATTERY ENCLOSURE: 
As is the Electronic enclosure, the battery cover has been made by an injection moulding process. A useful LCD display  has been added to check the battery status.


 
 
 
 
 


 


BMS (battery management system):  
The BMS has been developed by a Chinese company specialising in PCM/BMS/CMB/PCB exclusively. To ensure best quality, the company is not only equipped with advanced manufacturing facilities, but also with an in house strict QC management system and it employs well experienced engineers and skilful workers. With its small size this BMS is built in the battery to keep everything as compact as possible. With its impressive continuous current of 80A and pulse of 120A, the BMS can deliver the current that the motor needs during hard acceleration and heavy working conditions. Cell voltage balance, temperature monitor, cut off protections, gauge monitor are just few of the BMS features.
 
184MM CNC MACHINED ALIEN PRECISION TRUCK: 
The advantages of using precision trucks is to have more precise tolerances on all the components for a better riding experience that is fluid and responsive. The bushing design provides a stable center without compromising on maneuverability and the wheels have a better grip on the ground.

 
 
 

 

 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 



BUSHINGS:
Bushings, pivot cups and washers are probably the smallest parts of the hardware, but very important in terms of comfort and control. The main factor to consider is their shape and durometer. Rider weight and riding style are important aspects.  We chose the bushing to have a perfect balanced Longboard that is stable at high speed and keeps a good agility. The bushing washers are Titanium CNC machined.
CERAMIC BEARINGS:  
Bearings are an important part of any set up. Si3N4 bearings are lighter, harder, and stronger. They are designed to handle more friction and be cooler, which allows them to roll faster and longer. Titanium coated with a built-in spacer, they have a much higher heat tolerance than steel ball bearings. Ceramic bearings are waterproof so there is no risk of rust if not lubricated. These bearings are used on the front wheels and in the HUB motors.
 

 

 

 
 



 
 
 



 
CNC MACHINED TITANIUM BOLTS:
Every bolt, from the trucks kingpin to the case screws are made in Titanium grade 5. Why did we choose to use expensive Titanium hardware? To give you an idea, a 5-grade Titanium bolt is 4 times stronger than a 316 stainless steel bolt at nearly half of the weight.
 
DECK:  
A 7 ply Canadian maple and 1 ply CARBON FIBRE structure make the 40" deck extremely light and strong. The electronics and battery are separate in 2 different boxes placed on the rear and front of the board. This makes the deck extremely flexible in the middle and gives the feeling of riding on a normal longboard.
 

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

 


REMOTE CONTROL:
The ergonomic remote control has 2 modes to familiarise with the performances, perfect for beginners with low mode and first-time users. High mode will allow the system to use its full power and acceleration with hill climb capabilities of up to 30% grade. Forward and reverse action on the trigger can be reversed to better suit the riders style. The LCD display on the remote will show the rider info like real monitor motors temperature, battery capacity, speed and others useful information. Riding mode can be selected to best suit any rider requirements.
WHEELS:  
The well-known 83mm Alien wheels are the perfect balance for traction and slide response. Not as hard as 76mm and not as soft as 90mm, these 83mm wheel with a 78A durometer will allow a good grip and low wheel wears. The core design reduces weight while providing precision riding. Excellent traction control and smooth riding

 
 

 

 
 
 
 


LIGHTS: 
LED lights are used on the front and rear of the deck to add safety and visibility during night rides. The lights are super bright CREE LED, integrated in both the front and rear ABS enclosures of the deck.

story:
This 6-wheel specialized skateboard is called a freeboard. A freeboard typically has 6 wheels: four normal longboard-style wheels at each corner and two spring-locked center wheels. The center wheels can turn freely in all directions, allowing the board to "slide" laterally. This mimics the traditional "side-to-side" motion of snowboard riding. By putting pressure on the corner wheels, the rider is able to control the board.

 

 

 

 

In addition to snowboarding, the feeling of going down a steep hill with a freeboard is hard to beat, but sometimes there are no hills or even a slight bump in the road. That's where the electric drive kit comes into use and turns any street into fresh powder.  This is the first electric drive kit for freeboards just like the Mellow drive was for standard skateboards. Add the drive kit to your board and you can ride when and wherever you want. The two in-wheel motors can smoothly accelerate you to top speeds of up to 25 mph / 40 km/h and bring you up-hills to a 30% grade. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

​

 

 

 

 

 

 

In 2018 when I moved from Sweden to the US I had no idea there was something called a freeboard. I've been snowboarding for over 20+ years but never heard of freeboarding. I discovered freeboarding thru my Instagram feed where a company called Leiftech advertised their electric skateboard that moved like a snowboard. They used catchy phrases like "Snowboard all year round", "Snowboard the streets" and "Start your season that never ends" and I got intrigued. ​The Leiftech board (nowadays called the Summerboard) seemed really expensive ($1800) and I started looking around for other options. And that's when I discovered freeboarding and the Freebord community. 

 

After watching 100+ hours of freeboarding I decided to buy my own board. I couldn’t really let go of the thought of an electric freeboard version so I decided to try to build my own out of my newly bought freeboard. I really like to mix electronics with mechanics so this project suited me well. The first prototype idea was to combine the One Wheel and the Freebord but eventually, I decided to make the prototype as simple as it could be, with no pressure sensors or advanced gyro programming and I went for a simple remote controller to control the speed. ​

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

Please contact us at info@drftb.com if you have a question about the drive kit or you just want to say hi and comment on the campaign, just send it.

 

 

 

Technical specifications are based on the drive kit prototype and may vary in the production model based on data gathered during development & testing. We will do everything we can to improve performance without compromising reliability.

Motors

Hub motor technology is advancing at a rapid pace. The exact hub motor model used in the prototype will most likely change. We will be using the most advanced hub motor technology available, to ensure your drive kit performs at the highest level possible.

Caster and baseplate

We will be evaluating the baseplate and caster construction during the development and testing of the final product to ensure your drive kit performs at the highest level possible.

Battery

Battery technology is advancing at a rapid pace. Due to frequent releases of new battery cell models, the exact battery cells used in production will most likely change. We will be using the most advanced battery technology available, to ensure your drive kit performs at the highest level possible.

Motor controller

Electronic speed controller technology is continually improving. We will be evaluating all ESC options during the development of the final product.

Remote control

The remote control technology is continually improving. We will be evaluating all remote options during the development of the final product.

Enclosure

We will be evaluating all other enclosure options during the development of the final product to ensure your drive kit performs at the highest level possible.

 

 

 
The first freeboard was created in 1996 by Steen Strand (Snap Inc, Icon Aircraft) in Palo Alto, CA while studying for his master’s in product design at Stanford University. Steen wanted to find a way to bring the snowboard ride to the street and began developing prototypes of a skateboard that could slide, drift and stop just like on snow.
 
He patented his design and began assembling and selling the first “Alpha” Freeboards in 1997 out of his garage in San Francisco, CA. Since then, Freeboards have evolved to become shorter and lighter, with bindings to hold the rider’s feet while carving and sliding.

The first freeboard was created in 1996 by Steen Strand (Snap Inc, Icon Aircraft) in Palo Alto, CA while studying for his master’s in product design at Stanford University. Steen wanted to find a way to bring the snowboard ride to the street and began developing prototypes of a skateboard that could slide, drift and stop just like on snow.
 
He patented his design and began assembling and selling the first “Alpha” Freeboards in 1997 out of his garage in San Francisco, CA. Since then, Freeboards have evolved to become shorter and lighter, with bindings to hold the rider’s feet while carving and sliding.

story:
Our Team, Psykoboard, is an innovative mechatronics start-up, which designed an electronic skateboard; our concern includes every hi-tech board as, snowboards, surfboards…and finally wake-skate boards. In parallel with the gained work experience, we moved towards a conclusion that our product had to be a compromise between hi-technology, new materials, a proper design and finally, had to be entirely made of carbon fibre, hand-built through an aeronautical process laid down by the Autoclave System, so that its high-performance, lightness and its innovative design, celebrating made in Italy, could surpass the old fashioned, currently on the market, skateboards.

Our product is the work of the well-known Werther Castelletti and the RRD-Roberto Ricci Designs.

 

The Psykoboard is thought to be used in the everyday life, that is to say, every day, for urban transport mobility, to get to work, to travel and during free time. It may be even used while raining thanks to its peculiarity. It’s the very first electric skateboard, in the whole world, with built-in mudguards, (basically one doesn’t get soaked when walking on wet surfaces). It’s a perfect smart mobility model.The very first skateboard offering such a low inertia so that can be even used smoothly as a common skateboard.

The entire electronic system and electrical motors are completely sealed since its motor lies inside its wheels, with its cooling system and the auto-regenerative brake in order to recharge its Li-Poly battery.

The two brushless motors are capable and guarantee, torque acceleration for extraordinary performance when getting up a hill (climbing grade 25%) and even more, tyres are totally replaceable.

 

 

Psykoboard is equipped with a spare wheel, a battery, a charger, a rechargeable remote and a driver to set trucks.

 

 

  • Its battery is really light and may be quickly trouble-free replaced.

 

The Psykoboard skate is remote-controlled by an excellent small ergonomic-designed unit, suitable for both children and adults. This remote has many functions, for instance, two speeds, normal and sport one, and equally manages forward/reverse drive. For its peculiarities, the Psykoboard can move both in front-wheel drive (FWD) and in RR, Rear-engine, depending on needs, since our Psykoboard is a Twin Tip.

 

 

 
 
 

 In order to make a comparison between internal brushless electric wheel motors, and those of other electric skateboards, is worth saying that Psykoboard motor generate less heat since it is entirely sealed from dust and water (waterproof level IP65) giving optimum performances with regard to accuracy and reliability: a top-level safety.

 

 

 

 

Psykoboard has the best skateboard component suppliers and is an innovative mechatronics start-up, with a prompt technical crew prepared for mass production and delivery to costumers. There had been done several production, acceptance and crash tests before its launch on the Kickstarter platform.

Our aim is not to lose time in delivering our Psykoboard all over the world.

Psykoboard has all safety certifications needed: CE,FCC,RoHs,MSDS,UN,38.3.

We made available numerous incentives and purchase methods, so that one can simply choose the most suitable Psykoboard! Psykoboard skateboard is an icon, an out-of-the-ordinary product now on the market, what is more, it is going to achieve an increasingly worth and prestige.

Patent Panding:

https://patentscope.wipo.int/search/en/detail.j...

 

“Some people worry that artificial intelligence will make us feel inferior, but then, anybody in his right mind should have an inferiority complex every time he looks at a flower.”

                                                                                                [Alan kay]     

 

Dear friends, thank for supporting us!

Psykoboard

RISK

Stated that, many of the skateboards already on the market, show up several flaws as the high engines overheating, the elevated failure-rate, the limited range and so on, Psykoboard solves all of these problems. We have the best working team and the best printed circuit board (PCB) supplier in the world. Thanks to a pilot production, we are ready for the big mass manufacturing; in fact, there had been reduced both processing and waiting time.After three years spent among studies, hard work and many sacrifices, we brought to an end its development; nevertheless, we are still in need of $40,000 for our first minimum order and manufacturing centre.

Psykoboard
RISK
Stated that, many of the skateboards already on the market, show up several flaws as the high engines overheating, the elevated failure-rate, the limited range and so on, Psykoboard solves all of these problems. We have the best working team and the best printed circuit board (PCB) supplier in the world. Thanks to a pilot production, we are ready for the big mass manufacturing; in fact, there had been reduced both processing and waiting time.After three years spent among studies, hard work and many sacrifices, we brought to an end its development; nevertheless, we are still in need of $40,000 for our first minimum order and manufacturing centre.

story:
WELCOME!!

Greetings at first and pray that you all are well and in good health.

           Presenting you outdoor off-road electric scooter with a durable and strong design for the maximum output of your adventures and fun in both the wilderness and outdoor empowered with 2000W Power dual-motor drive and long-lasting charge with 18650 Lithium Battery.

          The ultra-sports model is at its prototype and manufactured in a few numbers for beta-testing and room for enhancements. With your contributions and support, further improvements will be brought along with rewards for your perks. And when the funding goal meats, the mass production will start and will be delivered to your doors as soon as possible.

          A series of detailed specifications of our product has been provided below in illustrations for better exposure. 

'

 

Delivery Guaranteed

Your contribution with us is a  guaranteed purchase, That means if you order a bike with us, you will get the bike, guaranteed. Don't just take our word for it though, check out what these satisfied riders have already sent in!

story:
This small device fits on any motorcycle and lets you track your motorcycle in real-time. Share your journey with others and even know when someone is messing with your ride.

 

 

Is someone messing with your motorcycle? Is someone stealing your motorcycle? Ridesafe will notify you with exactly what is going on including live location tracking so you can sort it out!

 

 

 

Share your memorable journey with anyone anywhere so they know what you're up to. You can now save and track each of your trips, speeds, angles, and acceleration to brag with your friends. If you have a fitness tracker Ridesafe is the tracker for your motorcycle.

 

We don’t like to think about it but when the worse happens we want to make sure we are covered. If you have an accident RideSafe will notify a loved one and contact medical services with your GPS location and medical profile. 

 

 

RideSafe is a dedicated device for motorcycles that integrates the standard Emergency Call system. We are setting out to increase road safety for everyone and enhance your cruising experience. Very excited to continue our journey with your support!  

RideSafe was developed as an IoT device to increase driver safety, reduce emergency services response times, record your rides, and share your performance via a mobile app and desktop. The standalone device is the most integrated and optimized emergency and performance solution for bikers!

The embedded device is your quick-thinking assistant that can save your life and improve your experience on the road. It aligns your touring experience to future trends. Using complex algorithms, the device integrates easily with your motorcycle and comes with a user-friendly app.

We started small in 2015 with a simple idea to bring more safety on the road. Ever since then, we have grown into a close-knit community with a strong focus on automotive embedded software as well as passion for smart bikes. Our next step is thinking big! Both in terms of plans and community members. Together we stand a chance to reduce accidents, improve our tour experience, and share all our amazing achievements.

The device can be fully managed from your iPhone or Android phone, and it takes up little space in the battery box of your bike. The software is developed by a team of expert engineers and it is optimized in-house for the hardware. Within a small estate, the embedded device integrates top-notch technologies and takes action in critical situations.

We wrote more than 2,000,000 lines of code and rode over 100,000 minutes on the track so that we could optimize the device. But we geared up and went the extra mile! We have been continuously improving the device for over 2 years, adding new features requested by bikers who’ve tried out the device. Here’s how simple it is to set it up and hit the road:  

“RideSafe, an IoT platform and a mobile app developed for bike safety, received a new round of venture capital of 20,000 euros from GapMinder Venture Partners, at Techcelerator Demo Day” - Forbes Magazine

“As of today, the team has invested almost 40,000 euros and they estimate a further investment worth 15,000 euros for marketing campaigns and advertising” – Wall-Street Magazine

“RideSafe is a crash detection and e-call safety device that sends real-time critical information about your location and medical profile in case of need” - Techcelerator

story:
"The rest is still unwritten" by Natasha Bedingfield. This is my life mantra. I make it a point to strive for my goals and contributing to helping other people, which are nothing less than my grandest dreams!

Upon graduating with honors with a Paralegal degree from Hilbert College in New York, I embarked upon a career in the legal and business management fields. A dual professional career has allowed me to amass a large array of skills.

As a Paralegal in a prominent law firm my duties include legal research, drafting documents, office administration, client and case management. I pride myself on my ability to respond rapidly and appropriately to changing circumstances; evaluate problems, make astute decisions to effect positive change and refocus on new priorities. Providing strong direction and expert advice are vital.

I also have a proven background managing all phases of business which includes customized proposals, service, claims, billing, audits and reporting. Key components in this arena have been strategic development and organizational efficiency.

My spare time is spent with my “Brady Bunch” family, and we are actively involved at St. Andrews Church in Mount Pleasant, South Carolina.  I have an unhealthy love of the Buffalo Bills and spend much of my time reading and outdoors in our southern sunshine.

In May 2016, I co-founded BedLock Systems, LLC where I handle contract preparation and oversee day-to-day operations. Looking forward, my business partner and I are planning for a successful launch to our product and eventual expansion of our concept in an effort to save lives. We envision success with limitless potential!

What We Need & What You Get

You can be one of the first to receive this state of the art divider system. There is nothing on the market like it. We already have interest from online distributors, military applications, wholesale distribution and with the retail market.

What we need to get this on the markets:

  • Tooling Costs
  • Distribution Costs.
  • First Batch of Product Cost.
  • Delivery To You Cost.

SEE FULL ASSEMBLY PROCESS AT: www.bedlocksystems.com

 

 

 

The Impact

An article released on August 11, 2016 states, "More than 200,000 crashes involved debris on U.S. roadways during the past four years, according to a new study released by the AAA Foundation for Traffic Safety, resulted in approximately 39,000 injuries and more than 500 deaths between 2011 and 2014. AAA is calling for drivers to properly secure their loads to prevent dangerous debris.

Nearly 37 percent of all deaths in road debris crashes resulted from the driver swerving to avoid hitting an object. Over-correcting at the last minute to avoid debris can increase a driver’s risk of losing control of their vehicle and make a bad situation worse.

More than one in three crashes involving debris occur between 10:00 a.m. and 3:59 p.m., a time when many people are on the road hauling or moving heavy items like furniture or construction equipment.

Debris-related crashes are much more likely to occur on Interstate highways. Driving at high speeds increases the risk for vehicle parts to become detached or cargo to fall onto the roadway

About two-thirds of debris-related crashes are the result of items falling from a vehicle due to improper maintenance and unsecured loads. The most common types of vehicle debris are:

Parts becoming detached from a vehicle (tires, wheels, etc.) and falling onto the roadway

Unsecured cargo like furniture, appliances and other items falling onto the roadway

Tow trailers becoming separated and hitting another vehicle or landing on the roadway"

https://www.aaafoundation.org/prevalence-motor-...


With a 40% increase in debris related accidents since the study began, 16 states including Texas and Washington have implemented laws holding drivers responsible for improperly securing items on pickup truck and debris falling from their vehicle.

Risks & Challenges

The greatest risk associated with road debris is that one more person becomes maimed or is killed due to roadside rubbish. We can't count on the county inmates from the  Department Of Corrections to make sure our highways are clear of dangerous debris in the road.

The biggest challenge our company faces is raising enough capital to get the Cargo Divider System to market. Once we get past this initial stage, BedLock Systems, LLC can have a significant impact on how vehicles secure their cargo.

BedLock Systems, LLC cannot save every life, but if we save one person from a lifetime of agony or a family from losing their dad because we prevented a back yard grill from toppling off a pickup truck, then we have accomplished our mission. If you own a pickup truck, you can help. You no longer have to have an unsecured load. Don't be the guy that has to live with your random mattress or paint bucket falling off your truck, causing the accident that takes a life.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

campaign_city: Mount Pleasant, South Carolina, United States

story:
Existing gig economy companies currently take as much as 90% of what the consumer pays; One Search of the internet proves that the proof is in the pudding. These companies only provide only basic leads, billing support and Sub Par "partner support" while these companies pay "partners" peanut wages, that often times don't even their basic needs or vehicle repairs. What's more, nearly all the money that you spend on these services as a consumer are shipped back to Silicon Valley making billionaires richer; forcing your neighbors into poverty and bankruptcy. 

 

These companies want to decimate society by automating the american workforce (to save costs) when only 29% of the North-American population has attained more than a 2 Year degree. If we automate without the educational infrastructure in place the economy will likely implode upon itself due to extremely high unemployment rates that North America has not seen since the Gilded Age and Great Depression because we did not have the proper structure in place to support this change. 

 

Our objective is simple, raise enough funds to create a new kind of app, global in nature but local in structure. Any additional funds will be used to pay for legal counsel, licencing fees to help markets get started when applicable (afterwards they are on their own) initial back-end liability insurance, advertising and to support labor to restructure the existing industry into something more sustainable; both politically and economically. 

 

On our system, providers will keep 100% (minus payment processing fees where applicable). Our system will allow multiple forms of payment. Providers will also be able to set their own rates and build their own recurring business base including creating their own schedules in app, while consumers will be able to name their own price; pick their own provider all while having access to 15+ service options on a single mobile application (region permitting of course). Markets will be managed locally with a distributed format ensuring that everything remains transparent while consumers and providers will all be able to make decisions and enact discipline (when necessary) without worrying that the executive decision maker has the ultimate benefit of hiding behind a veil. 

 

How will Agora make money if they aren't taking a cut? 

The organization has plans to make money through advertising (simple partnerships, banner ads only- nothing obtrusive or annoying) and has future plans for both an IPO and an ICO when accessible. The organization also has plans for adding block-chain to its future structure where most everything will be automatically executed by the system, from escrow and payments to insurance and documentation on all fronts. 

 

 

If any of this interests you or you see the need for a better future, please contribute to our cause. 

Remember Think Global, Act Local, Live Glocal

story:
Short Summary

As the owner of J Seven Logistics, I am very excited about the start-up.  As a father of four, I am always concerned about their safety.  When I hear stories of people getting attacked or drivers being attacked, I feel for the families involved.  I decided that some things need to remain personal.  Some of us desire a more personal touch.   

With my degree in Criminal Justice and my experience in logistics and celebrity security, I have hired qualified colleagues to provide personal driver service and personal delivery service.  This will provide safety for all precious cargo.  Please help me with the start-up and hopefully we can spread as a national service.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your assistance for:

  • the development of the JSeven App
  • the additional vehicles for the start-up fleet
  • additional training for new hires
  • marketing and promotions

If the goal is not reached we will minimize the service and start as a smaller service with less drivers. 

Risks & Challenges

The challenges with the service would be competing with Uber and Lyft.  However, we plan to focus on the security and personal aspects that our service provides.  Can you imagine the feeling of being picked up by a well dressed security professional for your rides? Can you imagine sending a package or freight with security? This is what we plan to create - a feeling of safety in logistics.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Please remember that any amount helps.  However, if you are unable to help financially, please get the word out by using the share tools. 

Thanks in advance for your consideration in helping J Seven grow into reality.

story:
Tideline has been operating a commuter ferry service between the Berkeley Marina and Pier 1.5 since March 2017.

We have received many requests to add another boat for this route .  Here is what people are saying about Tideline...

"a life changing experience"

"a favorite part of the day"

"refreshing and invigorating" 

Tideline would like more people to experience a friendly, fast and affordable commute, that is why we are crowdfunding more lines of service between Berkeley and San Francisco

We are pre-selling monthly passes at $290 and one Roundtrip Tickets at $16.  We need $7,500 to launch, but more importantly we need committed riders to keep the service going.

Here is the proposed schedule:

Berkeley Departures:                                                     San Francisco Departures:

8:00am and 9:00am                                                        8:30am and 9:30am

5:30pm and 6:30pm                                                        6:00pm and 7:00pm

 

Each one-way trip takes 25-30 minutes between the Berkeley Marina and Pier 1.5 in San Francisco (including boarding and disembarking). Riders board at the K Dock at Berkeley Marina in front of Harbormaster’s office (next to Hana Japan Restaurant). The Berkeley Marina is on bus line 81, which goes to UC Berkeley, BART, and the Berkeley Capitol Corridor Amtrak Station. Our riders are also permitted to park for free across the street in the South Sailing Basin gravel parking lot near the UC Aquatic Center.

We have been so lucky to receive so much support for our service.  Tideline appreciates you sharing our campaign on social outlets like Facebook, Twitter and even Next Door.  Everybody deserves a great commute.

story:
Hello! My name is Don Ladanyi and I am a bio-medical engineer with degrees in law, engineering and medicine. I have been a new product developer since 1962 with my first endeavor being a team member in the development of the very first portable heart defibrillator. You can find me on LinkedIn.

Recently, I went all-in on the development of Essential Powder® for the FASTEST temporary relief of occasional acid reflux (GERD), heartburn and indigestion anywhere. And it's a big hit for We Got The Beet, LLC.  Unfortunately, I let the DynaVizor® project slide to the side for lack of "essential" funding on my part...

But fortunately, I have an in-place agreement with the world's largest manufacturer of window tint films to do a one day production run of the DynaVizors® that would normally cost $10,000 for the service. All I have to do is come up with the raw materials, that being (1) the relatively expensive photochromic dyes, (2) the carrier, a clear window film substrate and (3) the clear coat, solvent-based matrix material that will contain the photochromic dyes and our patented photochromic longevity technology.

Any additional funding beyond my stated $20,000 goal will be used to buy more of the necessary materials to do an even bigger single day production run. The finished DynaVizor® products will be sold in pairs for $19.95 via our website at http://www.dynatint.com and through "As-Seen-On-TV" independent marketers that have promised significant TV air time when the product actually becomes physically available.

There is no product like this anywhere in the marketplace and certainly not one that can claim the years of longevity that the DynaVizor® product can deliver. And it even works behind windshield glass! A huge stumbling block for any potential competitors.

If I don't reach my stated goal, then the funds available will hopefully be enough to do a small pilot run of several hundred pairs (or maybe even a thousand) of the DynaVizors® rather than 15,000.

As of today, we have over 2,700 Facebook "Likes" with just about as many "Followers" eagerly awaiting this product's introduction. Now, that's some amazing Facebook "Follower" numbers!

Oh, and what are the main features and benefits of the DynaVizor®? 

1. It's a true "peel & stick" product. If you don't align it up to quite your liking, just peel it back off and start to lay it down again. It's that easy!

2.It is totally clear at night yet darkens proportionally to the intensity of the daytime sunlight. It even works on rainy, cloudy, overcast days. It's that sensitive. 

3. It transitions FAST and automatically. Sun and it goes dark, no sun and it quickly fades to clear.

4. Great for people with sight challenges that have to avoid bright sunlight but offers clear, unobstructed, night-time vision.

5. Superior UV sunlight eye and skin protection. For truckers, placing the DynaVizors® on a side window can avoid the commonplace "farmer's tan."

6. Perks? Indiegogo funders will get a special and sizable discount once the DynaVizor® product hits the market (via our website). 

 

Cheers and thank you all,

Don Ladanyi
story_txt:
Hello! My name is Don Ladanyi and I am a bio-medical engineer with degrees in law, engineering and medicine. I have been a new product developer since 1962 with my first endeavor being a team member in the development of the very first portable heart defibrillator. You can find me on LinkedIn.
Recently, I went all-in on the development of Essential Powder® for the FASTEST temporary relief of occasional acid reflux (GERD), heartburn and indigestion anywhere. And it's a big hit for We Got The Beet, LLC.  Unfortunately, I let the DynaVizor® project slide to the side for lack of "essential" funding on my part...
But fortunately, I have an in-place agreement with the world's largest manufacturer of window tint films to do a one day production run of the DynaVizors® that would normally cost $10,000 for the service. All I have to do is come up with the raw materials, that being (1) the relatively expensive photochromic dyes, (2) the carrier, a clear window film substrate and (3) the clear coat, solvent-based matrix material that will contain the photochromic dyes and our patented photochromic longevity technology.
Any additional funding beyond my stated $20,000 goal will be used to buy more of the necessary materials to do an even bigger single day production run. The finished DynaVizor® products will be sold in pairs for $19.95 via our website at http://www.dynatint.com and through "As-Seen-On-TV" independent marketers that have promised significant TV air time when the product actually becomes physically available.
There is no product like this anywhere in the marketplace and certainly not one that can claim the years of longevity that the DynaVizor® product can deliver. And it even works behind windshield glass! A huge stumbling block for any potential competitors.
If I don't reach my stated goal, then the funds available will hopefully be enough to do a small pilot run of several hundred pairs (or maybe even a thousand) of the DynaVizors® rather than 15,000.
As of today, we have over 2,700 Facebook "Likes" with just about as many "Followers" eagerly awaiting this product's introduction. Now, that's some amazing Facebook "Follower" numbers!
Oh, and what are the main features and benefits of the DynaVizor®? 
1. It's a true "peel & stick" product. If you don't align it up to quite your liking, just peel it back off and start to lay it down again. It's that easy!
2.It is totally clear at night yet darkens proportionally to the intensity of the daytime sunlight. It even works on rainy, cloudy, overcast days. It's that sensitive. 
3. It transitions FAST and automatically. Sun and it goes dark, no sun and it quickly fades to clear.
4. Great for people with sight challenges that have to avoid bright sunlight but offers clear, unobstructed, night-time vision.
5. Superior UV sunlight eye and skin protection. For truckers, placing the DynaVizors® on a side window can avoid the commonplace "farmer's tan."
6. Perks? Indiegogo funders will get a special and sizable discount once the DynaVizor® product hits the market (via our website). 
 
Cheers and thank you all,
Don Ladanyi

story:
Thank you all for participating with our campaign  this time. 
If you have and comment, request, or join our brand agency, please feel free to email us at ideal@startsjump.com 

Every hot news or event about  STARTS JUMP bicycle will be updated on the official platform.
http://www.startsjump.com

Or join as our fans now https://www.fackbook.com/StartsJumpDesign
@StartsJumpDesign


Thank you very much~
Sincerely, STARTS JUMP team.

​

Naming Origin 
Design is like a relationship produced by human and the tangible or intangible surroundings interaction.

Jumping is the human nature.

Experience the Eight Worldly Dharmas by feeling, reflecting, learning, and grateful.

STARTS JUMP arises spontaneously.

 

Designer of STARTS JUMP is

  • Mechanical design engineering background
  • Previous experiences were related in machinery and product development
  • Capable of mechanical structure design and metal processing process
  • Awards & Publication  http://www.startsjump.com 

Speaking of myself, creating a product to the users them to directly operate and feel it has always been my dream and original goal. After that, I have comprehended that a bicycle is the most ideal product to be connected with my thoughts.  For me, it is the most directly tool and can be used for the user to go any places they want to go. A few years of exploring and researching on the bicycles, I established my own company, STARTS JUMP CO., LTD.  The company aims to create some functions upon the bicycle products in order to achieve for bringing the different riding experience to riders.

 

STARTS JUMP Branding Mission 

  • loop up our branded products into user's daily life
  • provide quality on our branded products   
  • prepare various selection on our branded products to fulfill the different potential user demands  

 

Sincerely from the STARTS JUMP Team   www.startsjump.com

story: I have grown up with great passionate with bicycles since i was a little kid, and now over 30years i want to reach my goal of modifying regular bikes by creating Solar bikes which are ECO friendly, bikes that does not harm environment by polluting air or bringing unnecessary noises. Solar Energy will easy climbing high hills with these bikes and thus main concept of this campaign to easy this ECO friendly mode of transport in mountaneous locations.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
للعربية إنظر بالأسفل

As Seen on Huffington Post :  https://goo.gl/JcgoLK

Imagine this : Your Grandchildren will be able to tell the story that YOU helped in sending the First Book to Moon.






This is an Example of Maximum Size for the Capsule 
 


Why Sending The First Book on The Moon Matters ?

These Are The Reasons for Sending The First Book To the Moon ( Holy Quran ) :

  • A New Record For World Guinness World Records.
  • Promoting a Peaceful and innovative view on Islam .
  • The Holy Quran is the Book that Unites all Muslims together , it is a reminder of what unites Muslims in times of conflict  .
  • A BenchMark For All Muslim to Start competing in Space initiative and Space Technology, thus helping humanity and contributing to the world.


Guinness World Records Registration Reference : 161110122008fbot

What do We need to Achieve This ?

  • 25,800 USD For The Moon Mail Package Which will Allow us to send the Book.

  • 5000 USD To Develop the Website and Social Media Accounts.
  • 1000 USD To Priority Process and Regester the World Records .
  • 2000 USD to Purchase or Produce The Miniature Version of the Holy Quran in the 1 x 2 inches size to fit the capsule.
  • 500 USD For Shiping Expences
  • 10,000 For Publishing Press Realises , Public Relations Fees and Appearing on Media to Promote the initiative.
  • 5000 USD Will Go To Google Ads and Social Media Celebrities who will Promote the initiative.
  • 700 USD will be Divided Equally As a Bonus to All on-site Volunteers ( Excluding the Founder )  

The Impact

You only Hear and read negative things about Muslims in the Media , well we are not like that at all.
More than 1 Billion Muslim Around the World will be inspired by this initiative and this will be a benchmark event that will help Muslims Contribute more to Humanity.

  • A Message of Peace for All Muslims in times of conflict.
  • Making History By Taking the First Book to the Moon.
  • Achieving a world record in Guinness World Records.
  • Contributing & Promoting the Space industry and Space pioneering.
  • Setting a Benchmark for All Muslim to start a new age of space competitions.
  • Leaving a Legacy for all Muslim on the Moon until the time comes when the ( Holy Quran Will be in the First Lunar Museum )

Risks & Challenges

The environment on the Moon is harsh. There are extreme temperature variances and solar radiation that reaches the surface. Much like other artifacts from history, some items will age better than others. Regardless of the condition of the item's however, all MoonMail™ participants will have a lasting connection to the Moon for their most important memories. You will be a participant of the first commercial lunar landings in human history.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You Can Share This Campaign in your Social Media Accounts.
  • Refer Reporter and Mentioned this campaign to Media and New Agencies.
  • Talk About it With your friend and Family.

 

Past Achievements Attempts

  • Participating in Lunar Lion Program ( Pen State ) with the First Arabic Text To be engraved on it and Sending via Lunar Lion the First Arabic Tweet from the Moon .
  • The First Arab Volunteer in the Mars one Program and Sending the Frist Arabic Written Text to Mars Via Mars Lander Parachute.

Imagine this : After 100 Years This Book will Be in the First Lunar Museum and YOU Helped Take it There.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

تخيل هذا : أن أحفادك عندما يزورون القمر في  الإجازة الصيفية سيرون المصحف في المتحف القمري الأول و ستقول لهم تخيلوا أني ساهمت في هذا المشروع !







هذا مثال لحجم المصحف الذي سيتم إرساله 

 


لماذا إرسال المصحف كأول كتاب للقمر مهم ؟

  •  عمل إنجاز بإسم الأمة الإسلامية يحفز و يرفع معنويات المسلمين
  • تحقيق عامل - مؤثر الفراشة - بتحويل نظر المسلمين الى الفضاء
  • التذكير بأن ما يجمعنا هو القرآن الكريمو أعبرها رسالة سلام
  • ليكون حفظاً و إلهاما لمن يأتي بعدنا من الأجيال القادمة
  • نشر غير مباشر للدين الإسلامي - فيقوم من يسمع الخبر بالبحث عن القرآن و قرأته
  • تسجيل الحدث في موسوعة جينيس العالمية 


  161110122008fbot رقم التسجيل لدى موسوعة جينيس القياسية 

 ماذا نحتاج لنحقق هذا الهدف ؟

  • 25,800 USD  Moon Mail رسوم إرسال المصحف للقمر عبر خدمة.

  • 5000 USD رسوم عمل الموقع و تأسيس الشبكات الإجماعية.
  • 1000 USD  World Records رسوم تسجيل موسوعة جينيس العالمية
  • 2000 USD لشراء و طباعة و قص المصحف الشريف بالمقاس المطلوب
  • 500 USD رسوم شحن داخل كوكب الأرض
  • 10,000 لنشر الخبر لدى وكالات الأخبار العالمية و تسجيل الحدث لدى المؤسسات الإعلامية العربية
  • 5000 USD رسوم إعلانات في جوجل و لدى مشاهير الشبكات الإجتماعية
  • 700 USD سيتم توزيعها على المتطوعين الفعليين المشاركين - بإستثناء المؤسس  

الرسالة

نحن المسلمون أكثر من مليار شخص حول العالم و مساهماتنا في مجال الفضال غير موجودة إن قورنت بالمساهمات الأخرى السابقة ، فعلينا أن نشارك في بناء الجنس البشري كافة ، علينا أن نشارك في بناء المستقبل ، خصوصا و ان الإعلام لا ينصف المسلمين فيجب أن نعلم على بث و خلق أعمال إيجابية و ملهمة من نحن المسلمين أنفسنا و نساعد الإنسانية للوصول لكافة قدراتها الكامنة بحب و سلام

  • رسالة سلام من المسلمين في أوقات يكون السلام مجرد أمل.
  • تسجيل إسم المسلمين في التاريخ كأول كتاب على سطل القمر هو القرآن الكريم.
  • الحصول على رقم قياسي عالمي جديد في موسوعة جينيس العالمية.
  • المساهمة في مبادرة ريادة الفضاء و توجيه أنظار المسلمين للفضاء.
  • عمل ملهم يجمع المسلمين بكافة أطيافهم و طوائفهم و يحفزهم للمساهمة في مجال الفضاء.
  • ترك بصمة طيبة و أثر طيب للمسلمين في أذهان الجيل الجديد

الصعوبات و المخاطر

البيئة في القمر شرسة جداً و قاسية ، فيوجد تقلبات شديدة في درجات الحرارة و الإشعاعات الشمسية و الفضائية التي تصل لسطح القمر بشكل مستمر دون أي غلاف جوي يحميه ، لكن الكبسولات ستحمي المصحف لأنها مصنوعة من أفضل و أغلى ما صنعته البشرية و احدث ما توصلت إليه التقنية ، كما إنه ستكون هذه اول رحلة تجارية عبر خدمة مون مايل التوصيل خارج كوكب الأرض

طرق أخرى يمكنك المساعدة بها

  • تستطيع مشاركة هذا الرابط مع عائلتك و أصدقائك

  • إرسال هذا المقال الى الإعلامين و الصحفيين الذين تعرفهم

  • التحدث عن هذه المبادرة مع العائلة و الأصدقاء و مناقشتها

 

 

الإنجازات و المحاولات السابقة 

  • المساهمة في برنامج لونار لايون القائم من طلاب و أساتذة جامعة بنسلفانيا الأمريكية لإسرال أول تغريدة من القمر عبر المسبار لونار لايون و أول نص عربي محفور في المسبار نفسه
  • كان مؤسس المبادرة من أوائل المتطوعين للسفر الى المريخ عبر منظمة مارس ون و سيرسل عبر نفس المنظمة اول نص مطبوع لكوكب المريخ في باراشوت مسبار المريخ

 

تخيل هذا : بعد ١٠٠ عام سيجدوا المصحف أحفادك ، و تذكر أنك ساهمت في إرسال المصحف للقمر .

 

للمزيد يرجى قراءة هذه المقالة :

http://www.huffpostarabi.com/mohammad-bahareth/story_b_13124156.html

 

للتعرف أكثر صاحب الحملة أكثر يرجى زيارة الموقع

www.mohammadbahareth.com

التحدث عن هذه المبادرة مع العائلة و الأصدقاء و مناقشتها



 

 
الإنجازات و المحاولات السابقة 
المساهمة في برنامج لونار لايون القائم من طلاب و أساتذة جامعة بنسلفانيا الأمريكية لإسرال أول تغريدة من القمر عبر المسبار لونار لايون و أول نص عربي محفور في المسبار نفسه
كان مؤسس المبادرة من أوائل المتطوعين للسفر الى المريخ عبر منظمة مارس ون و سيرسل عبر نفس المنظمة اول نص مطبوع لكوكب المريخ في باراشوت مسبار المريخ
 تخيل هذا : بعد ١٠٠ عام سيجدوا المصحف أحفادك ، و تذكر أنك ساهمت في إرسال المصحف للقمر . للمزيد يرجى قراءة هذه المقالة :http://www.huffpostarabi.com/mohammad-bahareth/story_b_13124156.html للتعرف أكثر صاحب الحملة أكثر يرجى زيارة الموقعwww.mohammadbahareth.com

story:
Story of Sanctum

After winning the MathWorks COVID-19 Challenge in the summer of 2020, the founding team composes of fellows from the Integrated Design Lab (IDM) of MIT School of Engineering and Sloan School of Management developed an origami space divider to provide the population with safety from COVID-19 in close-quartered public spaces. With bureaucratic roadblocks, we faced an unpredictable amount of challenges introducing the divider this past year despite the protection that it provides. 

As of today, our team grows to have members from various disciplines. We continue to persist in our efforts to prove the product's scientific efficacy and refine the engineering details. In order to get to the manufacturing stage for large-scale protection, we need your support.  As when vaccination is slowly rolling out, the divider shall become a critical measure to protect the population in public spaces. 

After the pandemic, we hope to grasp every moment that we can to create simple pleasure for you, such that you can enjoy your own private cubicle or power nap anywhere and anytime in Sanctum. 

 

 

 

 

 

Product Features

Sanctum combines both fluid dynamic and psychological sciences, to provide you with privacy and protection from germs in public spaces. It is a simple piece of origami that is made of sustainable materials. Find yourself dreaming with our cloud-like daylight white color and savor a midnight snack with our mysterious dark color. 

 

Materials

Sanctum dividers are made of recyclable paper, fabric, and cardboard materials. The COVID-19 virus lasts for a significantly less amount of time on paper and fabric materials as opposed to on other materials like plastic, glass, or stainless steel commonly used in dividers.

 

Dimensions

 

Experimentation

Thanks to Elizabeth Brennan and Yongji Wang, we tested the effectiveness of using dividers to decrease germ spread in public spaces. Viruses use air particles breathed out by humans as their medium of transmission. We simulated this event by using water molecules, a medium that has comparable fluid dynamics. We placed lego blocks throughout a liquid tank to represent seats in a public space. Yellow liquid, representing someone's breath, was released from a syringe at one of these seats. We found that the yellow liquid spread much faster and farther when no dividers were present as opposed to when dividers were in place. The results indicate that using dividers decreases the spread of germs from someone's breath throughout a public space. This also brings us to a grander conclusion that breaking airflow can be more important than social distancing. Below are some images from our fluid dynamic simulation of an airplane-like seating arrangement approximately 10 seconds after yellow liquid was released:

Before dividers:

After dividers:

story:
Don't put yourself and family at risk ...

You never think you would need anything like this but you must have seen the breakdown of other cars. How dangerous it is when the car stops on the highway! By taking a few simple steps and keeping a set of emergency warning triangles in your vehicle, you can greatly improve your safety and reduce the likelihood that a secondary accident will occur or you will be hit while parked on the shoulder or near moving traffic.

 

The Smart Triangle can help offer some added protection and peace of mind on your travels with more emergency features.

The strong magnet can hang or attach firmly to any vehicle metal surface in any position. And together with the flashing bright red LED, this gives very far early warning signal to other vehicles.

 

 

 

The higher warning sign gives additional clearer and farther vision distance to the oncoming traffics reducing the chance of the view being blocked by the front cars.

 

Rear white LED bar for emergency lighting

 

SOS signal mode for help

The SOS flashing mode of the red LED and the green laser beam give additional emergency signal to seek help from the other people and even air rescue team when trapped in the dark forest or wild park.

 

 

"I put a set of these in each car. You never know when you will get stranded somewhere that is poorly lit at night."

"It’s ready in the van for any emergence. Hope we don't have to use them, but they're there if needed."

"It folds up nicely for vehicle storage. I also like that you can either hang it or attach it to your vehicle by the magnets. The LED blinking lights and SOS mode are another nice feature. Well designed and constructed."

"You can alert motorists to roadside trouble day or night and help keep you and your passengers safe."

 

Please support our campaign to make the road safer!
